title: 880-03 Kashf al-lithām ʻan asʼilat al-anām : manuscript / Ḥusayn ibn Muḥammad al-Maḥallī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi thiqatī. Ḥamdan li-man faqqaha fī al-dīn man irtaḍāhu min ʻibādih, fa-salakū minhāj al-rashād ʻalá wafq murādih, wa-ṣalātan wa-salāman ʻalá Sayyid al-Mursalīn, al-qāʼil 'Man yarid Allāh bi-hi khayran yufaqqihhu fī al-dīn', wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-aṣḥābihi wa-al-tābiʻīn wa-tābiʻīhim bi-iḥsān ilá Yawm al-Dīn. Wa-baʻd, fa-yaqūlu rājī ʻafwa Rabbihi wa-iḥsānah, wa-muʼammil min Allāh faḍla jūdihi wa-imtinānah, Ḥusayn ibn Muḥammad al-Maḥallī al-Shāfiʻī: Lammā kathura al-suʼāl ʻan waqāʼiʻ al-aḥwāl, wa-zāda al-ishtighāl fī al-ḥall wa-al-irtiḥāl, wa-qalla man yujību al-sāʼil bi-al-manqūl, wa-iʻtamad al-muftīyūn [al-muftūn] ʻalá jawāhir al-ʻuqūl, wa-rubbamā ajābū fī al-wāqiʻāt bi-ghayr mā qarrarahu al-aʼimmah min al-manqūlāt, aradtu an ajmaʻa mā yartāḥu bi-hi al-labīb wa-yakshufu al-karb ʻan kull muhimm gharīb ..."

title: 880-03 Kashf al-lithām ʻan asʼilat al-anām : manuscript / Ḥusayn ibn Muḥammad al-Maḥallī.
note_text: Secundo folio: al-sukhūnah wa-al-burūdah wa-māʼ diyār Thamūd.

title: 880-03 Kashf al-lithām ʻan asʼilat al-anām : manuscript / Ḥusayn ibn Muḥammad al-Maḥallī.
note_text: At the head of folio 1a: An endowment statement: "Awqafa hādhā al-kitāb Aḥmad Muḥammad al-Najjārī."

title: 880-02 Taʻlīm al-mutaʻallim ṭarīq al-taʻallum : manuscript / Burhān al-Dīn al-Zarnūjī.
note_text: Incipit of the excerpt from "Majālis al-abrār wa-masālik al-akhyār": "Aʻūdhu billāh min al-Shayṭān al-rajīm. Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Majlis al-ḥādī wa-al-thalāthūn: Fī bayān ṣadaqat al-fiṭr wa-aḥkām al-ʻīdayn wa-bayān al-bidaʻ fīhi [fīhimā]. Faraḍ Rasūl Allāh, ṣallá Allāh taʻālá ʻalayhi wa-sallam, zakāt al-Fiṭr ṭuhratan lil-ṣiyām min al-lahw wa-al-laghw wa-al-rifth wa-ṭuʻmatan lil-masākīn. Wa-hādhā al-Ḥadīth min ḥisān al-Maṣābīḥ, rawāhu Ibn ʻAbbās, wa-huwa yadullu ʻalá wujūb ṣadaqat al-Fiṭr, li-anna al-farḍ fī al-lughah bi-maʻná al-taqdīr, wa-fī al-sharʻ bi-maʻná al-ījāb. Wa-lafẓ al-Shāriʻ dāra bayna al-maʻná al-sharʻī wa-maʻná [wa-al-maʻná] al-lughawī, yataʻayyanu ḥamluhu ʻalá al-maʻná al-sharʻī mā amkana, li-anna al-ghālib min ḥāl al-Nabī, ʻalayhi al-salām, taʻrīf al-aḥkām dūn al-lughāt, fa-ʻalá hādhā yakūnu al-maʻná anna wujūb ṣadaqat al-Fiṭr ʻalá al-insān li-fāʼidatan ..."

title: 880-02 Taʻlīm al-mutaʻallim ṭarīq al-taʻallum : manuscript / Burhān al-Dīn al-Zarnūjī.
note_text: Secundo folio of the excerpt from "Majālis al-abrār wa-masālik al-akhyār": bi-al-mubāsharah wa-baʻḍuhum bi-al-mushāhadah.

title: 880-02 Taʻlīm al-mutaʻallim ṭarīq al-taʻallum : manuscript / Burhān al-Dīn al-Zarnūjī.
note_text: Incipit of "Taʻlīm al-mutaʻallim ṭarīq al-taʻallum": "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī faḍḍala banī Ādam bi-al-ʻilm wa-al-ʻamal ʻalá jamīʻ al-ʻālam, wa-al-ṣalāh ʻalá Muḥammad Sayyid al-ʻArab wa-al-ʻAjam, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-aṣḥābih yanābīʻ al-ʻulūm wa-al-ḥikam. Wa-baʻd, fa-lammā raʼaytu kathīran min ṭullāb al-ʻilm fī zamāninā yajiddūna ilá al-ʻilm wa-lā yaṣilūn, wa-min manāfiʻihi wa-thamarātihi, wa-hiya al-ʻamal bi-hi wa-al-nashr yuḥramūn, limā annahum akhṭaʼū ṭarāʼiqahu wa-tarakū sharāʼiṭ [sharāʼiṭahu] <annī>, wa-kull man akhṭaʼa al-ṭarīq ḍalla, wa-lā yanālu al-maqṣūd qalla aw jalla, aradtu wa-aḥbabtu an ubayyina lahum ṭarīq al-taʻallum ʻalá mā raʼaytu fī al-Kitāb wa-samiʻtu min asātīdhī ulī al-ʻilm wa-al-ḥikam rajāʼ al-duʻāʼ lī min al-rāghibīn fīhi al-mukhliṣīn bi-al-fawz wa-al-khalāṣ fī Yawm al-Dīn mā istakhartu lillāh taʻālá fīhi, wa-sammaytuhu 'Taʻlīm al-mutaʻallim ṭarīq al-taʻallum', wa-jaʻaltuhu fuṣūlan ..."

title: 880-02 Taʻlīm al-mutaʻallim ṭarīq al-taʻallum : manuscript / Burhān al-Dīn al-Zarnūjī.
note_text: Secundo folio of "Taʻlīm al-mutaʻallim ṭarīq al-taʻallum": fī taʻẓīm al-ʻilm wa-ahlih.

title: 880-02 Taʻlīm al-mutaʻallim ṭarīq al-taʻallum : manuscript / Burhān al-Dīn al-Zarnūjī.
note_text: "Taʻlīm al-mutaʻallim ṭarīq al-taʻallum" is written in good naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; headings and markings in red; some notes on the margins; catchwords. The excerpt from "Majālis al-abrār wa-masālik al-akhyār" is written in fair naskh/ruqʻah script.

title: 880-02 Taʻlīm al-mutaʻallim ṭarīq al-taʻallum : manuscript / Burhān al-Dīn al-Zarnūjī.
note_text: On folio 1a: "Kitāb bi-hi Taʻallum al-mutaʻallim."

title: 880-02 Taʻlīm al-mutaʻallim ṭarīq al-taʻallum : manuscript / Burhān al-Dīn al-Zarnūjī.
note_text: Folios 3b-9a are blank; text of "Taʻlī al-mutaʻallim ṭarīq al-taʻallum" (folios 9b-30a).

title: 880-02 Taʻlīm al-mutaʻallim ṭarīq al-taʻallum : manuscript / Burhān al-Dīn al-Zarnūjī.
note_text: On folio 9b: "Munājāt [Munājāh]. Lā ilāha illā Allāh, Muḥammad Rasūl Allāh. Lā ilāha illā Allāh, Muḥammad Rasūl Allāh. Hādhā kitāb Taʻlīm mutaʻallim."

title: 880-02 Taʻlīm al-mutaʻallim ṭarīq al-taʻallum : manuscript / Burhān al-Dīn al-Zarnūjī.
note_text: Colophon of the excerpt from "Majālis al-abrār wa-masālik al-akhyār": No colophon. Text ends abruptly with: "... Naʻam. Inna hādhihi al-ayyām ayām faraḥ wa-surūr, lākin yanbaghī an yakūna iẓhār al-faraḥ wa-al-surūr fīhā bi-mā kāna mubāḥan aw mustaḥabban, ka-al-ightisāl wa-al-taṭayyub wa-lays [wa-libs] aḥsan al-sayyiʼāt [al-thiyāb?] al-mubāḥah allatī takūn jadīdah aw ghasīlah ʻalá mā sayajīʼ, lā bi-mā kāna ḥarām [ḥarāman], ka-libs al-ḥarīr wa-al-khawḍ fī al-bāṭil, li-anna al-ʻīd innamā summiya ʻīdan li-annahu taʻālá yaʻūdu fīhi ʻalá al-muʼmin bi-al-maghfirah wa-al-iḥsān, fa-yajibu ʻalayhim an yajtanibū al-maʻṣiyah wa-al-ṭughyān ḥattá yakūnū min ahl al-saʻādah wa-al-ruḍwān, lā min ahl al-shaqāwah wa-al-khidhlān. Wa-qad ḥukiya ʻan baʻḍ al-ʻārifīn annahu [marra] yawm al-ʻīd bi-qawm yalʻabūn wa-yaḍḥakūn, fa-qāl: In kāna tuqubilla min hāʼulāʼ lazimahum an yashkurū wa-laysa hādhā fiʻl al-shākirīn, wa-in kāna lam tuqubilla [yutaqabbal] minhum lazimahum an yakhāfū wa-laysa hādhā fiʻl al-khāʼifīn. Thumma yanbaghī an yuʻlam anna baʻḍ al-nās qad zaʻamū anna ..."

title: 880-02 Taʻlīm al-mutaʻallim ṭarīq al-taʻallum : manuscript / Burhān al-Dīn al-Zarnūjī.
note_text: Colophon of "Taʻlīm al-mutaʻallim ṭarīq al-taʻallum": "Wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh awwalan wa-ākhiran. Wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh ʻalá al-tamām. Wa-al-ṣalāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad khayr al-anām, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-aṣḥābihi ajmaʻīn. 18 Dhī al-Ḥijjah, sanat 1191."

title: 880-02 Taʻlīm al-mutaʻallim ṭarīq al-taʻallum : manuscript / Burhān al-Dīn al-Zarnūjī.
note_text: Translation of the colophon of "Taʻlīm al-mutaʻallim ṭarīq al-taʻallum": "Praise be to God at the beginning and at the end. Praise be to God for the completion. May prayer be upon our Master Muḥammad, the best of mankind, and upon his family and all his companions. 18 Dhū al-Ḥijjah, the year 1191 [of the Hijrah = 17 January, 1778]."

title: 880-02 Rashf al-zulāl min al-siḥr al-ḥalāl : manuscript / Jalāl al-Dīn al-Suyūṭī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Hādhā Rashf al-zulāl min al-siḥr al-ḥalāl fī aḥad wa-ʻishrīn ʻāliman lammā tazawwaja kull wāḥid minhum waṣafa laylatahu mūriyan bi-alfāẓ fannihi min maqāmāt al-Shaykh al-ʻālim al-ʻallāmah al-ḥāfiẓ al-Shaykh Jalāl al-Dīn al-Suyūṭī nafaʻanā Allāh bi-hi wa-al-Muslimīn. Āmīn."

title: 880-02 al-Fatʹḥ al-mubīn bi-sharḥ al-Arbaʻīn : manuscript / Shihāb al-Dīn Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad ibn Ḥajar al-Haythamī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm wa-huwa ḥasbī. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī waffaqa ṭāʼifatan min ʻulamāʼ kull ʻaṣr lil-qiyām bi-aʻbāʼ al-Aḥādīth wa-al-sunan wa-mayyazahum ʻalá siwāhum bi-sulūkihim awḍaḥ al-maḥajjah wa-aqwam al-sunan ..."

title: 880-02 al-Īḍāḥ fī al-nikāḥ wa-al-bāh : manuscript / Jalāl al-Dīn al-Suyūṭī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi ajmaʻīn. Wa-baʻd, fa-hādhā kitāb al-waṣīyah al-mashhūr al-musammá fī ʻilm al-nayk wa-yusammá al-Īḍāḥ fī al-nikāḥ wa-al-bāh fī al-rujūʻ [rujūʻ] al-shaykh ilá al-ṣibāh [ṣibāh] lil-Shaykh al-ajall Jalāl al-Dīn al-Suyūṭī, raḥimahu Allāh taʻālá, wa-dhālika mashhūr lammā fasiqū ahl miṣr allafa lahum hādhā al-kitāb ḥattá rajiʻū ʻan al-liwāṭ bi-barakat al-Shaykh, raḥimahu Allāh taʻālá ..."

title: 880-02 ʻAlam al-malāḥah fī ʻilm al-filāḥah : manuscript / ʻAbd al-Ghanī al-Nābulusī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-Allāh bi-kull shayʼ ʻalīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī anzala min al-samāʼ māʼan fa-aḥyā bi-hi al-arḍ, wa-akhraja thamarāt kull shayʼ bi-qudratih kamā yukhriju al-khalāʼiq yawm al-ʻarḍ, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad alladhī bayyana la-nā al-mashrūʻ wa-ghayr al-mashrūʻ, wa-kammal bi-al-sunnah wa-alzama bi-al-farḍ ... Ammā baʻd, fa-yaqūlu al-ʻabd ... al-madʻū bi-ʻAbd al-Ghanī ... lammā wajadtu kitāb al-filāḥah al-musammá bi-Jāmiʻ fawāʼid al-malāḥah lil-Shaykh ... Raḍī al-Dīn Abī al-Faḍl Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad ibn Aḥmad al-Ghazzī al-ʻĀmirī al-Shāfiʻī ... kitāb jalīl al-miqdār ʻaẓīm al-nafʻ li-man yuʻānī zirāʻat al-arāḍī wa-tarbiyat al-ashjār wa-lākinnahu mimmā yaḥsunu fīhi al-ikhtiṣār fa-jamaʻtu al-himmah wa-lakhkhaṣtu ghālib mā fīhi min al-masāʼil al-muhimmah ... wa-sammaytuhu 'ʻAlam al-malāḥah fī ʻilm al-filāḥah' ..."

title: 880-02 Taqyīdāt ʻalá Sharḥ al-ʻAllāmah al-Saʻd ʻalá matn al-ʻAqāʼid al-Nasafīyah : manuscript / Muḥammad ibn Aḥmad ibn ʻArafah al-Dasūqī al-Mālikī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallam ajmaʻīn. Qawluhu 'al-mutawaḥḥid' min al-tawaḥḥud, wa-min al-maʻlūm anna al-tawaḥḥud ʻalá wazn al-tafaʻʻul wa-ṣīghat al-tafaʻʻul taʼtī li-maʻān ..."

title: 880-02 Mukhtaṣar Qawāʻid al-Zarkashī : manuscript / ʻAbd al-Wahhāb ibn Aḥmad al-Shaʻrānī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Min mumidd al-kawn astamiddu al-ʻawn. al-Ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn wa-ashhadu an lā ilāh illā Allāh al-malik al-ḥaqq al-mubīn, wa-ashhadu anna Muḥammadan ʻabduhu wa-rasūluhu sayyid al-awwalīn wa-al-ākharīn. Allāhumma ṣalli wa-sallam ʻalayhi wa-ʻalá sāyir al-anbiyāʼ wa-al-mursalīn wa-ʻalá ālihim wa-ṣaḥbihim ajmaʻīn. Wa-baʻd, fa-hādhihi qawāʻid ʻaẓīmah yaḥtāju ilayhā kull faqīh intakhabtuhā min kitāb al-Qawāʻid lil-Shaykh al-Imām al-ʻālim al-Shaykh Badr al-Dīn al-Zarkashī raḥimahu Allāh taʻālá, fa-man raʼá fī hādhihi al-qawāʻid khaṭaʼan aw taḥrīfan fa-li-yurājiʻ aṣlahu, fa-rubbamā yakūnu dhālika min sūʼ fahmī, wa-Allāh fī ʻawn al-ʻabd mā kāna al-ʻabd fī ʻawn akhīh, wa-rattabtuhā tibʻan li-aṣlihā ʻalá ḥurūf al-muʻjam tasʹhīlan lil-ṭālib ..."

title: 880-03 al-Maqāmāt al-Ḥarīrīyah : manuscript / al-Qāsim ibn ʻAlī al-Ḥarīrī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Qāla al-Shaykh al-ajall al-awḥad Abū Muḥammad al-Qāsim ibn ʻAlī ibn Muḥammad ibn ʻUthmān al-Ḥarīrī al-Baṣrī, barrada Allāh maḍjaʻahu: Allāhumma innā naḥmaduka ʻalá mā ʻallamta min al-bayān wa-alhamta min al-tibyān kamā naḥmaduka ʻalá mā asbaghta min al-ʻaṭāʼ wa-asbalta min al-ghiṭāʼ wa-naʻūdhu bi-ka min shirrat al-lasn wa-fuḍūl al-hadhī ..."

title: 880-02 Ḥāshiyat al-Amīr al-Kabīr ʻalá Sharḥ al-Samarqandīyah lil-Mullawī : manuscript / Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad al-Amīr al-Kabīr.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamd al-ḥaqīqī laka minka yā ḥamīd yā majīd, fa-innamā majāz ḥamdinā takhyīl istiʻārah fī iṭlāq al-tajrīd, wa-rashshiḥ Allāhumma asrāranā bi-an taḍmura fī nufūsinā shuhūd waḥdatik al-aṣlīyah maʻa istiʻmālinā fī mursal tabʻīyat mursalika fī bayān al-ʻalāqāt al-marḍīyah, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-sallama wa-sharrafa wa-majjada wa-karram. Āmīn. Ammā baʻd, fa-yaqūlu Muḥammad al-Amīr al-Miṣrī al-Azʹharī: Hādhā mā narjū Allāh taʻālá fīhi ʻalá sharḥ Shaykhinā wa-shaykh mashāyikhinā wa-mashāyikhihim al-ʻAllāmah al-Mullawī ʻalá al-istiʻārāt ..."

title: 880-03 al-Risālah al-Qushayrīyah : manuscript / ʻAbd al-Karīm ibn Hawāzin al-Qushayrī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī tafarrada bi-jalāl malakūtih wa-tawaḥḥada bi-jamāl jabarūtih wa-taʻazzaza bi-ʻulū aḥadīyatih wa-taqaddasa bi-sumū ṣamadīyatih wa-takabbara fī dhātih ʻan muḍāraʻat kull naẓīr wa-tanazzaha fī ṣifātih ʻan kull tanāhin wa-quṣūr ..."

title: 880-02 Fatʹḥ al-mutaʻāl ʻalá al-qaṣīdah al-musammāh bi-Lāmīyat al-afʻāl : manuscript / Ḥamad ibn Muḥammad al-Ṣaʻīdī al-Mālikī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm wa-bi-hi thiqatī wa-tawakkulī. al-Ḥamdu lillāh ʻalá afḍālih wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salā[m] ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ālihi. Wa-baʻd fa-yaqūlu aḥwaj al-ʻibād wa-akhfaḍ al-ʻabīd Ḥamad ibn Muḥammad al-Ṣaʻīd[ī] al-Mālikī ghafara Allāh la-hu wa-li-wālidayh wa-li-ikhwānihi al-Muslimīn. Āmīn. Hādhā taʻlīq laṭīf ʻalá manẓūmat al-Imām Abī ʻAbd Allāh Jamāl al-Dīn Muḥammad ibn ʻAbd Allāh ibn Mālik al-Andalusī al-Jayyānī al-Naḥwī al-Lughawī al-Ṣarf[ī] iqtaṣartu fīhi ʻalá ḥall alfāẓihā wa-bayān murādihā ..."

title: 880-02 al-Minaḥ al-Ilāhīyah bi-sharḥ baʻḍ al-awrād al-Bakrīyah : manuscript / ʻAlī ibn ʻAbd al-Barr al-Wanāʼī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh al-ʻalī al-ʻaẓīm dhī al-kamāl alladhī lā tudriku al-ʻuqūl minhu shayʼan wa-lā talmaḥu minhu lamḥatan wa-lā taḥtamilu al-afkār al-salīmah ẓuhūr athar min āthārih illā bi-imdād minhu wa-manḥih ... Wa-baʻd fa-yaqūlu al-faqīr ilá mawlāh ʻAlī ibn ʻAbd al-Barr al-Ḥasanī al-Wanāʼī al-Shāfiʻī ... Hādhā sharḥ laṭīf ʻalá Awrād al-ṣabāḥ wa-al-masāʼ wa-al-ṣalawāt al-khams lil-Imām al-humām Sayyidī Muṣṭafá al-Bakrī, qaddasa Allāh sirrahu, fa-innahā zād al-musāfir wa-bi-hā yakūnu al-murīd bi-āmālihi ẓāfir ..."

title: 880-02 Risālah fī sharḥ qawlihi taʻālá Innamā yaʻmuru masājida Allāh : manuscript / ʻUmar ibn ʻAlī al-Ṭaḥlāwī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ālih. Ḥamdan li-man naḍḍara wujūh ahl al-Ḥadīth wa-ṣalātan wa-salāman ʻalá khayr rasūl nazala ʻalayhi aḥsan al-Ḥadīth wa-ʻalá ālihi al-aʻlām wa-ṣaḥābatihi wa-dhurrīyatihi al-kirām mā ʻummirat fī al-arḍ masājid wa-taqarraba ilá Allāh rākiʻ wa-sājid. Rabbi waffiqnī fa-lā aʻdilu ʻan sunan al-sāʻīn fī khayr sanan. Wa-baʻd fa-yaqūlu afqar al-ʻibād li-raḥmat rabbihi yawm al-tanād ʻUmar ibn ʻAlī al-Ṭaḥlāwī al-Mālikī al-Azʹharī: Lammā anʻama Allāh ʻalayya bi-al-tawajjuh ilá al-diyār al-Rūmīyah wa-al-aʻtāb al-sharīfah al-Khāqānīyah sāḥat malik salāṭīn al-Islām Mawlānā al-Sulṭān rafīʻ al-majd wa-al-shān al-mughāzī fī sabīl Allāh Maḥmūd Khān ..."

title: 880-02 al-Maqālah al-sanīyah li-dalāʼil al-ashkāl al-ramlīyah : manuscript / Abū ʻAbd Allāh al-Zinātī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm wa-bi-hi nastaʻīn. Qul lā yaʻlamu man fī al-samāwāt wa-al-arḍ al-ghayb illā Allāh. al-Ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad khātim al-anbiyāʼ wa-al-mursalīn wa-raḍiya Allāh ʻan ālihi wa-aṣḥābihi wa-al-tābiʻīn la-hu bi-iḥsān ilá yawm al-dīn. Qāla al-Imām al-ʻālim al-ʻallāmah Abū ʻAbd Allāh al-Zinātī ʻafá Allāh ʻanhu bi-mannihi wa-karamih: Iʻlam ayyuhā al-ṭālib li-ʻilm al-athar wa-mūḍiḥ al-khabar sa-ūḍiḥu laka ʻan kull marmūz wa-mustatir thumma wa-iʻlam anna ʻilm al-raml al-maʻrūf bi-ʻilm al-athar mā huwa illā ʻilm maʼthūr wa-bi-al-adillah al-muʻtamadah mashhūr ḥaythu mā khaṭṭahu al-amīn Jubrāyīl ʻalayhi al-salām li-Nabī Allāh Idrīs ..."

title: 880-02 al-Aḥkām al-muhimmah fī shurūṭ Ahl al-Dhimmah : manuscript / Ḍiyāʼ al-Dīn Abū al-Hudá ʻAlamī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh munshiʼ saḥāb al-maʻrifah fī samāʼ al-adhhān wa-muṭliʻ shams al-ʻināyah min mashriq al-fahm wa-maṭlaʻ al-bayān wa-munawwir al-jawāriḥ bi-ṣifāt al-ʻibādah wa-anwār al-īmān, wa-ashhadu an lā ilāha illā Allāh shahādata man waḥḥadahu ʻalá al-mushāhadah wa-al-ʻayān wa-ashhadu anna Muḥammadan ʻabduhu wa-rasūluhu al-mabʻūth lil-kāffah min ḍiʼḍiʼ Maʻadd ibn ʻAdnān, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-aṣḥābihi al-makhṣūṣīn bi-al-riḍwān ... fa-qaṣada al-Amīr al-kabīr Sayf al-Dīn al-Mahrānī al-muʻadd la-hum wa-al-muḥakkam fīhim al-muʻayyan bayna al-aʻyān an adhkura la-hu mā warada fī dhālika min al-shurūṭ li-yakūna ḥujjah ʻinda al-imtiḥān fa-istakhartu Allāh wa-jamaʻtuhu bi-ḥaythu lā yaṭʻanu fīhi insān wa-sammaytuhu al-Aḥkām al-muhimmah fī shurūṭ Ahl al-Dhimmah ..."

title: 880-01 Ashkāl al-taʼsīs min Kitāb Iqlīdis : manuscript.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn wa-al-ṣalāh ʻalá Nabīyihi Muḥammad wa-ālihi wa-aṣḥābihi al-ṭāhirīn. Wa-baʻd, fa-inna jamāʻah min al-fuḍalāʼ wa-ṭāʼifah min al-aṣdiqāʼ iltamasū minnī risālah takūnu muqaddimah wa-ālah fī iqtināʼ barāhīn al-ʻulūm al-ḥisābīyah ka-al-aʻmāl al-jabrīyah wa-al-misāḥīyah wa-dhālika muʼassas ʻalá ashkāl al-taʼsīs min Kitāb Iqlīdis wa-hiya ashkāl sharīfah yabtanī ʻlayhā barāhīn al-handasīyāt wa-yantahī ilayhā masāʼil al-riyāḍīyāt ..."

title: 880-02 Faṣl al-khiṭāb fī uṣūl lughat al-Aʻrāb : manuscript / Nāṣīf ibn ʻAbd Allāh al-Yāzijī al-Lubnānī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Fattāḥ. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī ʻilmuhu yastaghriqu al-asmāʼ wa-al-afʻāl wa-bi-yadihi al-taṣrīf wa-al-salāmah wa-al-ṣiḥḥah wa-al-iʻlāl ḥamdan yuzlifunā ilayh yawma tablá al-sarāʼir wa-taẓhar al-ḍamāʼir. Ammā baʻd, fa-hādhā mukhtaṣar jaʻaltuhu ka-al-bāb fī qawāʻid al-taṣrīf wa-al-iʻrāb tastaʻīnu bi-hi al-ṭalabah al-aṣāghir ʻalá al-dukhūl ilá majlis al-akābir wa-qad sammaytuhu Faṣl al-khiṭāb fī uṣūl lughat al-Aʻrāb ..."

title: 880-02 Ikmāl al-dīn wa-itmām al-niʻmah : manuscript / Abū Jaʻfar Muḥammad ibn ʻAlī ibn al-Ḥusayn ibn Mūsá ibn Bābawayh al-Qummī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Rabbi aʻin wa-waffiq ʻalá itmāmih. al-Ḥamdu lillāh al-wāḥid al-aḥad, al-fard al-ṣamad, al-qādir al-ʻalīm al-ḥakīm, taqaddasa wa-taʻālá ʻan ṣifāt al-makhlūqīn, dhī al-jalāl wa-al-ikrām wa-[...] wa-al-inʻām alladhī la-hu al-asmāʼ al-ḥusná wa-al-amthāl al-ʻulyā wa-al-ḥikmah al-bālighah ..."

title: 880-02 Irshād al-sārī fī sharḥ al-Bukhārī. Volume 2 : manuscript / Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad al-Qasṭallānī.
note_text: Incipit: Starts with "Bāb al-fitan. Bi-ʻawn Allāh wa-qūwatih bi-al-tanwīn yadhkuru fīhi qawlahu ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam: 'Man aḥabba liqāʼ Allāh aḥabba Allāh liqāʼah' ..."

title: 880-02 Ḥāshiyah ʻalá Marāqī al-falāḥ : manuscript / Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad al-Ṭahṭāwī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī ayyada al-sharīʻat bi-wurrāthihā wa-rafaʻa bi-him manārahā wa-basaṭa athāthahā wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad afḍal makhlūq wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi al-ʻālimīn bi-al-ḥuqūq. Ammā baʻd, fa-hādhihi taqyīdāt laṭīfah li-Sharḥ Nūr al-īḍāḥ al-musammá bi-Marāq [bi-Marāqī] al-falāḥ, asʼalu Allāh tamāmahā wa-ḥusn ikhtitāmihā, jamaʻtuhā li-man huwa qāṣir mithlī rājiyan qabūlahā min Allāh al-walī al-ʻalī maʼkhūdhah mimmā katabahu al-marḥūm ʻAbd al-Raḥmān Afandī Ḥalawāt wa-min Sharḥ al-muʼallif al-kabīr wa-sharḥ al-Sayyid Muḥammad Abī al-Suʻūd, raḥima Allāh taʻālá al-jamīʻ ..."

title: 880-02 Marāqī al-falāḥ bi-imdād al-Fattāḥ sharḥ Nūr al-īḍāḥ wa-najāt al-arwāḥ : manuscript / Ḥasan ibn ʻAmmār al-Shurunbulālī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm wa-bi-hi nastaʻīn. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī sharrafa khulāṣat ʻibādihi bi-wirāthat ṣafwatih khayra ʻibādih wa-amaddahum bi-al-ʻināyah fa-aḥsanū li-dhātihi al-ʻibādah wa-ḥafiẓū sharīʻatahu wa-ballaghūhā ʻibādah ... Wa-baʻd fa-yaqūlu al-ʻabd al-dhalīl al-rājī ʻafwa rabbihi al-jalīl Ḥasan ibn ʻAmmār ibn ʻAlī al-Shurunbulānī al-Ḥanafī ... Inna hādhā kitāb ṣaghīr ḥajmuhu ghazīr ʻilmuhu ... wa-sammaytuhu Marāqī al-falāḥ bi-imdād al-Fattāḥ sharḥ Nūr al-īḍāḥ wa-najāt al-arwāḥ."

title: 880-03 Tafsīr Abī al-Saʻūd : al-musammá Irshād al-ʻaql al-salīm ilá mazāyā al-Kitāb al-Karīm : manuscript / Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad Abū al-Saʻūd.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. 'Yā ayyuhā alladhīn āmanū awfū bi-al-ʻuqūd'. al-Wafāʼ al-qiyām bi-mūjib al-ʻaqd wa-kadhā al-īfāʼ. Wa-al-ʻaqd huwa al-ʻahd al-muwaththaq al-mushabbah bi-ʻaqd al-ḥabl wa-naḥwih. Wa-al-murād bi-al-ʻuqūd mā yaʻumm jamīʻ mā alzamahu Allāh taʻālá ʻibādahu wa-ʻaqadahu ʻalayhim min al-takālīf wa-al-aḥkām al-dīnīyah wa-mā yaʻqudūnahu fīmā baynahum min ʻuqūd al-amānāt wa-al-muʻāmalāt wa-naḥwihā mimmā yajibu al-wafāʼ bi-hi aw yaḥsunu dīnan bi-an yuḥmala al-amr ʻalá maʻnan yaʻummu al-wujūb wa-al-nadb ..."

title: 880-02 Multaqá al-abḥur : manuscript / Ibrāhīm ibn Muḥammad al-Ḥalabī.
note_text: Incipit: "Multaqá al-abḥur. Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī waffaqanā lil-tafaqquh fī al-dīn alladhī huwa ḥabluhu al-matīn wa-faḍluhu al-mubīn wa-mīrāth al-anbiyāʼ wa-al-mursalīn wa-ḥujjatuhu al-dāmighah ʻalá al-khalq ajmaʻīn wa-maḥajjatuhu al-sālikah ilá aʻlá ʻillīyīn ..."

title: 880-03 al-Tabṣirah : manuscript / Abū al-Faraj ʻAbd al-Raḥmān ibn ʻAlī ibn al-Jawzī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. [al-Ḥamdu] lillāh fāliq al-ḥabb wa-al-nawá wa-sāmiʻ mā khafá wa-khāliq al-ʻabd wa-mā nawá wa-ʻālim mā khafiya, al-muṭṭalaiʻ ʻalá bāṭin al-ḍamīr wa-mā ḥawāhu min al-kadar wa-al-ṣafā, bi-mashīʼatihi rashada man rashad, wa-ghawá man ghawá bi-irādatih wa-jafā. Ikhtāra Muḥammadan, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam, ʻalá sāʼir al-khalāʼiq wa-jaʻalahu musharrafan wa-asrá bi-hi min al-Masjid al-Ḥarām ilá al-Masjid al-Aqṣá fa-kāna dhālika la-hu fakhran wa-sharafan, fa-urkiba al-Burāq wa-ʻurrija bi-hi ilá al-sabʻ al-ṭibāq ..."

title: 880-03 al-Kitābān al-rābiʻ wa-al-khāmis min al-Qānūn fī al-ṭibb : manuscript / Ibn Sīnā.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Fī al-amrāḍ allatī lā takhtaṣṣu bi-ʻuḍw dūna ʻuḍw. al-Kitāb al-rābiʻ min al-Qānūn. Kalām kullī fī al-ḥummīyāt wa-huwa sabʻat funūn ..."

title: 880-02 Tuḥfat al-ṭullāb bi-sharḥ Taḥrīr tanqīḥ al-Lubāb : manuscript / Abū Yaḥyá Zakarīyā ibn Muḥammad al-Anṣārī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm wa-bi-hi nastaʻīn. Qāla Sayyidunā wa-Mawlānā qāḍī al-quḍāh, shaykh mashāyikh al-Islām, malik al-ʻulamāʼ al-aʻlām, Sibawayh zamānih, farīd ʻaṣrihi wa-awānih, Zayn al-Dīn, lisān al-mutakallimīn, ḥujjat al-munāẓirīn, muḥyī sunnat Sayyid al-Mursalīn, Abū Yaḥyá Zakarīyā al-Anṣārī al-Shāfiʻī, taghammadahu Allāh bi-raḥmatih wa-nafaʻanā wa-al-Muslimīn bi-barakatih ... wa-baʻd, fa-hādhā sharḥ ʻalá mukhtaṣarī al-musammá bi-Taḥrīr tanqīḥ al-Lubāb fī al-fiqh ʻalá madhhab al-Imām al-mujtahid al-Shāfiʻī, raḍiya Allāh ʻanhu, yaḥullu alfāẓahu wa-yubayyinu murādahu wa-yuḥaqqiqu masāʼilahu wa-yuḥarriru dalāyilahu, wa-sammaytuhu Tuḥfat al-ṭullāb bi-sharḥ taḥrīr tanqīḥ al-Lubāb. Wa-Allāh al-karīm asʼalu an yajʻalahu khāliṣan li-wajhihi al-karīm ..."

title: Islamic prayers, invocations and decorations : manuscript.
note_text: Incipit: The first leaf seems to be missing.

title: 880-02 al-Durrah al-muḍīʼah fī qirāʼāt al-aʼimmah al-thalāthah al-marḍīyah : manuscript / Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad ibn al-Jazarī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Quli al-ḥamdu lillāh alladhī waḥdahu ʻalá // wa-majjidhu wa-isʼal ʻawnahu wa-tawassalā ..."

title: 880-02 Ḥawāshin ʻalá mawāḍiʻ min Sharḥ Taṣrīf al-ʻIzzī : manuscript.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm wa-bi-hi nastaʻīn, wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallam. Ammā baʻd ḥamd Allāh wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Rasūl Allāh, fa-hādhihi Ḥawāshin ʻalá mawāḍiʻ min Sharḥ Taṣrīf al-ʻIzzī lil-ʻAllāmah al-Taftāzānī, qaddasa Allāh sirrahumā arjū an yaʻumma nafʻuhā wa-yaʻẓuma waqʻuhā, innahu huwa al-maʼmūl wa-muḥaqqiq kull masʼūl ..."

title: 880-01 Ḥadīth Miʻrāj Muḥammad Rasūl Allāh : manuscript.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ālihi wa-ṣaḥbih. Hādhā kitāb adhkuru fīhi Ḥadīth Miʻrāj Muḥammad Rasūl Allāh, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam, ḥadīth al-Ḥasan ibn ʻAlī [?] al-Baṣrī, raḍiya Allāh ʻanh. Ruwiya ʻan Ibn ʻAbbās, raḍiya Allāh ʻanhu, qāl: Qāla Rasūl Allāh, Allāh, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam, fa-baynamā anā nāʼim dhāt laylah bayna al-Ṣafā wa-al-Marwah, kānat laylah muẓlimah wa-hiya dhāt raʻd wa-barq wa-shitāʼ, habaṭa ʻalayya al-Amīr Jibrīl, ʻalayhi al-salām ..."

title: 880-02 Tāj al-tarājim fī ṭabaqāt al-Ḥanafīyah : manuscript / al-Qāsim ibn ʻAbd Allāh ibn Quṭlūbughā.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm wa-bi-hi thiqatī. al-Ḥamdu lillāh wa-salāmun ʻalá ʻibādihi alladhīna iṣṭafá. Qāla al-Shaykh al-Imām al-ʻālim al-ʻallāmah zayn al-millah wa-al-dīn Qāsim ibn Quṭlūbughā al-Ḥanafī ʻāmalahu Allāh bi-luṭfihi al-khafī: Lammā waqaftu ʻalá tadhkirat Shaykhinā al-Imām al-ʻālim al-ʻallāmah imām al-muʼarrikhīn wa-baqīyat al-ḥuffāẓ al-ʻārifīn Shihāb al-Dīn Aḥmad ibn ʻAlī ibn ʻAbd al-Qādir ibn Muḥammad al-Maqrīzī amtaʻa Allāh bi-ḥayātih wa-aʻāda ʻalaynā min barakātih raʼaytu fīhā mā katabahu min tarājim al-aʼimmah al-Ḥanafīyah fa-aḥbabtu an ulḥiqa bi-kull ism mā tayassara lī min tarājim man tasammá bi-hi minhum ʻalá naḥw mā qaṣada min al-iqtiṣār ʻalá dhikr man la-hu taṣnīf ḥubban li-ittibāʻih wa-jabran li-qiṣar bāʻī bi-ṭūl bāʻih ..."

title: 880-02 ʻIqd al-laʼālī li-Badʼ al-amālī : manuscript / Raḍī al-Dīn Abū al-Qāsim ibn al-Ḥusayn al-Bakrī al-Maqdisī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh ḥaqqa ḥamdih wa-ṣalātuhu wa-salāmuhu ʻalá rasūlihi wa-ʻabdihi Muḥammad wa-ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi al-muʼminīn bi-mīthāqih wa-buʻdih al-muqtafīn bi-mā addāhu ijtihāduhu wa-jidduh mā atqana muʼminun binyat ʻaqdih wa-ayqana annahu ṣāyirun ilá laḥdih wa-sāyirrn ilá tafṣīl al-ḥisāb fī jumlat wafdih ..."

title: 880-03 al-Isʻāf fī aḥkām al-awqāf : manuscript / Ibrāhīm ibn Mūsá al-Ṭarābulusī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī khalaqa al-insān fī aḥsan taqwīm wa-hadá man shāʼa ilá al-ṣirāṭ al-mustaqīm fa-amarahu bi-al-ṣalāh wa-al-ṣadaqah wa-al-ṣiyām wa-al-ḥajj ilá baytihi al-ḥarām li-yafūza bi-al-naʻīm al-muqīm wa-jāda ʻalá man waqafa fī al-khayrāt nafsahu wa-mālahu, lammā ʻalima anna ilayhi māʼālahu, bi-al-faḍl al-jasīm ..."

title: 880-02 Zīj-i Gūrgānī : manuscript / Ulugh Beg.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī khalaqa al-arḍ wa-al-samāwāt wa-zayyanahā bi-al-kawākib al-thawābit wa-al-sayyārāt wa-qaddara manāzil li-yuʻlama bi-hā ʻadad al-sinīn wa-ḥisāb al-awqāt, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Rasūlihi Muḥammad ṣāḥib al-muʻjizāt wa-muẓhir al-ḥikam wa-al-āyāt wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-aṣḥābihi al-muqīmīn bi-aḥsan al-taqwīm wa-al-aḥkām al-bayyināt ..."

title: Prayers and invocations for seeking God's protection : manuscript.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn, al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Īyāka naʻbudu wa-īyāka nastaʻīn. Ihdinā al-ṣirāṭa al-mustaqīm, ṣirāṭa alladhīna anʻamta ʻalayhim, ghayr al-maghḍūbi ʻalayhim wa-lā al-ḍāllīn ..."

title: Biography of the Nasrides rulers : manuscript.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ālihi wa-ṣaḥbih. Amīr al-Muslimīn thālith al-umarāʼ min Banī Naṣr Abū ʻAbd Allāh Muḥammad ibn Amīr al-Muslimīn Abī ʻAbd Allāh ibn Amīr al-Muslimīn Abī ʻAbd Allāh al-ghālib billāh, tawallā [tawallá] al-amr baʻda abīh fa-ajrāhu ʻalá daydānih ..."

title: 880-01 Qiṣṣat futūḥ Ifrīqīyah. Al-Sifr 1 : manuscript.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ālihi. Qiṣṣat futūḥ Ifrīqīyah. Bi-ʻawn Allāh wa-barakat Rasūl Allāh ṣallá Allāh ʻlayhi wa-sallam. Qāl fa-kharaja ilayhā ʻUqbah ibn ʻĀmir, raḍiya Allāh ʻanh, yakūnu amīr al-jaysh, wa-kharrajahu Mawlānā ʻUthmān ibn ʻAffān, raḍiya Allāh ʻanh, wa-huwa amīr al-Madīnah [madīnat] al-Nabī, ṣallá Allāh ʻlayhi wa-sallam, wa-yakūnu ʻAlī, raḍiya Allāh ʻanh, wazīrahu. Wa-lam yuqtal aḥad baʻda mawt al-Nabī, ṣallá Allāh ʻlayhi wa-sallam. Fa-kharaja bi-sittīn alf fāris min bilād al-ʻArab ..."

title: 880-03 Fatʹḥ al-qarīb al-mujīb fī sharḥ alfāẓ al-Taqrīb : manuscript / Abū ʻAbd Allāh Muḥammad ibn Qāsim al-Ghazzī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm wa-bi-hi nastaʻīn. Qāla al-Shaykh al-Imām al-ʻallāmah al-muḥaqqiq al-mudaqqiq al-fahhāmah al-Shams [Shams] al-Millah wa-al-Dīn Abū ʻAbd Allāh Muḥammad ibn Qāsim al-Raqʻī [al-Ghazzī al-Shāfiʻī], saqá Allāh tharāh [...] raḥmatan. Āmīn. "al-Ḥamdu lillāh" tabarrukan bi-al-Fātiḥah [bi-Fātiḥat] al-Kitāb li-annahā ibtidāʼ kull amr dhī bāl wa-khātimat kull duʻāʼ mujāb wa-ākhir duʻāʼ al-muʼminīn fī al-Jannah ..."

title: 880-01 Takmilat Tafsīr al-Qurʼān al-Karīm : manuscript.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh ḥamdan muwāfiyan li-niʻamih, mukāfiyan li-mazīdih, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ālihi wa-ṣaḥbih wa-junūdih. Hādhā mā ishtaddat ilayhi ḥājat al-rāghibīn fī taklimat [takmilat] tafsīr al-Qurʼān al-Karīm alladhī allafahu Sayyidunā al-Shaykh al-Imām al-ʻallāmah al-muḥaqqiq Jalāl al-Dīn Muḥammad Abī [ibn] Aḥmad al-Maḥallī al-Shāfiʻī, raḥimahu Allāh, wa-tatmīm mā fātahu, wa-huwa min awwal Sūrat al-Baqarah ilá ākhir al-Isrá [al-Isrāʼ], bi-tatmīmihi ʻalá namaṭihi min dhikr mā yufhamu bi-hi kalām Allāh taʻālá wa-al-iʻtimād ʻalá arjaḥ al-aqwāl ..."

title: 880-02 Ijāzah min ʻAlī Riḍā ibn Yūnus al-Jānakī al-Fātsawī al-Fazmawī ilá tilmīdhihi al-Ḥājj ʻAbd al-Qādir ibn ʻAlī al-Bāzārjīfī : manuscript / ʻAlī Riḍā ibn Yūnus al-Jānakī al-Fātsawī al-Istānbūlī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh ḥamda man shakar, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Sayyid al-Bashar Nabīyinā Abī al-Qāsim Muḥammad al-abarr, wa-ʻalá ālihi alladhī ṭāba wa-ṭahur. Fa-yaqūlu al-faqīr ilá Allāh al-ghanī ʻAlī Riḍā ibn Yūnus al-Jānakī al-Fātsawī al-Fazmawī ayyadahumā Allāh taʻālá fī jamīʻ umūrihimā bi-taʼyīdihi al-qawī ..."

title: 880-02 Ijāzah min ʻUthmān Nūrī ibn Muḥammad Amīn al-Miyāwardī ilá tilmīdhihi ʻUmar Luṭfī ibn Muḥammad Ḥilmī al-Arkhawī : manuscript / Abū Muḥammad al-Dhihnī ʻUthmān Nūrī al-Ḥanafī al-Miyāwardī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī qad anbata dawḥat al-ʻilm fī ṣudūr al-ʻulamāʼ wa-jaʻala athmārahā iḥkām al-Sharīʻah al-gharrāʼ, wa-lā yaghrubu ʻan ʻilmihi mithqāl dharrah fī al-arḍ wa-lā fī al-samāʼ, yaʻlamu mā bayna aydīhim wa-mā khalfahum, wa-lā yuḥīṭūna bi-shayʼ min ʻilmihi illā bi-mā shāʼ ..."

title: 880-03 Kitāb Tahāfut al-falāsifah wa-al-radd ʻalayhim : manuscript / taṣnīf al-Shaykh al-Imām Abī Ḥāmid Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad al-Ghazzālī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm wa-bi-hi thiqatī. Qāla [...] al-Imām Abū Ḥāmid Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad al-Ghazzālī, raḍiya Allāh ʻanhu: Nasʼalu Allāh taʻālá al-mūfī ʻalá kull nihāyah wujūduhu, al-mujāwiz kull ghāyah, an yufīḍa ʻalaynā anwār al-hidāyah wa-yaqbiḍa ʻannā ẓulumāt al-ḍalāl wa-al-ghiwāyah, wa-an yajʻalanā mimman raʼá al-ḥaqq fa-āthara ittibāʻah wa-iqtafāh, wa-raʼá al-bāṭila bāṭilan fa-ikhtāra ijtinābahu wa-ijtawāh ..."

title: 880-02 al-Qurʼān al-Karīm : manuscript.
note_text: Incipit: "Sūrat al-Fātiḥah Makkīyah wa-qīl Madanīyah. Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn, al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm ..."

title: 880-02 al-ʻUyūn al-sawāhir fī rawḍat al-zawāhir : manuscript / Masʻūd ibn al-Sayyid Ḥijāzī Masʻūd.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī manna ʻalaynā bi-nayl al-maṭlūb wa-jaʻalanā nanṭuqu fīmā nuʻānī wa-jaʻala bi-dhikrihi taṭmaʼinnu al-qulūb, wa-in kāna yuṭribuhā dhikr al-aghānī ..."

title: 880-02 Mukhtaṣar Ghunyat al-mutamallī : manuscript / Ibrāhīm ibn Muḥammad ibn Ibrāhīm al-Ḥalabī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī jaʻala al-ʻibādah maftaḥ al-saʻādah wa-maṭmaḥ al-siyādah wa-malmaḥ al-ḥusná wa-al-ziyādah, wa-jaʻala al-ṣalāh ʻamūd qiyāmihā wa-dhurwat sanāmihā wa-ʻumdat aḥkāmihā, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá afḍal khalqihi Sayyidinā Muḥammad alladhī juʻilat fī al-ṣalāh qurrat ʻaynihi, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-aṣḥābihi alladhīna fāzū min maʻdin al-dīn bi-lujaynih wa-ʻaynih. Wa-baʻd, fa-yaqūlu al-muftaqir ilá raḥmat rabbihi al-ghanī Ibrāhīm ibn Muḥammad ibn Ibrāhīm al-Ḥalabī: Qad sharaḥtu kitāb Munyat al-muṣallī sharḥan wa-sammaytuhu bi-Ghunyat al-mutamallī, wa-lākin lammā raʼaytu fīhi baʻḍ al-iṭālah allatī rubbamā awjabat lil-mubtadīn wa-al-qāṣirīn al-malālah, fa-aḥbabtu an akhtaṣir min farāʼid dalāʼilihi wa-azīd fī fawāʼid masāʼilihi tasʹhīlan lil-ṭālibīn wa-tanwīran lil-rāghibīn ..."

title: 880-03 Dalāʼil al-khayrāt wa-shawāriq al-anwār fī al-ṣalāh ʻalá al-Nabī al-mukhtār : manuscript / Muḥammad ibn Sulaymān al-Jazūlī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallam. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī hadānā lil-īmān wa-al-Islām, wa-al-ṣalāh ʻalá Muḥammad nabīyihi alladhī istanqadhanā min ʻibādat al-awthān wa-al-aṣnām wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-aṣḥābihi al-nujabāʼ al-bararah al-kirām ..."

title: 880-01 Kitāb thābit fī aḥkām al-buyūʻ : manuscript.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Rabbi yassir wa-tammim bi-al-khayr. Hādhā Kitāb thābit fī bayān aḥkām al-buyūʻ wa-fī baʻḍ al-nusakh Kitāb al-bayʻ. Wa-al-aṣl an lā yujmaʻ al-bayʻ wa-lā yuthanná li-annahu maṣdar, fa-taʼawwla al-kathīr wa-al-qalīl, wa-alladhī yajmaʻuhu naẓaran ilá anwāʻ [al-anwāʻ] allatī taḥtahu. Wa-huwa fī al-lughah muṭlaq al-mubādalah, wa-fī al-sharʻ huwa, ay al-bayʻ, mubādalat al-māl bi-al-māl bi-al-tarāḍī, fa-in wujidat al-mubādalah bi-lā tarāḍin lā yakūnu bayʻan sharʻīyan ..."

title: 880-03 Raḥmat al-ummah fī ikhtilāf al-aʼimmah : manuscript / taʼlīf Muḥammad ibn ʻAbd al-Raḥmān ibn al-Ḥusayn al-Qurshī al-ʻUthmānī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī ajzala iḥsānah wa-anzala Qurʼānah wa-bayyana fīhi qawāʻid dīnih wa-arkānah, thumma jaʻala ilá Nabīyih bayānah, wa-awḍaḥa dhālika li-aṣḥābih fī ḥayātih, thumma tafarraqū baʻda wafātih yabtaghūna faḍlan min Allāh wa-ruḍwānih ..."

title: 880-03 Dalāʼil al-khayrāt wa-shawāriq al-anwār fī al-ṣalāh ʻalá al-Nabī al-mukhtār : manuscript / Muḥammad ibn Sulaymān al-Jazūlī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallam. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī hadānā lil-īmān wa-al-Islām, wa-al-ṣalāh ʻalá Muḥammad nabīyihi alladhī istanqadhanā min ʻibādat al-awthān wa-al-aṣnām wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-aṣḥābihi al-nujabāʼ al-bararah al-kirām ..."

title: 880-02 Majmaʻ al-baḥrayn wa-multaqá al-nayyirayn : manuscript / Aḥmad ibn ʻAlī ibn al-Sāʻātī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh jāʻil al-ʻulamāʼ anjuman lil-ihtidāʼ zāhirah, wa-aʻlāman lil-iqtidāʼ ẓāhirah, wa-ḥujjah ʻalá al-ḥaqq qāṭiʻah, wa-maḥajjah ilá al-ṣidq shāriʻah ... Ammā, baʻd, fa-hādhā kitāb yaṣghuru lil-ḥāfiẓ ḥajmuhu wa-yaghzuru lil-ḍābiṭ ʻilmuhu ... yaḥwī Mukhtaṣar al-Shaykh Abī al-Ḥasan al-Qudūrī wa-Manẓūmat al-Shaykh Abī Ḥafṣ al-Nasafī ..."

title: 880-02 Sharḥ al-ṣadr bi-Ghazwat Badr : manuscript / ʻAbd Allāh ibn Muḥammad al-Shabrāwī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Yaqūlu al-faqīr ʻAbd Allāh al-Shabrāwī al-Shāfiʻī al-Aḥmadī: al-Ḥamdu lillāh al-qādir ʻalá murādih, al-qāhir fawqa ʻibādih, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi alladhīna jāhadū fī Allāh ḥaqqa jihādih, wa-baʻd, faqad amaranī man imtithāl amrihi ḥatm wa-ṭāʻatuhu ghunm an ajmaʻa la-hu asmāʼ al-ṣaḥābah al-Badrīyīn alladhīna ayyada Allāh bi-him al-dīn wa-ṭarafan min manāqibihim al-dāllah ʻalá ʻulw marātibihim ..."

title: Amulet : manuscript.
note_text: Incipit: Starts with Sūrat al-Qadr (Qurʼan: Chapter 97): "Innā anzalnāhu fī Laylat al-Qadr ..."

title: 880-03 al-Futūwah wa-maʻrifat al-ṭarīq wa-arkān al-sharīʻah ʻalá al-taḥqīq : manuscript / Muḥammad ibn ʻAlāʼ al-Dīn al-Ḥusaynī al-Riḍawī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Wa-nasʼalu Allāh an yuwaffiqanā wa-īyākum ilá jannat al-naʻīm, innahu tawwāb ghafūr raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī jaʻala al-futūwah libās al-taqwá wa-ḥullat al-anbiyāʼ, watasallaka fīhā man ikhtaṣṣahu min ʻibādihi al-awliyāʼ, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá ashraf al-anbiyāʼ wa-al-mursalīn, Muḥammad al-muṣṭafá wa-ʻAlī al-murtaḍá wa-aṣḥābihi wa-dhurriyatihi ajmaʻīn. Wa-baʻd, fa-qad ruwiya ʻan Muḥammad al-Murtaḍá ibn al-Ḥusayn ibn ʻAlī ibn Abī Ṭālib, raḍiya Allāh ʻanhum ajmaʻīn, wa-ʻafá Allāh ʻan muṣannif hādhihi al-Futūwah wa-maʻrifat al-ṭarīq wa-arkān al-sharīʻah ʻalá al-taḥqīq ..."

title: 880-02 al-Juzw al-thāmin min tajziʼat al-ʻashrah min Kitāb Allāh al-Karīm : manuscript.
note_text: Incipit: "al-Juzw al-thāmin min tajziʼat al-ʻashrah min Kitāb Allāh al-Karīm, nafaʻanā Allāh bi-barakātih wa-ghafara li-kātibihi wa-li-wālidayhi wa-man kutiba bi-ʻināyatihi, wa-lil-muʼminīn wa-al-muʼmināt bi-faḍl suwarihi wa-āyātih, wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá man unzila ʻlayahi wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-aṣḥābihi wa-azwājih ..."

title: Virtues of the month of Rajab and other holy months and days with folkoloric Islamic tales : manuscript.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Faṣl fī dhikr Rajab. Ruwiya ʻan Rasūl Allāh, ṣallá Allāh ʻlayhi wa-sallam, kāna idhā dakhala awwal shahr Rajab yaqūlu: Allāhumma bārik lanā fī Rajab wa-Shaʻbān wa-ballighnā Ramaḍān wa-aʻinnā ʻalá al-ṣiyām wa-al-qiyām ..."

title: 880-02 Mukhtaṣar Sharḥ Talkhīṣ al-Miftāḥ : manuscript / Masʻūd ibn ʻUmar al-madʻū bi-Saʻd al-Taftāzānī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm wa-bi-hi thiqatī. Naḥmaduka yā man sharaḥa ṣudūranā li-talkhīṣ al-bayān fī īḍāḥ al-maʻānī wa-nawwara qulūbanā bi-lawāmiʻ al-tibyān min maṭāliʻ al-mathānī wa-nuṣallī ʻalá Nabīyika Muḥammad al-muʼayyid dalāʼil iʻjāzihi bi-asrār al-balāghah wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-aṣḥābihi al-muḥrizīn qaṣabāt al-sabq fī miḍmār al-faṣāḥah wa-al-barāʻah. Wa-baʻd, fa-yaqūlu al-faqīr ilá Allāh al-ghanī Masʻūd ibn ʻUmar al-madʻū bi-Saʻd al-Taftāzānī hadāhu Allāh taʻālá sawāʼa al-ṭarīq wa-adhāqahu ḥalāwat al-taḥqīq: Qad sharaḥtu fī mā maḍá Talkhīṣ al-Miftāḥ wa-aghnaytuhu bi-al-iṣbāḥ ʻan al-miṣbāḥ, wa-awdaʻtuhu gharāʼib nukat samaḥat bi-hā al-anẓār wa-washshaḥtuhu bi-laṭāʼif fiqar sakabathā yad al-afkār. Thumma raʼaytu kathīran min al-fuḍalāʼ wa-al-jamm al-ghafīr min al-adhkiyāʼ yasʼalūnanī ṣarf al-himmah naḥwa ikhtiṣārih wa-al-iqtiṣār ʻalá bayān maʻānīhi wa-kashf asrārih ..."

title: 880-02 Manẓūmah fī al-buyūʻ : manuscript / ʻAlī ibn ʻAbd Allāh al-Munayyir.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Badaʼtu bi-bismillāh thumma ṣalātihi // wa-taslīmihi aʻnī li-Khayri al-Barīyati. Wa-baʻdu fa-inna al-bayʻa yakthur wuqūʻuhu // wa-fīhi fasādun wāqiʻun fī al-khalīqati ..."

title: 880-02 Wird al-aqṭāb : manuscript / ʻAbd al-Wahhāb ibn Aḥmad al-Shaʻrānī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi ajmaʻīn. Wa-baʻd, fa-hādhā Wird al-aqṭāb. Dhakar al-Shaykh Muḥyī al-Dīn annahu wird al-aqṭāb wa-al-mukammalīn min aṣḥāb al-dawāyin [al-dawāthir] al-kubrá, dhakartuhu lil-ikhwān rajāʼ al-ʻamal bi-hi, wa-dhakartu fī akhir kull dhikr baʻḍ mā yuntijuhu min al-aḥwāl al-bāṭinah, wa-Allāh yanfaʻu man yashāʼ, innahu samīʻ mujīb. Wa-yashtamilu hādhā al-wird ʻalá khamsah wa-ʻishrīn ṣifah min al-dhikr."

title: 880-02 Manẓūmah Lāmīyah fī madḥ Khayr al-Brīyah : manuscript / Sharaf al-Dīn Muḥammad ibn Saʻīd al-Būṣīrī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm wa-bi-hi nastaʻīn ʻalá al-qawm al-ḍāllīn al-muḍillīn. Ilá matá anta billādhāti mashghūlu // wa-anta ʻan kulli mā qaddamta masʼūlu. Fī kulli yawmin turajjī an tatūba ghadan // wa-ʻiqdu ʻazmika bittaswīfi makhlūlu ..."

title: 880-02 Takhmīs al-qaṣīdah al-Witrīyah fī madḥ Ashraf al-Barīyah : manuscript / al-Sirāj al-Warrāq, Abū Ḥafṣ ʻUmar ibn Muḥammad.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Qāla al-Shaykh al-Imām muʼallif al-Witrīyah [... ...] Abū ʻAbd Allāh Muḥammad ibn Abī Bakr ibn Rashīd al-Baghdādī al-wāʻiẓ, ʻafá Allāh ʻanhu wa-ʻannā. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī faḍḍala baʻḍ al-nabīyīn ʻalá baʻḍ wa-rafaʻa baʻḍahum fawqa baʻḍ darajāt, fa-ātá Ādam al-ṣafwah wa-Ibrāhīm al-khillah wa-Mūsá tisʻ āyāt bayyināt wa-baʻatha ʻĪsá bi-ibrāʼ al-akmah wa-al-abraṣ wa-aḥyá ʻalá yadayhi al-amwāt ..."

title: 880-02 Risālah fī ism Allāh al-aʻẓam : manuscript / Zayn al-Dīn Mūsá ibn Muḥammad al-Qulaybī al-Mālikī al-ʻUmarī al-Ghawthī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Qāla al-Shaykh al-fāḍil wa-al-niḥrīr al-kāmil, shaykh al-sharīʻah wa-al-ḥaqīqah, Zayn al-Millah wa-al-Dīn, Mūsá al-Qulaybī al-Mālikī al-ʻUmarī al-Ghawthī, mā naṣṣuhu: Ittafaqa al-muʻtaddu bi-ittifāqihim anna al-ism al-aʻẓam ʻArabī, bal ḥaká baʻḍuhum al-ijmāʻ ʻalá dhālik wa-ikhtalafū baʻda dhālika fī taʻyīnihi wa-ʻadam taʻyīnih ʻalá qawlayn. al-Qawl al-awwal anna al-ism al-aʻẓam wāḥid bi-ʻaynih, ay ism mutaʻayyan laysa dāʼiran fī sāʼir al-asmāʼ. Wa-ajmaʻa ahl hādhā al-qawl annahu aḥada ʻashara ḥarfan ..."

title: 880-03 Masāʼil Ibn Hishām : manuscript / ʻAbd Allāh ibn Yūsuf ibn Hishām.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh musbigh al-ʻaṭāʼ, musbil al-ghiṭāʼ, muʻṭī al-niʻam wa-al-ālāʼ, al-maḥmūd ʻalá al-sarrāʼ wa-al-ḍarrāʼ, al-mashkūr fī al-shiddah wa-al-rakhāʼ, aḥmaduhu wa-lā maḥmūd ʻalá al-ḥaqīqah siwāh, wa-ashkuruhu shukran lā yaʼbāh wa-lā yansāh, wa-uṣallī ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad nabīyihi alladhī min khayr al-ʻanāṣir iṣṭafāh ..."

title: 880-02 al-Fawāʼid fī al-ṣilāt wa-al-ʻawāʼid : manuscript / Aḥmad ibn Aḥmad al-Sharjī al-Zabīdī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm wa-bi-hi thiqatī. al-Ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn bi-jamīʻ maḥāmidihi ʻalá mā asbagha min jazīl ʻawāʼidihi ḥamdan yuwāfī mā ajzala min niʻamihi wa-fawāʼidih wa-yukāfī mā yafḍulu bi-hi min zawāʼidihi wa-ṣilātih, wa-salāmuhu ʻalá Nabīyihi Muḥammad, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam, alladhī ʻallama al-Qurʼān min aʻlam shawāhidih wa-dīn al-Islām min taʼsīsih wa-qawāʻidih, ṣallātan taʻummu ajmaʻa ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-wāfidih ..."

title: 880-03 al-Risālat al-Qushayrīyah fī al-taṣawwuf : manuscript / ʻAbd al-Karīm ibn Hawāzin al-Qushayrī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī tafarrada bi-jalāl malakūtih wa-tawaḥḥada bi-jamāl jabarūtih wa-taʻazzaza bi-ʻulū aḥadīyatih wa-taqaddasa bi-sumū ṣamadīyatih wa-takabbara fī dhātih ʻan muḍāraʻat kull naẓīr wa-tanazzaha fī ṣifātih ʻan kull tanāhin wa-qaṣīr ... Ammā baʻd, fahādhihi risālah katabahā al-faqīr ilá Allāh taʻālá ʻAbd al-Karīm ibn Hawāzin al-Qushayrī, raḥimahu Allāh, bi-balad Dār al-Salām, fī sanat 437. Ammā baʻd, fa-qad jaʻala Allāh taʻālá hādhihi al-ṭāʼifah ṣafwatan wa-faḍḍlahum ʻalá kathīr min al-nās baʻda rusulihi wa-anbiyāʼihi, ṣalāt Allāh ʻalayhim ajmaʻīn ..."

title: 880-02 Futūḥāt al-rashīd ʻalá Khulāṣat al-tawḥīd : manuscript / Muḥammad al-Damanhūrī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Naḥmaduka yā man dhātuka bi-dhātik wa-ṣifātuka bi-maʻānīka lā bi-dhātik, wa-nuṣallī wa-nusallimu ʻalá al-muballigh lil-aḥkām wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-aṣḥābih dhawī al-itqān wa-al-iḥkām, wa-nashhadu an lā ilāha illā ant, khalaqtanā wa-narāka bi-lā mithāl, wa-nashhadu anna Sayyidanā Muḥammad rasūluka al-ṣādiq fī kull ḥāl. Wa-baʻd, fayaqūlu faqīr raḥmat rabbihi al-dayyān Muḥammad al-Damanhūrī mubtaghī al-ghufrān innahu lammā kānat al-manẓūmah allatī anshaʼahā Shaykhunā al-Najjārī sahlat al-tanāwul yakhūḍu al-ʻaql fī baḥrihā al-jārī, ḥāwaltu an ashraḥahā bi-sharḥ yuzīlu ghiṭāhā wa-yubayyinu min al-marām mā taṭwī taḥta jināhā, walāsīmā wa-qad ashāra bi-hi ʻalayya Shaykhunā al-madhkūr fa-jāʼa bi-ḥamd Allāh wa-ʻawnihi mubashshiran bi-al-surūr. Wa-sammaytuhu Futūḥāt al-rashīd ʻalá Khulāṣat al-tawḥīd ..."

title: 880-02 Ḍawʼ al-maʻālī li-Badʼ al-amālī : manuscript / ʻAlī ibn Sulṭān Muḥammad al-Qārī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī wajaba wujūd dhātih wa-thabuta karam wujūdih wa-shuhūd ṣifātih wa-ẓahara afʻāluhu al-ḥamīdah fī ṣaḥāʼif maṣnūʻātih, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá dhubdat [zubdat] makhlūqātih wa-ʻumdat mawjūdātih wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-aṣḥābihi wa-atbāʻihi fī ḥarakātihi wa-sakanātih. Ammā baʻd, fa-yaqūlu al-multajī ilá ḥaram Rabbihi al-Bārī ʻAlī ibn Sulṭān ibn Muḥammad al-Qārī: Lammā sharaʻtu fī sharḥ al-Fiqh al-akbar lil-Imām al-aʻẓam wa-al-humām al-aqdam kāna fī nīyatī wa-ṭawīyatī an yakūna mukhtaṣaran bi-ḥaythu yartafiʻu bi-hi al-mubtadī wa-yaqtaniʻu bi-hi al-muntahī, thumma injarra al-kalām ilá al-kalām ḥattá kharaja ʻan intiẓām al-marām, fa-sanaḥa bi-bālī wa-ḥālī an aṣnaʻa sharḥan mūjazan ʻalá Qaṣīdat Badʼ al-amālī li-yakūna mufīdan lil-adānī wa-al-aʻālī wa-yaṣīra mūjiban li-taraqqī ḥālī wa-sababan li-ḥusn maʼālī, wa-sammaytuhu Ḍawʼ al-maʻālī li-Badʼ al-amālī ..."

title: 880-02 al-Alfāẓ al-qalīlah fī al-ʻulūm al-jalīlah : manuscript / ʻAbd al-Raḥmān ibn Shihāb al-Dīn Khalīfah.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-huwa ḥasbī. al-Ḥamdu lillāh al-wāḥid al-aḥad, al-fard al-ṣamad, al-munfarid ʻan al-ṣāḥibah wa-al-walad, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-taslīm ʻalá man ikhtārahu Allāh ḥabīban min al-abad, Muḥammad al-mukhtār dhī al-faḍl wa-al-madad, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-aṣḥābihi mā tanaffasa mutanaffis ilá al-abad. Ammā baʻd, fa-yaqūlu al-faqīr ilá raḥmat rabbihi al-qadīr al-munʻim al-mannān ʻAbd al-Raḥmān ibn Shihāb al-Dīn Khalīfah al-Ustādh al-aʻẓam al-Shaykh Shiḥādhah al-ʻIrāqī, taghammadahum Allāh taʻālá bi-raḥmatihi wa-ruḍwānih wa-askanahum fasīḥ jinānih: Hādhā sharḥ laṭīf ʻalá risālat al-Shaykh al-Imām Sayyidī Muḥammad ibn al-Shaykh ʻAlī al-Maydānī, raḥimahumā Allāh taʻālá, jaʻaltuhu tadhkirah li-abnāʼ jinsī wa-sammaytuhu bi-al-alfāẓ al-qalīlah fī al-ʻulūm al-jalīlah, wa-asʼalu Allāh min faḍlih an yanfaʻanī bi-hi wa-al-Muslimīn. Āmīn."

title: 880-02 al-Kalām al-yasīr fī ʻilāj al-maqʻadah wa-al-bawāsīr : manuscript / Aḥmad ibn ʻAbd al-Munʻim al-Damanhūrī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi nastaʻīn. Ḥamdan li-man abdaʻa al-uṣūl wa-al-muwalladāt wa-ikhtāra minhā dhawī al-rawīyah wa-al-ʻuqūl al-bāhirāt, wa-ṣalātan wa-salāman ʻalá aṣl al-nashʼatayn wa-khulāṣat man ātāhu Allāh al-ḥikmatayn, Sayyidinā wa-Mawlānā Muḥammad al-mabʻūth raḥmatan lil-ʻālamīn, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi al-mutamassikīn bi-millatihi wa-al-ʻāmilīn. Wa-baʻd, fa-yaqūlu aḥqar al-anām Aḥmad al-Damanhūrī, ṭahharahu Allāh min waṣmat al-anām: Hādhihi masāʼil muzdariyah jalīlah tataʻallaqu bi-ʻilāj al-maqʻadah al-ʻalīlah bi-adwiyah shahīrah kathīrat al-wujūd, qarībat al-taḥṣīl li-kull faqīr wa-ghanī kanūd, sammaytuhā bi-al-Kalām al-yasīr fī ʻilāj al-maqʻadah wa-al-bawāsīr, wa-rattabtuhā ʻalá muqaddimah wa-maqṣūd wa-khātimah, rājiyan minhu subḥānah an yamunna ʻalaynā bi-ḥusn al-khātimah ..."

title: 880-02 Fatʹḥ al-murīd li-Khulāṣat al-tawḥīd : manuscript / Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad al-Faraqī al-Zakī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Naḥmaduka Allāhumma ʻalá mā ʻallamtanā min farāʼid ʻaqāʼid al-īmān wa-nashkuruka ʻalá mā alhamtanā min sāṭiʻ al-ḥujaj wa-qawāṭiʻ al-burhān, wa-nuṣallī wa-nusallim ʻalá man ʻaṣamtahu min al-anām, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi al-hādīn ṭarīq al-ḥaqq wa-al-ḥāmīn sharāʼiʻ al-Islām. Ammā baʻd, fa-yaqūl afqar al-ʻibād ilá raḥmat al-karīm al-jawwād Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad al-Faraqī al-Zakī, ʻāmalahu Allāh wa-al-Muslimīn bi-luṭfihi al-khafī: Lammā kāna ʻilm al-tawḥīd awwal wājib ʻalá al-mukallaf fahman lā yaṣiḥḥu wājib wa-lā mandūb bi-dūnih jazman, wa-kānat manẓūmat Shaykhinā al-Shaykh ʻAlī al-Najjārī min ajall mā ṣunnifa fīhi nafʻan li-mā annahā qad ishtamalat maʻa wajāzat lafẓihā wa-suhūlat tanāwulihā ʻalá al-ʻaqāʼid murdafah bi-adillatihā jamʻan, fa-insharaḥ ṣadrī la-hā ghāyat al-inshirāḥ, fa-sharaʻtu fī taʼlīf sharḥ mukhtaṣar ʻalayhā, mustaʻīnan bi-al-ʻAlīm al-Fattāḥ, wa-huwa ḥasbī wa-niʻma al-wakīl, wa-sammaytuhu "Fatʹḥ al-murīd li-Khulāṣat al-tawḥīd ..."

title: 880-02 Muḥāḍarat al-abrār wa-musāmarat al-akhyār : manuscript / Ibn al-ʻArabī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī aṭlaʻa shams al-fawāʼid fī muḥāḍarat al-abrār wa-jaʻala niẓām al-qalāʼid fī musāmarat al-akhyār wa-awdaʻa li-laʼāliʼ [laʼāliʼ] al-fawāʼid fī muḥāwarat al-aḥrār, wa-awḍaḥa al-ḥikam fī mujārāt al-ḥukamāʼ, wa-abāna jawāmiʻ al-kalim fī mubārāt al-ʻulamāʼ, wa-ḍammana al-asrār fī muṭāraḥat al-aḥibāʼ, wa-arsala al-arwāḥ fī munāwaḥat al-awiddāʼ, wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ālihi wa-sallam. Ammā baʻd, fa-innī awdaʻtu fī hādhā al-kitāb alladhī sammaytuhu "Muḥāḍarat al-abrār wa-musāmarat al-akhyār" ḍurūban min al-akhbār wa-funūnan min al-mawāʻiẓ wa-al-amthāl dhawī al-albāb ..."

title: 880-02 Tadhkirat ulī al-albāb bi-maʻrifat al-ādāb : manuscript / Muḥammad ʻAbd al-Raʼūf ibn Tāj al-ʻĀrifīn al-Munāwī al-Ḥaddādī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm wa-bi-hi nastaʻīn. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī arshada hādhihi al-ummah ilá ādāb lā tuḥṣá, wa-khaṣṣahā bi-faḍāʼil wa-mazāyā lā tustaqṣá, wa-ashhadu an lā ilāha illā Allāh shahādata ʻabd muḥtāj ilá fayḍ ʻAllām al-Ghuyūb, wa-anna Muḥammadan ʻabduhu wa-rasūluh, ajall ṭālib wa-maṭlūb, ṣalātan wa-salāman dāʼimayn, mā ṭalaʻa najm wa-afila gharūb. Wa-baʻd, fa-yaqūlu al-ʻabd al-ḍaʻīf, al-multajī ilá karam al-Raʼūf al-Laṭīf, Muḥammad al-madʻū ʻAbd al-Raʼūf ibn al-Munāwī al-Ḥaddādī, kafāhu Allāh sharra al-munāwī wa-al-muʻādī: Hādhā mā ishtaddat ilayhi ḥājat al-khāṣṣ wa-al-ʻāmm ilá maʻrifat ādāb al-akl wa-al-shurb wa-al-jimāʻ ..."

title: 880-02 Kashf al-qināʻ ʻan Matn wa-Sharḥ Abī Shujāʻ : manuscript / ʻAbd al-Raḥmān ibn Muḥammad al-Maḥallī al-Azʹharī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Ḥamdan li-man ikhtaṣṣanā bi-risālat Abī al-Qāsim, wa-ikhtaṣṣahu bi-al-shafāʻah al-ʻuẓmá yawm al-hawl, al-ʻāṣim mā ashfaqat al-umm ʻalá waladihā al-bārr al-rāḥim ... Wa-baʻd, fa-yaqūlu al-muftaqir ilá al-ghfrān ... ʻAbd al-Raḥmān al-Maḥallī al-Azʹharī al-Shāfiʻī ... Lammā an manna Allāh ʻalayya bi-al-ijtimāʻ ʻalá ... Abī al-Ḍiyāʼ Nūr al-Dīn ʻAlī al-Shabramallisī ... kāna min jumlat mā qaraʼtuhu ʻalayhi Sharḥ Abī Shujāʻ lil-Shams Ibn Qāsim al-Ghazzī, wa-ḥaṣala min dhālika fawāʼid, nashaʼa baʻḍuhā min asʼilat al-ḥāḍirīn, baʻda al-murājaʻah bi-ḥasab al-ṭāqah, wa-aktharuhā min fawāʼid Ustādhinā al-madhkūr, ghayra jawābin li-suʼāl, fa-aḥbabtu an ajmaʻahā fī hādhihi al-awrāq, khishyata ḍayāʻihā, baʻda an istajaztuhu, fa-ajāz. Wa-wasamtu mā jamaʻt bi-"Kashf al-qināʻ ʻan Matn wa-Sharḥ Abī Shujāʻ" ..."

title: 880-02 Tuḥfat al-ṭullāb bi-Sharḥ Taḥrīr Tanqīḥ al-Lubāb : manuscript / Abū Yaḥyá Zakarīyā ibn Muḥammad al-Anṣārī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm wa-bi-hi al-iʻānah. Qāla Sayyidunā wa-Mawlānā Qāḍī al-Quḍāh, shaykh mashāyikh al-Islām, malik al-ʻulamāʼ al-aʻlām, Sībawayh zamānih, farīd ʻaṣrih wa-awānih, zayn al-dīn, lisān al-mutakallimīn, ḥujjat al-munāẓirīn, muḥyī sunnat Sayyidī [Sayyid] al-Mursalīn, Abū Yaḥyá Zakarīyā al-Anṣārī al-Shāfiʻī, taghammadahu Allāh bi-raḥmatih wa-fasaḥa fī qabrih wa-nafaʻanā wa-al-Muslimīn bi-barakatih: Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī faqqaha fī dīnihi man iṣṭafāh min al-anām, wa-hadá man irtaḍāh li-fahm mā sharraʻahu min al-aḥkām ... Wa-baʻd, fa-hādhā sharḥ ʻalá mukhtaṣarī al-musammá bi-Taḥrīr tanqīḥ al-lubāb fī al-fiqh ʻalá madhhab al-Imām al-mujtahid al-Shāfiʻī, raḍiya Allāh ʻanhu, yaḥullu alfāẓahu wa-yubayyinu murādahu wa-yuḥaqqiqu masāʼilahu wa-yuḥarriru dalāʼilahu, wa-sammaytuhu "Tuḥfat al-ṭullāb bi-sharḥ taḥrīr tanqīḥ al-lubāb". Wa-Allāh al-karīm asʼal an yajʻalahu khāliṣan li-wajhihi al-karīm wa-sababan lil-fawz bi-jannāt al-naʻīm."

title: 880-03 Sharḥ Jamʻ al-jawāmiʻ : manuscript / al-Jalāl al-Maḥallī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm wa-bi-hi thiqatī. al-Ḥamdu lillāh ʻalá afḍālih wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ālih. Hādhā mā ishtaddat ilayhi ḥājat al-mutafahhimīn li-Jamʻ al-jawāmiʻ min sharḥ yaḥullu alfāẓah wa-yubayyinu murādah wa-yuḥaqqiqu masāʼilah wa-yuḥarriru dalāʼilah ʻalá wajh sahl lil-mubtadiʼīn, ḥasan lil-nāẓirīn, nafaʻa Allāh bi-hi. Āmīn. Qāla al-muṣannif, raḥimahu Allāh taʻālá: Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm ..."

title: 880-02 Shirʻat al-Islām ilá dār al-salām : manuscript / Muḥammad ibn Abī Bakr Imāmʹzādah.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī dallanā ʻalá maʻrifatihi bi-al-shawāhid wa-al-aʻlām wa-taʻabbudinā li-karāmatinā bi-aqsām al-ʻubūdīyah wa-al-aḥkām, wa-sharraʻ la-nā fīmā yuṣliḥunā fī al-dārayn sunan al-Islām, wa-hadānā ilá mā irtaḍāhu min amr al-dīn bi-Nabīyihi Muḥammad, ʻalayhi al-sallām, wa-jaʻalahu qāʼidanā bi-laṭīf khulqihi ilá dār al-salām, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-ʻalá ālihi mā lamaʻa fī al-samāʼ barq wa-tahallala ghamām. Wa-baʻd, fa-hādhihi ʻuqūd manẓūmah min sunan sayyid al-ʻālamīn wa-imām al-muttaqīn muntaqdah [muntaqāh] min kutub al-aʼimmah al-mahdīn min ʻulamāʼ al-dīn mufaṣṣalah shudhūruhā wa-ʻaqāʼiluhā lil-mashghūf bi-ijtināʼihā, mashrūḥah fuṣūluhā wa-makshūfah abwābuhā lil-mustaḍīʼ bi-maṣābīḥ akhawātihā ... wa-tarjamtuhu bi-Kitāb Shirʻat al-Islām ilá dār al-salām wa-jaʻaltuhu thamāniyah wa-arbaʻīn faṣlan ..."

title: 880-02 Sharḥ al-Fiqh al-akbar : manuscript / Abū al-Muntahá Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad al-Maghnīsāwī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm wa-bi-hi nastaʻīn. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī hadānā ilá ṭarīq al-Sunnah wa-al-Jamāʻah bi-faḍlihi al-ʻaẓīm, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Rasūlihi wa-ḥabībihi Muḥammad alladhī kāna ʻalá khuluq ʻaẓīm, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-aṣḥābihi al-dāʻīn ilá ṣirāṭin mustaqīm. Ammā baʻd, fa-yaqūlu al-ʻabd al-ḍaʻīf al-mudhnib Abū al-Muntahá, ʻaṣamahu Allāh taʻālá al-kabīr al-karīm ʻan al-khāṭāyā [al-khaṭāyā] wa-al-maʻāṣī wa-min al-iʻtiqād al-fāsid al-ʻaqīm: 'Inna Kitāb al-Fiqh al-akbar alladhī ṣannafahu al-Imām al-aʻẓam kitāb ṣaḥīḥ maqbūl. Qāla al-Shaykh al-Imām fakhr al-Islām ʻAlī al-Yazdawī: Fī uṣūl al-fiqh nawʻān, ʻilm al-tawḥīd wa-al-ṣifāt, wa-ʻilm al-sharāʼiʻ wa-al-aḥkām, wa-al-aṣl fī al-nawʻ al-awwal huwa al-tamassuk bi-al-Kitāb wa-al-Sunnah wa-mujānabat al-hawá wa-al-bidʻah wa-luzūm ṭarīq al-Sunnah wa-al-Jamāʻah ..."

title: 880-03 Fatḥ al-qarīb al-mujīb fī sharḥ alfāẓ al-Taqrīb : manuscript / Shams al-Dīn Abū ʻAbd Allāh Muḥammad ibn Qāsim al-Shāfiʻī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Qāla al-Shaykh al-Imām al-ʻālim al-ʻallāmah Shams al-Dīn Abū ʻAbd Allāh Muḥammad ibn Qāsim al-Shāfiʻī, taghammadahu Allāh bi-raḥmatih wa-ruḍwānih. Āmīn: al-Ḥamdu lillāh tabarrukan bi-Fātiḥat al-Kitāb li-annahā ibtidāʼ kull amr dhī bāl wa-khātimat kull duʻāʼ mujāb wa-ākhir duʻāʼ al-muʼminīn fī al-Jannah dār al-thawāb, aḥmaduhu an [ay] wifqa murādih, wa-uṣallī wa-usallimu ʻalá afḍal khalqihi Muḥammad Sayyidī [Sayyid] al-Mursalīn, al-qāʼil 'Man yurid Allāh bi-hi khayran yufaqqihhu fī al-dīn' wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-aṣḥābihi muddata dhikr al-dhākirīn wa-sahw al-ghāfilīn. Wa-baʻd, fa-hādhā kitāb fī ghāyat al-ikhtiṣār wa-al-tahdhīb wa-ḍaʻtuhu ʻalá al-kitāb al-musammá bi-al-Taqrīb li-yantfiʻa bi-hi al-muḥtāj min al-mubtadiʼīn li-furūʻ al-sharīʻah wa-al-dīn ..."

title: 880-03 Fatḥ al-qarīb al-mujīb fī sharḥ alfāẓ al-Taqrīb : manuscript / Ibn Qāsim al-Ghazzī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh tabarrukan bi-Fātiḥat al-Kitāb li-annahā ibtidāʼ kull amr dhī bāl wa-khātimat kull duʻāʼ mujāb wa-ākhir daʻwá al-muʼminīn fī al-Jannah dār al-thawāb, aḥmaduhu an waffaqa man arāda min ʻibādih lil-tafaqquh fī al-dīn ʻalá wifq murādih, wa-uṣallī wa-usallimu ʻalá afḍal khalqihi Muḥammad Sayyid al-Mursalīn, al-qāʼil 'Man yurid Allāh bi-hi khayran yufaqqihhu fī al-dīn' wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-aṣḥābihi muddata dhikr al-dhākirīn wa-sahw al-ghāfilīn. Wa-baʻd, hādhā kitāb fī ghāyat al-ikhtiṣār wa-al-tahdhīb wa-ḍaʻtuhu ʻalá al-kitāb al-musammá bi-al-Taqrīb li-yantfiʻa bi-hi al-muḥtāj min al-mubtadiʼīn li-furūʻ al-sharīʻah wa-al-dīn ... wa-iʻlam annahu yūjadu fī baʻḍ nusakh hādhā al-kitāb fī ghayr khuṭbatih: Laqad sammaytuhu tāratan bi-al-Taqrīb wa-tāratan bi-Ghāyat al-akhtiṣār, wa-li-dhālika sammaytuhu bi-ismayn, aḥaduhumā Fatḥ al-qarīb al-mujīb fī sharḥ alfāẓ al-Taqrīb, wa-al-thānī al-Qawl al-mukhtār fī sharḥ Ghāyat al-ikhtiṣār ..."

title: 880-02 Qurrat al-ʻayn li-sharḥ Waraqāt Imām al-Ḥaramayn : manuscript / Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad al-Ḥaṭṭāb.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm wa-bi-hi thiqatī. Qāla Sayyidunā wa-Mawlānā al-Shaykh al-Imām al-ʻālim al-ʻallāmah, al-ḥabr al-fahhāmah, muftī al-Muslimīn bi-balad Allāh al-amīn, Abū ʻAbd Allāh Muḥammad ibn Sayyidinā wa-Mawlānā al-Shaykh al-Imām al-ʻallāmah Muḥammad al-Ḥaṭṭāb al-Mālikī: al-Ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi ajmaʻīn. Wa-baʻd, fa-inna Kitāb al-Waraqāt fī ʻilm uṣūl al-fiqh lil-Shaykh al-Imām al-ʻallāmah, ṣāḥib al-taṣānīf al-mufīdah, Abī al-Maʻālī ʻAbd al-Malik Imām al-Ḥaramayn, kitāb ṣaghura ḥajmuh, wa-kathura ʻilmuh, wa-ʻaẓuma nafʻuh, wa-ẓaharat barakatuh, wa-qad sharaḥahu jamāʻah min al-ʻulamāʼ ... wa-min aḥsan shurūḥihi sharḥ Shaykhinā al-ʻAllāmah al-mufīd Jalāl al-Dīn Abī ʻAbd Allāh Muḥammad ibn Aḥmad al-Maḥallī al-Shāfiʻī, fa-innahu kathīr al-fawāʼid wa-al-nukat, wa-qad ishtaghala bi-hi al-ṭalabah wa-intafaʻū bi-hi, illā annahu li-farṭ al-ījāz qāraba an yakūna min jumlat al-alghāz ... fa-istakhartu Allāh taʻālá fī sharḥ al-Waraqāt bi-ʻibārah wāḍiḥah munabbihah ʻalá al-sharḥ al-madhkūr wa-fawāʼidih bi-ḥaythu yakūnu hādhā al-sharḥ sharḥan lil-Waraqāt wa-lil-sharḥ al-madhkūr ... wa-sammaytuhu Qurrat al-ʻayn li-sharḥ Waraqāt Imām al-Ḥaramayn ..."

title: 880-02 Ḍawʼ al-maʻālī li-Badʼ al-amālī : manuscript / ʻAlī ibn Sulṭān Muḥammad al-Qārī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm wa-bi-hi nastaʻīn. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī wajaba wujūd dhātih, wa-thabuta karam wujūdih wa-shuhūd ṣifātih, wa-ẓahara afʻāluhu al-ḥamīdah fī ṣaḥāʼif maṣnūʻātih, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá zubdat makhlūqātih wa-ʻumdat mawjūdātih, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-aṣḥābihi wa-atbāʻih, fī ḥarakātihi wa-sakanātih. Ammā baʻd, fa-yaqūlu al-multajī ilá ḥaram Rabbihi al-Bārī ʻAlī ibn Sulṭān ibn Muḥammad al-Qārī: Lammā sharaʻtu fī sharḥ al-Fiqh al-akbar lil-Imām al-aʻẓam wa-al-humām al-aqdam, kāna fī nīyatī wa-ṭawīyatī an yakūna mukhtaṣaran ... fa-sanaḥa bi-bālī wa-ḥālī an aṣnaʻa sharḥan mūjazan ʻalá Qaṣīdat Badʼ al-amālī ... wa-sammaytuhu Ḍawʼ al-maʻālī li-Badʼ al-amālī ..."

title: 880-02 Bushrá al-kaʼīb bi-liqāʼ al-ḥabīb : manuscript / Jalāl al-Dīn al-Suyūṭī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi ajmaʻīn. Hādhā juzʼun laṭīf wa-sammaytuhu Bushrá al-kaʼīb bi-liqāʼ al-ḥabīb, lakhkhaṣtuhu min kitābī al-kabīr alladhī allaftuhu fī aḥwāl al-Barzakh, qaṣartuhu ʻalá al-bushrá bi-mā yalqāhu al-muʼmin ʻinda mawtihi wa-fī qabrihi min al-takrīm wa-al-tarḥīb, wa-billāh al-tawfīq ..."

title: 880-02 al-Shifā bi-taʻrīf ḥuqūq al-Muṣṭafá : manuscript / ʻIyāḍ ibn Mūsá ibn ʻIyāḍ al-Yaḥṣubī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Qāla al-Shaykh al-Imām al-ʻālim al-awḥad, al-ʻallāmah al-muḥaqqiq al-mutqin, Abū al-Faḍl ʻIyāḍ ibn Mūsá ibn ʻIyāḍ al-Yaḥṣubī, raḍiya Allāh ʻanh: al-Ḥamdu lillāh al-munfarid bi-ismihi al-asmā [al-asmá], al-mukhtaṣṣ bi-al-mulk al-aʻazz al-aḥmá, alladhī laysa dūnahu muntahá wa-lā warāʼahu marmá, al-ẓāhir lā takhayyulan wa-wahman, wa-al-bāṭin taqddusan lā ʻadman ..."

title: 880-02 Bahjat al-ḥusn al-waḥīd ʻalá Jawharat al-tawḥīd : manuscript / Aḥmad al-Mīhī al-Shabīnī al-Shāfiʻī al-Nuʻmānī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī ḥallá ʻarāʼis al-tawḥīd fī ḥaḍrat al-wujūd, wa-ḥallá nafāʼis al-taghrīd fī rawḍat al-shuhūd, al-wāḥid al-maʻbūd alladhī naṭaqat bi-waḥdānīyatih ʻajāʼib maṣnūʻātih, al-fard al-ṣamad alladhī aṭbaqat ʻalá ṣamadānīyatihi gharāʼib mubdaʻātih ... Wa-baʻd, fa-yaqūlu al-ʻabd al-mudhnib al-awwāh ... Aḥmad al-Mīhī al-Shabīnī al-Shāfiʻī al-Nuʻmānī ... Inna naẓm al-ʻAllāmah al-quṭb al-rabbānī al-ʻārif billāh taʻālá Sayyidī Ibrāhīm al-Laqqānī, nisbah ilá Laqānah, baldah shahīrah bi-Iqlīm al-Buḥayrah alladhī anshaʼahu bi-ishārat shaykh al-tarbiyah fī al-taṣawwuf, Sayyidī Aḥmad ʻArab al-Sharnūbī ... al-musammī dhālika al-naẓm bi-Jawharat al-tawḥīd ... wa-qad kuntu waḍaʻtu ʻalayhā ḥāshiyah badīʻat al-mabānī, laṭīfat al-maʻānī, thumma fī sanat thamān wa-khamsīn wa-miʼatayn baʻda al-alf ... ṣaraftu al-himmah ilá tabyīḍihā ... wa-sammaytuhā Bahjat al-ḥusn al-waḥīd ʻalá Jawharat al-tawḥīd ..."

title: 880-01 Ḥawāshin ʻalá Sharḥ al-Ujhūrī li-naẓmihi Faḍāʼil Ramaḍān : manuscript.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm wa-bi-hi nastaʻīn. al-Ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Sayyid al-Mursalīn, Sayyidinā Muḥammad, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi ajmaʻīn, wa-raḍiya Allāh ʻan al-tābiʻīn wa-man tabiʻahum bi-iḥsān ilá yawm al-dīn. Wa-baʻd, fa-hādhihi ḥawāshī ʻalá sharḥ al-ʻAllāmah al-Ujhūrī al-Mālikī li-naẓmihi li-Faḍāʼil Ramaḍān, jamaʻtuhā min hawāmish katabahā bi-yadihi Shaykhunā al-Shaykh Ḥasan al-Madābighī, ʻalayhi saḥāyib al-raḥmah wa-al-riḍwān, ʻalá hāmish nuskhatihi, wa-min taqrīr Shaykhinā al-Shaykh ʻAṭīyah al-Ujhūrī, ḥafiẓahu Allāh, wa-min kutub al-Tafsīr, wa-al-Ḥadīth, wa-al-Fiqh. Wa-Allāh al-masʼūl an yanfaʻa bi-hā, ka-mā nafaʻa bi-aṣlihā ..."

title: 880-02 al-Qudūrī : manuscript / Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad al-Qudūrī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Kitāb al-Ṭahārah. Qāla Allāh taʻālá: Yā ayyuhā alladhīn āmanū idhā qumtu ilá al-ṣalāh fa-ighsilū wujūhakum wa-aydiyakum ilá al-marāfiq wa-imsaḥū bi-ruʼūsikum wa-arjulikum ilá al-kaʻbayn. Fa-faraḍa al-ṭahārah ..."

title: 880-02 Nūr al-hidāyah wa-al-ʻirfān fī sirr al-rābiṭah wa-al-tawajjuh wa-Khatm al-Khawājakān : manuscript / Muḥammad Asʻad ibn Maḥmūd al-Khālidī al-ʻUthmānī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī ayyada al-Sharīʻah al-Aḥmadīyah bi-ẓuhūr al-zumrah al-taqīyah al-naqīyah, ahl al-akhlāq al-Muḥammadīyah, fa-aḥyá bi-him al-arwāḥ al-ṭāhirah al-zakīyah ... Ammā baʻd, fa-yaqūlu asīr al-dhunūb ... Muḥammad Asʻad ibn al-Ustādh al-Shaykh Maḥmūd al-Khālidī al-ʻUthmānī, al-mulaqqab bi-al-Ṣāḥib ... inna al-wird al-maʻrūf ʻinda sādātinā al-aslāf al-Naqshabandīyah wa-qādatinā al-aṣḥāb al-Khālidīyah ... al-musammá bi-al-Khatm al-Khawājakānī al-muḥtawī ʻalá baʻḍ ayāt min al-Qurʼān al-Karīm wa-al-Sabʻ al-Mathānī, huwa laysa fī al-ḥaqīqah min sharāʼiṭ hādhihi al-ṭarīqah al-anīqah, bal huwa min awrād akābir mashāyikhihā al-kirām ... al-Khawājah ʻAbd al-Khāliq al-Ghajdawānī ..."

title: 880-02 al-Anwār al-Azʹharīyah al-muḥīṭah bi-al-khuṭab al-minbarīyah : manuscript / Ibrāhīm ibn Badawī al-Naḥḥās al-Shāfiʻī al-Azʹharī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī sharrafa aʻwād al-mābir wa-maḥārīb al-masājid bi-dhikrihi, wa-atḥafa khuṭabāʼ al-anām bi-tuḥaf imtinānih wa-mazīd birrih, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam, khayr man khaṭaba wa-amma, wa-anāra al-qulub bi-waʻẓihi wa-zajrih. Ammā baʻd, fa-yaqūlu muḥtāj Rabbihi al-qawī, Ibrāhīm ibn Badawī al-Naḥḥās al-Shāfiʻī al-Azʹharī: Hādhā mā ishtaddat ilayhi ḥājat al-khuṭabāʼ wa-al-qāṣirīn min amthālī, jamaʻtuhu ayyāma niyābatī li-khiṭābat al-Jāmiʻ al-Azʹhar, manbaʻ al-ʻulūm wa-martaʻ arbāb al-manṭūq wa-al-mafhūm, al-ḥaram al-Miṣrī, al-aqmar al-anwar ..."

title: 880-02 Ḥāshiyat al-Kastalī ʻalá Sharḥ al-ʻAqāʼid al-Nasafīyah lil-Taftāzānī : manuscript / Muṣliḥ al-Dīn Muṣṭafá ibn Maḥmūd al-Qasṭallānī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu li-man wajaba la-hu al-wujūd kamā wajaba la-hu al-sujūd, wa-fāḍa bi-hi al-jūd fa-fāḍa ʻanhu kull mawjūd, ʻalá mā sharaḥa ṣadrī li-ʻaqāʼid al-Islām wa-ḥaqāʼiq al-sharāʼiʻ wa-al-aḥkām, wa-al-ṣalāh adhká mā kān ʻalá ashraf man wujida fī buqʻat al-imkān, wa-ʻalá ālihi al-bararah al-kirām ... Wa-baʻd, fahādhā ʻiqd min al-farāʼid ʻallaqtuhu ʻalá Sharḥ al-ʻAqāʼid lil-ʻAllāmah Masʻūd al-Taftāzānī ..."

title: 880-02 Risālat fī al-Basmalah : manuscript / Ismāʻīl ibn Ghunaym al-Jawharī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm wa-bi-hi al-iʻānah ʻalá al-qawm al-kāfirīn. Ḥamdan li-māniḥ al-bayān wa-fātiḥ abwāb al-tibyān, wa-ṣalātan wa-salāman ʻalá man amara bi-tajwīd al-Basmalah, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-aṣḥābihi al-ḥāʼizīn fī kull faḍl li-ḥamdih. Wa-baʻd, fa-yaqūlu al-ʻabd al-faqīr ilá al-Mawlá al-kabīr Ismāʻīl ibn al-Shaykh Ghunaym al-Jawharī, futiḥa [ʻalayhi] al-tawfīq al-bāṭinī wa-al-ẓāhirī: qad waḍaʻtu fīmā maḍá risālah tataḍammanu mā ishtamalat ʻlayhi al-Basmalh min al-mabāḥith al-sharīfah wa-taḥtawī ʻalá mā fīhā min al-fawāʼid al-ghazīrah wa-al-maqāṣid al-munīfah, wa-qad raʼaytu an akhtaṣirahā min ahamm al-muhimmāt li-yasʹhula taʻāṭiyahā ʻalá amthālī min ulī al-raghabāt, ṭāliban min Allāh al-thawāb wa-al-fawz yawm al-maʼāb ..."

title: 880-02 Sharḥ al-Jazāʼirīyah fī ʻilm al-tawḥīd : manuscript / ʻAbd al-Raḥmān ibn ʻAbd al-Salām al-Ṣaffūrī al-Shāfiʻī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī laysa fī al-wujūd illā dhātuh, wa-mā yurá min al-siwá fa-huwa afʻāluhu wa-ṣifātuh, wa-kāna wa-lā shayʼ maʻah, wa-huwa al-ān ʻalá mā ʻlayhi kān, fa-awjada kull shayʼ min lā shayʼ, bul qāla la-hu kun fa-kān ... Wa-baʻd, fa-inna ashraf al-ʻulūm ʻilm al-tawḥīd, li-annahu yubḥathu fīhi ʻan dhāt al-maʻbūd wa-ṣifātih ... wa-qad ṣunnifa fīhi kutub kathīrah, muṭawwalāt wa-mukhtaṣarāt, wa-aḥsan mā ṣunnifa min al-mukhtaṣarāt manẓūm al-Shaykh al-faqīh ʻalam al-aʻlām al-Sayyid Abī al-ʻAbbās Aḥmad ibn ʻAbd Allāh al-Jazāʼirī ... wa-qad sharaḥahu ... Abū ʻAbd Allāh Muḥammad ibn Yūsuf al-Sanūsī al-Ḥasanī ... sharḥan aṭnaba fīhi wa-bālagha fī al-iṭnāb ... ghayra annahu min ziyādat al-iṭnāb yamallu minhu baʻḍ al-ṭullāb, fa-aḥbabtu an akhtaṣirah wa-aqtaṣir ʻalá al-maqṣūd alladhī lā budda minh ..."

title: 880-02 Risālah fī al-tawḥīd : manuscript / Ibrāhīm ibn Muḥammad al-Bājūrī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm wa-bi-hi nastaʻīn ʻalá al-qawm al-kāfirīn. al-Ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá ashraf al-mursalīn wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi ajmaʻīn. Wa-baʻd, fa-yaqūlu al-ʻabd al-faqīr ilá raḥmat rabbihi al-khabīr al-baṣīr Ibrāhīm al-Bājūrī dhawī [dhū] al-taqṣīr: Ṭalaba minnī baʻḍ al-ikhwān, aṣlaḥa Allāh lī wa-lahum al-ḥāl wa-al-shān an aktuba risālah laṭīfah tashtamilu ʻalá ṣifāt al-Mawlá wa-aḍdādihā, wa-mā yajūzu fī ḥaqqihi taʻālá, wa-ʻalá mā yajūzu fī ḥaqq al-rusul, wa-mā yastaḥīlu fī ḥaqqihim wa-mā yajūz, fa-ajabtu li-dhālika, fa-qultu, wa-billāh al-tawfīq ..."

title: 880-03 al-Mukhtār ʻalá madhhab al-Imām al-Aʻẓam : manuscript / ʻAbd Allāh ibn Maḥmūd al-Mawṣilī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh ʻalá jazīl naʻmāʼihi, aḥmaduhu ʻalá jalīl ālāʼih, wa-ashkuruhu ʻalá jamīl balāʼih, wa-ashhadu an lā ilāha illā Allāh shahādatan uʻidduhā li-yawm liqāʼih, wa-ashhadu anna Muḥammadan ʻabdahu wa-rasūlah, sayyidu rusulihi wa-khātim anbiyāʼih, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-aṣfiyāʼih, wa-aḥmaduhu ʻalá an jaʻalanī mimman salaka sunan sunnatihi wa-iqtafāhu, wa-warada sharīʻat sharʻihi fa-rawāh, ḥamda man ghamarathu niʻamuhu wa-ʻammathu ʻaṭāyāh ..."

title: 880-02 Irshād al-fāriḍ ilá Kashf al-ghawāmiḍ : manuscript / Badr al-Dīn Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad Sibṭ al-Māridīnī.
note_text: Incipit: The first five lines are torn; the text begins with: "... yablughu qāʼiluhā aʻlá al-marātib ... wa-ashhadu anna Muḥammadan ʻabduhu wa-rasūluhu al-mabʻūth ilá kāffat al-khalq, Aʻāribihā wa-al-Aʻājim, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-aṣḥābihi mā ḥarrara qismat al-mawārīth qāsim. Ammā baʻd, fa-yaqūlu Muḥammad Sibṭ al-Mārdīnī: Lammā taḥarrara kitābī "Kashf al-ghawāmiḍ" wa-ishtahar, wa-iʻtaná bi-hi kathīr min al-fuḍalāʼ wa-intashar li-mā ishtamala ʻlayhi min masāʼil al-farāʼiḍ wa-al-waṣīyah wa-naql al-madhāhib al-muḥarrarah al-marḍīyah, saʼalanī baʻḍ al-sādah al-ashrāf an aʻmala ʻalayhi tawḍīḥan khāliyan min al-ijḥāf wa-al-iʻtisāf ... fa-ʻamiltu hādhā al-sharḥ ʻamal man ṭabba li-man ḥabb. Wa-sammaytuhu "Irshād al-fāriḍ ilá Kashf al-ghawāmiḍ" ..."

title: 880-03 al-Juzʼ al-thānī min Sīrat al-Ḥalabī : manuscript / ʻAlī ibn Ibrāhīm Nūr al-Dīn al-Ḥalabī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bāb dhikr al-Isrāʼ wa-al-Miʻrāj wa-farḍ al-ṣalawāt al-khams. Qāl: Iʻlam annahu lā khilāfa fī al-isrāʼ bi-hi, ṣallá Allāh ʻlayhi wa-sallam, wa-huwa naṣṣ al-qurʼān ʻalá sabīl al-ijmāʻ, wa-jāʼat bi-tafṣīlihi wa-sharḥ ʻajāʼibihi Aḥādīth kathīrah ʻan jamāʻh min al-Ṣaḥābah min al-rijāl wa-al-nisāʼ, naḥwa al-thalāthīn, ay, wa-min thamma dhahaba al-Ḥātimī al-Ṣūfī ilá anna al-isrāʼ waqaʻa la-hu, ṣallá Allāh ʻalyahi wa-sallam, thalāthīn marrah ..."

title: 880-02 Mawlid al-Muṣṭafá : manuscript / Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad ibn Ḥajar al-Haythamī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallam. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī baʻatha fīnā rasūlahu al-aʻẓam wa-nabīyahu al-akmal al-afkham, ṣallá Allāh ʻlayhi wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallama wa-sharrafa wa-karrama wa-ʻaẓẓam. Wa-baʻd, fa-inna aṣdaq al-ḥadīth Kitāb Allāh taʻālá, wa-khayr al-hudá hady Muḥammad, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam. Wa-qad qāla taʻālá fī Kitābihi al-mubīn, wa-huwa aṣdaq al-qāʼilīn: Laqad jāʼakum rasūlun min anfisikum, ʻazīzun ʻalayhi mā ʻanittum, ḥarīṣun ʻalaykum, bi-al-muʼminīna raʼūfun raḥīm. Fa-in tawallaw fa-qul ḥasbiya Allāhu lā ilāh illā huwa, ʻalayhi tawakkaltu, wa-huwa Rabbu al-ʻarsh al-ʻaẓīm ..."

title: 880-02 Mawlid Rasūl Allāh : manuscript / Ḥasan ibn ʻAlī al-Madābighī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm wa-bi-hi al-iʻānah. Qāla al-ʻabd al-faqīr ilá Mawlāhu al-ʻAlī Ḥasan ibn ʻAlī al-Shāfiʻī al-Azʹharī al-Madābighī: Qad suʼiltu fī ikhtiṣār al-Mawlid al-Sharīf lil-Najm al-Ghayṭī, fa-ajabtu ilá dhālik ḥasbamā fataḥa bi-hi al-Qādir al-Mālik, fa-qultu: al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī anāra al-wujūd bi-mawld Sayyid al-Mursalīn, ṣallá Allāh wa-sallama ʻalayhi wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-aṣḥābihi wa-al-tābiʻīn lahum bi-iḥsān ilá yawm al-dīn. Ammā baʻd, fa-inna shahr Rabīʻ al-Awwal ikhtaṣṣa bi-manqabah ʻaẓīmah fāqa bi-hā ʻalá sāyir al-shuhūr wa-fāza bi-karāmah kubrá ṣāra madhkūran bi-hā ʻalá mamarr al-duhūr ..."

title: 880-02 Sharḥ Manẓūmat Ibn Faraḥ : manuscript / Yaḥyá ibn ʻAbd al-Raḥmān al-Qarāfī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Qāla faqīr raḥmat rabbihi al-kāfī, Yaḥyá al-Qarāfī ibn ʻAbd al-Raḥmān al-Iṣfahānī, mustamiddan min Allāh dhī al-mathānī: al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī qabila taṣḥīḥ [bi-ṣaḥīḥ] al-nīyah man hājara ilayh, wa-kafá bi-ḥasanihā man tawakkala ʻalayh, wa-waṣala al-ḍaʻīf al-munqaṭiʻ bi-marāsīl birrih, wa-sakkana nafsahu ʻan al-iḍṭrāb wa-al-ʻilal fī baḥrihi wa-barrih ... Wa-baʻd, fa-hādhā sharḥ laṭīf al-ḥajm, ḥawá fī ʻilm al-Ḥadīth min al-fawāʼid al-jamm, ʻamiltuhu ʻalá Manẓūmat al-Ḥāfiẓ Ibn Farḥ al-Ishbīlī, taghammadahu Allāh bi-raḥmatih, wa-askanahu baḥbūḥat jannatih ... Qāla: Gharāmī ṣaḥīḥun ... wa-al-rajā ... fīka muʻḍilu ... // wa-ḥuznī wa-damʻī mursalun ... wa-musalsalu ..."

title: 880-02 Sharḥ al-Isrāʼ : manuscript / Shihāb al-Dīn al-Qalyūbī al-Shāfiʻī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm wa-bi-hi thiqatī. al-Ḥamdu lillāh al-mannān ʻalá ʻibādihi bi-niʻam lā tuḥṣá wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá man usriya bi-hi min al-Masjid al-Ḥarām ilá al-Masjid al-Aqṣá wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-aṣḥābihi dhawī al-faḍāʼil alladhī [allatī] lā tustaqṣá. Wa-baʻd, fa-hādhā taʻlīq laṭīf fī kull min al-Isrá [al-Isrāʼ] wa-al-Miʻrāj al-munīf jāmiʻ li-mā fī ghayrihi min al-muṭawwalāt maʻa qillat al-ḥajm wa-talkhīṣ al-ʻibārāt, jaʻalahu Allāh khāliṣan min shawāʼib al-waṣamāt wa-khāliyan min al-shukūk wa-al-shubuhāt wa-nāfiʻan li-ṭālibīhi fī jamīʻ sāʼir al-ḥālāt ..."

title: 880-02 Mawlid al-Nabī : manuscript / Jaʻfar ibn Ḥasan al-Barzanjī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallam. Abtadiʼu al-imlāʼ bi-ism al-Dhāt al-ʻAlīyah, mustadirran fayḍ al-barakāt ʻalá mā anālahu wa-awlāh, wa-uthannī bi-ḥamd mawāridihi sāyighatan hanīyah, mumtaṭiyan min al-shukr al-jamīl maṭāyāh, wa-uṣallī wa-usallimu ʻalá al-nūr al-mawṣūf bi-al-taqaddum wa-al-awlawīyah, al-muntaqil fī al-ghurar al-karīmah wa-al-jibāh, wa-astamniḥu Allāh taʻālá ruḍwānan yakhuṣṣu al-ʻitrah al-ṭāhirah al-Nabawīyah, wa-yaʻummu al-aṣḥāb wa-al-atbāʻ wa-man wālāh ..."

title: 880-03 Sharḥ al-ʻAqāʼid al-Nasafīyah : manuscript / Masʻūd ibn ʻUmar al-Taftāzānī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh al-mutawaḥḥid bi-jalāl dhātih wa-kamāl ṣifātih, al-mutaqaddis fī nuʻūt al-jabarūt ʻan shawāyib al-naqṣ wa-simātih, wa-al-ṣalāh ʻalá Nabīyihi Muḥammad al-muʼayyad bi-sāṭiʻ ḥujajihi wa-awḍaḥ bayyinātih, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-aṣḥābihi hudāt ṭarīq al-ḥaqq wa-ḥumātih ..."

title: 880-03 Sharḥ ʻAqāʼid al-Imām al-Nasafī : manuscript / Masʻūd ibn ʻUmar al-Taftāzānī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi nastaʻīn. al-Ḥamdu lillāh al-mutawaḥḥid bi-jalāl dhātih wa-kamāl ṣifātih, al-mutaqaddis fī nuʻūt al-jabarūt ʻan shawāyib al-naqṣ wa-simātih, wa-al-ṣalāh ʻalá Nabīyihi Muḥammad al-muʼayyad bi-sāṭiʻ ḥujajihi wa-awḍaḥ bayyinātih, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-aṣḥābihi hudāt ṭarīq al-ḥaqq wa-ḥumātih ..."

title: 880-02 Manẓūmat al-Ṣabbān fī muṣṭalaḥ al-Ḥadīth : manuscript / Muḥammad ibn ʻAlī al-Ṣabbān.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Yaqūlu rājī raḥmata al-Mannāni // Muḥammadu al-maʻrūfu bi-al-Ṣabbān. Ḥamdan li-man sharrafa ḥuffāẓa al-athar // bi-khidmat al-Sunnati min byani al-bashr ..."

title: 880-02 Mukhtaṣar al-Shamāʼil al-Nabawīyah : manuscript / ʻAbd Allāh ibn Ḥijāzī al-Sharqāwī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá afḍal al-mursalīn wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-al-tābiʻīn lahum ilá yawm al-dīn. Ammā baʻd, fa-yaqūlu rājī ghafr al-masāwī ʻAbd Allāh ibn Ḥijāzī al-Sharqāwī: Hādhā kitāb ikhtaṣartuhu min Shamāʼil al-Ḥāfiẓ al-Tirmidhī, jaʻlahu Allāh khāliṣan li-wajhihi al-karīm. Āmīn.
