Bāb khalq Rasūl Allāh, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam ..."

title: 880-02 Ḥāshiyah ʻalá Sharḥ al-Kharīdah al-bahīyah : manuscript / Muṣṭafá ibn Aḥmad al-ʻUqbāwī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm wa-bi-hi thiqatī. al-Ḥamdu lillāh wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Rasūl Allāh Sayyidinā Muḥammad, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam. Wa-baʻd, fa-yaqūlu rājī ʻafwa al-masāwī, Muṣṭafá ibn Aḥmad al-ʻUqbāwī: Lammā arāda Allāh taʻālá bi-ḥuṣūl al-khayr al-kathīr jadhaba al-qulūb li-ʻaqīdat ahl al-tawḥīd lil-Quṭb al-shahīr alladhī ʻamma al-nafʻ bi-hi, wa-huwa Shaykhunā Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad al-Dardīr, fa-kānat nafʻan ṣirfan lil-kabīr wa-al-ṣaghīr ... fa-jamaʻtu ʻalayhā duraran mufīdah jāda bi-hā Shaykhunā fī Sharḥ al-Kharīdah, jaʻalahā Allāh khāliṣah li-wajhihi al-karīm wa-sababan lil-fawz bi-jannāt al-naʻīm ..."

title: 880-02 Ḥāshiyah ʻalá Qiṣṣat al-Miʻrāj : manuscript / Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad al-Dardīr.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi nastaʻīn ʻalá al-qawm al-kāfirīn. al-Ḥamdu lillāh wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá rasūl Allāh. Wa-baʻd, fa-hādhihi kalimāt jamaʻtuhā ʻalá Qiṣṣat al-Miʻrāj rajāʼa an yantafiʻa bi-hā man yataṣaddá ilá qirāʼatihā mimman huwa qāṣid mithlī, jamaʻtuhā min al-wujūh allatī dhakarahā muʼallifuhā al-ʻAllāmah Najm al-Dīn al-Ghayṭī, raḍiya Allāh ʻanh, baʻda dhikr al-qiṣṣah. Wa-mattá qultu "al-muʼallif", lā yanṣarif illā la-hu, fa-huwa al-murād, wa-min sharḥ al-ʻAllāmah al-Qalyūbī, wa-mimmā yaftaḥu Allāh taʻālá bi-hi, maʻa ʻadam al-taṭwīl al-muʼaddī ilá al-saʼāmah, fa-aqūlu, wa-anā afqar ʻibād Allāh taʻālá, ḥalīf al-taqṣīr, Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad al-Dardīr ..."

title: 880-02 Nihāyat al-ṭalab fī sharḥ al-Muktasab fī zirāʻat al-dhahab : manuscript / Aydamar ibn ʻAbd Allāh al-Jaldakī.
note_text: Incipit: Incipit missing, starts with "... wa-al-Ḥijāz wa-al-Shām wa-anā ajūbu al-bilād wa-ataṣaffaḥu al-wujūh wa-aṭlubu al-ḍāllah wa-asʼalu Allāh taʻālá ānāʼa al-layl wa-aṭrāf al-nahār muddatan tazīdu ʻalá sabʻata ʻashara ʻāman uʻāliju murr al-ṣabr fī al-ishtighāl, wa-uʻānī al-ṭuruq al-jābirīyah fī al-aʻmāl wa-al-naẓar fī asrār al-ṭabāyiʻ wa-al-istiḥālāt wa-afḍal maʻānī aqwāl al-mutaqaddimīn wa-afʻālihim fī al-murakkabāt wa-al-imtizājāt. Wa-lam azal kadhālika ilá an manna Allāh taʻālá, wa-la-hu al-ḥamd, bi-al-ijtimāʻ bi-al-Shaykh al-wāṣil wa-al-ḥakīm al-fāḍil alladhī ʻalayhi ishtaghaltu wa-la-hu khadamtu ..."

title: 880-02 ʻUyūn al-ḥaqāʼiq wa-īḍāḥ al-ṭarāʼiq : manuscript / Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad al-ʻIrāqī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī aṭlaʻa lanā min mashāriq al-arḍ shumūsan lā yatimmu khaṭṭ al-mulk wa-al-sharīʻah al-Muḥammadīyah illā bi-him, wa-hadāhum min al-ḍalāl bi-ḥifẓ raʻīyatihi min al-Muslimīn, wa-li-dhālika khalaqahum, wa-ʻalá qadri raḥmihim razaqahum, wa-jaʻala hādhā al-ʻaṣr makhṣūṣan bi-arfaʻihim ladayhi rutbatan, wa-awjabihim ʻindahu qurbatan, fa-huwa mālikunā al-malik al-ẓāhir rukn al-dunyā, rukn al-muwaḥḥidīn, qāmiʻ al-kafarah wa-al-mushrikīn, hādī ruʻāt al-muʼminīn, ʻaḍada Allāh bi-hi al-dīn, wa-jaʻalahu min afḍal ʻabīdihi al-ṣāliḥīn ..."

title: 880-02 Ḥāshiyah ʻalá Sharḥ al-Risālat al-ʻAḍudīyah : manuscript / Muḥammad ibn Sālim al-Ḥifnī.
note_text: Incipit: Incipit is missing; the folios are numbered 10-52. Starts with: "... wa-laysa kadhālika, bal huwa wāwīyuhā ayḍan, fa-qad sumiʻa al-fayd wa-al-fawd, ka-mā fī al-Qāmūs. Qawluhu bi-maʻná istiḥdāth al-iḍāfah bayānīyah, ay, lā bi-maʻná al-nāḥiyah, wa-lā bi-maʻná shaʻr al-raʼs, mimmā yalī al-udhn, wa-lā bi-maʻná dhahāb al-māl aw thabātuh, li-anna al-fayd ka-al-fawd, yuṭlaqu ʻalá hādhihi al-maʻānī wa-ghayrihā, ka-mā fī al-Qāmūs ..."

title: 880-03 al-Juzʼ al-thālith min Tadhkirat al-Ḥakīm Dāwūd : manuscript / Dāʼūd ibn ʻUmar al-Anṭākī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Rabbi yassir, yā karīm. al-Bāb al-rābiʻ fī tafṣīl aḥwāl al-amrāḍ al-juzʼīyah wa-istiqṣāʼ asbābihā wa-ʻalāmātihā wa-ḍurūb muʻālajatihā al-khāṣṣah bi-hā, idh fīmā sabaqa min al-qawānīn al-kullīyah fī al-tarākīb al-jāmiʻah mā fīhi kifāyah ..."

title: 880-02 Murshid al-mutaʼahhil : manuscript / Muḥammad ibn Quṭb al-Dīn Muḥammad al-Iznīqī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī khalaqa min al-māʼ basharan, fa-jaʻalahu nasaban wa-ṣihran, wa-ṣallá ʻalá Muḥammad al-mabʻūth bashīran wa-nadhīran wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallama taslīman kathīran. Fa-lammā raʼaytu nisāʼ al-zamān yatazayyan bi-zī al-fāḥishāt wa-yamshīna fī al-aswāq wa-al-qulūb [wa-al-durūb], yafʻalna mā turīdīn [yuridna] fī al-khalawāt, ḥāshā an yakūna ḥāluhunna ḥāl al-mustaʼjarāt, wa-yakshifna sāqahunna ʻinda al-nās li-yamīla ilayhunna yad al-lāmis, wa-yalʻabna fī al-walāʼim maʻa al-shubbān fa-yastaḥiqqanna al-ghaḍab min al-Raḥmān, wa-yakhrujna ilá al-ḥammām ʻalá aʻyun al-nās bi-al-tabakhkhur [bi-al-tabakhtur] ..."

title: 880-02 Fatʹḥ al-qarīb al-mujīb fī sharḥ alfāẓ al-Taqrīb : manuscript / Muḥammad ibn Qāsim al-Ghazzī.
note_text: Incipit: No incipit. Several leaves from the beginning of the manuscript are missing. Starts with: "... yakūnu bi-zawāl ʻaynihā wa-muḥāwalat zawāl awṣāfihā min ṭaʻm wa-lawn wa-rīḥ, fa-in baqiya ṭaʻm al-najāsah ḍarra, aw lawn, aw rīḥ, ʻasura zawāluh lam yaḍurr. Wa-in kānat al-najāsah ghayr mushāhadah, wa-hiya al-musammāh bi-al-ḥukmīyah, fa-yakfī ijrāʼ al-māʼ ʻalá al-mutanjjis bi-hā ..."

title: 880-02 Kifāyat al-ṭālib al-rabbānī li-Risālat Ibn Abī Zayd al-Qayrawānī : manuscript / Abū al-Ḥasan al-Mālikī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Wa-baʻd, fayaqūlu al-ʻAbd al-faqīr li-raḥmat rabbihi al-qadīr ʻAlī Abū al-Ḥasan al-Mālikī, ghafara Allāh la-hu wa-li-wālidayhi wa-mashāyikhihi wa-awlādihi wa-ikhwānihi wa-jamīʻ al-Muslimīn: Hādhā taʻlīq laṭīf lakhkhaṣtuhu min sharḥayya al-wasaṭ wa-al-kabīr ʻalá Risālat Ibn Abī Zayd al-Qayrawānī (raḥimahu Allāh taʻālá, wa-aʻāda ʻalaynā wa-ʻalá aḥbābinā min barakātihi wa-nafaʻanā bi-ʻulūmihi wa-jaʻalanā min al-muttabiʻīna la-hu fī aqwālihi wa-afʻālihi, bi-Muḥammad wa-ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-ʻitratih. Āmīn) talkhīṣan ḥasanan mujtaniban fīhi al-taṭwīl al-mumill wa-al-ikhtiṣār al-mukhill ... wa-sammaytuhu Kifāyat al-ṭālib al-rabbānī li-Risālat Ibn Abī Zayd al-Qayrawānī ..."

title: 880-03 al-Juzʼ al-awwal min Sharḥ al-Mukhtaṣar li-Abī al-Ḍiyāʼ Khalīl ibn Isḥāq al-Jundī  : manuscript / Muḥammad ibn ʻAbd Allāh al-Kharshī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ālihi wa-sallam. Yaqūlu al-ʻabd al-faqīr Muḥammad al-Kharshī al-Mālikī: al-Ḥamdu lillāh al-muḥīṭ bi-khafīyāt al-ghuyūb, al-muṭṭaliʻ ʻalá sarāyir al-qulūb, al-mukhtaṣṣ bi-irādatihi kull maḥbūb wa-mawhūb ... Ammā baʻd, fa-inna al-ishtighāl bi-al-ʻilm min afḍal al-ṭāʻāt ... wa-qad kāna madhhab al-Imām Mālik ahlan wa-ḥaqīqan bi-dhālik. Wa-kāna aʻẓam mā ṣunnifa fīhi min al-mukhtaṣarāt, wa-aghná ʻan kathīr min al-muṭawwalāt "Mukhtaṣar" Mawlānā Abī al-Ḍiyāʼ Khalīl ibn Isʹḥāq ... wa-qad waḍaʻtu ʻalayhi sharḥan yaḥullu alfāẓah wa-yaḥtawī ʻalá taqyīdātih ..."

title: 880-02 Nawādir al-Qalyūbī  : manuscript / Shihāb al-Dīn Aḥmad ibn Aḥmad al-Qalyūbī.
note_text: Incipit: "Kitāb Nawādir al-Qalyūbī. Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī jaʻala li-man waffaqa min ʻibādihi wāʻiẓan min nafsihi, wa-adhāqahu min kuʼūs sharābihi ḥalāwat unsihi, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá quṭb dāʼirat al-asmāʼ wa-al-ṣifāt Sayyidinā wa-Mawlānā Muḥammad al-manʻūt bi-anwāʻ al-kamālāt wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-aṣḥābihi wa-ashyāʻihi wa-aṣhārihi wa-anṣārihi wa-atbāʻihi alladhīna abrazū bi-ittibāʻihi mukhaddarāt al-maʻārif wa-al-farāʼid wa-aḥrazū nawādir al-laṭāʼif wa-al-fawāʼid, wa-ʻalá al-tābiʻīn la-hum bi-iḥsān fī kull waqt wa-awān. Ammā baʻd, fa-hādhā kitābun ṣaghura ḥajmuhu wa-ghazura nafʻuhu wa-sahula fahmuhu ... lil-Ustādh al-ʻālim al-ʻallāmah ... al-Shaykh Aḥmad Shihāb al-Dīn al-Ḥūfī thumma al-Qalyūbī ..."

title: 880-02 al-Taʻrīfāt  : manuscript / ʻAlī ibn Muḥammad al-Sayyid al-Sharīf al-Jurjānī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Rabbi tammim bi-al-khayr. al-Ḥamdu lillāh ḥaqqa ḥamdih wa-al-ṣalāh ʻalá khayr khalqih Muḥammad wa-ālih ajmaʻīn. Wa-baʻd, fa-hādhihi taʻrīfāt jamaʻtuhā wa-iṣṭilāḥāt akhadhtuhā wa-rattabtuhā min kutub al-qawm ʻalá ḥurūf al-hijāʼ, min al-Alif wa-al-Bāʼ ilá al-Yāʼ, tasʹhīlan tanāwuluhā lil-ṭālibīn wa-taysīran taʻāṭīhā lil-rāghibīn. Wa-Allāh al-hādī wa-ʻalayhi iʻtimādī fī mabdaʼī wa-maʻādī. Bāb al-Alif wa-al-Bāʼ ..."

title: 880-02 al-Ifṣāḥ fī ʻaqd al-nikāḥ : manuscript / Ḥusayn ibn Muḥammad al-Maḥallī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad Sayyid al-mursalīn, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi ajmaʻīn, alladhī uhdīnā bi-hi wa-bi-aṣḥābihi lil-farq bayna al-ḥalāl wa-al-ḥarām, wa-jaʻala al-nikāḥ min sunanihi li-yubāhiya bi-kathrat atbāʻih yawm al-zuḥām, wa-ḥarrama zawāj al-Jāhilīyah ʻalá al-dawām ... Ammā baʻd, fa-yaqūlu al-faqīr al-muʻtarif bi-al-ʻajz wa-al-taqṣīr Mawlānā al-Shaykh Muḥammad al-Maḥallī al-Shāfiʻī ... hādhā taʻlīq laṭīf fī al-nikāḥ ʻalá al-madhāhib al-arbaʻ, li-yakūna mutaʻāṭīhi ʻalá baṣīrah ... wa-sammaytuhu al-Ifṣāḥ fī ʻaqd al-nikāḥ ..."

title: 880-03 Sharḥ al-Bahjah al-Wardīyah : manuscript / Zakarīyā ibn Muḥammad al-Anṣārī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Bāb al-Farāʼiḍ. Jamʻ farīḍah [... ...] ay muqaddarah, li-mā fīhā min al-sihām al-muqaddarah. Wa-al-farḍ lughatan al-taqdīr wa-sharʻan hunā naṣīb muqaddar lil-wārith ..."

title: 880-02 Ḥāshiyah ʻalá matn al-Sullam : manuscript / Ibrāhīm ibn Muḥammad al-Bājūrī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallam. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī khaṣṣ al-insān bi-al-manṭiq al-mufṣiḥ ʻammā fī al-ḍamīr min al-maknūnāt wa-afāḍ ʻalá riyāḍ ʻaqlihi ghayth saḥāb al-taṣawwurāt wa-al-taṣdīqāt ... Ammā baʻd, fa-yaqūlu rājī al-ʻafwa min al-Khabīr al-Laṭīf Ibrāhīm al-Bājūrī al-dhalīl al-ḍaʻīf ibn Muḥammad al-Jīzāwī, ghafara Allāh la-hu jamīʻ al-masāwī: Qad saʼalanī baʻḍ al-ikhwān, aṣlaḥ Allāh lī wa-la-hu al-ḥāl wa-al-shān kitābatan badīʻah al-niẓām takshufu ʻan al-muqddimah al-shahīrah bi-al-Sullam al-lithām ..."

title: 880-02 Sharḥ al-Sullam al-murawnaq fī ʻilm al-manṭiq : manuscript / ʻAbd al-Raḥmān ibn Muḥammad al-Akhḍarī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi nastaʻīn. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī jaʻala qulūb al-ʻulamāʼ samāwāt tatajallá fīhā shumūs al-maʻārif, wa-wassaʻa dawāyir afhāmihim fa-awlajahum qibāb al-mukhaddarāt min ʻarāyis al-maʻānī wa-al-laṭāyif, wa-ḥabāhum bi-ḥadāyiq al-ʻuqūl fa-tanāwalū thamarātihā, fa-aṣbaḥt āfāq ʻuqūlihim mushriqah bi-aqmār al-ʻulūm ... Ammā baʻd, fa-lammā waḍaʻtu al-urjūzah al-musammāh bi-al-Sullam al-murawnaq fī ʻilm al-manṭiq, wa-jāʼat bi-ḥamd Allāh jumaluhu kāfiyah wa-li-maqāṣid min fannihā ḥāwiyah, rāwadanī baʻḍ al-ikhwān min al-ṭalabah, akramahum Allāh, al-marrah baʻda al-marrah, ʻalá an aḍaʻa ʻalyahā sharḥan mufīdan ... fa-ajabtuhu li-dhālika ..."

title: 880-02 al-Lumʻah al-Māridīnīyah fī sharḥ al-Yāsamīnīyah : manuscript / Badr al-Dīn Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad Sibṭ al-Mārdīnī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī aḥṣá kull al-ashyāʼ ʻadadan, wa-jaʻala al-mawāl li-man aʻṭá wa-ittaqá wa-ṣaddaqa bi-al-ḥusná saʻādatan sarmadā, wa-ʻalá man bakhula wa-istaghná wa-kadhdhaba bi-al-ḥusná kuʻūb shuʼm tūqiʻu fī al-radā ... Wa-baʻd, fa-yaqūlu faqīr raḥmat rabbihi Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad Sibṭ al-Mārdīnī: Hādhā taʻlīq ʻalá al-urjūzah al-Yāsamīnīyah fī ʻilm al-jabr mukhtaṣar jiddan, lam yasʼalnī fīhi aḥad, wa-innamā walaghtu fīhi min al-baṭālah wa-al-kasal hurūban min al-ishtighāl wa-al-malal ... wa-naʻattuhu bi-al-Lumaʻah al-Māridīnīyah fī sharḥ al-Yāsamīnīyah ..."

title: 880-02 Ḥāshiyah ʻalá Sharḥ Īsāghūjī : manuscript / Muḥammad ibn Ibrāhīm al-Dalajī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Ḥamdan li-man naṭaqat mawjūdātuhu bi-rubūbīyatih, wa-afāḍa ʻalá anwāʻ maṣnūʻātih ajnās al-niʻam biḥikmatih wa-raḥmatih, wa-ṣalá wa-sallama ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad ashraf al-anbiyāʼ wa-al-mursalīn wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-aṣḥābihi al-azkiyāʼ wa-al-tābiʻīn la-hum bi-iḥsān ilá yawm al-dīn. Wa-baʻd, fa-yaqūlu al-faqīr ilá Allāh taʻālá Muḥammad ibn Ibrāhīm al-Dalajī: Hādhā taʻlīqun laṭīf ʻalá sharḥ Shaykh al-Islām li-matn Īsāghūjī, nāfiʻ in shāʼa Allāh li-man aḥsana nītatah wa-ṭahhara ṭawīyatah ..."

title: 880-02 Akhbār Ibrāhīm ibn al-Mahdī wa-ukhtihi ʻUlayyah bint al-Mahdī wa-ashʻāruhumā : manuscript / jamʻ Abū Bakr Muḥammad ibn Yaḥyá al-Ṣūlī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Qāla Abū Bakr Muḥammad ibn Yaḥyá al-Ṣūlī: Hādhihi awrāq jamaʻtu fīhā akhbār Ibrāhīm ibn al-Mahdī wa-ukhtihi ʻUlayyah bint al-Mahdī wa-ashʻārahumā, fa-aqūlu: Ḥadathanī Yaḥyá ibn ʻAlī ʻan Aḥmad ibn Yaḥyá ibn Jābir, qāl ḥaddathanī Hibat Allāh ibn Ibrāhīm ibn al-Mahdī anna Muḥayyāh al-Ṭāʼifīyah umm walad al-Manṣūr kānat baʻathat bi-Shaklah umm Ibrāhīm ilá al-Ṭāʼif fa-nashaʼat hunāk, fa-faṣuḥat wa-qālat al-shiʻr, wa-anshadanī la-hā shiʻran fī akhin la-hā yuqālu la-hu Aḥmad ..."

title: 880-03 Dīwān Ibn al-Fāriḍ : manuscript / edited by ʻAlī Sibṭ al-Shaykh Sharaf al-Dīn ʻUmar ibn al-Fāriḍ.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm wa-bi-hi nastaʻīn. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alldhī khaṣṣa ḥabībah al-athná [al-asná] bi-maqām qāb qawsayn aw adná, wa-qarana ismahu al-sharīf bi-aʻẓam asmāʼihi al-ḥusná ... qāla al-faqīr al-muʻtarif bi-dhanbihi al-mughtarif min nahr ʻaṭā rabbihi ʻAlī Sibṭ al-Shaykh Sharaf al-Dīn ʻUmar ibn al-Fāriḍ, al-rājī karama rabbihi al-fāyiḍ ... naẓartu fī nusakh min dīwān Shaykhinā, qaddasa Allāh sirrahu wa-sharaḥ ṣadrahu bi-al-naẓar ilayhi wa-barrahu, fa-raʼaytu al-nussākh jahilū baʻḍ kalāmihi wa-mā ʻarafūhu, wa-ishtabaha ʻalayhim shayʼ min jināsihi fa-ṣaḥḥafūhu wa-akhrajūhu bi-dhālika ʻan aṣlih ..."

title: 880-02 Kanz al-dhakhāʼir wa-hadīyat al-musāfir ilá al-nūr al-sāfir : manuscript / Jalāl al-Dīn Muḥammad ibn Aḥmad ibn ʻAlī al-Maḥallī al-Samannūdī al-Shāfiʻī al-Rifāʻī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh dhī al-birr al-ghāmir wa-al-faḍl al-wāfir, al-awwal wa-al-ākhir. Aḥmaduhu ʻalá iḥsānihi al-mutawātir ḥamdan yakūnu ʻiṣmatan lil-ḥāḍir wa-zādan lil-musāfir, wa-astaghfiruhu min jamīʻ al-kabāʼir wa-al-ṣaghāʼir ... Ammā baʻd, fa-qad saʼalanī jamāʻah min al-ikhwān wa-min akābir al-fuḍalāʼ al-aʻyān fī sharḥ al-qaṣīdah al-Tāʼīyah al-mashūrah bi-al-Subkīyah ... fa-ajabtuhum li-masʼalatihim wa-fāʼan li-ṣāliḥ adʻiyatihim ..."

title: 880-02 al-Minaḥ al-Makkīyah fī sharḥ al-Hamzīyah : manuscript / Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad ibn Ḥajar al-Haythamī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Rabbi yassir. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alldhī ikhtaṣṣa Nabīyanā Muḥammad, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam bi-kitāb akhrasa al-fuṣaḥāʼ wa-aʻjaza al-bulaghāʼ ʻan al-tafawwuh bi-mithl aqṣar sūrah min suwarihi, bal āyah min āyātih, wa-bi-jawāmiʻ al-kalim wa-badāyiʻ al-ḥikam wa-ʻaẓīm al-khuluq fī sāyir aqwālihi wa-afʻālihi wa-ḥālātih, wa-kharaq la-hu khawāriq al-wujūd bi-muʻjizāt abharat al-ʻuqūl, wa-qaṣura ʻan iḥṣāʼihā istiqṣāʼ al-mādiḥīn ..."

title: 880-02 al-Ṣalawāt al-birrīyah fī al-ṣalāh ʻalá khayr al-barīyah : manuscript / Muṣṭafá ibn Kamāl al-Dīn al-Bakrī al-Ṣiddīqī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm wa-bihi nastaʻīn. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī ikhtaṣṣanā bi-Sayyid al-Anām nabīyan wa-rasūlan, wa-khaṣṣanā bi-sanad lā yuḍām malīyan maʼmūlan, wa-khallaṣanā bi-madad lā yusām marḍīyan maqbūlan ..."

title: 880-02 Sharḥ al-Sullam al-murawnaq fī ʻilm al-manṭiq : manuscript / Aḥmad ibn ʻAbd al-Fattāḥ al-Mullawī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh al-ʻālim bi-al-kullīyāt wa-al-juzʼīyāt, al-hādī lil-ʻuqūl ilá ḥall ṣiʻāb al-maʻqūl bi-ṭuruq iktisāb al-taṣawwurāt wa-al-taṣdīqāt, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad al-jāmiʻ li-ajnās al-kamālāt wa-al-faḍāyil, al-mukhtār min afḍal al-anwāʻ wa-ashraf aṣnāf al-urūmāt wa-al-qabāʼil ..."

title: 880-03 al-Maṭlaʻ : Sharḥ Īsāghūjī fī al-manṭiq : manuscript / Zakarīyā ibn Muḥammad al-Anṣārī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Qāla Shaykhunā al-Imām al-ʻālim al-ʻallāmah, shaykh al-ṭarīqah wa-maʻdin al-ḥaqīqah, waḥīd dahrihi wa-farīd ʻaṣrih ... Zakarīyā ibn Muḥammad ibn Aḥmad ibn Zakarīyā al-Anṣārī al-Shāfiʻī ... Wa-baʻd, fa-hādhā sharḥ laṭīf li-kitāb al-ʻAllāmah Athīr al-Dīn al-Abharī, raḥimahu Allāh, al-musammá bi-Īsāghūjī fī ʻilm al-manṭiq, yaḥullu alfāẓah wa-yubayyinu murādah, wa-yaftaḥu mughlaqah, wa-yuqayyidu muṭlaqah, ʻalá wajh laṭīf wa-manhaj munīf. Wa-sammaytuhu "al-Maṭlaʻ". Wa-Allāh asʼal an yanfaʻa bi-hi, wa-Huwa ḥasbī wa-niʻma al-wakīl ..."

title: 880-02 Mukhtaṣar fī ʻilm al-ḥisāb : manuscript / ʻAbd al-Qādir ibn ʻAlī al-Sakhāwī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Yā Fattāḥ. Yā ʻAlīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallam. Wa-baʻd, fa-yaqūlu [al-faqīr] ilá raḥmat Rabbih, ʻAbd al-Qādir ibn ʻAlī al-Sakhāwī al-Shāfiʻī, ʻāmalahumā Allāh bi-luṭfihi al-khafī fī al-dunyā wa-al-ākhirah: Hādhā Mukhtaṣar fī ʻilm al-ḥisāb, sahl lil-mubtadī, nāfiʻ, in shāʼa Allāh taʻālá, rattabtuhu ʻalá muqaddimah wa-aḥada ʻashara bāban wa-khātimah, fī ṣifat al-aḥruf al-Hindīyah, wa-hiya tisʻat ashkāl, hākadhā ..."

title: 880-02 al-Aḍwāʼ al-bahijah fī ibrāz daqāʼiq al-Munfarijah : manuscript / Zakarīyā ibn Muḥammad al-Anṣārī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm wa-bi-hi nastaʻīn. Qāla al-Shaykh al-Imām al-ʻālim al-ʻallāmah al-muḥaqqiq al-ruḥalah mufīd al-ṭālibīn ḥujjat al-munāẓirīn wa-lisān al-mutakallimīn muḥyī al-Sunnah fī al-ʻālamīn, Abū Yaḥyá Zayn al-Dīn Zakarīyā ibn Muḥammad ibn Aḥmad al-Anṣārī al-Shāfiʻī ... al-Ḥamdu lillāh al-mufrij lil-karab ʻuqayb al-shiddah, al-munjī li-khalāṣ ʻibādih min ghayāhib al-ẓulam al-muʻaddah ... wa-baʻd, fa-hādhā mā ishtaddat ilayhi ḥājat al-mutafahhimīn lil-Munfarijah, qaṣīdat al-Imām ... al-Rabbānī Abī al-Faḍl Yūsuf ibn Muḥammad ibn Yūsuf, al-Tawzarī al-aṣl, al-maʻrūf bi-Ibn al-Naḥwī ... min sharḥ yaḥullu alfāẓahā wa-yubayyinu murādahā ..."

title: 880-03 Mawrid al-ẓamʼān fī marsūm khaṭṭ al-Qurʼān : manuscript / Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad al-Kharrāz.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm wa-bi-hi nastaʻīn. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallam. Qāla al-Shaykh al-Imām al-ʻālim Abū ʻAbd Allāh Muḥammad ibn al-Umawī al-shahīr bi-al-Kharrāz, raḥimahu Allāh taʻālá wa-raḍiya ʻanh: al-Ḥamdu lillāh al-ʻaẓīmi al-minani // wa-mursili al-rusli bi-ahdá al-sunani. Li-yublighū al-daʻwata lil-ʻibādi // wa-yūḍiḥū mahāyiʻa al-irshādi ..."

title: 880-03 Nihāyat al-muḥtāj ilá sharḥ al-Minhāj : manuscript / Muḥammad ibn Aḥmad al-Ramlī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Kitāb al-Nikāḥ. Huwa lughatan al-ḍamm wa-al-waṭy, wa-sharʻan ʻaqd yataḍamman ibāḥat waṭy bi-al-lafẓ al-ātī. Wa-huwa ḥaqīqah fī al-ʻaqd majāz fī al-waṭy li-ṣiḥḥat baqīyat ʻaynih ..."

title: 880-03 al-Juzʼ al-thānī min Sharḥ al-Nuqāyah : manuscript / al-Qāsim ibn ʻAbd Allāh ibn Quṭlūbughā.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Allāhumma yassir wa-tammim bi-khayr, yā karīm. Kitāb al-buyūʻ. Huwa mubādalat māl bi-māl bi-tarāḍin. Qultu: Ahmala fī aṣl al-kitāb lafẓ "bi-tarāḍin", fa-qāl al-muṣannif fī sharḥihi innamā tarakahu li-yashmula bayʻ al-mukrah, fa-innahu bayʻ munʻaqid, fa-taʼammal kayfa zāda mā nabbaha ʻalá awlawīyat tarkih. "Yanʻaqid", ay tathbut al-mubādalah "bi-ījāb", wa-huwa mā dhakara awwalan min qawlihi biʻtu aw ishtaraytu, wa-naḥwuhu ..."

title: 880-03 al-Juzʼ al-thānī min Ḥāshiyat al-Ṣaʻīdī ʻalá Sharḥ al-Kharshī ʻalá Mukhtaṣar Khalīl : manuscript / ʻAlī ibn Aḥmad al-Ṣaʻīdī al-ʻAdwī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi nastaʻīn. Bāb al-Ḥajj. Qawluhu 'Wa-huwa al-qiyās' li-annahu maṣdar ḥajja, qiyāsuhu al-fatʹḥ, illā annaka khabīr bi-anna al-murād bi-al-ḥajj huwa al-hayʼah al-makhṣūṣah al-mawṣūfah bi-annahā duʻāmah, wa-laʻallahu li-ajl dhālika kān al-kasr akthar samāʻan ..."

title: 880-02 Sharḥ Umm al-barāhīn : manuscript / Muḥammad ibn Manṣūr al-Hudhudī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī shahidat bi-wujūdihi jamīʻ al-kāʼināt, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad al-mabʻūth bi-al-āyāt al-wāḍiḥāt, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi al-tābiʻīn la-hum fī al-karāmāt ilá Yawm al-Qiyāmah. al-Ḥamdu lillāh wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Rasūl Allāh. al-Ḥamd huwa al-thanāʼ bi-al-lisān bi-al-jamīl min al-awṣāf, aw al-afʻāl, ka-al-ʻilm wa-al-jūd bi-al-minan wa-huwa ḍidd al-dhamm alladhī huwa al-thanāʼ bi-al-qabīḥ min al-awṣāf wa-al-afʻāl, ka-al-jahl wa-al-bukhl ..."

title: 880-02 Ḥāshiyah ʻalá sharḥ al-Sanūsī lil-ʻAqīdah al-ṣughrá : manuscript / ʻĪsá ibn ʻAbd al-Raḥmān al-Saktānī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidnā Muḥammad wa-ālihi wa-sallam. [Qāla] al-Shaykh al-Imām al-ʻālim, khātimat al-muḥaqqiqīn, qāḍī al-jamāʻah bi-Murrākush, Sayyidī Abū Mahdī ʻĪsá ibn ʻAbd al-Raḥmān al-Saktānī, raḥimahu Allāh taʻālá bi-mannih. Āmīn. al-Ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad khātim al-nabīyīn wa-imām al-mursalīn, wa-al-riḍá ʻan ālihi wa-aṣḥābihi wa-ʻan al-tābiʻīn la-hum fī silk minhāj al-muttaqīn: Fa-hādhā taqyīdun qaṣadtu fīhi, bi-ʻawn Allāh wa-tawfīqih, ilá tabyīn baʻḍ mā yakhfá tabyīnuhu min ḥall mā ʻasá an yastaṣʻiba al-ṭālib min alfāẓ minhu sh. (sharḥ) al-ʻAqīdah al-ṣughrá lil-Imām Abī ʻAbd Allāh Sayyidī Muḥammad ibn Yūsuf al-Sanūsī ..."

title: 880-02 Ḥāshiyah ʻalá sharḥ Tuḥfat al-ikhwān fī fann al-bayān : manuscript / Muḥammad ibn ʻAlī al-Jirjāwī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Naḥmaduka anta al-wāḥid al-ghaffār, fa-laka al-ḥamd ḥaqīqatan wa-li-ghayrika mustaʻār. Wa-nuṣallī wa-nusallimu ʻalá man washaḥtahu bi-laṭāʼif imdādik, Sayyidinā Muḥammad alladhī jaʻaltahu aṣlan li-makhlūqātik, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-aṣḥābihi al-mutajarridīn ʻan shawāʼib abʻādik. wa-baʻd, fa-yaqūlu rājī ghafr al-masāwī, Muḥammad ibn ʻAlī al-Jirjāwī: Hādhihi kalimāt qalīlah mushtamilah ʻalá fawāʼid jalīlah ʻalá sharḥ Sayyidī al-ʻārif billāh taʻālá al-Shaykh Aḥmad al-Dardīr ʻalá risālatihi al-musammāh bi-Tuḥfat al-ikhwān fī fann al-bayān. Qāla, raḍiya Allāh taʻālá ʻanh wa-amaddanā bi-imdādih: Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Lā baʼsa bi-al-taʻarruḍ li-shayʼ mimmā iḥtawat ʻalayhi hādhihi al-jumlah al-sharīfah yakūnu munāsiban li-hādhā al-fann, fa-aqūlu: Qāl Sībawayh: al-Bāʼ ḥaqīqatuhā an takūna lil-ilṣāq wa-al-ikhtilāṭ ..."

title: 880-02 Sharḥ Umm al-barāhīn : manuscript / Muḥammad ibn Manṣūr al-Hudhudī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Rabbi yassir bi-al-khayr. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī shahida bi-wujūdihi jamīʻ al-kāʼināt, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad al-mabʻūth bi-al-āyāt al-wāḍiḥāt, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-al-tābiʻīn la-hum fī al-karāmāt ilá Yawm al-Dīn. al-Ḥamdu lillāh wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Rasūl Allāh. Sh. [Sharḥ] al-Ḥamd huwa al-thanāʼ bi-al-lisān bi-al-jamīl min al-awṣāf, wa-al-afʻāl, ka-al-ʻilm wa-al-jūd wa-al-minan wa-huwa ḍidd al-dhamm alladhī huwa al-thanāʼ bi-al-qabīḥ min al-awṣāf wa-al-afʻāl, ka-al-jahl wa-al-bukhl ..."

title: 880-02 Shajarat al-kawn : manuscript / Muḥyī al-Dīn ibn al-ʻArabī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh al-aḥadī al-dhāt, al-fardī al-ṣifāt, alladhī taqaddasa wajhuhu ʻan al-jihāt, wa-qaddasahu ʻan al-muḥdathāt, wa-qadamuhu ʻan al-jihāt, wa-yaduhu ʻan al-ḥarakāt, wa-ʻaynuhu ʻan al-laḥaẓāt, wa-istiwāʼuhu ʻan al-ittiṣālāt, wa-qudratuhu ʻan al-hafawāt, wa-irādatuhu ʻan al-shahawāt, alladhī lā taʻaddud li-ṣifātih bi-ʻadad al-mawṣūfāt, wa-lā takhtalif irādatuhu bi-ikhtilāf al-murādāt, wa-kawwan bi-kalimat "Kun" jamīʻ al-kāʼināt, wa-awjada bi-hā al-mawjūdāt ..."

title: 880-02 Ḥāshiyah ʻalá Sharḥ al-Hudhudī : manuscript / ʻAlī ibn Khiḍr ibn Aḥmad al-ʻAmrūsī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm wa-bi-hi nastaʻīn. Yaqūlu al-ʻabd al-faqīr ilá Rabbihi al-qadīr, ʻAlī ibn Khiḍr ibn Aḥmad al-ʻAmrūsī, askanahu Allāh bi-mannihi Jannat al-Firdaws: al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī anʻama ʻalá al-insān bi-maʻrifatih, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Muḥammad wa-ālihi. Wa-baʻd, fa-hādhihi ḥawāshin kāshifah li-mā lam yattaḍiḥ maʻnāh min alfāẓ Sharḥ al-ʻAllāmah Sayyidī Muḥammad ibn Manṣūr al-Hudhudī, jamaʻtuhā qāṣidan bi-dhālika al-thawāb min al-Karīm al-Wahhāb ..."

title: 880-02 Ḥuṣūl al-rifq bi-uṣūl al-rizq : manuscript / Jalāl al-Dīn ʻAbd al-Raḥmān ibn Abī Bakr al-Suyūṭī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá man lā nabī baʻdah. al-Ḥamdu lillāh wa-kafá, wa-salāmun ʻalá ʻibādihi alladhīn iṣṭafá. Wa-baʻd, fa-qad saʼalanī sāʼil ʻammā warada fī al-Ḥadīth min al-adhkār wa-al-afʻāl al-jālibah lil-rizq [...] fīhā man ḍāqa ʻalayhi rizquhu wa-taʻassarat ʻalayhi maʻīshatuh li-qawlihi [taʻālá] fa-ibtaghū ʻinda [Allāh] al-rizq. Thumma saʼalanī ākhar wa-ākhar, fa-jamaʻtu lahum hādhā al-juzʼ wa-sammaytuhu Ḥuṣūl al-rifq bi-uṣūl al-rizq ..."

title: 880-03 Sharḥ al-Ushmūnī ʻalá Alfīyat Ibn Mālik : manuscript / ʻAlī ibn Muḥammad al-Ushmūnī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Qāla al-Shykh al-Imām, al-ʻālim al-humām, al-muḥaqqiq al-mudaqqiq, Nūr al-Dīn Abū al-Ḥasan, ʻAlī ibn Muḥammad al-Ushmūnī al-Shāfiʻī, raḥimahu Allāh taʻālá: Ammā baʻd ḥamd Allāh ʻalá mā manaḥa min asbāb al-bayān, wa-fataḥ min abwāb al-tibyān, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá man rafaʻa bi-māḍī al-ʻazm qawāʻid al-īmān, wa-khafaḍa bi-ʻāmil al-jazm kalimat al-buhtān, Muḥammad al-muntakhab min khulāṣat Maʻadd wa-lubāb ʻAdnān, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-aṣḥābihi alladhīna aḥrazū qaṣabāt al-sabq fī miḍmār al-iḥsān ..."

title: 880-02 Taḥbīr al-muwashshīn fī al-taʻbīr bi-al-Sīn wa-al-Shīn : manuscript / Muḥammad ibn Yaʻqūb al-Fīrūzābādī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn, ḥamdan yastawjibu qāʼiluhu al-iḥsān wa-al-taḥsīn, wa-yastajlibu la-hu fī maʼāzim al-maḍāʼiq al-khalāṣ min al-taʻishīn wa-al-taʻisīn, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Nabīyinā Muḥammad khayr al-khalāʼiq wa-Sayyid al-unāsīn, alladhī alqá Allāh zubdat al-faṣāḥah ʻalá lisānihi fa-khāṭabahu bi-Ṭāhā wa-Yāsīn ..."

title: 880-02 al-Alfīyah : manuscript / Muḥammad ibn ʻAbd Allāh ibn Mālik.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Lā ilāha illā Allāh. Muḥammad Rasūl Allāh. Qāla al-Shaykh al-Imām, al-ʻālim al-fāḍil, ḥujjat al-ʻArab wa-kanz al-adab, waḥīd dahrihi wa-farīd ʻaṣrihi, Abū ʻAbd Allāh Muḥammad ibn Mālik, raḥmat Allāh ʻalayh: Qāla Muḥammadun huwa Ibnu Māliki // Aḥmadu Rabbī Allāha khayra māliki ..."

title: 880-02 al-Nukāt al-ḥisān ʻalá mā waqaʻa lil-Najm al-Ghayṭī ʻalá awāʼil Sūrat al-Dukhān wa-faḍāʼil Laylat al-Niṣf min Shaʻbān : manuscript / Nūr al-Dīn ʻAlī ibn Ibrāhīm al-Ḥalabī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Wa-bi-hi thiqatī. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī fī kull yawm huwa fī shān, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá ashraf nawʻ al-insān, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-aṣḥābihi al-mamdūḥīn fī al-isrār wa-al-iʻlān. Wa-baʻd, fa-yaqūlu afqar al-muḥtājīn ʻAlī ibn Burhān al-Dīn al-Ḥalabī al-Shāfiʻī al-Aḥmadī: Hādhihi Nukāt ḥisān mushtamilah ʻalá ḥusn al-bayān li-mā waqaʻa fīmā katabahu al-Najm al-Ghayṭī ʻalá awāʼil Sūrat al-Dukhān wa-faḍāʼil Laylat al-Niṣf min Shaʻbān, ʻallaqtuhā ʻinda mudhākarat baʻḍ al-ikhwān, min ghayr mazīd taʼammul wa-itqān wa-taftīsh wa-imʻān. Qawluhu ..."

title: 880-02 al-Anwār al-bahijah fī ẓuhūr kunūz al-Munfarijah : manuscript / ʻAbd al-Raḥmān ibn al-Ḥasan al-Maqābirī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī azāḥa ʻan qulūb awliyāʼihi shiddat muʻālajat al-nufūs wa-afraja la-hum ʻan sarrāʼ daqqāt qulūbihim ghayāhib al-ghaflah, fa-hum fī baḥr mushāhadatihi ghumūs. Wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad alladhī huwa li-sāʼir al-anbiyāʼ ʻarūs, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-aṣḥābihi wa-atbāʻihi alladhīn hum li-aʻdāʼ Allāh ʻubūs ..."

title: 880-02 Sharḥ al-Unmūdhaj fī al-naḥw : manuscript / Muḥammad ibn ʻAbd al-Ghanī al-Ardabīlī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm wa-bi-hi nastaʻīn. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī jaʻala al-ʻArabīyah miftāḥ al-bayān wa-ṣayyarahā ālatan <bi-hā> yuḥtarazu bi-hā ʻan al-khaṭaʼ fī al-lisān wa-qawwama bi-sababihā al-manṭiqa alladhī huwa al-mumayyizu lil-insān wa-hayyaʼahā sullaman yurtaqá bi-hā ilá dhurwat ḥaq̄āʼiq al-Qurʼān, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá khayr al-anām, Muḥammad ṣāḥib al-Furqān, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-aṣḥābih ruʼasāʼ ahl al-īmān ..."

title: 880-03 Awḍaḥ al-masālik ilá Alfīyat Ibn Mālik : manuscript / ʻAbd Allāh ibn Yūsuf ibn Hishām.
note_text: Incipit: The incipit is missing. Starts with: "... fa-lā yujmaʻu naḥwa jarīḥ wa-ṣabūr wa-sakrān wa-aḥmar. Faṣl. Wa-ḥamalū ʻalá hādhā al-jamʻ arbaʻat anwāʻ: Aḥaduhā asmāʼ jumūʻ, wa-hiya: Ulū, wa-ʻālamūn, wa-ʻishrūn wa-bābuhu ilá al-tisʻīn ..."

title: 880-03 Marāḥ al-arwāḥ : manuscript / Aḥmad ibn ʻAlī ibn Masʻūd.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Qāla al-muftaqir ilá Allāh al-wadūd, Aḥmad ibn ʻAlī ibn Masʻūd, ghafara Allāh la-hu wa-li-wālidayh, wa-aḥsana ilayhimā wa-ilayhi. Iʻlam anna al-ṣarf umm al-ʻulūm wa-al-naḥw abūhā, wa-yaqwá fī al-dirāyāt dārūhā, wa-yaṭghá fī al-riwāyāt ʻārūhā, fa-jamaʻtu fīhi kitāban mawsūman bi-Marāḥ al-arwāḥ, wa-hiya lil-ṣabī janāḥ al-najāḥ wa-rāḥun raḥrāḥ, wa-fī maʻīdatihi ḥīna rāḥ mithl tuffāḥ aw rāḥ. Wa-billāh aʻtaṣmu ʻammā yaṣimu wa-astaʻīn wa-huwa niʻma al-muʻīn ..."

title: 880-02 Mukhtaṣar Sharḥ Talkhīṣ al-Miftāḥ : manuscript / Masʻūd ibn ʻUmar al-Taftāzānī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Naḥmaduka yā man sharaḥa ṣudūranā li-talkhīṣ al-bayān fī īḍāḥ al-maʻānī, wa-nawwara qulūbanā bi-jawāmiʻ al-tibyān min maṭāliʻ al-mathānī, wa-nuṣallī ʻalá Nabīyika Muḥammad, al-muʼayyid dalāʼil iʻjāzihi bi-asrār al-balāghah, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-aṣḥābihi al-muḥrizīn qaṣab al-sabq fī miḍmār al-faṣāḥah wa-al-barāʻah. Wa-baʻd, fa-yaqūlu al-ʻabd al-faqīr ilá Allāh al-ghanī Masʻūd ibn ʻUmar al-madʻū bi-Saʻd al-Taftāzānī, hadāhu Allāh taʻālá sawāʼa al-ṭarīq wa-adhāqahu ḥalāwat al-taḥqīq: Qad sharaḥtu fī mā maḍá Talkhīṣ al-Miftāḥ wa-aghnaytuhu bi-al-iṣbāḥ ʻan al-miṣbāḥ ... thumma raʼaytu al-kathīr min al-fuḍalāʼ, wa-al-jamm al-ghafīr min al-adhkiyāʼ yasʼalūnanī ṣarf al-himmah naḥwa ikhtiṣārih wa-al-iqtiṣār ʻalá bayān maʻānīhi wa-kashf astārih ..."

title: 880-02 Mukhtaṣar Sharḥ Talkhīṣ al-Miftāḥ : manuscript / Masʻūd ibn ʻUmar al-Taftāzānī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi nastaʻīn. Naḥmaduka yā man sharaḥa ṣudūranā lil-talkhīṣ [li-talkhīṣ] al-bayān fī īḍāḥ al-maʻānī, wa-nawwara qulūbanā bi-lawāmiʻ al-tibyān min maṭāliʻ al-mathānī, wa-nuṣallī ʻalá Nabīyika Muḥammad, al-muʼayyid dalāʼil iʻjāzihi bi-asrār al-balāghah, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-aṣḥābihi al-muḥrizīn qaṣabāt al-sabq fī miḍmār al-fasāḥah [al-faṣāḥah] wa-al-barāʻah. Wa-baʻd, fa-yaqūlu al-ʻabd al-faqīr ilá Allāh al-ghanī Masʻūd ibn ʻUmar al-madʻū bi-Saʻd al-Taftāzānī, wah [hadāhu] Allāh taʻālá sawāʼa al-ṭarīq wa-azāqahu [wa-adhāqahu] ḥalāwat al-taḥqīq: Wa-qad sharaḥtu fīmā maḍá Talkhīṣ al-Miftāḥ wa-aghnaytuhu bi-al-iṣbāḥ ʻan al-miṣbāḥ wa-awdaʻtuhu gharāʼib nukat samaḥat bi-hā al-anẓār, wa-washshaḥtuhu bi-laṭāʼif fiqar sabakathā yad al-afkār, thumma raʼaytu al-jamʻ al-kathīr min al-fuḍalāʼ, wa-al-jamm al-ghafīr min al-adhkiyāʼ yasʼalūnanī ṣarf al-himmah naḥwa ikhtiṣārih wa-al-iqtiṣār ʻalá bayān maʻānīhi wa-kashf astārih ..."

title: 880-02 Futūḥāt al-Rashīd ʻalá Khulāṣat al-tawḥīd : manuscript / Muḥammad al-Damanhūrī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Naḥmaduka yā man dhātuka bi-dhātik wa-ṣifātuka bi-maʻānīka lā bi-dhātik, wa-nuṣallī wa-nusallimu ʻalá al-muballigh lil-aḥkām wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-aṣḥābih dhawī al-itqān wa-al-iḥkām, wa-nashhadu an lā ilāha illā ant, wa-narāka bi-lā mithāl, wa-nashhadu anna Sayyidanā Muḥammadan rasūluka al-ṣādiq fī kull ḥāl. Wa-baʻd, fayaqūlu faqīr raḥmat rabbihi al-dayyān Muḥammad al-Ḥudaynī al-Damanhuwī [al-Damanhūrī] mubtaghī al-ghufrān innahu lammā kānat al-manẓūmah allatī anshaʼahā Shaykhunā al-Najjārī sahlat al-tanāwul yakhāḍu fī maʻānī baḥrihā al-jārī, ḥāwaltu an ashraḥahā bi-sharḥ yuzīlu ghiṭāhā wa-yubayyinu min al-marām mā inṭawá taḥta khibāhā, walāsīyamā wa-qad ashāra ʻalayya bi-hi Shaykhunā al-madhkūr fa-jāʼa bi-ḥamd Allāh wa-ʻawnihi mubashshiran bi-al-surūr. Wa-sammaytuhu Futūḥāt al-rashīd ʻalá Khulāṣat al-tawḥīd. Wa-Allāh asʼal an yanfaʻanā bi-mā qaṣadnāh wa-yaksuwahu thawb al-qabūl ..."

title: 880-02 Sharḥ Lāmīyat al-afʻāl : manuscript / Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad Ibn al-Nāẓim.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Qāla al-Shaykh al-Imām wa-al-ḥabr al-humām Badr al-Dīn Abū ʻAbd Allāh Muḥammad ibn al-Imām al-ʻallāmah Jamāl al-Dīn Abū ʻAbd Allāh Muḥammad ibn ʻAbd Allāh ibn Mālik al-Jayyānī al-Andalusī al-Ṭāʼī, raḥimahu Allāh taʻālá: Hādhihi awrāq tashtamilu ʻalá sharḥ qaṣīdat wālidī, raḥimahu Allāh taʻālá, fī abniyat al-afʻāl wa-mā yattaṣilu bi-hā, wa-ʻalá dhikr mā yuḥtāju ilayhi min al-amthilah, wa-īḍāḥ mā istubhima wa-tafsīr al-gharīb ..."

title: 880-02 al-Maqṣad al-asná fī sharḥ asmāʼ Allāh al-Ḥusná : manuscript / Abū Ḥāmid Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad al-Ghazzālī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Qāla al-Shaykh al-Imām al-ʻālim al-ʻāmil, ḥujjat al-Islām al-Ghazzālī, qaddasa Allāh rūḥahu wa-nawwara ḍarīḥahu: Ammā qawluhu "Allāh", fahuwa ism al-mawjūd al-ḥaqq, al-jāmiʻ li-ṣifāt al-ilāhīyah, al-manʻūt bi-nuʻūt al-rubūbīyah, al-munfarid bi-al-wujūd al-ḥaqīqī, fa-inna kull mawjūd siwāh ghayr mustaḥiqq lil-wujūd bi-dhātihi, wa-innamā istafād al-wujūd minhu, fa-huwa min ḥaythu dhātihi hālik, wa-min al-jihah allatī talīh mawjūd ..."

title: 880-02 Bahjat al-sāmiʻīn wa-al-nāẓirīn bi-mawlid Sayyid al-awwalīn wa-al-ākharīn : manuscript / Muḥammad ibn Aḥmad al-Ghayṭī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Qāla Sayyidunā wa-mawlānā al-Shaykh al-Imām, al-ʻālim al-ʻallāmah, al-rāsikh al-kāmil al-ruḥalah al-fahhāmah, Shaykh al-Muslimīn, khātimat al-ḥuffāẓ wa-al-muḥaddithīn, al-ḥujjah Najm al-Dīn, Muḥammad ibn Aḥmad al-Ghayṭī al-Shāfiʻī, khādim al-Sunnah al-sharīfah, aʻāda Allāh ʻalaynā min barakātihi wa-barakāt ʻulūmihi fī al-dunyā wa-al-ākhirah. Āmīn: al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī anāra bi-mawlid Aḥmad al-Muṣṭafá, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam, jamīʻ al-wujūd, wa-aẓhar shams faḍl Nabīyinā al-mujtabá, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam, fī shahr Rabīʻ al-Awwal, fa-kāna lil-ʻibād saʻd al-suʻūd, wa-khalaqa nūrahu min nūrihi qabla ījād kull mawjūd ..."

title: 880-02 Ḥāshiyah ʻalá matn al-Sullam : manuscript / Ibrāhīm ibn Muḥammad al-Bājūrī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī khaṣṣ al-insān bi-al-manṭiq al-faṣīḥ ʻammā fī al-ḍamīr min al-maknūnāt, wa-afāḍ ʻalá riyāḍ ʻaqlihi ghayth saḥāʼib al-taṣawwurāt wa-al-taṣdīqāt ... Ammā baʻd, fa-yaqūlu rājī al-ʻafwa min al-Khabīr al-Laṭīf Ibrāhīm al-Bājūrī al-dhalīl al-ḍaʻīf ibn Muḥammad al-Jīzāwī, ghafara Allāh la-hu jamīʻ al-masāwī: Qad saʼalanī baʻḍ al-ikhwān, aṣlaḥ Allāh lī wa-la-hu al-ḥāl wa-al-shān kitābatan badīʻah al-niẓām takshufu ʻan al-muqddimah al-shahīrah bi-al-Sullam al-lithām, ʻalá muʼallifihā al-riḍá wa-al-iḥsān min al-Mawlá al-Karīm al-Raḥmān ..."

title: 880-02 Tashṭīr Burdat al-madīḥ : manuscript / Aḥmad ibn Ḥamad al-Sharqāwī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm wa-bi-hi nastaʻīn. al-Ḥamdu lillāh mujrī aqlām al-tasṭīr bi-al-tashṭīr, wa-mursī sufun al-ʻazāyim bi-barr al-maqāṣid an ṭābaqa sābiq al-taqdīr, wa-sāʼiq khawāṭir al-ḥarakāt ilá qulūb dhawī al-tafkīr, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá al-mamdūḥ fī al-Kitāb al-munīr bi-mā taḍammana min al-āyāt annahu al-bashīr al-nadhīr, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-aṣḥābihi wa-ummatihi, al-ijābah min kull kabīr wa-ṣaghīr. Wa-baʻd, fa-yaqūlu al-ʻabd al-muḍṭarr ilá al-iḥsān, al-rājī nafaḥāt al-minnah wa-al-jūd wa-al-ḥanān, kabīr al-dhunūb wa-kathīr al-masāwī Aḥmad ibn Ḥamad ibn ʻUthmān al-Sharqāwī al-Ṣaʻīdī al-Jirjāwī, tābiʻ al-Shams al-Ḥifnāwī: Baynamā anā taʼihun fī tīh al-ghafalāt, lāhin lahwa al-ṣibā, maʻa ishtighāl al-raʼs bi-nadhīr hādim al-ladhdhāt, idh warada ʻalá khāṭirī tashṭīr Burdat al-madīḥ, naẓm al-Imām al-ʻārif billāh taʻālá, al-balīgh al-faṣīḥ al-Ustādh Sharaf al-Dīn Muḥammad al-Būṣīrī ..."

title: 880-02 al-Iqtiṣād fī kifāyat al-ʻiqād : manuscript / Aḥmad ibn al-ʻImād al-Aqfahsī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Rabbi yassir. Yā Karīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī yumajjadu // wa-fī al-samāʼi ʻarshuhu wa-ashhadu. Bi-annahu al-Wāḥidu lā maḥālah // wa-al-Muṣṭafá al-Rasūlu bil-dilālah ..."

title: 880-02 Sharḥ al-Iqtiṣād fī kifāyat al-ʻiqād : manuscript / al-Ḥasan ibn Muḥammad al-Nassāb.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Allāhumma ṣalli ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallim. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī khalaq al-khalq bi-qudratih, wa-dabbar al-ashyāʼ bi-ḥikmatih, wa-khalaqa Ādam fa-aḥsana taqwīm ṣūratih, wa-istakhraja al-ʻibād min ʻunṣurihi wa-dhurrīyatih, wa-jaʻalahum shuʻūban wa-qabāʼila li-yataʻārafū, wa-ʻarrafahum bi-waḥdānīyatih, fa-man ittaqāhu wa-khashiyahu askanahu dāra karāmatih, wa-man ʻaṣāhu wa-khālafahu sāqahu li-niqmatih, fa-minhum shaqī wa-saʻīd, wa-qarīb min bābihi wa-baʻīd ... Wa-baʻd, yaqūlu al-ʻabd al-faqīr ilá raḥmat rabbihi al-karīm al-wahhāb, al-Sharīf al-Ḥasan al-Ḥasanī al-Shāfiʻī al-Nassāb ibn Muḥammad ibn Ayyūb ... ibn al-Ḥasan al-Sibṭ ibn Amīr al-Muʼminīn ʻAlī ibn Abī Ṭālib ... min Fāṭimah al-Zahrāʼ, ibnat Sayyid al-Mursalīn wa-Khātim al-Nabīyīn, Muḥammad, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam, wa-ʻalayhim ajmaʻīn, innahu istakhāra Allāh taʻālá fī jamʻ sharḥ ʻalá mā naẓamahu al-Imām al-ʻālim al-ʻallāmah Shihāb al-Dīn Aḥmad ibn al-ʻImād [...] al-Aqfahsī al-Shāfiʻī ... alladhī wa-samahu bi-al-Iqtiṣād fī kifāyat al-ʻiqād, li-yaḥsula al-kashf ʻan mushkilih wa-mubhamih, maʻa mā aḍummu ilayhi ... min al-ziyādāt allatī lā budda minhā li-ṭālibih ..."

title: 880-02 Taḥrīr al-fatāwī fī taṣḥīḥ al-Ḥāwī : manuscript / Maḥmūd ibn ʻAlī al-Qūnawī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ālihi wa-sallam taslīman. Qāla al-Shaykh al-ajall al-ʻālim al-ʻallāmah Muḥibb al-Dīn Maḥmūd ibn al-Shaykh al-Imām al-ʻālim al-ʻallāmah Abī al-Ḥasan al-Qūnawī, raḍiya Allāh ʻanh: al-Ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad khātim al-nabīyīn, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥābatihi wa-al-tābiʻīn lahum bi-iḥsān ilá Yawm al-Dīn. Ammā baʻd, fa-lammā kāna al-ʻamal fī hādhā al-zamān ʻalá mā rajjaḥahu al-Imāmān, al-Imām al-Rāfiʻī wa-al-Shaykh Muḥyī al-Dīn al-Nawāwī, istakhartu Allāh taʻālá fī jamʻ mukhtaṣar unabbihu fīhi ʻalá mā waqaʻa fī al-Ḥāwī lil-Shaykh Najm al-Dīn ʻAbd al-Ghaffār al-Qazwīnī min al-masāyil al-mukhālifah li-tarjīḥihā, aw tarjīḥ aḥadihimā, wa-mā waqaʻa fīhi min al-masāʼil al-muṭlaqah, wa-qad qayyadāhā, aw qayydahā aḥaduhumā bi-qayd, wa-rubbamā ushīru fī baʻḍ al-mawāḍiʻ ilá fāʼidah naqalahā al-Baghawī, aw ṣāḥib al-Miṣbāḥ, aw ṣāḥib al-Muʻtamad, aw ghayruhum, ka-ṣāḥib al-Baḥr, wa-al-Māwardī ṣāḥib al-Ḥāwī al-kabīr, wa-ṣāḥib al-Shāmil, wa-ṣāḥib al-Tatimmah, wa-ghayruhum. Wa-Allāh aʻlam ... wa-qad ḍammantuhu mā taʻarraḍa la-hu wālidī, raḥimahu Allāh, fī sharḥihi min dhālik. Wa-sammaytuhu Taḥrīr al-fatāwī fī taṣḥīḥ al-Ḥāwī. Wa-Allāh asʼal an yanfaʻa bi-hi muʼallifahu wa-kātibahu wa-al-nāẓira fīhi wa-jamīʻ al-Muslimīn bi-mannihi wa-karamih ..."

title: 880-02 Nubdhah mukhtaṣarah fī al-kitāb al-musammá al-Kawākib al-durrīyah fī al-qawāʻid al-sirrīyah : manuscript.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh, wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-aṣḥābihi wa-azwājihi wa-dhurrīyatihi wa-ahl baytihi wa-al-tābiʻīn. Hādhihi Nubdhah mukhtaṣarah fī al-kitāb al-musammá "al-Kawākib al-durrīyah fī al-qawāʻid al-sirrīyah". Fa-min al-qawāʻid, athbit al-takht al-khārij bi-al-ḍarb, wa-athbit fawqa kull shakl ussahu al-kabīr alladhī bi-ziyādat al-marātib, thumma ʻudda al-ʻanāṣir al-nārrīyah al-mufradah allatī fī al-takht, wa-khudh ʻadadahā, ijʻalhu li-ʻunṣur al-nār fī kull shakl. Wa-ʻudda ʻanāṣir al-hawá al-mufradah allatī fī al-takht wa-khudh ʻadadahā, ijʻalhu li-ʻunṣur al-hawá fī kull shakl. Wa-ʻudda ʻanāṣir al-māʼ al-mufradah, wa-khudh ʻadadahā, ijʻalhu li-ʻunṣr al-māʼ fī kull shakl. Wa-ʻudda ʻanāṣir al-turāb al-mufradah, ijʻalhu li-ʻunṣr al-turāb fī kull shakl, thumma zawwij al-ashkāl li-baʻḍihā ..."

title: 880-02 Ighāthat al-muḥtājīn min al-ummah al-Muḥammadīyah li-ḥall alfāẓ al-Istighāthah al-Būnīyah : manuscript / ʻAlī Makkī al-Khalwatī al-Ḥifnāwī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Allāh nāṣir kull ṣābir. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī jaʻala al-tawassul bi-aḥbāb Allāh yanfaʻu dunyā wa-ukhrá, wa-jaʻalahum al-wasāʼil ilá al-ḥabīb al-aʻẓam, wa-al-wasāʼiṭ ilá wuṣūl al-sabīl al-aqwam. Wa-aʻẓim bihim dhukhran. Wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad alladhī naṭaqa bi-mazāyāhu al-Kitāb wa-al-Tanzīl, wa-ḥabāhu bi-raqāʼiq al-takrīm wa-al-tabjīl, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-aṣḥābihi maṣābīḥ al-dujá al-ḥawālik wa-al-nāshilīn li-kull gharīq hālik, wa-ʻalá al-tābiʻīn wa-tābiʻ al-tābiʻīn wa-tābiʻīhim bi-iḥsān ilá yawm al-dīn. Ammā baʻd, fa-yaqūlu al-ʻabd al-faqīr al-murtajī ghafr al-masāwī ʻAlī Makkī al-Khalwatī al-Ḥifnāwī: Lammā raʼytu al-nufūs mutaʻashshiqah fī tilāwat Sūrat Yāsīn, wa-al-qulūb rāghibah fī al-istighāthah al-mashhūrah bi-Yā Al Yāsīn al-mansūbah lil-ʻārif billāh taʻālá Sayyidī Aḥmad al-Būnī, qaddasa Allāh sirrahu al-matīn, allatī khammasahā baʻḍ al-ʻārifīn wa-nasajahā nasjan badīʻan yusirru qulūb al-sāmiʻīn wa-yaladhdhu aʻyun al-nāẓirīn, bi-qawlihi: 'Yā ʻuṣbata al-khayri bi-khayr al-milali', wa-bi-dhālika ṣārat wasīlah lil-ṭālibīn wa-dhakhīrah lil-rāghibīn wa-istighāthah yustaghāthu bi-hā ʻinda kull khaṭb mubīn, aḥbabtu an ajmaʻa ʻalá al-istighāthah al-ẓarīfah wa-al-wasīlah al-munīfah baʻḍ kalimāt takūnu ka-al-sharḥ taḥullu minhā al-mushkilāt ..."

title: 880-02 Manāzil al-arwāḥ : manuscript / Abū ʻAbd Allāh Muḥammad ibn Sulaymān al-Kāfiyajī al-Ḥanafī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī khalaqa al-nafs, wa-uthnī ʻalá man zakkāhā, wa-arsala Nabīyanā Muḥammad, Sayyid al-mursalīn, maḥyaduhu khayr al-bilād wa-azkāhā, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-aṣḥābih, mā dāmat al-Shams wa-ḍuḥāhā. Ammā baʻd, fa-hādhihi risālah mushtamilah ʻalá muqaddimah wa-khamsat abwāb wa-khātimah. Ammā al-muqaddimah fa-fī bayān al-rūḥ wa-ḥudūthih, wa-fī bayān al-aqwāl fīhi ..."

title: 880-01 Duʻāʼ Mnāhil al-raḥmah wa-kashf al-ghummah : manuscript.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Allāhumma, Yā Raḥmān, Yā Raḥīm. Bika atawassalu, wa-ʻalayka atawakkalu, wa-ʻanka lā ataḥawwalu, wa-ilayka atabattalu, fa-ayyidnī bi-rūḥ ʻināyatik ..."

title: 880-02 Sharḥ Uṣūl al-Ḥadīth : manuscript / Dāwūd ibn Muḥammad al-Qarṣī al-Ḥanafī.
note_text: Incipit: "Dāwūd Qarṣī. Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī aʻazza al-ʻulamāʼ al-ʻāmilīn wa-al-Muḥaddithīn al-ʻādilīn, wa-rafaʻa al-ḥāfiẓīn al-muttaṣilīn wa-al-munqaṭiʻīn al-wāqifīn, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá sayyid al-anbiyāʼ wa-al-mursalīn, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-muqtadīh ajmaʻīn. Wa-baʻd, fa-yaqūlu al-ʻabd al-faqīr ilá Allāh al-ghanī Dāwūd ibn Muḥammad ibn al-Qāriṣī al-Ḥanafī, ʻāmalahu Allāh taʻālá bi-luṭfihi al-jalī wa-al-khafī: Lammā badaʼtu bi-al-Bukhārī al-Sharīf, raʼaytu anna al-munāsib badʼ Risālat Fī uṣūl al-Ḥadīth qablahu, li-annahu yuḥtāju ilayhā, wa-lam ajid fī rasāʼil al-uṣūl aḥsan min hādhihi li-kawnihā aḥsanuhā taḥrīran, wa-atammuhā tartīban, wa-aktharuhā lil-uṣūl al-lāzimah jamʻihā [jamīʻihā], wa-qad thabut ʻindī, bi-khabar al-wāḥid, annahā lil-Imām al-ʻallāmah wa-al-fāḍil al-karāmah, waḥīd ʻaṣrihi fī al-taḥqīq wa-farīd ʻaṣrihi fī al-tadqīq Muḥammad Afandī al-Burkawī ..."

title: 880-02 Kashf al-astār ʻan ʻilm ḥurūf al-ghubār : manuscript / Abū al-Ḥasan ʻAlī ibn Muḥammad al-Qalaṣādī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad, wa-sallama wa-karrama wa-ʻaẓẓam. Qāla al-Shaykh al-fāḍil, al-Ustādh al-ʻālim al-ʻallāmah [... ...], Abū al-Ḥasan, ʻAlī ibn Muḥammad ibn ʻAlī, al-shahīr bi-al-Qalṣādī, raḥimahu Allāh taʻālá. Āmīn: al-Ḥamdu lillāh musabbib al-asbāb, sarīʻ al-ḥisāb, musbil al-niʻmah wa-fātiḥ al-abwāb. Wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Sayyid al-Kawnayn, al-mabʻūth ilá al-thaqalayn. Ammā baʻd, fa-hādhihi nubdhah kāfiyah shāfiyah, wa-ʻan maʻānī al-ikhlāl wa-al-iqlāl mutajāfiyh, iqtaṭaftuhā min kitābī al-musammá bi-'Kashf al-jilbāb ʻan ʻilm al-ḥisāb' li-takūna ghunyah li-baʻḍ al-ṭullāb wa-tadhkirah li-ulī al-albāb, wa-sammaytuhā bi-Kashf al-astār ʻan ʻilm ḥurūf al-ghubār. Wa-min Allāh asʼal al-iʻānah wa-al-irshād ilá sawāʼ ṭarīq al-tawfīq wa-al-sadād fī hādhihi al-dunyā wa-al-maʻād ..."

title: 880-02 Ḥāshiyah ʻalá matn al-Samarqandīyah : manuscript / Ibrāhīm ibn Muḥammad al-Bājūrī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī khaṣṣanā bi-al-bayān, wa-jaʻalanā min al-fāʼizīn bi-dār al-jinān, wa-al-salām ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad walad ʻadnān, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi dhawī al-ʻilm wa-al-ʻirfān. Fa-yaqūlu Ibrāhīm al-Bājūrī, waffaqahu Allāh li-ṭuruq al-saʻādah, wa-razaqahu al-ḥusná wa-ziyādah: Qad saʼalanī baʻḍ al-ikhwān, aṣlaḥ Allāh lī wa-la-hu al-ḥāl wa-al-shān, kitābatan zakīyah ʻalá al-muqaddimah al-musammāh bi-al-Samarqandīyah, tubayyinu murādahā wa-takshifu lithāmahā, maʻa al-ikhtiṣār wa-al-īḍāḥ, wa-al-iẓhār wa-al-ifṣāḥ. Fa-lammā insharaḥ ṣadrī li-dhālik, wa-Allāh aʻlam bi-mā hunālik, ajabtuhu li-mā ṭalab, mutawassilan bi-Sayyid al-ʻArab ..."

title: 880-02 al-Adhkār lil-ikhwān al-akhyār wa-al-abnāʼ al-abrār : manuscript / Muḥammad ibn ʻAlī ibn al-Sarrāj.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi nastaʻīn. al-Ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn. Wa-ashhadu an lā ilāha illā huwa, munzil al-dhikr ʻalá al-Muslimīn, wa-anna Muḥammadan ʻabduhu wa-rasūluh, al-ṣādiq al-amīn, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-man tabiʻahum min al-muʼminīn. Ammā baʻd, fa-yaqūlu al-faqīr ilá Allāh taʻālá, Muḥammad ibn ʻAlī ibn ʻAbd al-Raḥmān ibn ʻUmar al-Qurashī al-Dimashqī al-Shāfiʻī ibn al-Sarrāj, taghammadahu Allāh wa-wālidayhi bi-raḥmatihi wa-ghamar: Qad saʼalanī baʻḍ al-murīdīn mimman arjū falāḥahu min al-muhtammīn an urattiba la-hu kitāban mukhtaṣaran yataḍammanu shayʼan min al-adhkār al-sharīfah, fa-ajābahu al-ʻabd ilá dhālik [...] al-munīfah wa-ṣannafahu fī layālin yasīrah ʻajalan, mughtaniman ʻaẓīm ajrih, khāʼifan min shawāghil dahrih wa-jilan ... wa-sammaytuhu 'Kitāb al-Adhkār lil-ikhwān al-akhyār wa-al-abnāʼ al-abrār ..."

title: 880-02 Sharḥ al-Mawāqif : manuscript / al-Sayyid al-Sharīf ʻAlī ibn Muḥammad al-Jurjānī.
note_text: Incipit: Incipit missing. Starts with: "... fī ḥaqīqat dhātihi, muttaṣif bi-ṣifāt al-jalāl, ay, al-ʻaẓamah. Yuqālu jalla fulān, idhā ʻaẓuma qadruhu. Wa-jalāl Allāh ʻaẓamatuhu, mubarraʼ ʻan shawāʼib al-naqṣ, jāmiʻ li-jihāt al-kamāl fī al-dhāt wa-al-ṣifāt wa-al-afʻāl, ghanī fī jamīʻ dhālik ʻammā siwāh, fa-lā yaḥtāju ilá shayʼ min al-ashyāʼ fīmā dhakarnāh, ʻālim bi-jamīʻ al-maʻlūmāt, li-mā sayaʼtī min anna al-muqtaḍá li-ʻilm khuṣūṣīyat dhātihi, wa-al-muṣaḥḥiḥ lil-maʻlūmīyah dhawāt al-mafhūmāt. Wa-lā shakka anna nisbat dhātihi ilá jamīʻihā sawāʼ, fa-wajaba ʻumūm ʻilmihi īyāhā, fa-lā yaʻzubu ʻan ʻilmihi mithqāl dharrah fī al-arḍ wa-lā fī al-samāʼ, ay, lā yabʻudu wa-lā yaghību ʻanhu aqall qalīl ..."

title: 880-01 al-Durr al-manẓūm : manuscript.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh al-maḥmūd bi-kull lisān, al-karīm al-mannān, al-dāʼim al-iḥsān, al-ʻaẓīm al-sulṭān, al-mūʻid li-man aṭāʻahu bi-al-jinān, wa-li-man ʻaṣāhu bi-al-nīrān, wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Rasūlihi al-mukhtār, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-aṣḥābihi al-abrār wa-al-muṣṭafayn al-akhyār. Ammā baʻd, fa-hādhā kitāb yaʻdhubu lil-masāmiʻ, wa-yazīdu fī ʻaql al-adīb al-bāriʻ, wa-yantaqilu min al-suṭūr ilá al-ṣudūr, wa-yarwī kalāmahu bi-al-durr al-manẓūm, dhakartu fīhi fuṣūlan gharāʼib al-alfāẓ allatī yaḥmulu al-adīb īrādahā, wa-yusirru al-qalb qurbuhā, kamā yuḥzinu al-khāṭir ibʻāduhā, wa-ilá Allāh arghabu fī al-tawfīq ..."

title: 880-01 Ṣuḥuf Ghāthādīmū al-Nabī : manuscript.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ṣaḥīfah al-ūlá. Yā nafs taṣawwarī wa-tamaththalī mā anā mūriduhu ʻalayki min al-maʻānī al-ʻaqlīyah al-mawjūdah wujūdan dāʼiman, fa-mā taṣawwartīhi fa-qad ʻaqaltīhi wa-tayaqqantīhi li-tayaqqunuki anna al-ḥayāh jins yanbūʻ al-insān wa-anna al-mawt min jins yanbūʻ al-jism, ka-tayaqqunuki ayḍan anna al-mustawī ghayr al-muʻwajj, wa-anna al-kullī aʻẓam min al-juzʼ, wa-anna al-māʼ yarwī min al-ʻaṭash, wa-annahu bārid raṭb bi-al-ṭabʻ, wa-anna al-nār taḥruqu wa-tunḍiju wa-annahā ḥārrah yābisah bi-al-ṭabʻ ..."

title: 880-02 Ḥāshiyat al-Ṣabbān ʻalá Sharḥ al-Ushmūnī ʻalá Alfīyat Ibn Mālik : manuscript / Muḥammad ibn ʻAlī al-Ṣabbān.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Naḥmaduka Allāhumma ʻalá mā wajjahta naḥwanā min sawābigh al-niʻam, wa-nashkuruka ʻalá mā aẓharta la-nā min mubhamāt al-asrār wa-muḍmarāt al-ḥikam, wa-nashhadu an lā ilāha illā anta waḥdaka, lā sharīka lak, al-fāʻil li-kull mubtadaʼ wa-mubtadaʻ, wa-nashhadu anna Sayyidanā Muḥammad ʻabduka wa-rasūluk, al-mufrad al-ʻalam wa-al-imām al-muttabaʻ ... Ammā baʻd, fa-yaqūlu rājī al-ghufrān Muḥammad ibn ʻAlī al-Ṣabbān, ghafara Allāh dhunūbah wa-satara fī al-dārayn ʻuyūbah: Hādhihi ḥawāshin sharīfah, wa-taqrīrāt jalīlah munīfah, wa-taḥqīqāt fāyiqah, wa-tadqīqāt rāʼiqah, khadamtu bi-hā sharḥ al-ʻAllāmah Nūr al-Dīn Abī al-Ḥasan ʻAlī ibn Muḥammad al-Ushmūnī al-Shāfiʻī ʻalá Alfīyat al-Imām Ibn Mālik kull al-khidmah, wa-ṣaraftu fī taḥrīr mabānīhā wa-tahdhīb maʻānīhā jamīʻ al-himmah ..."

title: 880-02 Ḥāshiyat al-Ṣafatī ʻalá sharḥ Ibn Turkī ʻalá al-ʻAshmāwīyah : manuscript / Yūsuf ibn Saʻīd al-Ṣafatī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi nastaʻīn. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī faqqaha fī al-dīn man ikhtārahau min ʻibādihi, wa-ashhadu an lā ilāha illā Allāh waḥdah, lā sharīka la-hu, shahādatan tūṣilunā ilá ṭarīq rashādih. Wa-ashhadu anna Sayyidanā Muḥammad ʻabduhu wa-rasūluh al-amīn, al-qāʼil: Man yurid Allāh bi-hi khayran yufaqqihhu fī al-dīn ... Ammā baʻd, fa-yaqūlu asīr al-shahawāt wa-kathīr al-masāwī wa-al-hafawāt ʻabduhu Yūsuf ibn al-Shaykh Saʻīd al-Ṣafatī al-Mālikī, aḥsana Allāh ʻilmahu wa-ballaghahu fī al-dārayn amalah: Hādhihi kalimāt qalīlah ʻalá sharḥ al-ʻAllāmah Ibn Turkī ʻalá al-ʻAshmāwīyah ..."

title: 880-02 Ḥāshiyah ʻalá Sharḥ al-Kātī : manuscript / Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad al-Bardaʻī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu li-man ḥamduhu aḥsan kull al-maqūl, wa-shukruhu ashraf mā yakhtaliju fī al-ʻuqūl, wa-al-ṣalāh ʻalá Muḥammad al-maqbūl, alladhī lam yatamayyal ilayhi al-juhūl. Wa-baʻd, fa-jamaʻtu hādhihi al-ḥawāshī lil-mubtadiʼīn, bi-istiʻānat al-Qādir, min al-kutub, maʻa ḍamm mā lāḥa li-bālī al-fātir. Wa-mā faʻaltu hādhihi illā iʻtimādan ʻalá ighmāḍ al-abṣār min mawāqiʻ al-anẓār ..."

title: 880-02 al-Fawāʼid al-muzʹhirah fī sharḥ al-Durrah al-muntaḍirah : manuscript / Aḥmad ibn Aḥmad al-Sujāʻī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi astaʻīn. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī yaʻfū ʻan al-sayyiʼāt bi-faḍlihi, wa-yaḥkumu fī jamīʻ al-anām dunyā wa-ukhrá bi-ʻadlihi, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Sayyidinā wa-Mawlānā Muḥammad al-mabʻūth raḥmatan wa-hudan, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-aṣḥābihi alladhīna awṣalū al-aḥkām, fa-zāla bihim ʻannā al-radá. Ammā baʻd, fa-qad ṭalab minnī baʻḍ al-afāḍil al-kirām an ashraḥ al-Durrah al-muntaḍirah fī al-maʻfū min al-najāsāt lil-Shaykh al-Imām wa-al-ḥabr al-humām Shihāb al-Dīn Aḥmad al-Shurunbulālī al-Shāfiʻī, raḥimahu Allāh al-Raḥmān ... wa-sammaytuhu al-Fawāʼid al-muzʹhirah fī sharḥ al-Durrah al-muntaḍirah ..."

title: 880-03 Anwār al-tanzīl wa-asrār al-taʼwīl. Al-Juzʼ al-awwal : manuscript / ʻAbd Allāh ibn ʻUmar al-Bayḍāwī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī nazzala al-Furqān ʻalá ʻabdihi li-yakūna lil-ʻālamīn nadhīran, fa-taḥaddá bi-aqṣar sūrah min suwarihi maṣāqiʻ al-khuṭabāʼ min al-ʻArab al-ʻarbāʼ, fa-lam yajid bi-hi qadīran, wa-afḥama man taṣaddá li-muʻāraḍatihi min fuṣaḥāʼ ʻAdnān wa-bulaghāʼ Qaḥṭān ḥattá ḥasibū annahum suḥirū tasḥīran, thumma bayyan lil-nās mā nazzala ilayhim ḥasbamā ʻanna lahum min maṣāliḥihim li-yatadabbarū āyātihi wa-li-yadhdhakkara ulū al-alabāb tadhkīran ..."

title: 880-03 Anwār al-tanzīl wa-asrār al-taʼwīl. Al-Juzʼ al-thānī : manuscript / ʻAbd Allāh ibn ʻUmar al-Bayḍāwī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Sūrat al-Anʻām Makkīyah, ghayr sitt āyāt, aw, thalāth, min qawlihi 'Qul taʻālaw atlu', wa-hiya miʼah wa-khams wa-sittūn āyah. Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī khalaqa al-samāwāti wa-al-arḍ. Akhbara bi-annahu, taʻālá, ḥaqīq bi-al-ḥamd, wa-nabbaha ʻalá annahu al-mustaḥiqq la-hu ʻalá hādhihi al-niʻam al-jisām, ḥumida aw lam yuḥmad, li-yakūna ḥujjatan ʻalá alladhīna hum bi-rabbihim yarhabūn [crossed out] yaʻdilūn. Wa-jamaʻa al-samāwāt dūna al-arḍ ..."

title: 880-03 Anwār al-tanzīl wa-asrār al-taʼwīl. Al-Juzʼ al-thālith : manuscript / ʻAbd Allāh ibn ʻUmar al-Bayḍāwī.
note_text: Incipit: "Sūrat al-Kahf Makkīyah, wa-qīla illā qawluhu taʻālá 'wa-iṣbir nafsak', al-āyah. Wa-hiya miʼah wa-iḥdá ʻashrata āyah. Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. 'al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī anzala ʻalá ʻabdihi al-Kitāb', yaʻnaī al-Qurʼān. Rattaba istiḥqāq al-ḥamd ʻalá inzālihi, tanbīhan ʻalá annahu aʻẓamu naʻmāʼihi, wadhālika li-annahu al-hādī ilá mā fīhi kamāl al-ʻibād, fa-yakūnu waṣfan la-hu wa-al-dāʻī ilá mā bi-hi yantaẓimu ṣalāḥ al-maʻāsh wa-al-maʻād ..."

title: 880-03 Anwār al-tanzīl wa-asrār al-taʼwīl. Al-Juzʼ al-rābiʻ : manuscript / ʻAbd Allāh ibn ʻUmar al-Bayḍāwī.
note_text: Incipit: "Sūrat Yāsīn Makkīyah, wa-hiya thalāth wa-thamānūn āyah. Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Yāsīn, ka-ALM fī al-maʻná wa-al-iʻrāb. Wa-qīla maʻnāhu 'Yā insān' bi-lughat Ṭayyiʼ, ʻalá anna aṣlahu 'Yā unsīyīn', fa-iqtaṣara ʻalá shaṭrihi li-kathrat al-nadābah, ka-mā qīla 'Mu Allāh' fī aymun Allāh, wa-quriʼa bi-al-kasr, ka-jayri, wa-bi-al-fatḥ ʻalá al-bināʼ, ka-ayn, idh al-iʻrāb ʻalá utlu Yāsīn, aw, bi-iḍmār ḥarf al-qasam, wa-al-fatḥah li-manʻ al-ṣarf, wa-bi-al-ḍamm bināʼan ka-ḥaythu, aw iʻrāban ʻalá hādhihi Yāsīn. Wa-amāl al-yāʼ Ḥamzah wa-al-Kisāʼī wa-Abū Bakr wa-Rawḥ, wa-adghama al-nūn fī wāw ..."

title: 880-03 Anwār al-tanzīl wa-asrār al-taʼwīl. Al-Juzʼ al-awwal : manuscript / ʻAbd Allāh ibn ʻUmar al-Bayḍāwī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Allāhumma yassir, Yā Karīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī nazzala al-Furqān ʻalá ʻabdihi li-yakūna lil-ʻālamīn nadhīran, fa-taḥaddá bi-aqṣar sūrah min suwarihi maṣāqiʻ al-khuṭabāʼ min al-ʻArab al-ʻarbāʼ, fa-lam yajid bi-hi qadīran, wa-afḥama man taṣaddá li-muʻāraḍatihi min fuṣaḥāʼ ʻAdnān wa-bulaghāʼ Qaḥṭān ḥattá ḥasibū annahum suḥirū tasḥīran, thumma bayyan lil-nās mā nazzala ilayhim ḥasbamā ʻanna lahum min maṣāliḥihim li-yaddabbarū āyātihi wa-li-yatadhakkara ulū al-alabāb tadhkīran, fa-kashafa lahum qināʻ al-inghilāq ʻan āyātin muḥkamāt hunna umm al-Kitāb, wa-ukhar mutashābihāt hunna rumūz al-khiṭāb taʼwīlan wa-tafsīran ..."

title: 880-02 al-Fawāʼid al-bahīyah : manuscript / Saʻd Allāh ibn ʻĪsá Saʻdī Chalabī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh wa-salāmun ʻalá ʻibādihi alladhīna iṣṭafá. Sūrat Fātiḥat al-Kitāb. Hākadhā wujidat maktūbatan fī awāʼil al-Maṣāḥif al-Karīmah, wa-hiya [khabar] mubtadaʼ maḥdhūf, ay, hādhihi al-sūrah musammāh bi-Sūrat Fātiḥat al-Kitāb, ʻalá al-taʼwīl al-mashhūr fī jumal al-khabarī [?]. Wa-al-ẓāhir anna ʻilm al-sūrah al-ʻaẓīmah huwa majmūʻ Sūrat Fātiḥat al-Kitāb. Wa-al-ʻajab anna al-ʻAllāmah al-Taftāzānī jaʻalahā ʻalá wifq mā dallat ʻalayhi al-Aḥādīth al-Nabawīyah musammāh bi-Fātiḥat al-Kitāb ..."

title: 880-02 Tafsīr al-Jalālayn : manuscript / Jalāl al-Dīn Muḥammad ibn Aḥmad al-Maḥallī, Jalāl al-Dīn ʻAbd al-Raḥmān ibn Abī Bakr al-Suyūṭī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm wa-bi-hi nastaʻīn, wa-Huwa ʻalá kull shayʼ qadīr. Qāla al-Shaykh al-Imām al-ʻālim al-ʻallāmah, ḥāfiẓ al-ʻaṣr wa-mujtahiduh, Sayyidunā wa-Mawlānā wa-Shaykhunā Jalāl al-Dīn ʻAbd al-Raḥmān al-Suyūṭī al-Shāfiʻī, nafaʻa Allāh al-Muslimīn bi-barakātihi, bi-Muḥammad wa-ālihi: Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh ḥamdan muwāfiyan li-niʻamih, mukāfiyan li-mazīdih, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Muḥammad wa-ālihi wa-ṣaḥbih wa-junūdih. Hādhā mā ishtaddat ilayhi ḥājat al-rāghibīn fī takmilat Tafsīr al-Qurʼān al-Karīm alladhī allafahu al-Imām al-ʻAllāmah al-muḥaqqiq Jalāl al-Dīn Muḥammad ibn Aḥmad al-Maḥallī al-Shāfiʻī, raḥimahu Allāh, wa-tammama [wa-tatmīm] mā fātahu, wa-huwa min awwal Sūrat al-Baqarah ilá ākhir al-Isrāʼ, nutimmuhu ʻalá namaṭih, min dhikr mā yufhamu bi-hi kalām Allāh taʻālá, wa-al-iʻtimād ʻalá arjaḥ al-aqwāl ..."

title: 880-03 Muqtabas min Tafsīr al-Qurʼān. Al-Juzʼ al-rābiʻ : manuscript / ʻAlāʼ al-Dīn ʻAlī ibn Muḥammad ibn Ibrāhīm al-maʻrūf bi-al-Khāzin.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh al-manʻūt bi-ṣifāt al-kamāl al-munazzah ʻan al-aghrāḍ fī al-aḥkām wa-al-afʻāl, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad alladhī aẓhara al-dīn wa-li-ahlihi rafaʻa, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-man li-sharīʻatihi ittabaʻ. ʻAn Anas, raḍiya Allāh ʻanhu, qāl: Qāla Rasūl Allāh, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam: Inna li-kull shayʼ qalb, wa-qalb al-Qurʼān Yāsīn, wa-man qaraʼa Yāsīn kataba Allāh la-hu bi-qirāʼatihā qirāʼat al-Qurʼān ʻashr marrāt. Akhrajahu al-Tirmidhī, wa-qāl: Ḥadīth gharīb wa-fī isnādihi shaykh majhūl ..."

title: 880-03 Ḥirz al-amānī wa-wajh al-tahānī : manuscript / al-Qāsim ibn Fīrruh al-Shāṭibī al-Ruʻaynī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Kitāb Qaṣīdat al-Shāṭibī, al-muṣannif al-ʻālim al-ʻāmil al-Rabbānī, wa-huwa al-Imām Aḥmad ibn Fīrruh al-Ruʻaynī thumma al-Shāṭibī, al-mulaqqabah bi-Ḥirz al-amānī wa-wajh al-tahānī, raḥmat Allāh ʻalayh. Fa-qāl: Badaʼtu bi-bismillāh fī al-naẓmi awwalan // tabāraka raḥmānan raḥīman wa-mawʼilā. Wa-thannaytu ṣallá Allāhu Rabbī ʻalá al-Riḍá // Muḥammadini al-muhdá ilá al-nāsi mursalā ..."

title: 880-02 Sharḥ al-Shāṭibīyah : manuscript / Abū al-Faḍl Jalāl al-Dīn ʻAbd al-Raḥmān ibn Kamāl al-Dīn al-Suyūṭī.
note_text: Incipit: Incipit missing; starts with: "... alifayn aw wāwayn aw yāʼayn, wa-iḍrib jamʻ al-hamzatayn fī hādhā al-bāb thalāthah li-annahumā immā maftūḥatān naḥwa aandhartahum am lam tundhirhum, aw al-ūlá maftūḥah wa-al-thāniyah maḍmūmah naḥwa li-yaʼtā al-mabʻūthūn, wa-al-ūlá maftūḥah wa-al-thāniyah maḍmūmah naḥwa aanzalā ʻalayhi al-dhikr wa-qad taqaddm ..."

title: 880-02 Sirāj al-qārī al-mubtadī wa-tadhkār al-muqrī al-muntahī : manuscript / ʻAlī ibn ʻUthmān ibn al-Qāṣiḥ.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Qāla al-Shaykh al-Imām al-ʻālim al-ʻallāmah, al-ḥabr al-baḥr al-fahhāmah, Abū al-Baqāʼ ʻAlī ibn ʻUthmān ibn Muḥammad ibn Aḥmad ibn al-Ḥasan ibn al-Qāṣiḥ al-ʻUdhrī, taghammadahu Allāh bi-raḥmatih: al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī ʻallama al-Qurʼān wa-zayyana al-insān bi-nuṭq al-lisān, fa-ṭūbá li-man yatlū Kitāb Allāh ḥaqqa tilāwatih, wa-yuwāẓibu ānāʼ al-layl wa-aṭrāf al-nahār ʻalá dirāsatih, kalām Allāh alladhī anzalahu ʻalá ʻabdihi wa-Rasūlihi al-Muṣṭafá, Muḥammad, al-Nabī al-ummī al-ʻArabī al-mukhtār ..."

title: 880-02 Muqaddimat Ḥafṣ : manuscript / Fāyid ibn Mubārak al-Abyārī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallam. Wa-baʻd, fa-yaqūlu al-faqīr al-wāthiq bi-rabbihi al-bārī, Fāyid ibn Mubārak al-Abyārī: Qad saʼalanī baʻḍ aṣdqāʼī wa-man huwa min ikhwānī fī Allāh wa-aḥbābī an ajmaʻa la-hu mulakhkhaṣ riwāyat Ḥafṣ, rāwī ʻĀṣim li-yantafiʻa bi-hi, fa-innahu yaʻjazu ʻan al-iṭṭilāʻ fī kutub al-qirāʼāt wa-maʻrifat al-tarājim, fa-ajabtuhu li-mā ṭalab, idh huwa ʻalayya mimmā wajab, fa-aqūlu, wa-billāh al-mustaʻān, wa-ʻalayhi al-iʻtimād wa-al-tiklān: Iʻlam inna riwāyatahu in wāfaqat qirāʼat Abī ʻAmr, wa-lam adhkurhā, qirāʼat Abī ʻAmr fī Miṣrinā, wa-huwa Abū ʻAmr Ḥafṣ ibn Sulaymān ibn al-Mughīrah al-Bazzāz, wa-kāna yuʻrafu bi-Ḥafṣ, wa-taʻallama al-Qurʼān min ʻĀṣim, khumsan khumsan, ka-mā yataʻallamuhu al-ṣabī min al-muʻallim, wa-kāna ʻāliman ʻāmilan, aʻlam aṣḥāb ʻĀṣim bi-qirāʼat ʻĀṣim, wa-kāna ibn zawjat ʻĀṣim ..."

title: 880-03 Risālah sharīfah fī qirāʼat al-Imām Ḥafṣ : manuscript / Fāyid ibn Mubārak al-Abyārī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi nastaʻīn. al-Ḥamdu lillāh ḥaqqa ḥamdih, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad, rasūlihi wa-ʻabdih. Wa-baʻd, fa-yaqūlu al-wāthiq bi-rabbihi al-ʻalīm al-bārī, Fāyid ibn Mubārak al-Abyārī: Qad saʼalanī baʻḍ aṣdqāʼī wa-man huwa min ikhwānī fī Allāh wa-aḥbābī an ajmaʻa la-hu mā takhuṣṣu rāwiyat [riwāyat] Ḥafṣ, rāwī ʻĀṣim, yantafiʻu bi-hi, fa-innahu yaʻjazu ʻan al-iṭṭilāʻ fī kutub al-Qurʼān [al-qirāʼāt] wa-maʻrifat al-tarjamah, fa-ajabtuhu li-mā ṭalab, idh huwa ʻalayya mimmā wajab, fa-aqūlu, wa-billāh al-mustaʻān, wa-ʻalayhi al-iʻtimād wa-al-tiklān: Wa-iʻlam inna riwāyatahu in wāfaqat qirāʼat Abī ʻUmar, wa-lam adhkurhā, qirāʼat Abī ʻUmar fī Miṣrinā, wa-huwa Abū ʻAmr Ḥafṣ ibn Sulaymān ibn al-Mughīrah al-Bazzāz, wa-kāna yuʻrafu bi-Ḥafṣ, wa-taʻallama al-Qurʼān min ʻĀṣim, khumsan khumsan, ka-mā yataʻallamuhu al-ṣabī min al-muʻallim, wa-kāna ʻāliman ʻāmilan, aʻlam aṣḥāb ʻĀṣim bi-qirāʼat ʻĀṣim, wa-kāna ibn zawjat ʻĀṣim ..."

title: 880-03 al-Daqāʼiq al-muḥkamah fī sharḥ al-Muqaddimah : manuscript / Abū Yaḥyá Zakarīyā ibn Muḥammad al-Anṣārī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Qāla Shaykh al-Islām al-ʻālim al-ʻāmil al-ʻallāmah ... Abū Yaḥyá Zakarīyā ibn al-Shaykh al-ṣāliḥ Shams al-Dīn Muḥammad ibn Shihāb al-Dīn Aḥmad ibn Zakarīyā al-Anṣārī al-Shāfiʻī ...: Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī fatataḥa bi-al-ḥamd kitābah, wa-ajzala li-man jawwadahu wa-ʻamila bi-hi thawābah, wa-ṣallá Allāh wa-sallam ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad al-amīn, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi ajmaʻīn. Wa-baʻd, fa-inna al-Muqaddimah al-manẓūmah fī tajwīd al-Qurʼān lil-Shaykh al-Imām ... Abī al-Khayr Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad al-Jazarī ... lammā iʻtaná bi-hā dhawū al-jidd wa-al-ijtihād, wa-kānat muḥtājah ilá bayān al-murād ... raʼaytu an aḍaʻa ʻalayhā sharḥan yaḥullu alfāẓahā, wa-yubayyinu murādahā, wa-yubrizu daqāʼiqahā, wa-yuqayyid muṭlaqahā, wa-yaftaḥu mughlaqahā, wa-sammaytuhu bi-al-Daqāʼiq al-muḥkamah fī sharḥ al-Muqaddimah. Wa-ʻiddat abyātihā miʼah wa-sabʻah ʻalá mā fī akthar al-nusakh, wa-miʼah wa-thamāniyah ʻalá mā fī aqallihā ..."

title: 880-01 Sharḥ al-Muqaddimah al-Jazarīyah fī al-tajwīd : manuscript.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Yaqūlu rājī ʻafwa rabbin sāmiʻi // Muḥammadu ibn al-Jazarīyi al-Shāfiʻī. al-Rajāʼ, al-ṭamaʻ fīmā yumkinu ḥuṣūluhu. Wa-al-ʻafw, al-ṣafḥ ʻan al-dhanb wa-tark mujāzāt al-mutaʻaddī. Wa-al-samʻ bi-maʻná al-qubūl wa-al-ijābah, wa-minhu qawl al-muṣallī 'Samiʻa Allāh li-man ḥamidah', ay, ajāba Allāh la-hu. Ṣ. al-Ḥamd lillāh wa-ṣallá Allāh, al-ḥamd huwa al-thanāʼ bi-al-lisān, ʻalá qaṣd al-taʻẓīm, wa-Allāh ism al-dhāt al-mastajmiʻ li-jamīʻ al-ṣifāt al-wājib al-wujūd al-mustajmiʻ li-jamīʻ al-maḥāmid. Wa-al-ṣalāh min Allāh raḥmah, wa-min al-malāʼikah istighfār, wa-min al-jinn wa-al-ins duʻāʼ, wa-hiya wājibah li-man samiʻa ismahu ..."

title: 880-02 Radd maʻānī al-āyāt al-mutashābihāt ilá maʻānī al-āyāt al-muḥkamāt : manuscript / Muḥammad ibn Aḥmad ibn al-Labbān.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Baʻda ḥamd Allāh al-wāḥid bi-dhātih wa-ṣifātih, al-munazzah fī aḥadīyatihi ʻan mushābahat makhlūqātih, wa-ṣalawātuhu ʻalá Muḥammad ʻabdihi wa-rasūlih, al-mūḍiḥ bi-sunnatihi mutashābih āyātih, al-bāqī madaduhu li-awliyāʼih baʻda mamātih, kamā kān lahum fī ḥayātih, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbih, alladhīn kāna aḥaduhum idhā zārahu fī qabrih, sallama ʻalayhi, wa-rafaʻa yadayhi kamā kāna yarfaʻuhumā ʻinda iftitāḥ ṣalātih, wa-sallama taslīman kathīran. Fa-innaka saʼaltanī, arshadanī Allāh wa-īyāka, ʻan amr ʻaẓuma fī hādhā al-zamān khaṭbuh wa-ʻamma ḍararuh, wa-huwa mā taẓāhara bi-hi baʻḍ al-mubtadiʻah al-muntasibīn ilá al-Ḥadīth wa-al-fiqh, wa-ashāʻahu fī al-ʻāmmah wa-al-khāṣṣah min iʻtiqād ẓawāhir al-āyāt al-mutashābihah fī asmāʼihi taʻālá wa-ṣifātih, min ghayr taʻarruḍ li-ṣarfihā ʻammā yūhim al-tashbīh wa-al-tajsīm, wa-yazʻumu annahu fī dhālika mutamassik bi-al-Kitāb wa-al-Sunnah, māshin fī ṭarīqat al-salaf al-ṣāliḥ, wa-yushanniʻu ʻalá man taʻarraḍa ilá shayʼ minhā bi-taʼwīl, aw ṣarafahu ʻan ẓāhirihi bi-dalīl, wa-yansibuhu fī dhālik ilá mukhālafat al-Ṣaḥābah wa-al-Tābiʻīn ..."

title: 880-02 al-Taysīr fī qawāʻid ʻilm al-tafsīr : manuscript / Muḥammad ibn Sulaymān al-Kāfiyajī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Rabbi yassir, Yā Karīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī anzala al-Qurʼān raḥmatan lil-anām, wa-al-ṣalāh ʻalá al-Nabī alladhī fassara al-Furqān wa-bayyana al-aḥkām, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-aṣḥābihi al-nujabāʼ al-kirām. Ammā baʻd, fa-inna madār al-sharāʼiʻ wa-al-Islām kalām Allāh al-Malik al-ʻAllām, wa-inna tafsīrahu ahamm al-muhimmāt al-ʻiẓām, lā yakādu yatimmu taʻāṭīhi illā li-wāḥid baʻda wāḥid fī kull zamān, fa-innahu baḥr lā yanqaḍī ʻajāʼibuh, wa-lā yantahī gharāʼibuh, badīʻ al-shān. Thumma inna ʻilam al-tafsīr min bayn al-ʻulūm, lammā kāna bi-manzilat al-insān lil-ʻayn wa-al-ʻayn lil-insān, wa-qad dalla ʻalá afḍalīyatihi al-burhān, wa-kān ghayra muntaẓimin ʻalá ḥidatin fī silk al-naẓm wa-al-bayān, wa-aradtu tadwīnahu bi-qadr al-wisʻ wa-al-imkān, rattabtu hādhihi al-risālah ʻalá bābayn wa-khātimah, tuḥfatan minnī lil-ikhwān ..."

title: 880-03 Muqtabas min Tafsīr al-Qurʼān. Al-Juzʼ al-thālith : manuscript / ʻAlāʼ al-Dīn ʻAlī ibn Muḥammad ibn Ibrāhīm al-maʻrūf bi-al-Khāzin.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh dhī al-kamāl wa-al-jalāl alladhī jaʻala al-ahillah mawāqīt li-ṣāliḥ al-aʻmāl, wa-ṣalātuhu wa-salāmuhu ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad al-musharrif lil-makān wa-al-zamān, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-kull man talāhum bi-iḥsān. Qiṣṣat Yūsuf fīhā bayān akhbār al-umam al-sālifah wa-al-qurūn al-māḍiyah, wa-fīhā min al-ʻibar wa-al-ḥikam wa-al-nukat wa-al-fawāyid allatī taṣluḥu lil-dīn wa-mā fīhā min siyar al-mulūk wa-al-mamālīk wa-al-ʻulamāʼ wa-makr al-nisāʼ wa-al-ṣabr ʻalá adhā [adhá] al-aʻdāʼ wa-ḥusn al-tajāwuz ʻanhum ..."

title: 880-02 Fatʹḥ al-Raḥmān bi-kashf mā talabbasa fī al-Qurʼān : manuscript / Abū Yaḥyá Zakarīyā ibn Muḥammad al-Anṣārī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm wa-bi-hi nastaʻīn. Qāla Sayyidunā wa-Mawlānā Shaykh mashāyikh al-Islām, malik al-ʻulamāʼ al-aʻlām, Abū Yaḥyá Zakarīyā al-Anṣārī, taghammadahu Allāh bi-raḥmatih wa-askanahu fasīḥ Jannatih: Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī nawwara qulūb al-ʻārifīn bi-Kitābihi al-ʻazīz, wa-aṭlaʻahum ʻalá khabāyā al-zawāyā bi-al-barāhīn [bi-al-burhān] al-qawīm, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá khayr al-anām, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi al-bararah al-kirām. Fa-hādhā mukhtaṣar fī dhikrāyāt al-Qurʼān al-mutashābihāt, al-mukhtalifāt bi-ziyādah, aw taqdīm, aw ibdāl, aw ghayr dhālik, maʻa bayān sabab al-ikhtilāf, wa-fī dhikr ghayr al-mukhtalifah, maʻa bayān sabab takrārih, wa-fī dhikr unmūdhaj min asʼilat al-Qurʼān al-ʻazīz wa-ajwibatihā ṣarīḥan, aw ishāratan, jamaʻtuhu min kalām al-ʻulamāʼ al-muḥaqqiqīn, maʻa mā fataḥa Allāh bi-hi min fayḍ faḍlihi al-matīn. Wa-sammaytuhu bi-Fatʹḥ al-Raḥmān bi-kashf mā talabbasa fī al-Qurʼān. Wa-Allāh asʼalu bi-hi wa-bi-jaʻlihi khāliṣan li-wajhihi, wa-huwa ḥasbī wa-niʻma al-wakīl ..."

title: 880-03 al-Taysīr fī al-qirāʼāt al-sabʻ : manuscript / ʻUthmān ibn Saʻīd al-Dānī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi nastaʻīn. Qāla al-Imām al-ḥāfiẓ al-muqriʼ Abū ʻAmr ʻUthmān ibn Saʻīd ibn ʻUthmān al-Madanī al-Dānī, raḍiya Allāh ʻanhu: al-Ḥamdu lillāh al-munfarid bi-al-dawām, al-mutaṭawwil bi-al-inʻām, khāliq al-khalq bi-qudratih, wa-mudabbir al-amr bi-ḥikmatih, lā rādda li-amrih, wa-lā muʻaqqiba li-ḥukmih, wa-huwa sarīʻ al-ḥisāb. Aḥmaduhu ʻalá jamīʻ niʻamih, wa-ashkuruhu ʻalá tatābuʻ ālāʼihi wa-minanih, wa-asʼaluhu al-mazīd min inʻāmih wa-al-jazīl min iḥsānih, wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá al-Bashīr al-Nadhīr, al-sirāj al-munīr, Nabīyinā Muḥammad, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam, wa-ʻalá ālihi al-ṭayyibīn al-ṭāhirīn, wa-sallama taslīman kathīran. Ammā baʻd, fa-innakum saʼaltumūnī an uṣannifa lakum kitāban mukhtaṣaran fī madhhab al-qurrāʼ al-sabʻah bi-al-amṣār, raḥimahum Allāh taʻālá, yaqrubu ʻalaykum mutanāwaluh wa-yasʹhulu ʻalaykum ḥifẓuhu ..."

title: 880-03 Anwār al-tanzīl wa-asrār al-taʼwīl. Al-Juzʼ al-awwal : manuscript / ʻAbd Allāh ibn ʻUmar al-Bayḍāwī.
note_text: Incipit: The right half of the first leaf, and the center of the upper part of the second leaf, are torn off. The text starts with: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-sallam [... ... ... ?] lil-ʻālamīn nadhīran, fa-taḥaddá bi-aqṣar sūrah min suwarihi [... ... ... ?] qadīran, wa-afḥama man taʻarraḍa li-muʻāraḍat [li-muʻāraḍatihi] min fiṣaḥāʼ ʻAdnān [... ... ... ?] thumma bayyana lil-nās mā nuzzila ilayhim ḥasba mā ʻanna [... ... ... ?] ulū al-alabāb tadhkīran, fa-kashafa lahum qināʻ al-inghilāq ..."

title: 880-03 Anwār al-tanzīl wa-asrār al-taʼwīl. Al-Juzʼ al-awwal : manuscript / ʻAbd Allāh ibn ʻUmar al-Bayḍāwī.
note_text: Incipit: The first leaf of the codex is missing; text starts with: "... al-sharʻ wa-asāsuhā lā yalīqu li-taʻāṭīhi wa-al-taṣaddī lil-takallum fīhi illā man baraʻa fī al-ʻulūm al-dīnīyah kullihā, uṣūlihā wa-furūʻihā, wa-fāqa fī al-ṣināʻāt al-ʻArabīyah wa-al-funūn al-adabīyah bi-anwāʻihā. Wa-la-ṭāla mā uḥaddithu nafsī bi-an uṣannifa fī hādhā al-fann kitāban yaḥtawī ʻalá ṣafwat mā balaghanī min ʻuẓamāʼ al-ṣaḥābah wa-ʻulamāʼ al-tābiʻīn, wa-man dūnahum min al-salaf al-ṣāliḥīn, wa-yanṭawī ʻalá nukat bāriʻah wa-laṭāʼif rāʼiʻah istanbaṭṭuhā [istanbaṭtuhā] anā wa-man qablī min afāḍil al-mutaʼakhkhirīn wa-amāthil al-muḥaqqiqīn ..."

title: 880-03 Lāmīyat al-afʻāl : manuscript / Muḥammad ibn ʻAbd Allāh ibn Mālik.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāhi lā abghī bi-hi badalā // ḥamdan yuballighu min ruḍwānihi al-amalā ..."

title: 880-03 al-Shamāʼil : manuscript / Muḥammad ibn ʻĪsá al-Tirmidhī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm wa-bi-hi thiqatī. al-Ḥamdu lillāh wa-kafá, wa-salāmun ʻalá ʻibādihi alladhīna iṣṭafá. Qāla al-Shaykh al-ḥāfiẓ Abū ʻĪsá Muḥammad ibn ʻĪsá ibn Sūrah al-Tirmidhī: al-Bāb al-awwal fīmā jāʼa fī khalq Rasūl Allāh, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam. Akhbaranā Abū Rajāʼ Qutaybah ibn Saʻīd ʻan Mālik ibn Anas ʻan Rabīʻah ibn Abī ʻAbd al-Raḥmān ʻan Mālik annahu samiʻahu yaqūlu: Kāna Rasūl Allāh, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam, laysa bi-al-ṭawīl al-bāyin, wa-lā bi-al-qaṣīr, wa-lā bi-al-abyaḍ al-amhaq, wa-lā bi-al-ādam ..."

title: 880-03 Uns al-munqaṭiʻīn li-ʻibādat Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn : manuscript / al-Muʻāfá ibn Ismāʻīl ibn Abī al-Sinān al-Mawṣilī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad al-Nabī wa-ālihi ajmaʻīn. Qāla al-faqīr ilá Allāh taʻālá, al-Muʻāfā [al-Muʻāfá] ibn Ismāʻīl ibn al-Ḥusayn ibn Abī al-Fatʹḥ ibn Abī al-Sinān: Istakhartu Allāh taʻālá fī jamʻ kitāb yashtamilu ʻalá thalāthimiʼat Ḥadīth ʻan Rasūl Allāh, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam, wa-ʻalá thalāthimiʼat ḥikāyah, wa-atbaʻtuhā abyātan min al-shiʻr, maḥdhūfat al-asānīd, ṭāliban lil-ikhtiṣār, qāṣidan bi-hi wajh al-ʻAzīz al-Ghaffār, li-yantafiʻa bi-hā man waqafa ʻalayhā wa-yurshada man addat fikratuhu ilayhā, wa-Allāh al-mustaʻān wa-ʻalayhi al-tiklān ..."

title: 880-03 al-Daqāʼiq al-muḥkamah fī sharḥ al-Muqaddimah : manuscript / Abū Yaḥyá Zakarīyā ibn Muḥammad al-Anṣārī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Qāla al-Shaykh al-Imām al-ʻālim al-ʻallāmah, Shaykh al-Islām wa-al-Muslimīn, zayn al-millah wa-al-dīn, Abū Yaḥyá Zakarīyā al-Anṣārī al-Shāfiʻī, ghafar Allāh la-hu wa-li-wālidayh, wa-aʻāda ʻalayya wa-ʻalá al-Muslimīn min barakatih bi-Muḥammad wa-ālih: Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-Huwa ḥasbī wa-niʻma al-wakīl. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī iftataḥa bi-al-ḥamd kitābah, wa-ajzala li-man jawwadahu wa-ʻamila bi-hi thawābah, wa-ṣallá Allāh wa-sallam ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad al-amīn, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi ajmaʻīn. Wa-baʻd, fa-inna al-Muqaddimah al-manẓūmah fī tajwīd al-Qurʼān lil-Shaykh al-Imām ... Abī al-Khayr Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad al-Jazarī ... lammā iʻtaná bi-hā dhawū al-jidd wa-al-ijtihād, wa-kānat muḥtājah ilá bayān al-murād ... raʼaytu an aḍaʻa ʻalayhā sharḥan yaḥullu alfāẓahā, wa-yubayyinu murādahā, wa-yubrizu daqāʼiqahā, wa-yuqayyid muṭlaqahā, wa-yaftaḥu mughlaqahā, wa-sammaytuhu bi-al-Daqāʼiq al-muḥkamah fī sharḥ al-Muqaddimah. Wa-ʻiddat abyātihā miʼah wa-sabʻah ʻalá mā fī akthar al-nusakh, wa-miʼah wa-thamāniyah ʻalá mā fī aqallihā ..."

title: 880-03 al-Daqāʼiq al-muḥkamah fī sharḥ al-Muqaddimah : manuscript / Abū Yaḥyá Zakarīyā ibn Muḥammad al-Anṣārī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-huwa ḥasbī. Qāla Shaykh al-Islām wa-al-Muslimīn, zayn al-millah wa-al-dīn, Abū Yaḥyá Zakarīyā al-Anṣārī al-Shāfiʻī ...: Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī ifatataḥa al-ḥamd bi-kitābah, wa-ajzala li-man jawwadahu wa-ʻamila bi-hi thawābah, wa-ṣallá Allāh wa-sallam ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad al-amīn, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi ajmaʻīn, wa-huwa ḥasbī wa-niʻma al-wakīl.
