Wa-baʻd, fa-inna al-Muqaddimah al-manẓūmah fī tajwīd al-Qurʼān al-ʻaẓīm lil-Shaykh al-Imām wa-al-ḥabr al-humām, Shaykh al-Islām, ḥāfiẓ al-ʻaṣr wa-al-awān Abī al-Khayr Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad al-Jazarī al-Shāfiʻī, ṭayyaba Allāh tharāh, wa-jaʻala al-Jannah maʼwāh, lammā iʻtanā bi-hā dhawū al-jidd wa-al-ijtihād, wa-kānat muḥtājah ilá bayān al-murād, wa-ḥawat, maʻa ṣighar al-ḥajm wa-ḥusn al-ikhtiṣār, mā lam taḥwihi fī hādhā al-fann kathīr min al-kutub al-kibār, raʼaytu an aḍaʻa ʻalayhā sharḥan yaḥullu alfāẓahā, wa-yubayyinu murādahā, wa-yubrizu daqāʼiqahā, wa-yuqayyid muṭlaqahā, wa-yaftaḥu mughlaqahā, sammaytuhā bi-al-Daqāʼiq al-muḥkamah fī sharḥ al-Muqaddimah. Wa-ʻiddat abyātihā miʼah wa-sabʻah ʻalá mā fī akthar al-nusakh, wa-miʼah wa-thamāniyah ʻalá mā fī aqallihā ..."

title: 880-02 al-Qawāʻid al-muqarrarah wa-al-fawāʼid al-muḥarrarah : manuscript / Muḥammad ibn Qāsim ibn Ismāʻīl al-Baqarī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Yaqūlu al-muʻtarif bi-dhunūbihi al-rājī min rabbihi satra ʻuyūbihi, Muḥammad ibn Qāsim ibn Ismāʻīl al-Muqrī: al-Ḥamdu lillāh ʻalá afḍālih, wa-ashhadu an lā ilāha illā Allāh waḥdahu, lā sharīka lah, shahādatan, shahādatan arjū bi-hā al-najāh min ʻadhābih, wa-ashhadu anna Sayyidanā Muḥammad ʻabduhu wa-rasūluh, al-muwaffaq fī aqwālihi wa-afʻālih, ṣallá Allāh wa-sallama ʻalayhi wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi al-qāʼilīn bi-maqālih. Wa-baʻd, fa-qad saʼalanī baʻḍ al-ikhwān an ajmaʻa risālatan tashtamilu ʻalá mā yataʻallaqu bi-madhhab kull wāḥid min al-qurrāʼ bi-infirādih, sālikan ṭarīq al-ikhtiṣār, fa-ajabtuhu ilá suʼlih, ṭāliban lil-thawāb, sāʼilan min Allāh an yajʻalahā khāliṣatan li-wajhih. Wa-qad jamaʻtu fīhā mā istafadʹtuhu min durūs Shaykhī wa-qudwatī ... al-Syakh ʻAbd al-Raḥmān al-Yamanī ..."

title: 880-02 al-Mukarrar fīmā tawātara min al-qirāʼāt al-sabʻ wa-taḥarrar : manuscript / ʻUmar ibn Qāsim al-Nashshār.
note_text: Incipit: Starts with: "Sūrat Umm al-Qurʼān. Qaraʼa ʻĀṣim wa-al-Kisāʼī 'Mālik' bi-alif baʻda al-mīm, wa-qaraʼ al-bāqūn 'Malik' bi-ghayr alif, wa-adgham al-mīm min 'al-Raḥīm' fī mīm 'Malik' Abū ʻAmr bi-khilāf ʻan al-Dūrī wa-al-Sūsī; fa-min riwāyat al-Dūrī al-iẓhār ashhar, wa-min riwāyat al-Sūsī al-idghām ashhar, wa-lā rawm fī hādhā al-idghām, limā fī dhālika min al-kulfah al-ḥāṣilah bi-inṭibāq al-shafatayn wa-al-waqf ʻalá 'Yawm al-Dīn' fīhi. Li-jamīʻ al-qurrāʼ fīhi arbaʻat awjuh ..."

title: 880-02 al-Durr al-naẓīm fī faḍāʼil al-Qurʼān al-ʻAẓīm wa-al-āyāt wa-al-Dhikr al-Ḥakīm : manuscript / ʻAbd Allāh ibn Asʻad al-Yāfiʻī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi thiqatī. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī aṭlaʻa min āfāq Kitābih al-ʻAzīz nayyirāt awḍāḥ al-ghurar, wa-ḥaffahu bi-āthār al-karāmāt wa-karāmāt al-athar, wa-jaʻalahu baḥran yakhruju minhu fawāʼid al-jawāhir wa-nafāʼis al-durar, wa-amadda nārīyat al-afhām bi-nūrīyat al-ilhām, fa-tajallat minhu bawāhir al-āyāt wa-ʻajāʼib al-ʻibar. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-sallama taslīman kathīran. Ammā baʻd, fa-inna Allāh jaʻala Kitābah lil-adwāʼ shifāʼ, wa-li-ṣadaʼ al-qulūb jalāʼ, fa-huwa al-nūr alladhī lā yushbihuhu nūr, wa-al-burhān alladhī tushfá bi-hi al-nufūs, wa-thushraḥu bi-hi al-ṣudūr, fa-raʼayt an ajmaʻa fī hādhā al-kitāb bayna kitāb al-Barq al-lāmiʻ wa-al-ghayth al-hāmiʻ maʻa [min] taʼlīf al-Faqīh al-Qāḍī Abī Bakr al-Ghassānī, wa-bayna kitāb fīhi Khawāṣṣ āyāt min al-Qurʼān wa-fawātiḥ min al-suwar lil-Imām Ḥujjat al-Islām, wa-sammaytuhu bi-al-Durr al-naẓīm fī faḍāʼil al-Qurʼān al-ʻAẓīm wa-al-āyāt wa-al-Dhikr al-Ḥakīm ..."

title: 880-03 al-Jāmiʻ al-ṣaḥīḥ. Al-Juzʼ 9 : manuscript / Muḥammad ibn Ismāʻīl al-Bukhārī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Bāb al-Khurūj fī al-tijārah, wa-qawl Allāh taʻālá 'Fa-intashirū fī al-arḍ, wa-ibtaghū min faḍl Allāh'. Ḥaddathanā Muḥammad ibn Sallām, akhbaranā Mukhlid ibn Yazīd, qāl, anbaʼanā Ibn Jurayj, qāl, [akhbaranī ʻAṭāʼ ʻan ʻUbayd] ibn ʻUmayr anna Abā Mūsá al-Ashʻarī istaʼdhana ʻannī ʻUmar ibn al-Khaṭṭāb, raḍiya Allāh ʻanhu, fa-lam yuʼdhin la-hu, wa-ka-annahu kāna mashghūlan, fa-rajiʻa Abū Mūsá, fa-farigha ʻUmar, raḍiya Allāh ʻanhu, fa-qāl: A-lam asmaʻ ṣawt ʻAbd Allāh ibn Qays? Iʼdhunū la-hu. Qīl: Qad rajiʻ. Fa-daʻāhu, fa-qāl: Kunnā nuʼmaru bi-dhālik. Fa-qāl: Taʼtīnī ʻalá dhālika bi-al-bayyinah ..."

title: 880-02 Insān al-ʻuyūn fī sīrat al-Amīn al-Maʼmūn. Al-Juzʼ al-thālith : manuscript / Nūr al-Dīn ʻAlī ibn Ibrāhīm al-Ḥalabī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān [al-Raḥīm], wa-bi-hi thiqatī. Ghazwat Banī Liḥyān, bi-nāḥiyat ʻAsfān. Wa-Liḥyān bi-kasr al-Lām wa-fatʹḥihā, qabīlah min Hudhayl. [Lā] yakhfá an baʻda muḍī sittat ashhur min Ghazwat Banī Qurayẓah, ghazā Rasūl Allāh, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam, Banī Liḥyān, yaṭlubuhum bi-aṣḥāb al-Rajīʻ, ay, wa-hum Khubayb wa-aṣḥābuhu alladhīna qutilū bi-Biʼr Maʻūnah, ka-mā sayaʼtī dhikr dhālik fī al-sarāyā, ay, li-annahu, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam, wajada, ay, ḥazina, wajdan shadīdan ʻalá aṣḥābihi al-maqtūlīn bi-al-Rajīʻ, wa-arāda an yantaqima min Hudhayl, fa-amar aṣḥābahu bi-al-tahayyuʼ, wa-aẓhara annahu yurīdu al-Shām, li-yudrika min al-qawm gharrah, ay, ghaflah ..."

title: 880-03 al-Mawāhib al-ladunīyah bi-al-minaḥ al-Muḥammadīyah. Al-Juzʼ al-awwal : manuscript / Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad ibn Abī Bakr al-Khaṭīb al-Qasṭallānī.
note_text: Incipit: First leaf and title page missing. Starts with: "... Qāla ʻAbd Allāh: Fa-wallāh laqad raʼytuhum ṣarʻá Yawm Badr, thumma suḥibū ilá al-Qalīb, Qalīb Badr. Thumma qāala Rasūl Allāh, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam, wa-atbaʻa aṣḥāb al-Qalīb laʻnah, wa-ustudilla bi-hādhā al-Ḥadīth ʻalá anna man ʻaraḍ la-hu fī ṣalātihi mā yamnaʻu inʻiqādahā ibtidāʼan, lā tabṭulu ṣalātuhu. Fa-law kānat najāsah fa-azālahā fī al-ḥāl wa-lā athara la-hā ṣaḥḥat ṣalātuhu ittifāqan, wa-ustudilla bi-hi ayḍan ʻalá ṭahārat farth mā yuʼkalu laḥmuhu, ʻalá anna izālat al-najāsah laysat bi-farḍ, wa-huwa ḍaʻīf ..."

title: 880-03 al-Shamāʼil : manuscript / Muḥammad ibn ʻĪsá al-Tirmidhī.
note_text: Incipit: "Kitāb Shamāʼil Sharīf. Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm wa-bi-hi nastaʻīn. al-Ḥamdu lillāh wa-salāmun ʻalá ʻibādihi alladhīna iṣṭafá. Qāla al-Shaykh al-ḥāfiẓ Abū ʻĪsá ibn Sūrah al-Tirmidhī al-muṣannif, raḥimahu Allāh: Bāb mā jāʼa fī khalq Rasūl Allāh, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam, ḥaddathanā Abū Rajāʼ Qutaybah ibn Saʻīd ʻan Mālik ibn Anas, ʻan Rabīʻah ibn Abī ʻAbd al-Raḥmān, ʻn Anas ibn Mālik, annahu samiʻahu yaqūl: Kāna Rasūl Allāh, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam, laysa bi-al-ṭawīl al-bāʼin, wa-la bi-al-qaṣīr, wa-lā bi-al-abyaḍ al-amhaq, wa-lā bi-al-ādam ..."

title: 880-02 Kitāb al-Arbaʻīn al-Nawawīyah : manuscript / Abū Zakarīyā Yaḥyá ibn Sharaf al-Nawawī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi nastaʻīn. Qāla al-Shaykh al-Imām al-ʻālim al-ʻallāmah, al-awḥad al-wariʻ, al-qudwah al-ḥāfiẓ, Muḥyī al-Dīn, muftī al-Muslimīn, ʻālim al-ʻulamāʼ, awḥad al-ʻālamīn, Abū Zakarīyā, Yaḥyá ibn Sharaf al-Marwī ibn Ḥasan ibn Ḥusayn al-Nawawī al-Shāfiʻī, akrama Allāh tharāh wa-jaʻala al-jannah maʼwāh: al-Ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn, qayyūm al-samāwāt wa-al-araḍīn, mudabbir al-khalāʼiq ajmaʻīn, bāʻith al-rusul, ṣalawāt Allāh wa-salāmuhu ʻalayhim ajmaʻīn, ilá al-mukallafīn, li-hidāyatihim wa-bayān sharāʼiʻ al-dīn bi-al-dilālāt al-qaṭʻīyah wa-wāḍiḥāt al-barāhīn ..."

title: 880-02 Talkhīṣ wa-ikhtiṣār li-khuṭbat al-ʻAllāmah al-Qasṭallānī fī sharḥihi ʻalá al-Bukhārī : manuscript / Sulaymān ibn ʻUmar al-ʻUjaylī al-Jamal.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi nastaʻīn. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī sharaḥ bi-maʻārif ʻawārif al-Sunnah al-Nabawīyah ṣudūr awliyāʼih, wa-rawwaḥa bi-samāʻ Aḥādīthihā al-ṭayyibah arwāḥ ahl widādih wa-aṣfiyāʼih. Aḥmaduhu ʻalá mā waffaqa min irshādih wa-asdá min ālāʼih, wa-ashkuruhu ʻalá faḍlihi al-mutawātir al-kāmil al-wāfir, wa-asʼaluhu al-mazīd min ʻaṭāʼih wa-kashf ghiṭāʼih ... Wa-baʻd, fa-yaqūlu al-ʻabd al-faqīr, al-qalīl al-biḍāʻah al-kathīr al-taqṣīr, Sulaymān al-Jamal, khādim al-fuqarāʼ: Lammā raʼaytu al-Imām al-Qasṭallānī afād fī khuṭbat sharḥihi ʻalá Ṣaḥīḥ al-Bukhārī wa-ajād ... raʼaytu fī ʻibāratihi ṭūlan lā taḥtamiluhu ḍaʻafat al-ʻuqūl ka-amthālī, fa-aḥbabtu an akhtaṣirahā wa-ulakhkhiṣahā fī hādhihi al-awrāq li-yashula ʻalá al-qāṣir mithlī muṭālaʻatuhā wa-tafahhumuhā ..."

title: 880-02 al-Abḥāth allatī ka-al-baḥr al-jārī ʻalá ākhir Ḥadīth fī al-Bukhārī : manuscript / Tāj al-ʻĀrifīn ibn Muwaffaq al-Dīn.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi nastaʻīn ʻalá al-qawm al-kāfirīn. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī jaʻala lil-dhunūb mukaffirāt, wa-hiya al-dhikr wa-al-ṣawm wa-sāʼir al-ʻibādāt, wa-jaʻala naql al-aqdām lil-masājid ʻalá ṭahārah li-adāʼ al-ṣalawāt māḥiyan lil-dhunūb wa-rāfiʻan lil-darajāt. Aḥmaduhu, subḥānahu wa-taʻālá, ʻalá mā asdá min al-ʻaṭīyāt, wa-ashkuruhu fī sāʼir al-azmān wa-al-awqāt ... Wa-baʻd, fa-yaqūlu al-ʻabd al-faqīr, al-muʻtarif bi-al-ʻajz wa-al-taqṣīr, al-Sayyid Tāj al-ʻĀrifīn ibn Muwaffaq al-Dīn, maḥá Allāh ʻanhu sayyiʼātihi, wa-rafaʻa li-khidmat al-ʻilm darajātih: Qad aradtu an aktuba kitābah jāmiʻah, lil-fawāʼid ḥāwiyah, lil-abḥāth wa-al-taḥqīqāt wa-al-farāʼid ʻalá Ḥadīth khatama bi-hi jāmiʻuhu al-Imām al-Bukhārī ... wa-sammaytuhu al-Abḥāth allatī ka-al-baḥr al-jārī ʻalá ākhir Ḥadīth fī al-Bukhārī ..."

title: 880-02 al-Itʹḥāfāt al-sanīyah bi-al-Aḥādīth al-Qudsīyah : manuscript / Muḥammad ʻAbd al-Raʼūf ibn Tāj al-ʻĀrifīn al-Munāwī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi thiqatī. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī anzala ahl al-Ḥadīth aʻlā manāzil al-tashrīf, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad alladhī shahidat al-āy al-Qurʼānīyah wa-al-Aḥādīth al-Qudsīyah bi-annahu al-sayyid al-ʻafīf, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi al-maʻṣūmīn fī maqālihim ʻan al-taḥrīf. Wa-baʻd, fa-yaqūlu al-ʻabd al-ḍaʻīf al-rājī ʻafwa rabbihi al-raʼūf al-laṭīf, Muḥammad ʻAbd al-Raʼūf ibn al-Munāwī al-Ḥaddādī, kafāhu Allāh sharr kull munāwin wa-muʻādī: Hādhā kitāb awradtu fīhi mā waqaftu ʻalayhi bi-mā lam usbaq min al-Aḥādīth al-Qudsīyah al-wāridah bi-al-asānīd min Khayr al-Barīyah, murattiban la-hu ʻalá bābayn, al-awwal fīmā ṣaddarahu al-Muṣṭafá, ʻalayhi al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām, bi-lafẓ 'Qāla ʻazza wa-jall', wa-al-thānī fīmā ṣuddira bi-ghayrihā, wa-qawl Allāh taʻālá fī ḍimnihi. Wa-rattabtu kilā al-bābayn ʻalá ḥurūf al-muʻjam, sāʼilahu an yaghfira lī mā irtakabtuhu min al-dhunūb wa-yarḥam, innahu jawwād karīm, raʼūf raḥīm. Wa-sammaytuhu: 'al-Itʹḥāfāt al-sanīyah bi-al-Aḥādīth al-Qudsīyah' ..."

title: 880-02 al-Ḥabāʼik fī akhbār al-malāʼik : manuscript / Jalāl al-Dīn ʻAbd al-Raḥmān ibn Abī Bakr al-Suyūṭī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh jāʻil al-malāʼikah rusulan ulī ajniḥah mathná wa-thulāth wa-rubāʻ, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-al-āl wa-al-ṣuḥb wa-al-atbāʻ. Wa-baʻd, fa-hādhā taʻlīq laṭīf jamaʻtuhu fī akhbār al-malāʼikah al-abrār, istawʻabtu fīhi mā waradat fīhi al-Aḥādīth wa-al-āthār, wa-khatamtuhu bi-fawāʼid yabtahiju bi-hā ulī al-abṣār, wa-sammaytuhu al-Ḥabāʼik fī akhbār al-malāʼik. Wa-Allāh al-mustaʻān wa-ʻalayh al-tuklān ..."

title: 880-02 Kunūz al-asrār fī al-ṣalāh ʻalá al-Nabī al-Mukhtār : manuscript / ʻAbd Allāh al-Khayyāṭ ibn Muḥammad al-Hārūshī al-Maghribī al-Fāsī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ālihi wa-sallam. Kitāb Kunūz al-asrār. al-Ḥamdu lillāh fātiḥ kunūz al-asrār li-awliyāʼihi al-ṣāliḥīn, wa-māniḥ futūḥāt al-istibṣār li-man taqarraba ilayhi bi-al-ṣalāh ʻalá Sayyid al-Mursalīn, wa-kāshif al-ḥujub wa-al-astār li-man jaʻalahā hijjīrāhu fī kull waqt wa-ḥīn, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá al-Nabī al-Mukhtār wa-ʻalá ālihi al-ṭayyibīn al-ṭāhirīn. Wa-baʻd, fa-yaqūlu aḥwaj al-wará li-ʻafw rabbihi wa-maghfiratih, ʻAbd Allāh al-Khayyāṭ ibn Muḥammad al-Hārūshī al-Maghribī al-Fāsī manshaʼan wa-dāran, thumma al-Tūnisī riḥlatan wa-mazāran: Hādhihi ṣalawāt jayyidāt ʻaẓīmat al-ujūr wa-al-mathūbāt, tumḥaqu bi-hā, in shāʼ Allāh, al-sayyiʼāt, wa-tanmū al-ḥasanāt, wa-turfaʻu bi-hā al-darajāt, jamaʻtuhā maḥabbatan fī Sayyid al-Sādāt, wa-afḍal ahl al-araḍīn wa-al-samāwāt, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-aṣḥābihi al-hudāt ... wa-sammaytuhā bi-Kunūz al-asrār fī al-ṣalāh ʻalá al-Nabī al-Mukhtār ..."

title: 880-03 al-Muʻjam al-wajīz min Aḥādīth al-Rasūl al-ʻAzīz : manuscript / ʻAbd Allāh ibn Ibrāhīm al-Mīrghanī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh ḥaqqa ḥamdih, wa-kamā yanbaghī li-kamāl kibriyāʼih wa-majdih, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Rasūlih wa-ʻabdih wa-jamīʻ man ursila min ʻindih, al-nāṭiqīn bi-jawāhir al-durar, wa-al-mursalīn bi-anwār al-ghurar, wa-ʻalá āl al-mafākhir wa-aṣḥāb al-mashāʻir, wa-ʻalá kull awwal wa-ākhir, wa-bāṭin wa-ẓāhir. Wa-ashhadu an lā ilāh illā Allāh al-wāḥid al-akbar, wa-ashhadu anna Muḥammadan Rasūl Allāh, al-ḥabīb al-afkhar, ʻalayhi min al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām al-aʻṭar. Ammā baʻd, fa-hādhā 'al-Muʻjam al-wajīz min Aḥādīth al-Rasūl al-ʻAzīz' iltaqaṭtuhu min akmām al-anwār wa-anwār al-azʹhār lil-ittiʻāẓ wa-al-ihtidāʼ wa-al-istirshād wa-al-iqtidāʼ, fa-inna khayr al-hady hadyu Muḥammad ..."

title: 880-02 Sharḥ Nukhbat al-fikr fī muṣṭalaḥ ahl al-athar : manuscript / Aḥmad ibn ʻAlī ibn Ḥajar al-ʻAsqalānī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī lam yazal ʻāliman qadīran, ḥayyan qayyūman, samīʻan baṣīran. Wa-ashhadu an lā ilāha illā Allāh waḥdahu lā sharīka la-hu, wa-ukabbiruhu takbīran, wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad alladhī arsalahu ilá al-nās kāffatan bashīran wa-nadhīran, wa-ʻalá āl Muḥammad wa-ṣaḥbihi, wa-sallama taslīman kathīran. Ammā baʻd, fa-inna al-taṣānīf fī iṣṭilāḥ ahl al-Ḥadīth qad kathurat lil-aʼimmah fī al-qadīm wa-al-ḥadīth, fa-min awwal man ṣannafa fī dhālika al-Qāḍī Abū Muḥammad al-Rāmhurmuzī fī kitābih 'al-Muḥaddith al-fāḍil', lākinnahu lam yastawʻib ... fa-saʼalanī baʻḍ al-ikhwān an ulakhkhiṣa min dhālika al-muhimm, fa-lakhkhaṣtuhu fī awrāq laṭīfah sammaytuhā 'Nukhbat al-fikr fī muṣṭalaḥ ahl al-athar', ʻalá tartīb ibtakartuhu wa-sabīl intahajtuhu ... fa-raghiba ilayya thāniyan an aḍaʻa ʻalayhā sharḥan yaḥullu rumūzahā, wa-yaftaḥu kunūzahā, wa-yūḍiḥu mā khafiya ʻalá al-mubtadī min dhālika, fa-ajabtuhu ilá suʼālihi ..."

title: 880-02 Sharḥ ʻUqūd al-jumān fī ʻilm al-maʻānī wa-al-bayān : manuscript / Jalāl al-Dīn ʻAbd al-Raḥmān al-Suyūṭī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh al-munazzah ʻan al-mumāthalah wa-al-tashbīh, wa-ashhadu an lā ilāh [illā] Allāh waḥdahu lā sharīka la-h, shahādata mukhliṣ fī al-tanzīh, wa-ashhadu anna Muḥammadan ʻabduhu wa-rasūluh, dhū al-muʻjizāt allatī lā yaʻtarīhā shawb al-tamwīh, ṣallá [Allāh] wa-sallama ʻalayh wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-ʻithratih [wa-ʻitratih] wa-dhurrihi [wa-dhurrīyatih]. Hādhā taʻlīq ʻallaqtuhu li-yuntafaʻa bi-hi fī ḥall urjūzatī allatī naẓamtuhā fī ʻilm al-maʻānī wa-al-bayān wa-sammaytuhā ʻUqūd al-jumān, idh lam yattasiʻ waqtī li-kitābat sharḥ ʻalayh kamā artaḍīh, maʻa ilḥāḥ qārīhi ʻalayya fī dhālik, fa-najaztu la-hum hādhihi al-ʻujālah li-tuʻīnahum ʻalá fahm maqāṣidihā. Wa-billāh astaʻīn fī maṣādir al-umūr wa-mawāridihā ..."

title: 880-02 al-Kashf al-mubīn al-mulakhkhaṣ min al-Shabrakhītī ʻalá al-Arbaʻīn : manuscript / Qāsim ʻAmmār al-Zawāwī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi nastaʻīn. Rabbi yassir. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī waffaqa li-ḥaml al-Ḥadīth man iṣṭafāhu min al-anām, wa-hadá man irtaḍāhu li-fahm mā fīhi min al-aḥkām, wa-ashhadu an lā ilāha illā Allāh, waḥdahu, lā sharīka la-h, al-Malik al-ʻallām, wa-ashhadu anna Sayyidanā Muḥammadan ʻabduhu wa-rasūluh alladhī ūtiya jawāmiʻ al-kalim wa-badāyiʻ al-ḥikam al-ʻiẓām, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥābatihi al-kirām, ṣalātan mutaḍāʻifah ʻalá mamarr al-shuhūr wa-al-aʻwām, wa-sallama taslīman. Wa-baʻd, fa-inna ūlá mā unfiqat fīhi min nafāʼis al-aʻmār wa-istuʻmilat fīhi al-afkār wa-al-asmāʻ wa-al-abṣār Ḥadīth Rasūl Allāh, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam, wa-kānat al-Arbaʻūn allatī allafahā walī Allāh al-ʻAllāmah Muḥyī al-Dīn Abū Zakarīyā Yaḥyá ibn Sharaf al-Dīn al-Nawāwī min jawāmiʻ kalimihi, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam ... wa-kāna sharḥ al-ʻAllāmah Sayyidī Ibrāhīm ibn Marʻī ibn ʻAṭīyah al-Shabrākhītī al-Mālikī min aḥsan mā ṣunnifa ʻalayhā min al-shurrāḥ ... lākin, lammā kānat ʻibāratuhu ṭawīlah ... fa-aḥbabtu an ulakhkhiṣa minhu mā tadʻū al-ḥājah ilayh ... wa-sammaytuhu bi-al-Kashf al-mubīn al-mulakhkhaṣ min al-Shabrakhītī ʻalá al-Arbaʻīn ..."

title: 880-02 Mawlid al-Nabī : manuscript / Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad al-Dardīr.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh al-wājib al-wujūd, al-wāsiʻ al-karam wa-al-jūd, al-munazzah ʻan al-wālid wa-al-mawlūd, alladhī baʻatha fīnā nabīyahu wa-ḥabībahu Muḥammadan, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam, bi-al-āyāt al-bayyināt wa-al-muʻjizāt al-bāhirāt, fa-aẓhara bi-hi dīnahu al-qawīm, wa-hadá bi-hi [ilá] al-ṣirāṭ al-mustaqīm, wa-khaṣṣahu bi-al-shafāʻah al-ʻuẓmá wa-al-maqām al-asmá, wa-akhadha ʻan anbiyāʼihi al-mawāthīq wa-al-ʻuhūd: La-in jāʼakum rasūl muṣaddiq li-mā maʻakum la-tuʼminunna bi-hi wa-li-tanṣurannahu ḥattá yuballigha risālat al-Malik al-maʻbūd. Fa-lammā aqarrū bi-dhālika, qāl: Ishhadū wa-anā maʻakum min al-shāhidīn, fa-dalla dhālika ʻalá annahu afḍal khalq Allāh wa-ashraf rusul Allāh ..."

title: 880-02 al-Shifā bi-taʻrīf ḥuqūq al-Muṣṭafá : manuscript / ʻIyāḍ ibn Mūsá ibn ʻIyāḍ al-Yaḥṣubī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Qāla al-Faqīh al-Qāḍī al-Imām Abū al-Faḍl ʻIyāḍ ibn Mūsá ibn ʻIyāḍ al-Yaḥṣubī, raḍiya Allāh ʻanh: al-Ḥamdu lillāh al-munfarid bi-ismihi al-asmá, al-mukhtaṣṣ bi-al-mulk al-aʻazz al-aḥmá, alladhī laysa dūnahu muntahá, wa-lā warāʼahu marmá, al-ẓāhir lā takhayyulan wa-lā wahman, wa-al-bāṭin taqddusan lā ʻadman, wasiʻa kull shayʼ raḥmatan wa-ʻilaman, wa-asbagha ʻalá awliyāʼihi niʻaman ʻammā, wa-baʻatha fīhim rasūlan min anfusihim ..."

title: 880-02 al-Shifā bi-taʻrīf ḥuqūq al-Muṣṭafá : manuscript / ʻIyāḍ ibn Mūsá ibn ʻIyāḍ al-Yaḥṣubī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallam. Qāla al-Qāḍī al-Imām al-ḥāfiẓ, muḥyī al-Sunnah, Abū al-Faḍl ʻIyāḍ ibn Mūsá ibn ʻIyāḍ al-Yaḥṣubī, raḍiya Allāh ʻanh wa-arḍāh: al-Ḥamdu lillāh al-munfarid bi-ismihi al-asmá, al-mukhtaṣṣ bi-al-mulk al-aʻazz al-aḥmā [al-aḥmá], alladhī laysa dūnahu muntahá, wa-lā warāʼahu marmá, al-ẓāhir, yaqīnan wa-qaṭʻan, lā takhayyulan wa-wahman, wa-al-bāṭin taqddusan lā ʻadaman, wasiʻa kull shayʼ raḥmatan [wa-]ʻilaman, wa-asbagha ʻalá awliyāʼihi niʻaman ʻamman, wa-baʻatha fīhim rasūlan min anfusihim, ʻAraban wa-ʻajaban [wa-ʻAjaman], wa-azkāhum maḥtidan wa-manmá ..."

title: 880-02 Mukhtaṣar Bahjat al-sāmiʻīn wa-al-nāẓirīn bi-Mawlid Sayyid al-awwalīn wa-al-ākhirīn : manuscript / Ḥasan ibn ʻAlī al-Madābighī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Yaqūlu al-faqīr ilá Mawlāhu al-ʻAlī, Ḥasan ibn ʻAlī al-Shāfiʻī al-Azʹharī al-Madābighī: Qad suʼiltu fī ikhtiṣār al-Mawlid al-Sharīf lil-Najm al-Ghayṭī, fa-ajabtu ilá dhālika wa-zidtuhu fawāʼid ḥasbamā fataḥa bi-hi al-Qādir al-Mālik, fa-qultu: al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī anāra al-wujūd bi-mawlid Sayyid al-Mursalīn, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-al-tābiʻīn lahum bi-iḥsān ilá yawm al-dīn. Ammā baʻd, fa-inna shahr Rabīʻ al-Awwal ikhtaṣṣa bi-minqabah ʻaẓīmah fāqa bi-hā ʻalá sāʼir al-shuhūr, wa-fāza bi-karāmah kubrá ṣāra bi-hā madhkūran ʻalá mamarr al-duhūr ..."

title: 880-02 al-Shifā bi-taʻrīf ḥuqūq al-Muṣṭafá : manuscript / ʻIyāḍ ibn Mūsá ibn ʻIyāḍ al-Yaḥṣubī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallam. Qāla al-Shaykh al-Faqīh al-Imām al-Qāḍī al-awḥad, Abū al-Faḍl ʻIyāḍ ibn Mūsá ibn ʻIyāḍ al-Yaḥṣubī, raḍiya Allāh ʻanh: al-Ḥamdu lillāh al-munfarid bi-ismihi al-asmá, al-mukhtaṣṣ bi-al-mulk al-aʻazz al-aḥmá, alladhī laysa dūnahu muntahá, wa-lā warāʼahu marmá, al-ẓāhir lā takhayyulan wa-wahman, wa-al-bāṭin taqddusan lā ʻudman, wasiʻa kulla shayʼ raḥmatan wa-ʻilaman, wa-asbagha ʻalá awliyāʼihi niʻaman ʻumman, wa-baʻatha fīhim rasūlan min anfusihim, ʻAraban wa-ʻAjaman, wa-azkāhum maḥtidan wa-manmá wa-arjaḥahum ʻaqlan wa-ḥilman ..."

title: 880-02 al-Āyāt al-ʻaẓīmah al-bāhirah fī miʻrāj Sayyid al-dunyā wa-al-ākhirah : manuscript / ʻAlī ibn Muḥammad al-Ujhūrī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá man lā nabī baʻdah. Qāla al-Shaykh al-Imām, al-ʻālim al-ʻallāmah, al-ruḥalah al-fahhāmah, ḥāfiẓ ʻaṣrih wa-zamānih, wa-faylasūf waqtihi wa-awānih, ʻumdat al-muḥaddithīn, wa-nukhbat al-fuqahāʼ wa-al-mufassirīn, khātimat al-ḥuffāẓ wa-al-muḥaqqiqīn, zayn al-millah wa-al-dīn, Abū al-Irshād, ʻAlī al-Ujhūrī al-Mālikī, laṭafa Allāh bi-hi fī al-dārayn wa-adhhaba ʻan qalbihi al-zaygh wa-al-dayn [wa-al-mayn], bi-Muḥammad wa-ālihi. Āmīn. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī rafaʻa Sayyidanā Muḥammadan, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam, ilá aʻlá al-maqāmāt, wa-raqqāhu ilá al-Rafīq al-Aʻlá ashraf al-darajāt, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-shīʻatih wa-wārithīhi wa-ḥizbihi mā tawālat al-awqāt ..."

title: 880-02 Mukhtaṣar Bahjat al-sāmiʻīn wa-al-nāẓirīn bi-Mawlid Sayyid al-awwalīn wa-al-ākhirīn : manuscript / Ḥasan ibn ʻAlī al-Madābighī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Qāla al-faqīr ilá Mawlāhu al-ʻAlī, Ḥasan ibn ʻAlī al-Shāfiʻī al-Azʹharī al-Madābighī: Qad suʼiltu fī al-ikhtiṣār [ikhtiṣār] al-Mawlid al-Sharīf lil-Najm al-Ghayṭī, fa-ajabtu ilá dhālika wa-zidtuhu fawāʼid ḥasbamā fataḥa bi-hi al-Qādir al-Malik, fa-qultu: [al-Ḥamdu] lillāh alladhī anāra al-wujūd bi-mawlid Sayyid al-Mursalīn, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam, wa-ʻalá [ālihi wa-]ṣaḥbihi wa-al-tābiʻīn lahum bi-iḥsān ilá yawm al-dīn. [Ammā baʻd], fa-inna shahr Rabīʻ al-Awwal ikhtaṣṣa bi-minqabah ʻaẓīmah, fāqa bi-hā ʻalá sāʼir al-shuhūr, wa-fāza bi-karāmah kubrá, ṣāra bi-hā madhkūran ʻalá mamarr al-duhūr ..."

title: 880-02 Taqyīdāt ʻalá Mawlid al-Muṣṭafá : manuscript / ʻAlī al-Shinnāwī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm wa-bi-hi nastaʻīn. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallam. al-Ḥamdu lillāh māniḥ al-ṣawāb, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad arqá al-akhillāʼ wa-al-aḥbāb, wa-ashhadu an lā ilāha illā Allāh, waḥdahu lā sharīka la-h, shahādata ʻabdin awwāb, wa-ashhadu anna Sayyidinā Muḥammadan ʻabduhu wa-rasūluh, al-wasīlah la-nā wa-al-bāb. Wa-baʻd, fayaqūlu rājī satr al-masāwī, al-faqīr ʻAlī al-Shinnāwī al-Sharqāwī: Hādhihi Taqyīdāt ʻalá Mawlid al-Muṣṭafá, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam, al-mansūb lil-ʻAllāmah al-Shaykh Ḥasan al-Madābighī, jamaʻtuhā min muṣannafāt kathīrah li-baʻḍ al-fuḍalāʼ, wa-taqrīrāt li-mashāyikhinā, nafaʻa Allāh bi-hā. Āmīn.

title: 880-03 al-Jāmiʻ al-ṣaḥīḥ. Al-Juzʼ 2 : manuscript / Muḥammad ibn Ismāʻīl al-Bukhārī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi nastaʻīn ʻalá al-qawm al-kāfirīn. Bāb 'Manāqib al-Anṣār wa-alladhīna tabawwaʼū al-dār wa-al-īmān min qablihim, yuḥibbūna man hājara ilayhim wa-lā yajidūna fī ṣudūrihim ḥājah mimmā ūtū, al-Āyah. Ḥaddathanā Muḥammad, qāl, ḥaddathanā Mūsá ibn Ismāʻīl, qāl, ḥaddathanā Mahdī ibn Maymūn, qāl, ḥaddathanā Ghaylān ibn Jarīr, qāl, qultu li-Anas Araʼyata ism al-Anṣār, kadhā yusammawna bi-hi, am sammākum Allāh, tabāraka wa-taʻālá, qāl, Bal sammānā Allāh ʻazza wa-jall. Kunā nadkhulu ʻalá Anas, fa-yuḥaddithunā bi-manāqib al-Anṣār wa-mashāhidihim, wa-yuqbilu ʻalayya, aw ʻalá rajul min al-Azd, fa-yaqūlu faʻala qawmuka yawma kadhā wa-kadhā kadhā wa-kadhā ..."

title: 880-02 al-Fatʹḥ al-mubīn bi-sharḥ al-Arbaʻīn : manuscript / Shihāb al-Dīn Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad ibn Ḥajar al-Haythamī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm wa-bi-hi nastaʻīn. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī waffaqa ṭāʼifah min ʻulamāʼ kull ʻaṣr lil-qiyām bi-aʻbāʼ al-Aḥādīth wa-al-sunnan, wa-mayyazahum ʻalá man siwāhum bi-sulūkihim awḍaḥ al-maḥajjah wa-aqwam al-sanan, wa-ashhadu an lā ilāha illā Allāh waḥdahu lā sharīka la-h, shahādatan antaẓimu fī silkihim wa-atabawwaʼu bi-khulūṣihā sawābigh al-niʻam wa-sawābiq al-minan ..."

title: 880-02 Sharḥ al-Shifā fī taʻrīf ḥuqūq al-Muṣṭafá : manuscript / ʻAlī ibn Sulṭān Muḥammad al-Qārī al-Harawī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī anzala al-Qurʼān shifāʼan li-mā fī al-ṣudūr, wa-hudan wa-raḥmatan lil-muʼminīn, wa-shafā bi-hi man kāna ashfá ʻalá biʼr Jahannam min al-kāfirīn, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Sayyid al-Mursalīn, wa-sanad al-awwalīn wa-al-ākhirīn, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-aṣḥābihi al-ṭayyibīn al-ṭāhirīn, wa-atbāʻihi wa-ashyāʻihi ajmaʻīn, ilá Yawm al-Dīn. Āmīn. Ammā baʻd, fa-yaqūlu afqar al-ʻibād ilá karam Rabbihi al-Bārī, ʻAlī ibn Sulṭān ibn Muḥammad al-Qārī: Lammā raʼaytu kitāb al-Shifāʼ fī shamāʼil Ṣāḥib al-Iṣṭifāʼ ajmaʻ mā ṣunnifa fī bābih mujmalan fī al-istīfāʼ, li-ʻadam imkān al-wuṣūl ilá intihāʼ al-istiqṣāʼ qaṣadtu an akhdumahu bi-sharḥ baʻḍ mā yataʻallaqu bi-hi min taḥqīq al-iʻrāb wa-al-bināʼ, rajāʼ an uslak fī silk masālik al-ʻulamāʼ yawm al-jazāʼ, fa-aqūl, wa-billāh al-tawfīq wa-bi-taʼyīdihi ẓuhūr al-taḥqīq ..."

title: 880-03 al-Ṭarīqah al-Muḥammadīyah : manuscript / Muḥammad ibn Bīr ʻAlī al-Burkawī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi nastaʻīn. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī jaʻalanā ummatan wasaṭan, khayra umam, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá afḍal man ūliya al-nubūwah wa-al-ḥukm, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-aṣḥābihi al-muqtadīn bi-hi fī al-qaṣd wa-al-shiyam, mā dāmat al-samāwāt wa-al-arḍ, wa-mā taʻāqabat al-aḍwāʼ wa-al-ẓulam. Wa-baʻd, fa-inna al-ʻaql wa-al-naql mutawāfiqān, wa-al-Kitāb wa-al-Sunnah mutaṭābiqān ..."

title: 880-03 al-Jāmiʻ al-ṣaghīr min Ḥadīth al-bashīr al-nadhīr : manuscript / Jalāl al-Dīn ʻAbd al-Raḥmān ibn Abī Bakr al-Suyūṭī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī baʻatha ʻalá raʼs kull miʼat sanah man yujaddidu li-hādhihi al-ummah amr dīnihā, wa-aqāma fī kull ʻaṣr man yaḥūṭu hādhihi al-millah bi-tashdīd arkānihā wa-taʼyīd sunanihā wa-tabyīnihā, wa-ashhadu an lā ilāha illā Allāh waḥdahu lā sharīka lah, shahādatan yuzīlu al-shukūk ṣubḥ yaqīnihā, wa-ashhadu anna Sayyidinā Muḥammadan ʻabduhu wa-rasūluh, al-mabʻūth li-rafʻ kalimat al-īmān wa-tashyīdihā, wa-khafḍ kalimat al-kufr wa-tawhīnihā, ṣallá Allāh wa-sallama ʻalayhi wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi, luyūth al-ghābah wa-usd ʻarīnihā. Hādhā kitābun awdaʻtu fīhi min al-kalim al-Nabawīyah ulūfan, wa-hiya 10934, wa-min al-ḥikam al-Muṣṭafawīyah ṣunūfan, iqtaṣartu fīhi min maʻādin al-athar ibrīzahu ... wa-rattabtuhu ʻalá ḥurūf al-muʻjam murāʻiyan awwal al-Ḥadīth fa-mā baʻdahu, tashīlan ʻalá al-ṭullāb ..."

title: 880-02 Ḍiyāʼ al-qulūb sharḥ Jalāʼ al-qulūb : manuscript / Isʹḥāq ibn Ḥasan al-Zanjānī al-Tūqātī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī jaʻala al-layl libāsan wa-al-nahār nushūran, wa-ʻayyana awqāt al-ʻibādah ayyāman wa-shuhūran, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá man muliʼa bi-hi al-ʻālam nuḍratan wa-surūran, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-aṣḥābihi alladhīna kāna saʻyuhum mashkūran, kamā kāna dhālika fī al-kitāb masṭūran, mā dāma al-shahādah an yakūna madhkūran. Ammā baʻd, fa-yaqūlu al-ʻabd al-jānī Isʹḥāq ibn al-Ḥasan al-Zanjānī thumma al-Tūqātī, aḥsana Allāh ḥālahumā fī al-ḥāl wa-al-ātī: Innī ishtaghaltu burhatan min al-ʻumr al-marghūb bi-tadrīs al-risālah al-musammāh bi-Jalāʼ al-qulūb, al-lāʼiq an yuqāla fī shaʼnihi kitābun naẓmuhu yaḥkī zulālan, wa-fī faḥwāhu nūrun qad talaʼlaʼa, kitābun fākhirun ka-al-durr lafẓan ... lil-ʻālim al-ʻāmil al-qawī Muḥammad ibn Bīr ʻAlī al-Burkawī ... thumma sammaytuhu bi-Ḍiyāʼ al-qulūb ..."

title: 880-02 Taḥqīq al-maqām ʻalá Kifāyat al-ʻawāmm fīmā yajibu ʻalayhim min ʻilm al-kalām : manuscript / Ibrāhīm ibn Muḥammad al-Bājūrī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh al-ʻālim bi-al-kullīyāt wa-al-juzʼīyāt, al-muttaṣif, subḥānuhu wa-taʻālá, bi-jamīʻ al-kamālāt, wa-ashhadu an lā ilāha illā Allāh, al-mukhālif lil-ḥawādith fī al-dhāt wa-al-ṣifāt, wa-ashhadu anna Sayyidanā Muḥammadan ʻabduhu wa-rasūluh, afḍal al-makhlūqāt, ṣallá Allāh wa-sallama ʻalayhi wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi dhawī al-majd wa-al-karāmāt, ṣalātan wa-salāman dāʼimayn, nanjū bihimā min al-fitānāt. Wa-baʻd, fa-yaqūlu al-faqīr ilá raḥmat Rabbih Ibrāhīm al-Bājūrī al-ḍaʻīf ibn Muḥammad, ghafara la-hu al-karīm al-laṭīf: Qad ṭalaba min Shaykhinā al-ʻālim al-ʻallāmah, al-ḥabr al-baḥr al-fahhāmah, man huwa lil-khiṣāl al-ḥamīdah wālī, Mawlānā al-Shaykh Muḥammad al-Faḍālī, baʻḍ al-ikhwān kitābatan ʻalá risālatihi al-musammāh bi-Kifāyat al-ʻawām fīmā yajibu ʻalayhim min ʻilm al-kalām, fa-adhina lī al-Shaykh fī al-kitābah ʻalayhā, fa-insharaḥa ṣadrī li-dhālik, wa-Allāh aʻlam bi-mā hunālik, fa-ʻallaqtu ʻalayhā kalimāt laṭīfah, bi-ʻibārah mustaḥsanah sharīfah, fa-jāʼat bi-ḥamd Allāh ḥāshiyah nāfiʻah wa-arjū an takūna bi-al-qabūl sāṭiʻah, wa-sammaytuhā Taḥqīq al-maqām ʻalá Kifāyat al-ʻawāmm fīmā yajibu ʻalayhim min ʻilm al-kalām ..."

title: 880-03 Kifāyat al-ʻawāmm fīmā yajibu ʻalayhim min ʻilm al-kalām : manuscript / Muḥammad ibn Shāfiʻī al-Faḍālī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh al-munfarid bi-al-ījād, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad afḍal al-ʻibād, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-aṣḥābih ulī al-bahjah wa-al-rashād. Wa-baʻd, fa-yaqūlu al-ʻabd al-faqīr ilá raḥmat Rabbihi al-mutaʻālī, Muḥammad ibn al-Shāfiʻī al-Faḍālī al-Shāfiʻī: Saʼalanī baʻḍ al-ikhwān an uʼallifa risālah fī al-tawḥīd, fa-ajabtuhu ilá dhālik, nāḥiyan naḥwa al-ʻAllāmah al-Sanūsī, fī taqrīr al-barāhīn, ghayra annī ataytu bi-al-dalīl bi-jānib al-madlūl, wa-zidtuhu tawḍīḥan, li-ʻilmī bi-quṣūr hādhā al-ṭālib, fa-jāʼat, bi-ḥamd Allāh, risālatan mufīdah, wa-li-taqrīr mā fīhā mujīdah, wa-sammaytuhā 'Kifāyat al-ʻawāmm fīmā yajibu ʻalayhim min ʻilm al-kalām'. Wa-Allāh asʼalu an yanfaʻa bi-hā, wa-huwa ḥasbī wa-niʻma al-wakīl ..."

title: 880-02 Tawḍīḥ li-kitāb al-Musāyarah fī al-ʻaqāʼid al-munjiyah fī al-ākhirah : manuscript / Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad ibn Abī Sharīf.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Ḥamdan li-man rasama ʻalá ṣafaḥāt al-kāʼināt dalāʼila tawḥīdih, wa-raqama suṭūrahā rasāʼila muʻlinah bi-wujūb wujūdih ilá kāffat ʻabīdih, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá afḍal man ḥabāhu min faḍlihi bi-mazīdih, Muḥammad al-Muṣṭafá, wa-ālihi wa-aṣḥābihi al-qāʼimīn bi-naṣr dīn Allāh wa-taʼyīdih, wa-tābiʻī sunnatihi wa-jamīʻ ṣaḥābatihi fī taqwīm al-ʻaqd wa-tasdīdih. Wa-baʻd, fa-hādhā tawḍīḥ li-Kitāb al-Musāyarah fī al-ʻaqāʼid al-munjiyah fī al-ākhirah, taʼlīf Shaykhinā al-Imām al-ʻAllāmah, awḥad ʻulamāʼ ʻaṣrih, wa-wāsiṭat ʻiqd muḥaqqiqī ʻaṣrih, Kamāl al-Dīn Muḥammad ibn Humām al-Dīn, ʻAbd al-Wāḥid ibn ʻAbd al-Ḥamīd, al-shahīr bi-Ibn al-Humām ..."

title: 880-02 Sharḥ Umm al-barāhīn fī ʻilm al-kalām : manuscript / Muḥammad ibn Manṣūr al-Hudhudī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī shahida bi-wujūdihi jamīʻ al-kāʼināt, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad al-mabʻūth bi-al-āyāt al-wāḍiḥāt, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-al-tābiʻīn la-hum fī al-karāmāt ilá Yawm al-Dīn. al-Ḥamdu lillāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Rasūl Allāh. al-Ḥamd huwa al-thanāʼ bi-al-lisān bi-al-jamīl min al-awṣāf, aw al-afʻāl, ka-al-ʻilm wa-al-jūd bi-al-minan, wa-huwa ḍidd al-dhamm ..."

title: 880-02 Ḥāshiyat al-Sharqāwī ʻalá Sharḥ al-Hudhudī ʻalá Umm al-barāhīn : manuscript / ʻAbd Allāh ibn Ḥijāzī al-Sharqāwī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi nastaʻīn. al-Ḥamdu lillāh al-mutawaḥḥid fī dhātih, al-mutanazzih fī nuʻūt jabarūtih ʻan shawāʼib al-naqṣ wa-simātih, al-faʻʻāl li-mā yurīdu, fa-lā muʻāriḍ li-mā qaḍāhu, wa-lā rādda li-hibātih, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wāsiṭat ʻiqd al-nabīyīn wa-al-mursalīn, al-ṣādiq, al-muballigh li-amr Rabbih al-amīn, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-aṣḥābihi wa-al-tābiʻīn wa-tābiʻīhim bi-iḥsān ilá Yawm al-Dīn. Wa-baʻd, fa-yaqūlu kathīr al-masāwī ʻAbd Allāh ibn Ḥijāzī al-mashhūr bi-al-Sharqāwī: Qad ṭalab minnī baʻḍ al-ikhwān an aktuba ʻalá Sharḥ al-ʻAllāmah al-Shaykh Muḥammad ibn Manṣūr al-Hudhudī ʻalá Umm al-barāhīn, al-musammāh bi-al-Ṣughrá, lil-ʻAllāmah Abī ʻAbd Allāh Muḥammad ibn al-Walī al-Ṣāliḥ Yūsuf al-Sanūsī al-Mālikī al-Maghribī al-Tilimsānī, ḥāshiyatan tataḍammanu tawḍīḥ mā katabahu ʻalayhi [ʻalayhā] Shaykhunā ʻallāmat al-zamān, wa-farīd al-ʻaṣr wa-al-awān, Shaykh al-Islām, al-Shaykh ʻAlī al-ʻAdawī al-Ṣaʻīdī, li-quṣūr fahm ghālib al-nās ʻan istiṭlāʻ ṭawāliʻ dhālik ..."

title: 880-02 Itḥāf al-murīd bi-Jawharat al-tawḥīd : manuscript / ʻAbd al-Salām ibn Ibrāhīm al-Laqānī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi thiqatī. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī rafaʻa li-ahl al-sunnah al-Muḥammadīyah fī al-khāfiqayn aʻlāman, wa-waḍaʻa bi-wāḍiḥ adillatihim min shubah al-mukhālifīn aʻlāman, wa-ashhadu an lā ilāha illā Allāh waḥdahu lā sharīka la-hu, shahādatan takūnu bi-al-takhalluṣ fī al-dārayn iʻlāman, wa-ashhadu anna Sayyidinā Muḥammadan ʻabduhu wa-rasūluh, al-mamnūḥ man ittabaʻahu al-jinān aʻlāman, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-ālihi wa-aṣḥābihi, mā badat qawāʻid al-ʻaqāʼid, wa-mā ḥulliyat al-ḥayāh bi-jawāhir al-farāʼid ..."

title: 880-02 al-Rawḍ al-unuf : manuscript / ʻAbd al-Raḥmān ibn ʻAbd Allāh al-Suhaylī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. [...] Qāla al-Shaykh al-faqīh al-ḥāfiẓ al-Muḥaddith Abū al-Qāsim ʻAbd al-Raḥmān ibn ʻAbd Allāh ibn Aḥmad ibn Abī al-Ḥasan al-Ḥanafī [al-Khathʻamī], thumma al-Suhaylī, raḍiya Allāh ʻanhu: Ḥamdan lillāh muqaddam ʻalá kull amr dhī bāl, wa-dhikruhu, subḥānuhu, ḥarīyun lā [allā] yufāriqa al-khalad wa-al-bāl, kamā badaʼa, jalla wa-ʻalā, bi-jazīl ʻawārifih qabla al-ḍarāʻat ilayhi wa-al-ibtihāl. Fa-la-hu al-ḥamd, taʻālá, ḥamdan lā yazāl dāʼim al-iqtibāl, ḍāfī al-sirbāl, jadīdan ʻalá marr al-jadīdayn, ghayra bāl. ʻAlá anna ḥamdahu, subḥānuhu, ʻalá niʻamihi wa-jamīl balāʼihi minnah min minanihi, wa-ālāʼ min ālāʼihi, fa-subḥāna man lā ghāyah bi-jūdihi wa-naʻmāʼihi, wa-lā ḥadda <li-asmāʼih> li-jalālih, wa-lā ḥaṣr li-asmāʼih. Wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh alladhī alḥaqanā bi-ʻiṣābat al-muwaḥḥidīn wa-waffaqanā lil-iʻtiṣām bi-ʻurwat hādhā al-amr al-matīn, wa-jaʻalanā fī ibbān barakāt ashraf al-mursalīn ..."

title: 880-02 Nuzʹhat al-arwāḥ fī baʻḍ awṣāf al-Jannah dār al-afrāḥ : manuscript / Yūsuf ibn Saʻīd al-Ṣafatī al-Mālikī al-Azʹharī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī jaʻala al-Jannah manzilan li-ʻibādih al-muʼminīn, wa-khaṣṣahum fīhā bi-mazīd al-iḥsān, wa-ashhadu an lā ilāha illā Allāh waḥdahu lā sharīka lah, shahādatan man qālahā khāliṣan mukhliṣan min qablihi [qalbihi] dakhala al-Jannah, wa-muttiʻa fīhā bi-al-ḥūr wa-al-wildān, wa-ashhadu anna Sayyidinā Muḥammadan ʻabudhu wa-rasūluhu, awwal man yadkhul al-Jannah wa-yaftaḥu la-hu Riḍwān ... Ammā baʻd, fa-yaqūlu al-ʻabd al-faqīr ilá Mawlāh al-qadīr Yūsuf [ibn] Saʻīd al-Ṣafatī al-Mālikī ... Hādhihi risālah laṭīfah fī baʻḍ awṣāf al-Jannah, jamaʻtuhā min kutub al-mufassirīn wa-min Jādhib al-arwāḥ li-Ibn al-Qayyim ..."

title: 880-03 al-Jāmiʻ al-ṣaḥīḥ. Al-Juzʼ 9 : manuscript / Muḥammad ibn Ismāʻīl al-Bukhārī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Bāb 'Luḥūm al-ḥumur al-unsīyah'. Fīhi ʻan Salamah ʻan al-Nabī, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam: Ḥaddathanā Ṣadaqah, akhbaranā ʻAbdah ʻan ʻUbayd Allāh ʻan Sālim wa-Nāfiʻ ʻan Ibn ʻUmar, raḍiya Allāh ʻanhumā: Nahá al-Nabī, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam, ʻan luḥūm al-ḥumur al-ahlīyah Yawm Khaybar ..."

title: 880-03 Matn Alfīyat al-Shaykh al-ʻIrāqī fī muṣṭalaḥ al-Ḥadīth : manuscript / ʻAbd al-Raḥīm ibn al-Ḥusayn al-ʻIrāqī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm wa-bi-hi nastaʻīn. Yaqūlu rājī <ʻafwa> Rabbihi al-muqtadiri // ʻAbd al-Raḥīm ibn al-Ḥusayn al-Athar. Min baʻdi ḥamd Allāhi dhī al-ālāʼi // ʻalá imtinānin jalla ʻan iḥṣāʼi ..."

title: 880-02 Sharḥ Alfīyat al-Sīrah : manuscript / ʻAlī ibn Muḥammad al-Ujhūrī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallam. Yaqūlu rājī man ilayhi al-mahrabu // ʻAbd al-Raḥīmi ibni al-Ḥusayni al-mudhnibu. Aḥmadu Rabbī bi-atammi al-ḥamdi // wa-lil-ṣalāti wa-al-salāmi uhdī. Ilá Nabīyihi wa-arjū Allāha // fī najḥ mā saʼaltuhu shifāhā. Min naẓmi Sīrati al-Nabīyi al-amjadi // Alfīyatan ḥāwiyatan lil-maqṣadi. Wa-li-yaʻlami al-ṭālibu anna al-siyara // tajmaʻu mā qad ṣaḥḥa wa-mā qad unkirā ..."

title: 880-02 Sharḥ Gharāmī ṣaḥīḥ : manuscript / Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad al-Amīr al-Kabīr.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ālihi wa-sallam. Yaqūlu mawqūf hawāhu al-khaṭīr, ʻabd Allāh wa-ibn ʻabdihi Muḥammad al-Amīr: Allāhumma rafaʻtu ilayka yadī fī taḥammul ḥamdik, fa-anā aḍʻaf ʻan adāʼih, wa-mithluhu bi-ṣalāh wa-salām ʻalá man tushaddu la-hu maṭāyā ṣaḥīḥ al-gharām, Muḥammad wa-ālihi awliyāihi. Ammā baʻd, fa-lammā kānat baṭālat maqdam al-ḥājj bi-Miṣr, adāma Allāh ḥifẓahumā, aradtu an atadhakkara maʻa al-ikhwān qaṣīdat 'Gharāmī ṣaḥīḥ' fī ʻajal, khawfan min al-baṭālah wa-al-kasal, wa-akhadhtuhā bi-taqayīd bayna bayn, mutaʻarriḍan lil-maʻnayayn, fa-aqūlu: Fawāʼid al-ūlá fī taʻrīf al-nāẓim: Huwa al-Imām al-ḥāfiẓ Shihāb al-Dīn Abū al-ʻAbbās Aḥmad ibn Faraḥ, bi-al-ḥāʼ al-muhmalah, ibn Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad al-Lakhmī al-Ishbīlī, nisbatan li-Ashbal, madīnah bi-al-Andalus ..."

title: 880-02 Sharḥ al-Manẓūmah al-Bayqūnīyah : manuscript / Muḥammad ibn ʻAbd al-Bāqī al-Zurqānī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh al-ʻazīz al-qawī al-ghāfir alladhī naḍḍara aṣḥāb al-Ḥadīth wa-ḥassanahum fī al-qadīm wa-al-ḥadīth, wa-rafaʻa qadrahum fī muḍāriʻ al-azmān wa-al-ghābir, wa-waḍaʻa lahum yawm al-Qiyāmah, ʻulūwan li-shaʼnihim, min nūr, manābir, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá man indaraja taḥta liwāʼ ḥamdihi kull kābir, wa-inqaṭaʻat bi-wujūdihi awṣāl al-shirk, fa-aṣbaḥa wa-huwa dābir, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-aṣḥābihi al-muttafiqīn ʻalá al-hudá, sawāʼun al-akābir wa-al-aṣāghir ... Ammā baʻd, fa-qad saʼalanī baʻḍ al-ikhwān ... an ashraḥa la-hu Manẓūmat al-Bayqūnī fī muṣṭalaḥ al-Ḥadīth ..."

title: 880-03 al-Jāmiʻ al-ṣaḥīḥ. Al-Juzʼ 9 : manuscript / Muḥammad ibn Ismāʻīl al-Bukhārī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Rabbi yassir. Bāb al-Taṣāwīr. Ḥaddathanā Ādam, ḥaddathanā Ibn Abī Dhiʼb, ʻan al-Zuhrī, ʻan ʻUbayd Allāh ibn ʻAbd Allāh, ʻan Ibn ʻAbbās, ʻan Abī Ṭalḥah, qāl, qāla al-Nabī, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam: Lā tadkhulu al-malāʼikah baytan fīhi kalb wa-lā taṣāwīr. Wa-qāla al-Layth: Ḥaddathanī Yūnus ʻan Ibn Shihāb, qāl, akhbaranī ʻUbayd Allāh annahu samiʻa Ibn ʻAbbās, qāl, samiʻtu Abā Ṭalḥah, qāl, samiʻtu al-Nabī, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam. Bāb ʻAdhāb al-muṣawwirīn Yawm al-Qiyāmah ..."

title: 880-03 Sharḥ Ṣaḥīḥ al-Bukhārī. Al-Juzʼ 8 : manuscript / Abū al-Ḥasan ʻAlī ibn Baṭṭāl al-Andalusī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi tawfīqī. Kitāb al-waṣāyā. Bāb al-waṣāyā, wa-qawl al-Nabī, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam: Waṣīyat al-rajul maktūbah ʻindahu. Wa-qāl Allāh, ʻazza wa-jall: Kutiba ʻalaykum idhā ḥaḍara aḥadakum al-mawt, al-āyah. Fīhi, Ibn ʻImrān, al-Nabī, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam, qāl: Mā ḥaqq umriʼin Muslim la-hu shayʼ yuʻṣá fīhi yabītu laylatayn illā waṣīyah maktūbah ʻindahu. Wa-fīhi, ʻAmr ibn al-Ḥārith khatan Rasūl Allāh, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam, akhū Juwayrīyah bint al-Ḥārith ..."

title: 880-02 al-Jawhar al-munaẓẓam fī ziyārat al-qabr al-mukarram : manuscript / Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad ibn Ḥajar al-Haythamī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi nastaʻīn ʻalá al-qawm al-kāfirīn. Naḥmaduka Allāhumma an ahhaltanā -- ʻalá mā fīnā min al-taqṣīr wa-al-taʻāmī ʻan shuhūd āyātik, lāsīyamā wa-qad jāʼa al-nadhīr, wa-al-tabāṭī ʻan al-mubādarah ilá imtithāl awāmirika wa-nawāhīka, wa-al-takhallī ʻan al-taḥallī bi-mā yurḍīka -- lil-safar ilá ziyārat ḥabībika wa-rasūlika wa-nabīyika wa-ṣafīyika wa-khalīlika, insān ʻayn khulafāʼika, wa-wāsiṭat ʻiqd walāʼika ..."

title: 880-02 Itḥāf al-murīd bi-Jawharat al-tawḥīd : manuscript / ʻAbd al-Salām ibn Ibrāhīm al-Laqānī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi thiqatī. al-Ḥamdu lillāh rāfaʻa li-ahl al-sunnah al-Muḥammadīyah fī al-khāfiqayn aʻlāman, waḍaʻa waḍḥ [wa-waḍaʻa bi-wāḍiḥ] adillatihim min shubah al-mukhālifīn aʻlāman, wa-ashhadu an lā ilāha illā Allāh waḥdahu lā sharīka la-hu, shahādatan takūnu bi-al-takhalluṣ fī al-dārayn iʻlāman, wa-ashhadu anna Sayyidinā Muḥammadan ʻabduhu wa-rasūluh, al-mamnūḥ man ittabaʻahu al-jinān aʻlāman, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-aṣḥābihi, mā uyyidat qawāʻid al-ʻaqāʼid, wa-mā ḥulliyat al-jiyād bi-jawāhir al-fawāʼid ..."

title: 880-02 Itḥāf al-murīd bi-Jawharat al-tawḥīd : manuscript / ʻAbd al-Salām ibn Ibrāhīm al-Laqānī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī rafaʻa li-ahl al-sunnah al-Muḥammadīyah fī al-khāfiqayn aʻlāman, wa-waḍaʻa bi-wāḍiḥ adillatihim min shubah al-mukhālifīn aʻlāman, wa-ashhadu an lā ilāha illā Allāh waḥdahu lā sharīka la-hu, shahādatan takūnu bi-al-takhalluṣ fī al-dārayn iʻlāman, wa-ashhadu anna Sayyidinā Muḥammadan ʻabduhu wa-rasūluh, al-mamnūḥ man ittabaʻahu min al-jinān aʻlāman, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-aṣḥābihi, mā uyyidat qawāʻid al-ʻaqāʼid, wa-mā ḥulliyat al-jiyād bi-jawāhir al-farāʼid ..."

title: 880-02 Itḥāf al-murīd bi-Jawharat al-tawḥīd : manuscript / ʻAbd al-Salām ibn Ibrāhīm al-Laqānī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi nastaʻīn. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī rafaʻa li-ahl al-sunnah al-Muḥammadīyah fī al-khāfiqayn aʻlāman, wa-waḍaʻa bi-wāḍiḥ adillatihim min shubah al-mukhālifīn aʻlāman, wa-ashhadu an lā ilāha illā Allāh waḥdahu lā sharīka la-hu, shahādatan takūnu bi-al-takhalluṣ fī al-dārayn iʻlāman, wa-ashhadu anna Sayyidinā Muḥammadan ʻabduhu wa-rasūluh, al-mamnūḥ man ittabaʻahu min al-jinān aʻlāman, ṣallá Allāh wasallama ʻalayhi, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-aṣḥābihi, mā abdat qawāʻid al-ʻaqāʼid, wa-mā ḥulliyat al-jiyād bi-jawāhir al-farāʼid ..."

title: 880-03 al-Ṭarīqah al-Muḥammadīyah : manuscript / Muḥammad ibn Bīr ʻAlī al-Burkawī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī jaʻalanā ummatan wasaṭan, khayra umam, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá afḍal man ūliya al-nubūwah wa-al-ḥukm, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-aṣḥābihi al-muqtadīn bi-hi fī al-qaṣd wa-al-shiyam, mā dāmat al-samāwāt wa-al-arḍ, wa-mā taʻāqabat al-aḍwāʼ wa-al-ẓulam. Wa-baʻd, fa-inna al-ʻaql wa-al-naql mutawāfiqān, wa-al-Kitāb wa-al-Sunnah mutaṭābiqān. Inna al-dunyā fāniyah, sarīʻat al-zawāl wa-al-kharāb, ʻizzuhā dhill, wa-niʻamuhā niqam, wa-sharābuhā sarāb, wa-inna al-dār al-ākhirah la-hiya al-ḥayawān, uʻiddat lil-muttaqīn min ahl al-īmān ..."

title: 880-03 al-Jāmiʻ al-ṣaḥīḥ. Al-Juzʼ 1 : manuscript / Muḥammad ibn Ismāʻīl al-Bukhārī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Qāla al-Shaykh al-Imām al-ḥāfiẓ Abū ʻAbd Allāh Muḥammad ibn Ismāʻīl ibn Ibrāhīm ibn al-Mughīrah al-Bukhārī, Raḥimahu Allāh taʻālá. Āmīn. Bāb Kayafa kāna badʼ al-waḥy ilá Rasūl Allāh, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam, wa-qawl Allāh jalla dhikruhu: Innā awḥaynā ilayka kamā awḥaynā ilá Nūḥin wa-al-nabīyīn min baʻdih. Ḥaddathanā al-Ḥamīdī qāl ḥaddathanā Sufyān qāl ..."

title: 880-02 Ḥāshiyah ʻalá Sharḥ al-ʻAqāʼid al-Nasafīyah : manuscript / Aḥmad ibn Mūsá al-Khayālī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bika iʻtimād [iʻtimādī]. Yā Karīm. Qāla al-shāriḥ al-niḥrīr, ʻāmalahu Allāh bi-luṭfihi al-khaṭīr, baʻdamā tayammana bi-al-tasmīyah, al-Ḥamdu lillāh. Aqūlu: Fī taʻqīb al-tasmiyah bi-al-taḥmīd iqtidāʼ bi-uslūb al-Kitāb al-Majīd, wa-ʻmal bi-mā shāʻ, bal waqaʻa ʻalayhi al-ijmāʻ, wa-imtithāl bi-ḥadīthay al-ibtidāʼ, wa-mā yutawahhamu min taʻāruṣihmā, fa-madfūʻ immā bi-ḥaml al-ibtidāʼ ʻalá al-ʻurfī al-mumtadd, aw bi-ḥaml aḥadihimā ʻalá al-ḥaqīqī wa-al-ākhar ʻalá al-iḍāfī ..."

title: 880-03 Ḥāshiyat al-Ṣāwī ʻalá Jawharat al-tawḥīd : manuscript / Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad al-Ṣāwī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi nastaʻīn. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī manna ʻalaynā bi-al-īmān wa-al-Islām, wa-akhrajanā bihimā min ẓulmat al-shirk wa-al-awhām, wa-ashhad an lā ilāha illā Allāh waḥdahu lā sharīka lah shahādatan addakhiruhā ʻinda al-khitām, wa-ashhadu anna Sayyidanā Muḥammadan ʻabduhu wa-rasūluh sayyid al-anām, ṣallá Allāh wa-sallama ʻalayhi wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-aṣḥābih al-bararah al-kirām, wa-ʻalá ashyākhinā wa-ashyākhihim ilá muntahá al-Islām. Wa-baʻd, fa-yaqūlu al-ʻabd al-faqīr al-murtajī ghafra al-masāwī Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad al-Mālikī al-Khalwatī al-Ṣāwī: Hādhihi Taqyīdāt ʻalá Jawharat al-tawḥīd lil-Imām al-ʻārif billāh taʻālá al-Shaykh Ibrāhīm ibn Ḥasan al-Mālikī al-Laqānī, raʼs silsilat hādhā al-fann, wa-min arbāb al-aḥwāl wa-al-kashf, wa-ʻāsha muddata ʻumrihi lam yura mā taḥta jubbatihi, min baghtah wa-lā ghayrihā, wa-kāna muhāban jiddan lā yukallimuhu illā al-qalīl min al-nās ..."

title: 880-02 Ḥāshiyah ʻalá Sharḥ al-Hudhudī ʻalá matn al-Sanūsīyah : manuscript / ʻAlī ibn Aḥmad al-Ṣaʻīdī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm wa-bi-hi nastaʻīn. al-Ḥamdu lillāh al-wājib al-dawām, al-munfarid bi-al-ījād wa-al-iʻdām, alladhī khalaqa al-insān wa-ʻallamahu al-kalām, wa-anʻama ʻalayhi bi-niʻmatay al-īmān wa-al-Islām, wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-aṣḥābihi wa-al-tābiʻīn lahum bi-iḥsān, ṣalātan wa-salāman dāʼimayan mā dāmat al-duhūr wa-al-azmān. Wa-baʻd, fa-yaqūlu al-faqīr ilá al-Munjī min al-mahālik, ʻAlī ibn Aḥmad al-ʻAdwī, al-Muqtadī bi-al-Imām Mālik: Hādhihi ḥawāshin ʻalá sharḥ al-ʻAllāmah al-Hudhudī ʻalá matn al-ʻAllāmah al-wariʻ al-zāhid, al-jāmiʻ shawārid al-fawāʼid, walī Allāh bi-lā nizāʻ, al-Sanūsī, al-musammá bi-al-ṣughrá, tūḍiḥu mushkilahu, wa-tusahhilu muʻḍilahu, jamaʻtuhā min ḥāshiyat al-ʻAllāmah al-Saktānī [ʻĪsá ibn ʻAbd al-Raḥmān, died 1652], ʻalá sharḥ al-muṣannif, wa-ḥāshiyat al-ʻAllāmah al-Ghunaymī [Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad, died 1634] ʻalayhi ayḍan, wa-ḥāshiyat Shaykhinā al-Ṣaghīr [probably ʻAlī ibn Muḥammad, died 1319 or 1320], raḥimahu Allāh taʻālá, wa-ghayrihā mimmā uṣarriḥu bi-hi wa-mimmā fataḥa bi-hi Rabbunā. Wa-Allāh asʼal an yanfaʻa bi-hā kamā nafaʻa bi-aṣlihā ..."

title: 880-02 Sharḥ al-ʻAqāʼid al-ʻAḍudīyah : manuscript / Muḥammad ibn Asʻad al-Dawwānī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Yā man waffaqanā li-taḥqīq al-ʻaqāʼid al-Islāmīyah, wa-ʻaṣamanā ʻan al-taqlīd fī al-uṣūl wa-al-furūʻ al-kalāmīyah, ṣalli ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad al-muʼayyad bi-qawāṭiʻ al-ḥujaj wa-al-burhān, al-mushayyad bi-lawāmiʻ al-sayf wa-al-sinān, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-aṣḥābihi al-aʻyān al-mubashsharīn bi-al-dukhūl wa-al-khulūd fī ghuraf al-jinān. Wa-baʻd, fa-yaqūl al-faqīr ilá ʻafw Rabbihi al-ghanī, Muḥammad ibn Asʻad al-Ṣiddīqī al-Dawwānī, mallakahu Allāh nawāṣī al-amānī: Inna al-ʻAqāʼid al-ʻAḍudīyah lam tadaʻ qāʻidah min uṣūl al-ʻaqāʼid al-dīnīyah illā wa-atat ʻalayhā, wa-lam tatruk min ummahātihā wa-muhimmātihā masʼalah illā wa-qad ṣarraḥat bi-hā, aw awmaʼat ilayhā ..."

title: 880-03 Ṣafwat al-Zubad fīmā ʻalayhi al-muʻtamad : manuscript / Aḥmad ibn Ḥusayn ibn Raslān al-Ramlī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh dhī al-jalāli // wa-Shāriʻi al-ḥarām wa-al-ḥalāli. Thumma ṣalāti Allāhi maʻ salāmī // ʻalá al-Nabī al-Muṣṭafá al-Tihāmī ..."

title: 880-02 al-Ṣawāʻiq al-muḥriqah fī al-radd ʻalá al-zanādiqah wa-ahl al-ḍalāl wa-al-mubdiʻah : manuscript / Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad ibn Ḥajar al-Haythamī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Rabbi yassir. Yā Karīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī ikhtaṣṣa Nabīyahu Muḥammad, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam, bi-aṣḥāb ka-al-nujūm, fa-awjaba ʻalá al-kāffah taʻẓīmahum wa-iqtifāʼ ḥaqīqat mā kānū ʻalayhi li-mā muniḥūhu min ḥaqāʼiq al-maʻārif wa-al-ʻulūm. Wa-ashhadu an lā ilāha illā Allāh waḥdahu, lā sharīka lah, shahādatan andariju bi-hā fī silkihim al-manẓūm. Wa-ashhadu anna Sayyidinā Muḥammadan ʻabduhu wa-rasūluh alladhī ḥabāhu bi-sirrihi al-maktūm al-Ḥayy al-Qayyūm. Wa-baʻd, fa-innī suʼiltu qadīman fī taʼlīf kitāb yubayyinu ḥaqīqat khilāfat al-Ṣiddīq wa-imārat Ibn al-Khaṭṭāb, fa-ajabtu ilá dhālika musāriʻan fī khidmat hādhā al-jināb ..."

title: 880-02 Taʻlīq ʻalá al-Manẓūmah fī uṣūl al-dīn : manuscript / ʻAlī ibn Muḥammad al-Ujuhūrī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn, wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad khātim al-nabīyīn wa-al-mursalīn, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi ajamʻīn. Wa-baʻd, fa-hādhā taʻlīq laṭīf waḍaʻtuhu ʻalá al-manẓūmah allatī allaftuhā fī uṣūl al-dīn, nāfiʻ in shāʼa Allāh taʻālá ..."

title: 880-01 Sharḥ al-Muqaddimah fī al-ṣalāh : manuscript / Naṣr ibn Muḥammad Abū al-Layth al-Samarqandī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh. Ay, al-thanāʼ wa-al-shukr lillāh bi-inʻāmih. Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn. Ay, mālik al-khalāʼiq ajmaʻīn, wa-qīla mudabbiruhum, wa-qīla walīyuhum, kadhā fī Gharāʼib al-Qurʼān. Wa-al-ʻāqibah lil-muttaqīn. Ay, al-ʻāqibah al-muḥammadah, aw, al-saʻādah al-sarmadīyah li-alladhīna yattaqūn Allāh taʻālá wa-yaḥdharūna ʻiqābah bi-ṭāʻah, wa-fassarahā Qatādah bi-al-Jannah. Thmma inna al-taqwá qismān ..."

title: 880-02 al-ʻAqīdah al-wusṭá : manuscript / Muḥammad ibn Yūsuf al-Sanūsī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi thiqatī. al-Ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-salām [wa-al-salām] ʻalá Sayyidinā wa-Mawlānā Muḥammad khātim al-nabīyīn wa-imām al-mursalīn, wa-raḍiya Allāh taʻālá ʻan aṣḥāb Rasūl Allāh ajmaʻīn, wa-man tabiʻahum bi-iḥsān ilá Yawm al-Dīn. Wa-baʻd, fa-hādhihi jumāl [jumal] mukhtaṣarah, yakhruju al-mukallaf bi-fahmihā, in shāʼa Allāh taʻālá, min al-taqlīd al-mukhtalaf fī īmān ṣāḥibihi, ilá al-naẓar al-ṣaḥīḥ, al-mujmaʻ ʻalá īmān ṣāḥibihi, wa-dhālika an taʻlama awwalan anna al-ḥukm al-ʻaqlī munḥaṣir fī thalāthat aqsām: al-Wujūb, wa-al-jawāz wa-al-istiḥālah, wa-ʻalá hādhihi al-thalāthah mabāḥth ʻilm al-kalām kulluhā ..."

title: 880-02 Badīʻ al-maʻānī fī sharḥ ʻAqīdat al-Shaybānī : manuscript / Najm al-Dīn Abū al-Faḍl Muḥammad ibn ʻAbd Allāh ibn Qāḍī ʻAjlūn.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Rabbi yassir wa-aʻin bi-khayr. Yā Karīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī hadānā li-hādhā, wa-mā kunnā li-nahtadī lawlā an hadānā Allāh subḥānuhu min ilāh munazzah ʻan shawāʼib al-naqṣ, munfarid bi-ṣifāt al-kamāl, ghanī ʻammā siwāhu, ḥamdan yuwāfī niʻamah wa-yukāfī mazīdah, wa-ashkuruhu idh alhamanā tawḥīdahu wa-taʻẓīmahu wa-tamjīdah, wa-ashhadu an lā ilāha illā Allāh waḥdahu lā sharīka lah, wa-ashhadu anna Sayyidanā Muḥammadan ʻabduhu wa-rasūluh ... Wa-baʻd, fa-inna aʻẓam al-ʻulūm wa-aʻlāhā wa-aqwamahā ḥujjatan wa-ajlāhā ʻilm uṣūl al-dīn al-musammá bi-ʻilm al-kalām, al-bāḥith ʻan dhāt al-ṣāniʻ wa-mā la-hu min ṣifāt al-jalāl wa-al-ikrām, wa-inna mimmā ullifa fīhi al-qaṣīdah al-fāʼiqat al-mabānī wa-al-maʻrūfah bi-Qaṣīdat al-Shaybānī ..."

title: 880-02 Shams al-maʻārif al-kubrá : manuscript / Aḥmad ibn ʻAlī al-Būnī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Shahādat azal, fa-min nūr hādhihi al-shahādah ightarafa al-muṣannifūn ʻilman. Fa-ifham dhālik. Wa-al-tartīb al-abadī fī al-shahādatayn al-muttaṣilatayn bi-al-malāʼikah al-kirām. Wa-awwal al-ʻilm fa-hādhihi shahādat al-abad. Fa-man fahima sirr hātayn al-shahādatayn shāhad al-malakūtayn wa-mā awdaʻāhu bi-sirr al-ittiṣāl bi-al-kashfīyāt ..."

title: 880-03 Maqāmāt al-Ḥarīrī : manuscript / al-Qāsim ibn ʻAlī al-Ḥarīrī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Allāhumma innā naḥmaduka ʻalá mā ʻallamta min bayān wa-alhamta min al-tibyān, kamā naḥmaduka ʻalá mā asbaghta min al-ʻaṭāʼ wa-asbalta min al-ghiṭāʼ, wa-nalūdhu bi-ka min shiddat al-lasan wa-fuḍūl al-hadhar, ka-mā naʻūdhu bi-ka min maʻarrat al-lakan wa-fuḍūḥ al-ḥaṣar, wa-nastakfī bi-ka al-iftinān bi-iṭrāʼ al-mādiḥ wa-ighḍāʼ al-musāmiḥ ..."

title: 880-02 Ḥāshiyat al-ʻAṭṭār ʻalá al-Maqūlāt : manuscript / Ḥasan ibn Muḥammad al-ʻAṭṭār.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm wa-bi-hi nastaʻīn. al-Ḥamdu lillāh waḥdah, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ālih. Yaqūlu Abū al-Saʻādāt Ḥasan ibn Muḥammad al-ʻAṭṭār: Innī lammā waḍaʻtu al-ḥāshiyatayn, al-kubrá ʻalá Maqūlāt al-ʻallāmah al-Sayyid al-Bulaydī, raḥimahu Allāh taʻālá, thumma sharaʻtu fī Maqūlāt Shaykhinā al-ʻallāmah al-Sujāʻī, raḥimahu Allāh, waḍaʻtu ʻalayhā ḥāshiyah waqaʻa fīhā baʻḍ ṣuʻūbah, lā tunāsibu al-mubtadī, wa-kāna yaẓharu lī baʻda al-mukālamah maʻa al-ikhwān umūr ghayr masṭūrah fī al-ḥāshiyah, fa-khift ḍayāʻahā, fa-qaṣadtu bi-waḍʻ hādhihi al-ḥāshiyah ḥall ʻibārat al-matn bi-qadr al-imkān ..."

title: 880-02 al-Rawḍ al-bāsim fī shamāʼil al-Muṣṭafá Abī al-Qāsim : manuscript / ʻAbd al-Raʼūf ibn Tāj al-ʻĀrifīn al-Munāwī al-Ḥaddādī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī aḥsana ilá Rasūlihi al-shamāʼil, wa-aqām ʻalá nubūwatihi awḍaḥ al-muʻjizāt wa-atamm al-dalāʼil, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-ʻalá ālihi al-amāthil wa-ṣaḥbihi al-afāḍil, ṣalātan wa-salāman dāʼimayn mā ṭalaʻ najmun afal. Wa-baʻd, fa-yaqūlu al-ʻabd al-faqīr al-rājī ʻafwa Rabbihi al-qadīr ʻAbd al-Raʼūf al-Munāwī al-Ḥaddādī, kafāh Allāh sharra kull munāwin wa-muʻādī: Hādhihi ʻujālah wajīzah ikhtaṣartu fīhā Shamāʼil al-Imām al-Tirmidhī, wa-zidtu ʻalayhā akthar min mithlihi, fa-mā kāna min takhrījihi ṣaddartu bi-hi al-bāb wa-lam unsibhu ilá mukhrij, wa-taraktu al-ʻalāmah ʻalāmah, wa-mā kāna min al-mazīd ʻazawtuhu ilá mukhrijihi wa-iftataḥtuhu bi-qawlī qultu, wa-akhtimuhu bi-qawlī wa-Allāh aʻlam. Wa-sammaytuhu al-Rawḍ al-bāsim fī shamāʼil al-Muṣṭafá Abī al-Qāsim ..."

title: 880-03 al-Shamāʼil : manuscript / Muḥammad ibn ʻĪsá al-Tirmidhī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh wa-salāmun ʻalá ʻibādihi alladhīna iṣṭafá. Qāla al-Shaykh al-ḥāfiẓ Abū ʻĪsá Muḥammad ibn ʻĪsá ibn Sūrah al-Tirmidhī al-muṣannif, raḥimahu Allāh taʻālá: Bāb mā jāʼa fī khalq al-Nabī, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam. Akhbaranā Abū Rajāʼ Qutaybah ibn ʻAbd al-Raḥmān Saʻīd ʻan Mālik ibn Anas ʻan Rabīʻah ibn Abī ʻAbd al-Raḥmān ʻan Anas ibn Mālik annahu samiʻahu yaqūlu: Kāna Rasūl Allāh, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam, laysa bi-al-ṭawīl al-bāʼin, wa-lā bi-al-qaṣīr, wa-lā bi-al-abyaḍ al-amhaq, wa-lā bi-al-ādam, wa-lā bi-al-jaʻad al-qaṭaṭ, wa-lā bi-al-sabaṭ, baʻathahu Allāh ʻalá raʼs arbaʻīn sanah ..."

title: 880-03 al-Manẓūmah al-Jazāʼirīyah : manuscript / Aḥmad ibn ʻAbd Allāh al-Jazāʼirī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāhi wa-huwa al-wāḥid al-azalī // subḥānuhu jalla ʻan shibhin wa-ʻan mathali. Fa-laysa yuḥṣá alladhī awlāhu min niʻamin // ajalluhā niʻmatu al-īmān bi-al-rusuli ..."

title: 880-02 Nubdhah laṭīfah fī ḥall mushkilāt ḥaḍarat fī al-suʼālāt : manuscript / Aḥmad ibn ʻAlī ibn Ḥajar al-ʻAsqalānī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi nastaʻīn. Qāla al-Shaykh al-Imām, al-ʻālim al-ʻallāmah, al-baḥr al-fahhāmah, ʻumdat al-sālikīn wa-shaykh al-muḥaqqiqīn, ḥujjat al-Islām, Shihāb al-Dīn, Aḥmad ibn Ḥajar al-ʻAsqallānī al-Shāfiʻī, Shaykh al-Ḥaram, ḥāwī al-ḥikam: al-Ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-taslīm ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ālihi wa-ṣaḥbih ajmaʻīn. Ammā baʻd, Nubdhah laṭīfah fī ḥall mushkilāt ḥaḍarat fī suʼālāt nuqilat min al-kutub al-muṣannafāt, mithl al-Iḥyāʼ wa-al-Tabṣirah, wa-ghayrihā min al-kutub al-muʻtabarah, lam takun qabla dhālika mufaṣṣalah wa-lā mubayyanah, fa-lammā ʻuriḍat ʻalaynā awḍaḥnā tilka al-masāʼil al-sharīfah bi-al-dalāʼil al-laṭīfah wa-al-akhbār al-munīfah ..."

title: 880-02 al-Aḥkām al-mulakhkhaṣah fī ḥukm māʼ al-ḥimmiṣah : manuscript / Ḥasan ibn ʻAmmār al-Shurunbulālī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī sharraʻa lanā dīnan qayyiman, ghayra dhī ʻiwaj, wa-kallafanā bi-mā lam yajʻal ʻalaynā fīhi min ḥaraj, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad al-mabʻūth raḥmah lil-ʻālamīn, wa-ʻalá ālihi qudwat al-nāsikīn wa-ʻumdat al-mutaṭahhirīn, wa-ṣaḥābatihi aʼimmat al-dīn wa-al-tābiʻīn bi-iḥsān ilá yawm al-dīn. wa-baʻd, fa-yaqūlu al-ʻabd al-muḍṭarr ilá karam Allāh dhī al-minan Abū al-Ikhlāṣ Ḥasan al-Shurunbulālī al-Ḥanafī, ʻāmalahu Allāh bi-luṭfihi al-jalī wa-al-khafī, wa-ghafara la-hu wa-li-wālidayhi wa-li-mashāyikhihi wa-ikhwānihi wa-al-Muslimīn: Hādhihi nubdhah yasīrah, jawāb li-ḥādithah shahīrah, sammaytuhā al-Aḥkām al-mulakhkhaṣah fī ḥukm māʼ al-ḥimmiṣah, jamaʻtuhā ijābah li-ṭālibihā ..."

title: 880-01 Ḥayāt al-qulūb : manuscript.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm wa-bi-hi nastaʻīn. al-Ḥamdu lillāh [alladhī] hadānā ilá dīn al-Islām, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Sayyid al-anām, Muḥammad wa-ālihi al-kirām. Wa-baʻd, fa-hādhihi al-risālah ʻilm al-dīn, jamaʻtuhu min kutub al-mutafarriqīn, wa-sammaytuhu bi-Ḥayāt al-qulūb, li-mā yazūlu bi-hi ʻilal al-jahl wa-al-dhunūb, wa-rattabtuhu ʻalá sabʻat abwāb bi-ʻawn al-Malik al-Wahhāb ..."

title: 880-02 Nūr al-īḍāḥ wa-najāt al-arwāḥ : manuscript / Ḥasan ibn ʻAmmār al-Shurunbulālī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi nastaʻīn. al-Ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad khātim al-nabīyīn, wa-ʻalá ālihi al-ṭāhirīn wa-ṣaḥābatihi ajmaʻīn. Qāla al-ʻabd al-faqīr ilá Mawlāhu al-ghanī Abū al-Ikhlāṣ Ḥasan al-Wafāʼī al-Shurunbulālī al-Ḥanafī: Innahu iltamasa minnī baʻḍ al-akhillāʼ, ʻāmalanā Allāh wa-īyāhum bi-luṭfihi al-khafī, an aʻmala muqaddimah fī al-ʻibādāt, tuqarribu ʻalá al-mubtadī mā tashattata min al-masāʼil fī al-muṭawwalāt, fa-istaʻantu billāh wa-ajabtuhu ṭāliban lil-thawāb, wa-lā adhkuru illā mā jazama bi-ṣiḥḥatihi ahl al-tarjīḥ min ghayr iṭnāb, wa-sammaytuhu 'Nūr al-īḍāḥ wa-najāt al-arwāḥ ..."

title: 880-02 Sirāj al-muṣallī wa-badr al-mubtadī wa-al-muntahī : manuscript / Burkawi Muḥammad Afandī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn, wa-al-ʻāqibah lil-muttaqīn, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Rasūlihi Muḥammad wa-ālihi ajmaʻīn. Iʻlam asʻadaka Allāh fī al-dārayn: Dhukira fī al-Fatāwá al-kabīrah, wa-al-Fatāwá al-Nāṣirī, wa-al-Fatāwá al-Shihābī, wa-al-Ṣalāh al-Saʻūdī, man lam yaʻrif farāʼiḍ al-wuḍūʼ wa-ghasl aʻḍāʼihi al-thalāthah kāmilan, wa-masḥ rubʻ al-raʼs, yajūzu wuḍūʼuhu maʻa al-karāhīyah, li-ʻadam taʻallum al-farāʼiḍ, wa-man lam yaʻlam farāʼiḍ al-ṣalāh, wa-lam yatruk shayʼan min al-sharāʼiṭ wa-al-arkān wa-al-wājibāt yajūzu ṣalātuhu maʻa al-karāhiyah, li-ʻadam taʻallumihā wa-huwa ithm ..."

title: 880-01 Tuḥfat al-arīb fī al-radd ʻalá ahl al-ṣalīb : manuscript / ʻAbd Allāh ibn ʻAbd Allāh al-Mayurūqī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm wa-bi-hi thiqatī, wa-ʻalayhi iʻtimādī. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī khaṣṣanā bi-khayr al-adyān, wa-jaʻalanā min ummat al-Furqān, wa-akramanā bi-tilāwat al-Qurʼān, wa-ṣawm shahr Ramaḍān, wa-al-ṭawāf ḥawla al-Bayt al-Ḥarām, wa-al-rukūʻ ʻinda al-Rukn wa-al-Maqām, wa-sharrafanā bi-Laylat al-Qadr, wa-al-wuqūf bi-ʻArafāt, wa-jaʻalanā min ahl al-ṭahārah wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-zakāh ... Wa-baʻd, fa-yaqūlu al-Shaykh ʻAbd Allāh ibn ʻAbd Allāh al-Tarjumān, jaʻala Allāh maḍjiʻahu wa-maʼwāhu fasīḥ al-jinān ..."

title: 880-02 Tuḥfat al-murīd ʻalá Jawharat al-tawḥīd : manuscript / Ibrāhīm ibn Muḥammad al-Bājūrī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi thiqatī. al-Ḥamdu lillāh al-munfarid bi-al-iʻdām wa-al-ījād, al-munazzah ʻan shawāʼib al-naqṣ wa-al-aḍdād, wa-ashhadu an lā ilāha illā Allāh al-qadīm, al-khāliq li-mā ʻadāh min al-kāʼināt, al-bāqī, wa-hālik kull mā ʻadāh min al-makhlūqāt ..."

title: 880-02 Itḥāf al-murīd bi-Jawharat al-tawḥīd : manuscript / ʻAbd al-Salām ibn Ibrāhīm al-Laqānī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-sallam. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī rafaʻa li-ahl al-Sunnah al-Muḥammadīyah fī al-khāfiqayn aʻlāman, wa-waḍaʻa bi-wāḍiḥ adillatihim min shubah al-mukhālifīn aʻlāman, wa-ashhadu an lā ilāha illā Allāh waḥdahu lā sharīka lahu, shahādatan takūnu bi-al-takhalluṣ fī al-dārayn iʻlāman, wa-ashhadu anna Sayyidanā Muḥammadan ʻabduhu wa-rasūluh, al-mamnūḥ man ittabaʻahu min al-jinān aʻlāman, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-aṣḥābih mā uyyidat qawāʻid al-ʻaqāʼid wa-mā ḥulliyat al-jiyād bi-jawāhir al-farāʼid. Wa-baʻd, fa-yaqūlu al-ʻabd al-ḥaqīr al-fānī ʻAbd al-Salām ibn Ibrāhīm al-Mālikī al-Laqānī, satara Allāh ʻuyūbahu wa-ghafara dhunūbahu: Kuntu qad lakhkhaṣtu mā ʻallaqahu Ustādhunā min ʻUmdat al-murīd ʻalá ʻaqīdatihi al-musammāh bi-Jawharat al-tawḥīd fī awrāq qalīlah sammaytuhā Irshād al-murīd ..."

title: 880-02 Selections from the Qurʼān : manuscript.
note_text: Incipit: "Sūrat al-Ṣāffāt. Miʼah wa-thamānūn wa-āyatān. Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Wa-al-Ṣāffāti ṣaffan fa-al-zājirāti zajran fa-al-tāliyāti dhikran inna ilāhakum la-wāḥidun ..."

title: 880-02 Sharḥ al-Mukaffirāt lil-Badr al-Rashīd : manuscript / ʻAlī ibn Sulṭān Muḥammad al-Qārī al-Harawī.
note_text: Incipit: The first four lines are water damaged and illegible: "... Iʻlam anna al-Shaykh al-ʻAllāmah al-maʻrūf bi-al-Badr al-Rashīd, raḥimahu Allāh, min al-aʼimmah al-Ḥanafīyah, jamaʻa akthar al-kalimāt al-kufrīyah bi-al-ishārah al-īmāʼīyah, fa-hā anā ubayyinu rumūzahā, wa-ubayyinu kunūzahā, wa-aḥullu ghumūḍahā, wa-uḥallī ḥumūḍahā, fa-fī al-Ḥāwī al-fatāwī [lil-fatāwī]: Man kafara bi-al-lisān wa-qalbuhu muṭmaʼinn bi-al-īmān fa-huwa kāfir wa-laysa bi-muʼmin ʻinda Allāh taʻālá. Intahá. Wa-huwa maʻlūm min mafhūm qawlihi taʻālá: Man kafara billāh min baʻdi īmānihi illā man ukriha wa-qalbuhu muṭmaʼinn bi-al-īmān, wa-lākin man sharaḥa bi-al-kufr ṣadran fa-ʻalayhim ghaḍab min Allāh ..."

title: 880-02 al-Durrah al-fākhirah fī kashf ʻulūm al-Ākhirah : manuscript / al-Ghazzālī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh mustaḥiqq al-ḥamd, al-bāriʼ al-laṭīf, al-mutaʻālī bi-al-ḥamd, al-mursil sawakib [sawākib] raḥmatih ilá jamīʻ khalqih, al-wāḥid al-aḥad, alladhī infarada ʻalá jamīʻ makhlūqātih bi-al-dawām wa-al-baqāʼ, amāta wa-aḥyā, fa-subḥānahu min ilāh, lam yattakhidh ṣāḥibatan wa-lā waladan ..."

title: 880-02 al-zajr bi-al-hajr : manuscript / Abū al-Faḍl Jalāl al-Dīn ʻAbd al-Raḥmān ibn Abī Bakr al-Suyūṭī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Qāla Allāh taʻālá: Wa-aʻriḍ ʻan al-jāhilīn. Wa-qāla al-Ṭabarānī: Ḥaddathanā Abū Dharr Hārūn ibn Sulaymān al-Miṣrī qāl ḥaddathanā Yūsuf ibn ʻAdī qāl thanā Shihāb ibn khurāsh ʻan abīhi ʻan Yusayr ibn ʻAmr wa-kāna qad raʼá al-Nabī, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam, qāl Iṣrim al-aḥmaq fa-laysa lil-aḥmaq min khayr min al-hijrān ..."

title: 880-02 Sharḥ Umm al-barāhīn fī ʻilm al-kalām : manuscript / Muḥammad ibn Yūsuf al-Sanūsī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Allāhumma ṣallī [ṣalli] ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-sallim. Qāla al-Shaykh al-Faqīh al-Imām Abū ʻAbd Allāh Muḥammad ibn Yūsuf al-Sanūsī al-Ḥasanī, laṭafa Allāh taʻālá bi-hi wa-binā wa-bi-man yaqifu ʻalaynā: al-Ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn, wāsiʻ al-jūd wa-al-ʻaṭāʼ, alladhī shahidat bi-wujūb wujūdihi wa-waḥdānīyatihi wa-ʻaẓīm jalālihi wujūb iftiqār al-kāʼināt kullihā fī al-arḍ wa-al-samāʼ, al-ʻazīz alladhī ʻazza mulkuhu ʻan an yakūna la-hu sharīk fī tadbīr shayʼ mā, fa-taʻālá wa-jalla ʻan al-shurakāʼ, al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, alladhī ʻammat niʻamuhu al-ʻawālim kullahā, fa-lā makhlaṣa li-kāʼin ʻan tilka al-naʻmāʼ, al-wāsiʻ al-karīm, al-munfarid bi-al-ījād ..."

title: 880-02 Sharḥ Umm al-barāhīn fī ʻilm al-kalām : manuscript / Muḥammad ibn Yūsuf al-Sanūsī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi thiqatī. Qāla al-Shaykh al-Imām, al-ʻālim al-ʻallāmah, al-mutabarrak bi-hi, waḥīd dahrih wa-farīd ʻaṣrih, Abū ʻAbd Allāh Muḥammad ibn Yūsuf al-Sanūsī al-Ḥasanī, ʻafā Allāh ʻanhu bi-mannih wa-faḍlih: al-Ḥamdu lillāh al-wāsiʻ al-jūd wa-al-ʻaṭāʼ, alladhī shahidat bi-wujūb wujūdihi wa-waḥdānīyatihi wa-ʻaẓīm jalālihi wujūb iftiqār al-kāʼināt kullihā ilayh, fī al-arḍ wa-al-samāʼ, al-ʻazīz alladhī ʻazza fī mulkihi ʻan an yakūna la-hu sharīk fī tadbīr shayʼ mā, fa-taʻālá Rabbunā wa-jalla ʻan al-shurakāʼ wa-al-wuzarāʼ, al-Raḥīm al-Raḥmān, alladhī ʻammat niʻamuhu al-ʻawālim kullahā, fa-lā makhlaṣa li-kāʼin ʻan tilka al-naʻmāʼ, al-wāsiʻ al-karīm, al-munfarid bi-al-ījād, fa-lā yustaṭāʻu shukr niʻamihi illā bi-mā huwa min niʻamihi al-jammāʼ ..."

title: 880-02 Sharḥ Umm al-barāhīn fī ʻilm al-kalām : manuscript / Muḥammad ibn Yūsuf al-Sanūsī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Wa-ṣallá Allāh wa-sallam ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ālihi. Qāla al-Shaykh al-faqīh Abū ʻAbd Allāh Muḥammad ibn Yūsuf al-Sanūsī al-Ḥasanī, laṭafa Allāh taʻālá bi-hi wa-nafaʻanā bi-hi: al-Ḥamdu lillāh al-wāsiʻ al-jūd wa-al-ʻaṭāʼ, alladhī shahida bi-wujūb wujūdihi wa-waḥdānīyatihi wa-ʻaẓīm jalālihi wujūb iftiqār al-kāʼināt kullihā ilayh, fī al-arḍ wa-al-samāʼ, al-ʻazīz alladhī ʻazza fī mulkihi ʻan an yakūna la-hu sharīk fī tadbīr shayʼ mā, fa-taʻālá wa-jalla ʻan al-shurakāʼ, al-Raḥīm al-Raḥmān, alladhī ʻammat niʻamuhu al-ʻawālim kullahā, fa-lā makhlaṣa li-kāʼin ʻan tilka al-naʻmāʼ, al-wāsiʻ al-karīm, al-munfarid bi-al-ījād, fa-lā yustaṭāʻu shukr niʻamihi illā bi-mā huwa min niʻamihi al-jammāʼ, al-Ghanī al-Quddūs ..."

title: 880-02 Ḥāshiyah ʻalá matn al-Sanūsīyah : manuscript / Ibrāhīm ibn Muḥammad al-Bājūrī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-sallam. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī tawaḥḥada fī dhātih, wa-tanazzaha ʻan shawāʼib al-naqṣ fī nuʻūtihi wa-simātih, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ālih. Wa-baʻd, fa-yaqūlu Ibrāhīm al-Bājūrī, al-faqīr ilá Mawlāhu al-Ghanī al-Qadīr: Saʼalanī baʻḍ al-ikhwān, aṣlaḥa Allāh taʻālá lī wa-lahum al-ḥāl wa-al-shān, an aktuba kitābah bahīyah ʻalá al-muqaddimah al-mashhūrah bi-al-Sanūsīyah, fa-insharaḥ ṣadrī li-dhālik, wa-Allāh taʻālá aʻlam bi-mā hunālik, li-annahā wa-in kānat ṣaghīrat al-jurm, kabīrat al-ʻilm, muḥtawiyah ʻalá jamīʻ al-ʻaqāʼid, maʻa ziyādat al-fawāʼid, wa-li-dhālika kānat aḥsan al-muʼallafāt fī al-tawḥīd, wa-akhlaṣahā min al-ḥashw wa-al-taʻqīd. Wa-hā anā ashraʻu fī al-maqṣūd bi-ʻawn al-Malik al-maʻbūd, fa-aqūlu, wa-billāh taʻālá al-tawfīq. Qawluhu 'Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm' ..."

title: 880-02 Ḥāshiyah ʻalá matn al-Sanūsīyah : manuscript / Ibrāhīm ibn Muḥammad al-Bājūrī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi nastaʻīn. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī tawaḥḥada fī dhātih, wa-tanazzaha fī nuʻūtihi ʻan shawāʼib al-naqṣ wa-simātih, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ālih. Wa-baʻd, fa-yaqūlu Ibrāhīm al-Bājūrī, al-faqīr ilá Mawlāhu al-Ghanī al-Qadīr: Saʼalanī baʻḍ al-ikhwān, aṣlaḥa Allāh lī wa-lahum al-ḥāl wa-al-shān, an aktuba kitābah bahīyah ʻalá al-muqaddimah al-mashhūrah bi-al-Sanūsīyah, fa-insharaḥ ṣadrī li-dhālik, wa-Allāh aʻlam bi-mā hunālik, li-annahā wa-in kānat ṣaghīrat al-jurm, kabīrat al-ʻilm, muḥtawiyah ʻalá jamīʻ al-ʻaqāʼid, maʻa ziyādat al-fawāʼid, wa-li-dhālika kānat aḥsan al-muʼallafāt fī al-tawḥīd, wa-akhlaṣahā min al-ḥashw wa-al-taʻqīd. Wa-hā anā ashraʻu fī al-maqṣūd bi-ʻawn al-Malik al-maʻbūd, fa-aqūlu, wa-billāh al-tawfīq: Qawluhu 'Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm' ..."

title: 880-02 Ḥāshiyat al-Sharqāwī ʻalá Sharḥ al-Hudhudī ʻalá Umm al-barāhīn : manuscript / ʻAbd Allāh ibn Ḥijāzī al-Sharqāwī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi nastaʻīn, wa-bi-hi thiqatī wa-iʻtimādī. al-Ḥamdu lillāh al-mutawaḥḥid fī dhātih, al-mutanazzih fī nuʻūt jabarūtih ʻan shawāʼib al-naqṣ wa-simātih, al-faʻʻāl li-mā yurīdu, fa-lā muʻāriḍ li-mā qaḍāhu, wa-lā rādda li-hibātih, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wāsiṭat ʻiqd al-nabīyīn wa-al-mursalīn, al-ṣādiq, al-muballigh li-amr Rabbih al-amīn, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-aṣḥābihi wa-al-tābiʻīn, wa-tābiʻīhim bi-iḥsān. Fa-yaqūlu kathīr al-masāwī, ʻAbd Allāh ibn Ḥijāzī al-mashhūr bi-al-Sharqāwī: Qad ṭalab minnī baʻḍ al-ikhwān an aktuba ʻalá Sharḥ al-ʻAllāmah al-Shaykh Muḥammad ibn Manṣūr al-Hudhudī ʻalá Umm al-barāhīn, al-musammāh bi-al-Ṣughrá ..."

title: 880-02 Taqāyīd ʻalá Sharḥ al-Shaykh ʻAbd al-Salām al-Laqānī li-Jawhart wālidih : manuscript / Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad al-Amīr al-Kabīr.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallam. Subḥānaka, mā qaddaraka aḥadun ḥaqqa qadrika. Wa-al-ḥamdu minka wa-ilayk. Wa-ṣalli wa-sallim ʻalá Sayyid kull man laka ʻalayhi siyādah, wa-wāsiṭat ḥijābika al-aʻẓam alladhī lā sabīla li-mujāwazatih, ʻabdika wa-rasūlika Muḥammad, al-dāll ʻalayka, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-atbāʻih, wa-dhurrīyatihi wa-ashyāʻih. Ammā baʻd, fa-yaqūlu ʻabd rabbih wa-rājī ḥasabih Muḥammad al-Amīr najjāh Allāh min kull khaṭīr. Āmīn: Hādhihi taqāyīd ʻalá Sharḥ al-Shaykh ʻAbd al-Salām al-Laqānī li-Jawharat wālidih, arjū min faḍl Allāh taʻālá al-luṭf fīhā wa-al-shukr li-mūlīhā [li-muʼallifihā] ..."

title: 880-02 Sharḥ Muqaddimat Abī al-Layth : manuscript / Dhū al-Nūn ibn Aḥmad.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī nazzala aḥsan al-ḥadīth hudan lil-muttaqīn, wa-bayyana bi-hi aṣwab al-ʻaqāʼid shirʻatan li-ahl al-yaqīn, wa-khaṣṣa min al-ʻibād man yashāʼu bi-raḥmatihi wa-istiqāmat al-dīn, wa-shayyada bunyān al-Islām wa-qawwá arkānahu bi-iqāmat al-ṣalāh fī al-ʻālamīn, wa-jaʻalahā farqan bayna al-ḥaqq wa-al-ḍalāl ilá Yawm al-Dīn, naḥmaduhu ʻalá mā razaqanā min tawātur ālāʼihi, wa-ʻalá al-rāsikhīn. Inna Allāh huwa al-razzāq, dhū al-qūwah al-matīn, wa-al-ṣalāh ʻalá nabīyihi al-ʻArabī, qudwat al-sālikīn ..."

title: 880-02 Ḍawʼ al-maʻālī li-Badʼ al-amālī : manuscript / ʻAlī ibn Sulṭān Muḥammad al-Qārī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī wajaba wujūd dhātih, wa-karam wujūdih wa-shuhūd ṣifātih, wa-ẓahara afʻāluhu al-ḥamīdah fī ṣaḥāʼif maṣnūʻātih, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá zubdat makhlūqātih wa-ʻumdat mawjūdātih, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-aṣḥābihi wa-atbāʻih, fī ḥarakātihi wa-sakanātih. Ammā baʻd, fa-yaqūlu al-multajī ilá ḥaram Rabbihi al-Bārī ʻAlī ibn Sulṭān Muḥammad al-Qārī: Lammā sharaʻtu fī sharḥ al-Fiqh al-akbar lil-Imām al-aʻẓam wa-al-humām al-aqdam, kāna fī nīyatī wa-ṭawīyatī an yakūna mukhtaṣaran ..."

title: 880-03 Sharḥ al-ʻAqāʼid al-Nasafīyah : manuscript / Masʻūd ibn ʻUmar al-Taftāzānī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh al-mutawaḥḥid bi-jalāl dhātih wa-kamāl ṣifātih, al-mutaqaddis fī nuʻūt al-jabarūt ʻan shawāyib al-naqṣ wa-simātih, wa-al-ṣalāh ʻalá Nabīyihi Muḥammad, al-muʼayyad bi-sāṭiʻ ḥujajihi wa-wāḍiḥ bayyinātih, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-aṣḥābihi hudāt al-ḥaqq wa-ḥumātih. Wa-baʻd, fa-inna mabná ʻilm al-sharāʼiʻ wa-al-aḥkām, wa-asās ʻaqāʼid al-Islām huwa ʻilm al-tawḥīd wa-al-ṣifāt, al-mawsūmah bi-al-kalām al-munjī min ghayāhib al-shukūk wa-ẓulumāt al-awhām, wa-inna al-mukhtaṣar al-musammá bi-al-ʻAqāʼid lil-Imām al-humām, qudwat ʻulamāʼ al-Islām, Najm al-Millah wa-al-Dīn, ʻUmar al-Nasafī, aʻlá Allāh darajatahu fī Dār al-Salām, yashtamilu min hādhā al-fann ʻalá ghurar al-fawāʼid wa-durar al-farāʼid ..."

title: 880-03 Sharḥ al-ʻAqāʼid al-Nasafīyah : manuscript / Masʻūd ibn ʻUmar al-Taftāzānī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Wa-ṣallá Allāh [ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad]. al-Ḥamdu lillāh al-mutawaḥḥid bi-jalāl dhātih wa-kamāl ṣifātih, al-mutaqaddis [fī nuʻūt] al-jabarūt ʻan shawāyib al-naqṣ wa-simātih, wa-al-ṣalāh ʻalá Nabīyihi Muḥammad, al-muʼayyad bi-sāṭiʻ ḥujajihi wa-wāḍiḥ bayyinātih, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-aṣḥābihi, hudāt ṭarīq al-ḥaqq wa-ḥumātih. Wa-baʻd, fa-inna mabná ʻilm al-sharāʼiʻ wa-al-aḥkām, wa-asās qawāʻid ʻaqāʼid al-Islām huwa ʻilm al-tawḥīd wa-al-ṣifāt, al-mawsūm bi-ʻilm al-kalām, al-munjī min ghayāhib al-shukūk wa-ẓulumāt al-awhām, wa-inna al-mukhtaṣar al-musammá bi-al-ʻAqāʼid, lil-Imām al-humām, qudwat ʻulamāʼ al-Islām, Najm al-Millah wa-al-Dīn, ʻUmar al-Nasafī, aʻlā Allāh darajatahu fī Dār al-Salām, yashtamilu min hādhā al-fann ʻalá ghurar al-fawāʼid wa-durar al-farāʼid ..."

title: 880-02 Itḥāf al-murīd bi-Jawharat al-tawḥīd : manuscript / ʻAbd al-Salām ibn Ibrāhīm al-Laqānī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī rafaʻa li-ahl al-Sunnah al-Muḥammadīyah fī al-khāfiqayn aʻlāman, wa-waḍaʻa bi-wāḍiḥ adillatihim min shubah al-mukhālifīn aʻlāman, wa-ashhadu an lā ilāha illā Allāh waḥdahu lā sharīka lahu, shahādatan takūnu bi-al-takhalluṣ fī al-dārayn iʻlāman, wa-ashhadu anna Sayyidanā Muḥammadan ʻabduhu wa-rasūluh, al-mamnūḥ man ittabaʻahu fī al-jinān aʻlāman, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-aṣḥābih mā ubbidat qawāʻid al-ʻaqāʼid wa-mā ḥulliyat al-jiyād bi-jawāhir al-farāʼid. Wa-baʻd, fa-yaqūlu al-ʻabd al-faqīr al-ḥaqīr al-fānī, ʻAbd al-Salām ibn Ibrāhīm al-Mālikī al-Laqānī: Qad kuntu lakhkhaṣtu mā ʻallaqahu Ustādhunā min ʻUmdat al-murīd ʻalá ʻaqīdatihi al-musammāh bi-Jawharat al-tawḥīd ..."

title: 880-02 Fatḥ al-qarīb al-majīd bi-Sharḥ Jawharat al-tawḥīd : manuscript / ʻAbd al-Barr ibn ʻAbd Allāh al-Ujhūrī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-ʻlayhi tawakkulī wa-iʻtimādī. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī jaʻala lanā ilayhi ṭarīqan wa-sabīlan, wa-aqāma lanā ʻalá maʻrifatihi burhānan wāḍiḥan wa-dalīlan, wa-ashhadu an lā ilāha illā Allāh waḥdahu, lā sharīka lah, shahādatan tamnaḥu qāʼilahā sharāban mizājuhu zanjabīlan, wa-ashhadu anna Sayyidanā Muḥammadan ʻabduhu wa-rasūluh, wa-ḥabībuhu wa-khalīluh, baʻathahu ilaynā muʻalliman wa-rasūlan, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-aṣḥābihi bukratan wa-aṣlan [wa-aṣīlan]. Wa-baʻd, fa-yaqūlu al-ʻabd al-faqīr ilá Allāh taʻālá, ʻAbd al-Barr ibn al-Shaykh ʻAbd Allāh ibn al-Shaykh Muḥammad ibn al-Shaykh ʻAlī ibn al-Shaykh Sayf al-Dīn al-Ujhūrī al-Shāfiʻī, qaddasa Allāh rūḥahu: Qad kuntu sharaḥtu manẓūmat Sayyidinā wa-Mawlānā wa-Shaykhinā al-Shaykh Ibrāhīm al-Laqānī al-musammah bi-al-Jawharah fī ʻilm al-tawḥīd sharḥan muṭawwalan, wa-qad suniḥa lī an akhtaṣirahu fī naḥw niṣf ḥajmihi, li-yashula al-tanāwul minhu ʻalá al-mubtadī, wa-lā yaqṣuru ʻan ifādat al-muntahī. Wa-ʻalá Allāh al-karīm iʻtimādī fīhi wa-fī ghayrihi min jamīʻ umūrī, dunyā wa-ukhrá, wa-ilayhi tafwīḍ [tafwīḍī] wa-isnādī. Wa-sammaytuhu Fatḥ al-qarīb al-majīd li-sharḥ Jawhart al-tawḥīd ..."

title: 880-02 al-Ḥiṣn al-ḥaṣīn min kalām Sayyid al-Mursalīn : manuscript / Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad ibn al-Jazarī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Allāhumma ṣalli ʻalá sayyid al-khalq Muḥammad, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallim. Qāla al-faqīr al-ḍaʻīf al-miskīn ilá Allāh taʻālá, al-rājī min karamihi an yunjiyahu min al-qawm al-ẓālimīn, Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad ibn al-Jazarī al-Shāfiʻī, laṭafa Allāh bi-hi fī shiddatah: Ammā baʻda ḥamd Allāh alladhī jaʻala al-duʻāʼ li-radd al-qaḍāʼ, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Muḥammad Sayyid al-Anbiyāʼ, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi al-atqiyāʼ al-aṣfiyāʼ, fa-inna hādhā 'al-Ḥiṣn al-ḥaṣīn min kalām Sayyid al-Mursalīn', wa-silāḥ al-muʼminīn min khizānat al-Nabī al-amīn, wa-al-haykal al-ʻaẓīm, min qawl al-Rasūl al-karīm, wa-al-ḥirz al-maknūn min lafẓ al-Maʻṣūm al-Maʼmūn ..."

title: 880-02 al-Ḥiṣn al-ḥaṣīn min kalām Sayyid al-Mursalīn : manuscript / Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad ibn al-Jazarī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá sayyid al-khalq Muḥammad, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallim. Qāla al-faqīr al-ḍaʻīf al-miskīn al-munqaṭiʻ ilá Allāh taʻālá, al-rājī min karamihi an yunjiyahu min al-qawm al-ẓālimīn, Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad ibn al-Jazarī, laṭafa Allāh taʻālá bi-hi fī shiddatah: Ammā baʻda ḥamd Allāh alladhī jaʻala al-duʻāʼ sababan li-radd al-qaḍāʼ, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Muḥammad Sayyid al-Anbiyāʼ, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi al-atqiyāʼ al-aṣfiyāʼ, fa-inna hādhā 'al-Ḥiṣn al-ḥaṣīn min kalām Sayyid al-Mursalīn', wa-silāḥ al-muʼminīn min khizānat al-Nabī al-amīn, wa-al-haykal al-ʻaẓīm, min qawl al-Rasūl al-karīm, wa-al-ḥirz al-maknūn min lafẓ al-Maʻṣūm al-Maʼmūn badhaltu fīhi al-naṣīḥah, wa-akhrajtuhu min al-Aḥādīth al-ṣaḥīḥah ..."

title: 880-02 Dalāʼil al-khayrāt wa-shawāriq al-anwār fī dhikr al-ṣalāh ʻalá al-Nabī al-mukhtār : manuscript / Muḥammad ibn Sulaymān al-Jazūlī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā wa-Mawlānā Muḥammad, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallam. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī hadānā lil-īmān wa-al-Islām, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad, Nabīyihi alladhī istanqadhanā min ʻibādat al-awthān wa-al-aṣnām, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi al-nujabāʼ al-bararah al-kirām. Allāhumma ṣallī [ṣalli] wa-sallim ʻalá man ashraf asmāʼihi Sayyidunā Muḥammad, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam ..."

title: 880-02 Kawkab al-mabānī wa-mawkib al-maʻānī sharḥ Ṣalawāt Sayyidī al-Shaykh ʻAbd al-Qādir al-Kīlānī : manuscript / ʻAbd al-Ghanī al-Nābulusī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh wa-kafá, wa-salāmun ʻalá ʻibādihi alladhīna iṣṭafá. Ammā baʻd, fa-hādhā sharḥ laṭīf, wa-sarḥ li-ṭayf al-khayāl al-muṭīf, kashafa bi-hi ʻAbd al-Ghanī ʻammā taḍammanahu al-matn min kull maʻnan sanī, wa-sirrun bi-hi jāmiʻuhu muʻtanī. Kayfa, wa-jāmiʻuhu, al-jāmiʻ al-fāriq, al-ʻālim al-mashhūr fī al-maghārib wa-al-mashāriq, al-ʻārif al-Rabbānī wa-al-haykal al-ṣamadānī, Janāb Abī Ṣāliḥ, al-Shaykh ʻAbd al-Qādir al-Kīlānī, Shaykhunā ijāzatan wa-ʻahdan, wa-ubūwatan rūḥānīyah, muḥāḍanatan wa-mahdan, saqá Allāh taʻālá sāḥat qalbihi saḥāʼib al-madad al-dāʼim min samāwāt qurbihi, wa-qaddasa Allāh rūḥahu wa-nawwara ḍarīḥahu ... Alā wa-inna al-matn huwa kitāb al-Ṣalawāt al-Muḥammadīyah wa-al-taslīmāt al-mubārakāt al-Aḥmadīyah ... wa-laqad salaktu fīhā maslak al-ikhtiṣār, fa-inna ẓulmat hādhā al-waqt lā taḥtamilu ishrāq hādhihi al-anwār ... wa-sammaytuhu 'Kawkab al-mabānī wa-markab al-maʻānī sharḥ Ṣalawāt Sayyidī al-Shaykh ʻAbd al-Qādir al-Kīlānī' ..."

title: 880-02 Ṣalawāt ʻalá al-Nabī : manuscript / Aḥmad ibn ʻAbd al-Fattāḥ al-Mullawī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Yaqūlu al-ʻabd al-faqīr ilá Rabbihi al-qawī, Aḥmad ibn ʻAbd al-Fattāḥ al-Mujīrī al-Mullawī: al-Ḥamdu lillāh al-Raḥīm al-Ghaffār, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad al-Nabī al-mukhtār, wa-ʻalá sāʼir al-nabīyīn, wa-ālihim wa-aṣḥābihim al-akhyār al-abrār, wa-al-tābiʻīn wa-tābiʻīhim bi-iḥsān ilá yawm al-dīn. Ammā baʻd, fa-hādhihi Ṣalawāt ʻalá al-Nabī, ṣallá Allāh [ʻalayhi] wa-sallam, jalīlat al-miqdār, asʼalu Allāh an yarzuqanī wa-kull man iʻtaná bi-hā al-ikhlāṣ wa-mazīd al-istibṣār ..."

title: 880-02 Dalāʼil al-khayrāt wa-shawāriq al-anwār fī dhikr al-ṣalāh ʻalá al-Nabī al-mukhtār : manuscript / Muḥammad ibn Sulaymān al-Jazūlī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Qāla al-Shaykh al-Imām, al-ʻālim al-ʻallāmah, Abū ʻAbd Allāh Muḥammad ibn Sulaymān al-Jazūlī, nafaʻanā Allāh bi-hi fī al-dārayn. Āmīn. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī hadānā lil-īmān wa-al-Islām, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Muḥammad Nabīyihi alladhī istanqadhanā bi-hi min ʻibādat al-awthān wa-al-aṣnām, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-aṣḥābihi al-nujabāʼ al-bararah al-kirām. Wa-baʻd, fa-al-gharaḍ fī hādhā al-kitāb dhikr al-ṣalāh ʻalá al-Nabī, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam wa-faḍāʼilihā, adhkuruhā maḥdhūfat al-asānīd li-yashula ḥifẓuhā ʻalá al-qāriʼ, wa-hiya min ahamm al-muhimmāt li-man yurīdu al-qurb min Rabb al-Arbāb. Wa-sammaytuhu bi-kitāb 'Dalāʼil al-khayrāt wa-shawāriq al-anwār fī dhikr al-ṣalāh ʻalá Muḥammad al-mukhtār', ibtighāʼ marḍāt Allāh taʻālá, wa-maḥabbatan fī Rasūlihi al-karīm, Muḥammad, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam ..."

title: 880-02 al-Durr al-manḍūd fī faḍl al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá ṣāḥib al-maqām al-maḥmūd : manuscript / Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad ibn Ḥajar al-Haythamī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi thiqatī wa-rajāʼī. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī ikhtaṣṣa Nabīyanā Muḥammadan, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam, bi-mā imtāza bi-hi ʻalá sāʼir al-anbiyāʼ wa-al-mursalīn wa-al-malāʼikah al-muqarrabīn, wa-awjaba ʻalá al-kāffah tawqīrahu wa-taʻẓīmah, wa-al-qiyām bi-ḥuqūqihi, sirran wa-ʻalanan, li-yakūnū min al-muhtadīn. Wa-ashhadu an lā ilāha illā Allāh waḥdah, lā sharīka lah, shahādatan antaẓimu bi-hā fī silk al-aʼimmah al-wārithīn ..."

title: 880-03 Rawḍat al-ṭālibīn wa-ʻumdat al-muftīn. Volume 8 : manuscript / Muḥyī al-Dīn Yaḥyá ibn Sharaf al-Nawawī.
note_text: Incipit: "Kitāb al-Ṣayd wa-al-dhabāʼiḥ wa-al-ʻaqīqah wa-al-aṭʻimah. Hādhihi al-kutub taqaddamat fī ākhir al-ʻibādāt.
