Kitāb al-sabq wa-al-ramy, wa-huwa al-munāḍalah. al-Musābaqah wa-al-munāḍalah jāʼizatān, bal, sunnatān, idhā quṣida bihimā al-taʼahhub lil-jihād. Qultu yukrahu li-man ʻalim al-ramy tarkuhu karāhatan shadīdah; fa-fī Ṣaḥīḥ Muslim ʻan ʻUqbah, raḍiya Allāh ʻanhu, Anna Rasūl Allāh, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam, qāl: 'Man ʻalima al-ramy thumma tarakahu fa-laysa minnā', aw, 'qad ʻaṣiya'. Wa-Allāh aʻlam ..."

title: 880-03 Rawḍat al-ṭālibīn wa-ʻumdat al-muftīn. Volume 6 : manuscript / Muḥyī al-Dīn Yaḥyá ibn Sharaf al-Nawawī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Rabbi zidnī ʻilman. Kitāb al-Ṭalāq. Fīhi sittat abwāb. al-Awwal fī al-ṭalāq al-Sunnī wa-al-bidʻī, wa-fīhi ṭarafān: al-Awwal, fī bayān al-bidʻī wa-al-Sunnī. Lam tazal al-ʻulamāʼ qadīman wa-ḥadīthan yaṣifūn al-ṭalāq bi-al-Sunnah wa-al-bidʻah, wa-fī maʻnāhumā iṣṭlāḥān. Aḥaduhumā al-Sunnī lā yuḥarramu īqāʻuhu, wa-al-bidʻī mā yuḥarram. Wa-ʻalá hādhā, fa-lā qisma siwāhumā ..."

title: 880-03 Rawḍat al-ṭālibīn wa-ʻumdat al-muftīn. Volume 7 : manuscript / Muḥyī al-Dīn Yaḥyá ibn Sharaf al-Nawawī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Rabbi zidnī ʻilman. Kitāb al-Jināyāt. Wa-hiya al-qatl wa-al-qaṭʻ wa-al-jarḥ alladhī lā yuzhiq wa-lā yabīn. Qatl al-nafs bi-ghayr ḥaqq min akbar al-kabāʼir. Qultu: Qāla al-Baghawī: Huwa akbar al-kabāʼir baʻda al-kufr. Wa-kadhā naṣṣa ʻalayhi al-Shāfiʻī, raḍiya Allāh ʻanhu, fī Kitāb al-Shahādāt min al-Mukhtaṣar, wa-tuqbalu al-tawbah minh. Wa-law qatala [Musliman], thumma māta qabla al-tawbah, lā yataḥattamu dukhūluhu al-nār, bal huwa fī khaṭar al-mashīʼah, ka-sāʼir aṣḥāb al-kabāʼir, fa-in dakhalahā lam yukhallad fīhā, khilāfan lil-Muʻtazilah wa-al-Khawārij ..."

title: 880-02 Dalāʼil al-khayrāt wa-shawāriq al-anwār fī dhikr al-ṣalāh ʻalá al-Nabī al-mukhtār : manuscript / Muḥammad ibn Sulaymān al-Jazūlī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī hadānā lil-īmān wa-al-Islām, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Nabīyihi alladhī istanqadhanā bi-hi min ʻibādat al-awthān wa-al-aṣnām, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-aṣḥābihi al-nujabāʼ al-bararah al-kirām. Hādhā, fa-al-gharaḍ fī hādhā al-kitāb dhikr al-ṣalāh ʻalá al-Nabī, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam, wa-faḍāʼilihā, nadhkuruhā, maḥdhūfat al-asānīd, li-yashula ḥifẓuhā ʻalá al-qāriʼ, wa-hiya min ahamm al-muhimmāt li-man yurīdu al-qurb min Rabb al-Arbāb, bi-Kitāb Dalāʼil al-khayrāt wa-shawāriq al-anwār fī dhikr al-ṣalāh ʻalá al-Nabī, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam, ibtighāʼan li-marḍāt Allāh taʻālá wa-maḥabbat Rasūlih al-karīm Muḥammad, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam ..."

title: 880-01 Taʻlīqāt ʻalá Sharḥ Faḍāʼil Ramaḍān : manuscript.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallam. 'Yā ayyuhā alladhīn āmanū kutiba ʻalaykum al-ṣiyām'. Atá bi-Yāʼ al-nidāʼ al-mawḍūʻah li-nidāʼ al-baʻīd, wa-in kāna al-munādá qarīban, idh qad tustaʻmalu fīhi li-tanzīlihi manzilat al-baʻīd lil-iʻtināʼ bi-al-madʻw la-hu wa-ziyādat al-ḥathth ʻalayhi. Wa-qāla al-Bayḍāwī ʻinda qawlihi: 'Yā ayyuhā al-nās uʻbudū rabbakum', mā naṣṣuhu: Wa-yā ḥarf wuḍiʻa li-nidāʼ al-baʻīd, wa-qad yunādá bi-hi al-qarīb tanzīlan la-hu manzilat al-baʻīd'. 'Immā' li-ʻaẓamatihi, ka-qawl al-dāʻī 'Yā Rabb wa-Yā Allāh', wa-Huwa aqrab ilayhi min ḥabl al-warīd, wa-lighaflatihi wa-sūʼ fahmih, aw lil-iʻtināʼ bi-al-madʻw la-hu wa-ziyādat al-ḥathth ʻalayhi. Intahá ..."

title: 880-02 Munyat al-muṣallī wa-ghunyat al-mubtadiʼ : manuscript / Sadīd al-Dīn al-Kāshgharī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn. Wa-al-ṣalāh ʻalá Rasūlihi Muḥammad, khātim al-nabīyīn. Wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá jamīʻ al-anbiyāʼ wa-al-mursalīn. Iʻlamū waffaqakum Allāh wa-īyānā inna anwāʻ al-ʻulūm kathīrah, wa-ahamm al-anwāʻ bi-al-taḥṣīl masāʼil al-ṣalāh. Fa-lammā raʼytu raghbat al-muqtabisīn fī taḥṣīlihā, iltaqaṭtu mā kathura wuqūʻuhu, wa-mimmā lā budda lahum minhu min muṣannafāt al-mutaqaddimīn wa-min mukhtārāt al-mutʼakhkhirīn, naḥwa al-Hidāyah, wa-al-Muḥīṭ, wa-Sharḥ al-Asbījābī [?], wa-al-Ghunyah, wa-al-Multaqaṭ, wa-al-Dhakhīrah, wa-Fatāwá Qāḍī Khān, wa-Jāmiʻayhi. Wa-sammaytuhu 'Munyat al-muṣallī wa-ghunyat al-mubtadī'. Asʼalu Allāh taʻālá an yajʻala mā iʻtamadtuhu khāliṣan li-wajh Allāh wa-mukaffiran li-dhunūbī bi-faḍlihi wa-raḥmatih ..."

title: 880-02 Ghāyat al-maqṣūd li-man yataʻāṭá al-ʻuqūd : manuscript / Abū al-ʻAbbās Aḥmad ibn ʻUmar al-Dayrabī al-Shāfiʻī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi thiqatī. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī ḥarrama al-sifāḥ wa-aḥalla al-nikāḥ lil-khāṣṣ wa-al-ʻāmm, wa-bayyana al-ḥalāl wa-al-ḥarām min al-nisāʼ, ʻalá lisān man arsalahu raḥmatan lil-anām. Aḥmaduhu, subḥānuhu wa-taʻālá, ʻalá mā manaḥanā min al-anʻām, wa-ashhadu an lā ilāha illā Allāh waḥdahu, lā sharīka lah, al-Malik al-ʻallām. Wa-ashhadu anna Sayyidanā Muḥammadan ʻabdahu wa-rasūlah ashraf al-anām, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-aṣḥābih, ṣalātan wa-salāman dāʼimayn bilā infiṣām. Ammā baʻd, fa-yaqūlu al-ʻabd al-faqīr al-muʻtarif bi-al-ʻajz wa-al-taqṣīr, Aḥmad al-Dayrabī al-Shāfiʻī al-Ghunaymī: Qad saʼalanī wālidī wa-baʻḍ al-ikhwān min al-anām, aḥsana Allāh lī wa-lahum ka-al-mabdaʼ al-khitām an aktuba shayʼan min al-masāʼil al-sharīʻah [al-sharʻīyah] al-mutaʻalliqah bi-al-nikāḥ ʻalá madhhab al-Shāfiʻī wa-Abī Ḥanīfah, fa-ajabtuhum ilá dhālik ..."

title: 880-02 Mukhtaṣar Munyat al-muṣallī wa-ghunyat al-mubtadī : manuscript / Ibrāhīm ibn Muḥammad ibn Ibrāhīm al-Ḥalabī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī jaʻala al-ʻibādah maftaḥ al-saʻādah wa-maṭmaḥ al-siyādah wa-malmaḥ al-ḥusná wa-al-ziyādah, wa-jaʻala al-ṣalāh ʻamūd qiyāmihā wa-zarwat [wa-dharwat] sanāmihā wa-ʻumdat aḥkāmihā. Wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá afḍal khalqihi, Sayyidinā Muḥammad alladhī juʻilat fī al-ṣalāh qurrat ʻaynihi, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-aṣḥābihi alladhīna fāzū min maʻdin al-dīn bi-lujaynihi wa-ʻaynih. Wa-baʻd, fa-yaqūlu al-muftaqir ilá Rabbihi al-ghanī, Ibrāhīm ibn Muḥammad ibn Ibrāhīm al-Ḥalabī: Qad kuntu sharaḥtu kitāb Munyat al-muṣallī sharḥan, wa-sammaytuhu bi-Ghunyat al-mutamallī, lākin raʼaytu fīhi baʻḍ al-iṭālah allatī awjabat lil-mubtadiʼīn wa-al-qāṣirīn al-malālah, fa-ajibu [fa-aḥbabtu] an akhtaṣira min farāʼid dalāʼilihi, wa-azīda fī fawāʼid masāʼilihi, tasʹhīlan lil-ṭālibīn, wa-tanwīlan lil-rāghibīn. Wa-Allāh subḥānuhu wa-taʻālá huwa al-mustaʻān ʻalá kull murād. Minhu al-mabdaʼ wa-ilayhi al-maʻād. Wa-huwa ḥasbī wa-niʻma al-wakīl."

title: 880-02 Itmām al-dirāyah li-qurrāʼ al-Nuqāyah : manuscript / Jalāl al-Dīn ʻAbd al-Raḥmān ibn Abī Bakr al-Suyūṭī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallam. al-Ḥamdu lillāh ʻalá niʻamihi al-sābighah al-shāmilah, wa-ashhadu an lā ilāha illā Allāh waḥdah, lā sharīka lah, shahādatan bi-al-najāh min al-aḥwāl kāfilah. Wa-ashhadu anna Muḥammadan ʻabduhu wa-rasūluh, dhū al-awṣāf al-jamīlah al-kāmilah, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-man nāṣarahu wa-khālalah. Wa-baʻd, falammā ẓahar lī taṣwīb al-muliḥḥīn ʻalayya fī waḍʻ sharḥ ʻalá al-kurrāsah allatī sammaytuhā bi-al-Nuqāyah, wa-ḍammantuhā arbaʻata ʻashara ʻilman, wa-rāʻaytu fīhā ghāyat al-ījāz wa-al-ikhtiṣār, wa-awdaʻtu fī ṭayy alfāẓihā mā nasharahu al-nās fī al-kutub al-kibār, bi-ḥaythu lā yaḥtāju al-ṭālib ilá ghayrihā, wa-lā yuḥramu al-faṭin al-mutasāʼil li-daqāʼiqihā min khayrihā, bādartu ilá dhālika li-ʻumūm al-ʻāʼidah, wa-tamām al-fāʼidah, wa-ibrāzan li-mā anā bi-istikhrājihi aḥrá, idh ṣāḥib al-bayt adrá bi-mā fīhi. Wa-sammaytuhu 'Itmām al-dirāyah li-qurrāʼ al-Nuqāyah'. Wa-Allāh asʼalu al-tawfīq wa-al-hidāyah wa-al-riʻāyah ..."

title: 880-02 Taqrīb al-fawāʼid wa-tasʹhīl al-maqāṣid : manuscript / ʻAlī ibn ʻAṭīyah al-Ḥamawī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi nastaʻīn. Rabbi ishraḥ lī ṣadrī, wa-yassir lī amrī, wa-iḥlil ʻuqdatan min lisānī yafqahū qawlī. Rabbanā ātinā min ladunika raḥmatan, wa-hayyiʼ lanā min amrinā rashadan. Rabbi zidnī ʻilaman. al-Ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn, muqarrib al-baʻīd wa-musahhil al-shadīd, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad, Khātim al-Rusul, wa-sayyid al-ʻabīd, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi, wa-jamīʻ ʻibād Allāh min kull barrin rashīd, ṣalātan tūjibu li-qāʼilihā ladhdhat al-naẓar ilá wajh Allāh al-karīm yawm al-waʻīd. Ammā baʻd, faqad iltamasa minnī baʻḍ aṣdiqāʼī an akhtaṣira kitābanā 'Miṣbāḥ al-hidāyah wa-miftāḥ al-wilāyah', fa-raʼaytu anna fī dhālika khayran, in shāʼa Allāh, fa-ajabtuhu. Wa-min Allāh astamiddu al-tawfīq, wa-iyyāhu asʼalu al-hidāyah ilá sawāʼ al-ṭarīq, wa-aljaʼu ilayhi an yanfaʻafnī bi-hi wa-al-Muslimīn fī al-dārayn, wa-an yajʻalanā wa-sāʼir al-aḥibbah min khayr al-farīqayn ..."

title: 880-02 al-Tathbīt ʻinda al-tabyīt : manuscript / Jalāl al-Dīn ʻAbd al-Raḥmān ibn Abī Bakr al-Suyūṭī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-sallam. al-Ḥamdu lillāhi ʻalá al-Islāmi // wa-al-shukru lillāhi ʻalá al-inʻāmi. Wa-afḍalu al-ṣalāti wa-al-thanāʼi // ʻalá al-Nabīyi Khātim al-Anbiyāʼi. Wa-ālihi ahli al-nuhá wa-ṣaḥbi-hi // wa-jundihi ahli al-tuqá wa-ḥizbihi ..."

title: 880-02 al-Ādāb al-sanīyah wa-al-afʻāl al-sharīfah al-marḍīyah al-qudsīyah li-man yurīdu sulūk ṭarīq al-Sādah al-khalwatīyah : manuscript / Muḥammad ibn Ḥasan al-Munayyir al-Samannūdī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Ḥamdan li-man jaʻala al-dhikr afḍal al-ʻibādāt, wa-jaʻala dhākirahu min afḍal al-barīyāt wa-al-makhlūqāt, wa-waʻadahum al-Jannah, wa-rafaʻa lahum fīhā aʻlá al-darajāt, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Sayyid al-Sādāt wa-ashraf al-mawjūdāt min ahl al-arḍ wa-al-samāwāt, alladhī man iqtafá atharahu wa-ʻamila bi-sunnatihi wa-salaka ṭarīqahu waṣala ilá Rabbihi wa-ṣāra min ahl qurbihi ... Wa-baʻd, fa-yaqūlu ḥammāl al-dhunūb wa-kathīr al-kurūb wa-al-lughūb ... Muḥammad ibn Ḥasan al-Shāfiʻī al-Khalwatī al-Munayyir al-shahīr bi-al-Samānūdī ... qad saʼalanī baʻḍ al-ikhwān ... an aḍaʻa sharḥan laṭīfan ʻalá manẓūmah naẓamtuhā tataʻallaqu bi-shayʼ min shurūṭ al-dhikr wa-al-ṭarīq wa-mā ʻalayhi ahl al-maʻrifah wa-al-ʻulūm wa-al-taḥqīq ... wa-sammaytuhu 'al-Ādāb al-sanīyah wa-al-afʻāl al-sharīfah al-marḍīyah al-qudsīyah li-man yurīdu ṭarīq al-Sādah al-khalwatīyah' ..."

title: 880-02 Ḥall al-rumūz wa-mafātīḥ al-kunūz : manuscript / ʻIzz al-Dīn ʻAbd al-Salām ibn Aḥmad ibn Ghānim al-Maqdisī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Rabbi yassir. Qāla al-Shaykh al-Imām al-ʻālim al-ʻāmil al-ʻallāmah, jāmiʻ al-faḍāʼil wa-mūḍiḥ al-dalāʼil, baqīyat al-salaf al-ṣāliḥīn, quṭb al-ʻārifīn, ʻIzz al-Dīn ʻAbd al-Salām ibn al-Shaykh al-Imām al-zāhid, al-wariʻ al-ʻābid al-taqī, shaykh al-mashāyikh Aḥmad ibn al-Shaykh Ghānim al-Maqdisī, nafaʻa Allāh al-Islām bi-barakātih, wa-aʻāda ʻalayhim min ṣāliḥ daʻawātih wa-khalawātih; Innahu ʻalá mā yashāʼu qadīr wa-bi-al-ijābah jadīr: al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī fataḥa bi-mafātīḥ al-ghuyūb aqfāl al-qulūb, wa-rafaʻa ḥujub al-sarāyir, wa-jalā abṣār al-baṣāʼir, fa-ẓahara mā huwa maḥjūb, wa-jalā ʻarāʼis al-wujūd fī mirʼāt al-shuhūd, fa-man fahim al-maqṣūd balagha al-maṭlūb ..."

title: 880-02 al-Risālah al-qudsīyah fī asrār al-nuqṭah al-ḥissīyah al-mushīrāt ilá asrār al-huwīyah al-ghaybīyah : manuscript / ʻAlī ibn Muḥammad al-Hamadhānī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī ẓahar bimā shāʼ li-man shāʼ, bi-mashīʼatihi al-Ilāhīyah [ṣuḥḥiḥat ilá "al-azalīyah"], wa-istatara ʻamman shāʼ bi-astār ʻizzatihi al-sarmadīyah, wa-jaʻala khaṣāʼiṣ al-nuqṭah bi-qudratihi āyah dāllah ʻalá ḥaqāʼiq aḥadīyatihi al-ghaybīyah, wa-aṭlaʻa ṭawāliʻ ḥaqāʼiqihā fī ʻālam al-raqm ʻukūsan li-shuʼūn tajalliyātihi al-dhātīyah wa-tanazzulāt āyatihi al-qudsīyah, wa-ṣayyarahā bi-ḥikmatihi huyūlá li-ṣuwar al-ḥurūf al-khaṭṭīyah wa-aʻyān al-kalimāt al-raqmīyah, thumma satarahā bi-mā aẓhara mā bi-hā minhā li-tabyīn al-dalālāt ʻalá al-umūr al-Ilāhīyah ..."

title: 880-02 Ḥall al-rumūz wa-mafātīḥ al-kunūz : manuscript / ʻIzz al-Dīn ʻAbd al-Salām ibn Aḥmad ibn Ghānim al-Maqdisī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallam. Qāla al-Shaykh al-Imām al-ʻālim al-ʻāmil al-muḥaqqiq, al-mūṣil ilá ḥaḍrat al-takwīn wa-al-tamkīn, al-muḥaqqaq bi-maqāmāt al-kirām, Sayyidī al-Shaykh ʻIzz al-Dīn ibn ʻAbd al-Salām ibn al-ʻabd al-faqīr ilá Allāh taʻālá Aḥmad ibn al-Shaykh Ghānim al-Maqdisī, qaddasa Allāh rūḥahu: al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī fataḥa bi-mafātīḥ al-ghuyūb aqfāl al-qulūb, wa-rafaʻa ḥujub al-sarāyir, wa-nawwara abṣār al-baṣāʼir, fa-ẓahara mā kāna maḥjūban, wa-jalā ʻan al-wujūd fī mirʼāt al-shuhūd li-man fahim al-maqṣūd wa-balagha al-maṭlūb, waffaqa man shāʼa min ʻibādihi fa-jāhada fī Allāh ḥaqqa jihādih ..."

title: 880-02 al-Sabʻīyāt fī mawāʻiẓ al-barīyāt : manuscript / Muḥammad ibn ʻAbd al-Raḥmān ʻAyn al-Quḍāh al-Hamadhānī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallam. al-Ḥamdu lillāh al-Malik al-jabbār, al-ʻazīz al-ghaffār, al-muhayymin al-sattār, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad, al-Nabī al-Mukhtār, sayyid al-abrār, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallama taslīman. Qāla al-Shaykh al-Imām, al-ʻālim al-ʻallāmah, Abū al-Naṣr Muḥammad ibn ʻAbd al-Raḥmān al-Hamdānī [al-Hamadhānī], raḥimahu Allāh taʻālá, qāl: Iʻlam anna al-Khāliq al-Bārī, jallat qudratuhu, wa-ʻalat kalimatuhu, wa-tawālat niʻamuhu, wa-tatābaʻat ālāʼuhu, zayyana al-ashyāʼ al-sabʻah, thumma zayyana al-sabʻah bi-sabʻah ukhrá, li-yaʻlama al-ʻālimūn anna al-aʻdād sabʻah [lil-aʻdād al-sabʻah] ʻinda Mālik al-ḍarr wa-al-nafʻ khaṭaran ʻaẓīman wa-maḥallan jasīman ..."

title: 880-02 Risālah fī ʻilm al-sulūk : manuscript / Abū al-Jannāb Najm al-Dīn Aḥmad ibn ʻUmar al-Kubarā.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī yaʻlamu makāyīl al-biḥār wa-mathāqīl al-jibāl, mursil al-saḥāb al-thiqāl, wa-mudabbir al-umūr, wa-muqallib al-aḥwāl, muqaddir al-arzāq wa-al-ājāl, dhī al-faḍl wa-al-ikrām wa-al-jalāl, al-munazzah ʻan al-ḥulūl wa-al-intiqāl, wa-al-ittiṣāl wa-al-infiṣāl, al-muttaṣif bi-ṣifāt al-kamāl, al-muqaddas ʻan al-nuqṣān wa-al-zawāl, al-mubarr [al-mubarraʼ] min maqālat al-kufr wa-al-ḍalāl, huwa al-ḥayy, lā ilāha illā hū, al-kabīr al-mutaʻāl, laysa la-hu sharīk wa-lā mithāl ..."

title: 880-02 Ghayth al-mawāhib al-ʻalīyah bi-Sharḥ al-Ḥikam al-ʻAṭāʼīyah : manuscript / Muḥammad ibn Ibrāhīm ibn ʻAbbād al-Nafazī al-Rundī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Rabbi yassir. Qāla al-ʻabd al-faqīr ilá Allāh taʻālá, al-muʻtamid fī ghufrān dhunūbihi ʻalá Allāh taʻālá, Muḥammad ibn Ibrāhīm ibn ʻAbbād al-Nafazī al-ʻArsawī [?], laṭafa Allāh taʻālá bi-hi wa-raḥimahu wa-ghafara la-hu. Āmīn: al-Ḥamdu lillāh al-munfarid bi-al-ʻaẓamah wa-al-jalāl, al-mutawaḥḥid bi-istiḥqāq nuʻūt al-kamāl, al-munazzah ʻan al-shurakāʼ wa-al-nuẓarāʼ wa-al-amthāl, al-mutaqaddis ʻan simāh [simāt] al-ḥadath min al-taghyīr wa-al-intiqāl wa-al-ittiṣāl wa-al-infiṣāl, ʻālim al-ghayb wa-al-shahādah, al-kabīr al-mutaʻāl, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad al-hādī min al-ḍalāl ..."

title: 880-02 al-Sabʻīyāt fī mawāʻiẓ al-barīyāt : manuscript / Muḥammad ibn ʻAbd al-Raḥmān ʻAyn al-Quḍāh al-Hamadhānī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh al-Malik al-jabbār, al-ʻazīz al-muhayymin al-sattār, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻala al-Nabī al-Mukhtār, Sayyidinā Muḥammad khayr al-abrār, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi al-amājid al-akhyār, ṣalātan wa-salāman dāʼimayn mutalāzimayn mā taʻāqaba al-layl wa-al-nahār. Wa-baʻd, fa-hādhā Kitāb al-Sabʻīyāt fī mawāʻiẓ Rabb al-Barīyāt. Fa-qāla al-Shaykh al-ʻālim al-ʻallāmah al-mufrad Abū al-Naṣr Muḥammad ibn ʻAbd al-Raḥmān al-Hamdānī [al-Hamadhānī], raḍiya Allāh taʻālá ʻanh: Iʻlam anna al-Khāliq al-Bārī, jallat qudratuhu, wa-ʻalat kalimatuhu, wa-tawālat ilāhīyatuh, wa-tazāyadat naʻmāʼuhu, zayyana al-ashyāʼ al-sabʻah bi-al-ashbāh al-sabʻah, thumma zayyana tilka al-sabʻah bi-sabʻah ukhrá, li-yaʻlama al-ʻālimūn anna al-aʻdād [lil-aʻdād] ʻinda Mālik al-ḍarr wa-al-nafʻ khaṭaran ʻaẓīman wa-maḥallan jasīman ..."

title: 880-02 al-Ḥikam al-ʻAṭāʼīyah : manuscript / Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad ibn ʻAṭāʼ Allāh al-Sakandarī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm wa-bi-hi nastaʻīn. al-Ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad, Khātim al-Nabīyīn, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi ajmaʻīn. Wa-baʻd, fa-hādhihi ḥikam asrāruhā jalīyah wa-anwāruhā qaṣīyah, li-quṭb al-ʻārifīn wa-imām al-muḥaqqiqīn, Tāj al-Dīn, Abū al-ʻAbbās, Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad ibn ʻAbd al-Karīm ibn ʻAṭāʼ Allāh al-Sakandarī, raḍiya Allāh ʻanhu wa-jaʻala al-Jannah munqalabahu wa-mathwāh. Qāla, raḍiya Allāh ʻanhu: Min ʻalāmāt al-iʻtimād ʻalá al-ʻamal nuqṣān al-rajāʼ ʻinda wujūd al-zalal. Irādatuka al-tajrīd maʻa iqāmat Allāh īyāka fī al-asbāb min al-shahwah al-khafīyah, wa-irādatuka al-asbāb maʻa iqāmat Allāh īyāk fī al-tajrīd inḥiṭāṭ ʻan al-himmah al-ʻalīyah ..."

title: 880-02 Fī bayān al-sayr ilá Allāh : manuscript / Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad al-Dardīr.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Qāla Sayyidunā wa-Mawlānā wa-Shaykhunā al-Shaykh al-Imām al-ʻālim al-ʻallāmah al-humām, al-ruḥalah al-awḥad al-amjad, murabbī al-ṭālibīn, maljaʼ al-qāṣidīn, ṣāḥib al-taḥqīqāt al-nafīsah, wa-muẓhir al-tadqīqāt al-gharībah, Shihāb al-Dīn Abū al-Barakāt Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad al-Dardīr al-ʻAdwī al-Mālikī: al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī ṭahhara qulūb aḥbābihi min ẓulm al-ghiyār, wa-nawwara baṣāʼirahum bi-luṭf al-maʻārif wa-lawāmiʻ al-asrār, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad afḍal al-akhyār, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-aṣḥābihi al-sādah al-abrār. Wa-baʻd, fa-hādhihi nubdhah laṭīfah Fī bayān al-sayr ilá Allāh al-wāḥid al-qahhār, jaʻaltuhā tabṣirah li-ikhwānī wa-tadhkirah li-khullānī ..."

title: 880-02 al-Sharḥ al-ṣaghīr ʻalá Aqrab al-masālik ilá madhhab al-Imām Mālik : manuscript / Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad al-Dardīr.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi thiqatī. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallam. al-Ḥamdu lillāh ʻalá afḍālih, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-ālih. Ammā baʻd, fa-hādhā sharḥ laṭīf ʻalá kitābinā al-musammá bi-'Aqrab al-masālik li-madhhab al-Imām Mālik', iqtaṣartu fīhi ʻalá bayān maʻānī alfāẓih li-yashula fahmuhu ʻalá al-mubtadiʼīn wa-sharḥuhu wa-qirāʼatuhu li-man shāʼa bi-mashīʼat Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn, fa-aqūlu, wa-bi-hi astaʻīn: Yaqūlu al-ʻabd al-faqīr al-munkasir al-fuʼād min al-taqṣīr Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad al-Dardīr ..."

title: 880-02 Bidāyat al-hidāyah : manuscript / Abū Ḥāmid Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad al-Ghazzālī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallam. Qāla al-Shaykh al-jalīl, al-Imām, al-ʻālim al-ʻallāmah, Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad al-Ghazzālī, raḥmat Allāh ʻalayh: Ammā baʻd, fa-iʻlam ayyuhā al-ḥarīṣ ʻalá iqtibās al-ʻilm, al-muẓhir min nafsihi ṣidq al-raghbah wa-farṭ al-taʻaṭṭush ilayh, innaka in kunta taqṣidu ṭalaba al-ʻilm lil-munāfasah wa-al-mubāhāt [wa-al-mubāhāh] wa-al-taqaddum ʻalá al-aqrān wa-al-istimālah [wa-istimālat] wujūh al-nās wa-jamʻ ḥuṭām al-dunyā, fa-anta sāʻin fī hadm dīnik wa-halāk nafsik wa-bayʻ ākhiratika bi-dunyāk, fa-ṣafqatuka khāsirah, wa-tijāratuka bāʼirah, wa-muʻallimuka muʻīn ʻalá ʻiṣyānika, wa-sharīkun laka fī khusrānika ..."

title: 880-02 al-Tibr al-masbūk fī naṣīḥat al-mulūk : manuscript / Abū Ḥāmid Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad al-Ghazzālī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh ʻalá inʻāmih wa-ifḍālih, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-aṣḥābihi wa-ālih. Wa-baʻd, fa-innahu saʼalanī baʻḍ al-mutaqaddimīn min al-kubarāʼ an anqula hādhā al-kitāb, wa-huwa 'Kitāb Naṣīḥat al-mulūk' min al-lughah al-Fārisīyah ilá al-alfāẓ al-ʻArabīyah, fa-imtathaltu dhālik, wa-naqaltuhu ʻalá tartībihi wa-ṣūratih, wa-lam ughayyir shayʼan min waḍʻ al-kitāb wa-ṣifatih, wa-ijtahadtu fī tashīl ʻibārātih wa-īḍāḥ ishārātih ..."

title: 880-02 al-Ḥikam al-ʻirfānīyah wa-al-ishārāt al-Qurʼānīyah : manuscript / ʻAlī ibn ʻAbd al-Malik al-Muttaqī al-Hindī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi nastaʻīn. al-Ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad, Khātim al-Anbiyāʼ wa-al-Mursalīn, wa-ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi ajmaʻīn. Ammā baʻd, fa-hādhihi 'Ḥikam ʻirfānīyah fī maʻānin irshādīyah wa-ishārāt Qurʼānīyah'. Kull ḥikmah minhā muʼayyadah bi-āyah aw baʻḍihā; bayna al-āyah wa-al-ḥikamah munāsabah lā yakhfá [lā takhfá] ʻalá al-mutaʼammil, lākin lā yudriku ladhdhat dhālik ʻalá wajh al-kamāl illā ḥāfiẓ al-āyāt wa-man la-hu ilmām bi-tafsīrihā, wa-ḥaẓẓ min ʻulūm al-ishārāt; fa-innī adhkuru baʻḍ al-āyah wa-atruku mā baʻdahā, iʻtimādan ʻalá ḥifẓ al-ṭālib ..."

title: 880-02 Bulghat al-murīd wa-mushtahá al-saʻīd fīmā yajibu fī al-ṭarīq ʻalá al-murīd : manuscript / Muṣṭafá ibn Kamāl al-Dīn al-Bakrī al-Ṣiddīqī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh ʻalá al-tawfīqi // mā sāra sārin manhaja al-taḥqīqi. Wa-al-shukru lillāhi ʻalá al-inʻāmi // mā adhhaba al-nahāru lil-ẓalāmi ..."

title: 880-02 Mashāriq al-anwār al-Qudsīyah fī bayān al-ʻuhūd al-Muḥammadīyah : manuscript / ʻAbd al-Wahhāb ibn Aḥmad al-Shaʻrānī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn, wa-ashhadu an lā ilāha illā [Allāh], al-Malik al-Ḥaqq al-Mubīn, wa-ashhadu anna Sayyidanā Muḥammadan ʻabduhu wa-rasūluh, sayyid al-awwalīn wa-al-ākharīn. Allāhumma, fa-ṣalli wa-sallim ʻalayhi wa-ʻalá sāyir al-anbiyāʼ wa-al-mursalīn, wa-ʻalá ālihim wa-ṣaḥbihim ajmaʻīn, ṣalātan wa-salāman dāʼimayn, abada al-ābidīn. Āmīn. Āmīn. Āmīn. Wa-baʻd, fa-hādhā kitāb nafīs lam yasbiqnī aḥad ilá waḍʻ mithālih, wa-lā aẓunnu aḥadan nasaja ʻalá minwālih, ḍammantuhu jamīʻ al-ʻuhūd allatī balaghatnā ʻan Rasūl Allāh, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam, min fiʻl al-maʼmūrāt wa-tark al-manhīyāt. Wa-sammaytuhu 'Mashāriq al-anwār al-Qudsīyah fī bayān al-ʻuhūd al-Muḥammadīyah'. Wa-kāna al-bāʻith lī ʻalá taʼlīfih mā raʼaytuhu min kathrat taftīsh al-ikhwān ʻalá mā naquṣa min dunyāhum, wa-lam ara aḥadan minhum yufattishu ʻalá mā naquṣa min umūr dīnih, fa-waḍaʻtu lahum hādhā al-kitāb ..."

title: 880-02 al-Anwār al-sanīyah ʻalá al-Waẓīfah al-Zarrūqīyah : manuscript / ʻAbd al-Raḥmān ibn Muḥammad al-ʻAyyāshī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbih. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī arshadanā li-iqāmat waẓāʼif al-Islām, wa-ḥaḍḍanā ʻalá takthīr dhikrihi fī al-ghudw wa-al-āṣāl ʻalá al-dawām, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad al-badr al-tamām, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi al-sādāt al-aʻlām. Wa-baʻd, fa-yaqūlu al-ʻabd al-faqīr ilá Allāh subḥānuh, al-mutaʻalliq bi-adhyāl awliyāʼih, ʻAbd al-Raḥmān Muḥammad ibn ʻAbd al-Raḥmān ibn Muḥammad ibn Abī Bakr al-ʻAyyāshī, nawwara Allāh qalbahu, wa-satara ʻaybahu, wa-khatama bi-kalimatay al-shahādah qawlahu, wa-faʻala bi-ummat Muḥammad, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam, mithlahu, qāl: Ṭāla mā khālaja qalbī an aḍaʻa taqyīdan yakūnu ka-al-sharḥ ʻalá 'al-Waẓīfah al-Zarrūqīyah', al-jāmiʻah li-khayray al-dunuā wa-al-ākhirah, allatī sārat masīrat al-Shams fī al-bilād, wa-intafaʻa bi-hā fī jamīʻ al-aqṭār al-ʻibād, munṭawiyan ʻalá tafsīr gharāʼibihā, wa-muḥtawiyan ʻalá faḍīlat adhkārihā ... wa-sammaytuhu 'al-Anwār al-sanīyah ʻalá al-Waẓīfah al-Zarrūqīyah' ..."

title: 880-01 Mukhtaṣar Minhāj al-ʻābidīn : manuscript.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Wa-bi-hi thiqatī. Qad rattaba al-Imām, Ḥujjat al-Islām, Abū Ḥāmid al-Ghazzālī, raḥimahu Allāh, kitāb Minhāj al-ʻābidīn ʻalá sabʻ ʻaqabāt: al-Ūlá ʻaqabat al-ʻilm, al-thāniyah ʻaqabat al-tawḥīd, al-thālithah ʻaqabat al-ʻawāʼiq (wa-hiya al-dunyā, wa-al-khalq, wa-al-Shayṭān, wa-al-nafs), al-rābiʻah ʻaqabat al-ʻawāriḍ (wa-hiya al-rizq, wa-al-akhṭār min kull shayʼ yukhāfu aw yurjá aw yurādu aw yukrahu; fa-inna ʻawāʼiq al-umūr mubhamah, fa-yashtaghilu al-qalb bi-hā, wa-al-shadāʼid, wa-anwāʻ al-qaḍāʼ), al-khāmisah ʻaqabat al-bawāʻith (wa-hiya al-khawf wa-al-rajāʼ), wa-al-sādisah ʻaqabat al-qawādiḥ (wa-hiya al-ʻujb wa-al-riyāʼ), al-sābiʻah ʻaqabat al-ḥamd wa-al-shukr ..."

title: 880-02 al-Sayr wa-al-sulūk ilá Malik al-Mulūk : manuscript / Qāsim ibn Ṣalāḥ al-Dīn al-Khānī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Hādhā al-kitāb Sayr al-mulūk. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī ahbaṭa bi-ḥikmatihi asrār dhātih min samāʼ al-ʻamāʼ ilá arḍ al-ṭabīʻah al-kullīyah, wa-awdaʻahā bi-qudratih fī ṣadaf al-nuṭaf iẓhāran li-khawāṣṣ al-asmāʼ, fa-inḥajabat al-ẓulumāt al-nafsānīyah ḥijāban ansāhā mā kānat ʻalayhi min al-kamālāt, fa-mālat ilá al-shahawāt, wa-rakanat ilá al-maḥsūsāt, wa-alifat al-ʻādāt, fa-lam tadhkur awṭānahā, wa-lā khaṭara bi-bālihā mabādīhā al-ʻalīyah. Thumma arsala ilayhā rusulan ʻalá ṣūratihā al-ẓāhirah wa-rusulan ʻalá ṣūratihā al-bāṭinah ..."

title: 880-02 Ḍawʼ al-maʻālī li-Badʼ al-amālī : manuscript / ʻAlī ibn Sulṭān Muḥammad al-Qārī al-Harawī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī wajaba wujūd dhātih, wa-thabbata karamuhu wujūdahu wa-shuhūd ṣifātih, wa-aẓhara afʻālahu al-ḥamīdah fī ṣaḥāʼif maṣnūʻātih, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá zubdat makhlūqātih wa-ʻumdat mawjūdātih, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-aṣḥābihi wa-atbāʻih, fī ḥarakātihi wa-sakanātih. Ammā baʻd, fa-yaqūlu al-multajī ilá ḥaram Rabbihi al-Bārī, ʻAlī ibn Sulṭān Muḥammad al-Qārī: Lammā sharaʻtu fī sharḥ al-Fiqh al-akbar lil-Imām al-aʻẓam wa-al-humām al-aqdam, kāna fī nīyatī wa-ṭawīyatī an yakūna mukhtaṣaran, bi-ḥaythu yartafiʻu bi-hi al-mubtadī wa-yantafiʻu bi-hi al-muntahī, thumma injarra al-kalām ilá al-kalām ḥattá kharaja ʻan intiẓām al-marām, fa-sanaḥa bi-bālī wa-khayālī an aḍaʻa sharḥan mūjazan ʻalá qaṣidat 'Badʼ al-amālī' li-yakūna mufīdan lil-adānī wa-al-aʻālī, wa-yaṣīra mūjiban li-taraqqī ḥālī wa-sababan li-ḥusn maʼālī. Wa-sammaytuhu 'Ḍawʼ al-maʻālī li-Badʼ al-amālī', fa-aqūlu: Qāla al-nāẓim, wa-huwa al-Shaykh al-ʻallāmah Abū al-Ḥasan Sirāj al-Dīn ʻAlī ibn ʻUthmān al-Ūshī: ... Yaqūlu al-ʻabdu fī Badʼ al-amālī // li-tawḥīdin li-naẓmin ka-al-laʼālī ..."

title: 880-02 Fuṣūṣ al-ḥikam : manuscript / Ibn al-ʻArabī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Wa-bi-hi nastaʻīn. al-Ḥamdu lillāh munzil al-ḥikam ʻalá qulūb al-kalim bi-aḥadīyat al-ṭarīq al-amam min al-maqām al-aqdam, wa-in ikhtalafa al-nuḥal wa-al-subul, li-ikhtilāf al-umam. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá mumidd al-himam min khazāʼin al-jūd wa-al-karam, bi-al-qīl al-aqwam, Muḥammad, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-sallam. Ammā baʻd, fa-innī raʼaytu Rasūl Allāh, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam fī mubashshirah raʼaytuhā fī al-ʻushr al-ākhir min Muḥarram, sanat sabʻ wa-ʻishrīn wa-sittimiʼah, bi-maḥrūsat Dimashq, wa-bi-yadihi, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam, kitāb, fa-qāl lī: 'Hādhā Kitāb Fuṣūṣ al-ḥikam'. Khudhhu wa-ukhruj bi-hi ilá al-nās yantafiʻūna bi-hi. Fa-qultu: 'al-Samʻ wa-al-ṭāʻah lillāh wa-Rasūlih wa-ulī al-amr, kamā umirnā ..."

title: 880-02 Iʻādat al-rūḥ ilá al-badan waqt al-suʼāl : manuscript / Nūḥ ibn Muṣṭafá al-Rūmī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn. Wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá ashraf al-anām wa-al-mursalīn, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-aṣḥābihi wa-azwājihi wa-dhurrīyatihi ajmaʻīn, wa-ʻalá alladhīn ittabaʻūhum bi-iḥsān ilá Yawm al-Dīn. Ammā baʻd, fa-yaqūlu al-ʻabd al-ʻājiz al-faqīr ilá raḥmat Mawlāhu al-ghanī al-qadīr, Nūḥ ibn Muṣṭafá al-Ḥanafī, ʻāmalahumā Allāh bi-luṭfihi al-khafī: Inna al-ʻulamāʼ qālū: Dallat al-Aḥādīth al-ṣiḥāḥ ʻalá anna al-rūḥ tuʻādu ilá al-badan waqt al-suʼāl, lākin hādhihi al-iʻādah lā taḥṣulu bi-hā al-ḥayāh al-maʻhūdah allatī taqūmu bi-hā al-rūḥ bi-al-badan wa-tadbīrih, wa-yaḥtāju maʻahā ilá al-akl wa-al-shurb wa-al-jamāʻ, wa-innamā yaḥṣulu bi-hā lil-badan ḥayāh ukhrá, yaḥṣulu bi-hā al-imtiḥān bi-al-suʼāl. Wa-kamā anna ḥayāt al-nāʼim, wa-huwa ḥayy, ghayr ḥayāt al-mustayqiẓ, fa-inna al-nawm akhū al-mawt, wa-huwa lā yanfī ʻan al-nāʼim iṭlāq ism al-ḥayāh ʻalayhi, fa-kadhālika ḥayāt al-mayyit ʻinda iʻādat al-rūḥ ilá badanihi ghayr ḥayāt al-ḥayy, wa-hiya ḥayāh lā tanfī ʻanhu iṭlāq ism al-mawt ʻalayhi ..."

title: 880-02 Kashf al-qināʻ ʻan shawārid al-ṭalāq wa-al-ikhtilāʻ : manuscript / Muḥammad ibn Aḥmad al-Manfalūṭī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi nastaʻīn. al-Ḥamdu lillāh al-jāmiʻ bayna man arāda min al-ʻibād, al-jāʻil bayna al-zawjayn libāsan li-baʻḍihimā, mā dāmā bilā nafād, wa-ʻallaqa nuṭaf qudratihi bi-al-takhalluq bi-ijtimāʻ māʼihimā in arād, aʻṭá fa-aghná, wa-manaʻa fa-afná, fa-lā mushāḥḥata fī ḥukmihi wa-lā ʻanād, al-māniʻ bayna man arāda al-manʻ baynahumā ʻalá ḥasb mā arād, al-jāʻil ʻalá taʻlīq qudratihi bi-al-tamānuʻ mabānya tadullu ʻalayhi bilā shakkin wa-lā irtidād ..."

title: 880-02 Fuṣūṣ al-ḥikam : manuscript / Ibn al-ʻArabī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Qāla al-Shaykh al-Imām al-ʻālim, al-rāsikh, al-muḥaqqiq, al-mukāshaf, waḥīd ʻaṣrih wa-farīd dahrih,Muḥyī al-Dīn Abū ʻAbd Allāh Muḥammad ibn ʻAlī ibn Muḥammad al-ʻArabī al-Ḥātimī al-Ṭāʼī al-Andalusī, raḍiya Allāh ʻanh: al-Ḥamdu lillāh munzil al-ḥikam ʻalá qulūb al-kalim bi-aḥadīyat al-ṭarīq al-amam min al-maqām al-aqdam, wa-in ikhtalafat al-nuḥal wa-al-milal, li-ikhtilāf al-umam. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá mumidd al-himam min khazāʼin al-jūd wa-al-karam, bi-al-qīl al-aqwam, Muḥammad, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-sallam. Wa-baʻd, fa-innī raʼaytu Rasūl Allāh, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam, fī mubashshirah raʼaytuhā fī al-ʻushr al-ākhir min al-Muḥarram, sanat sabʻ wa-ʻishrīn wa-sittimiʼah, bi-maḥrūsat Dimashq, wa-bi-yadihi, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam, kitāb, fa-qāl lī: 'Hādhā Kitāb Fuṣūṣ al-ḥikam'. Khudhhu wa-ukhruj bi-hi ilá al-nās yantafiʻūna bi-hi. Fa-qultu: 'al-Samʻ wa-al-ṭāʻah lillāh wa-li-Rasūlihi wa-ulī al-amr minnā, kamā umirnā ..."

title: 880-02 Ḥāshiyah ʻalá Sharḥ al-Kharīdah al-bahīyah : manuscript / Muṣṭafá ibn Aḥmad al-ʻUqbāwī.
note_text: Incipit: "Hādhā Sharḥ al-ʻUqbāwī. Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Rasūl Allāh Muḥammad, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam. Wa-baʻd, fa-yaqūlu rājī ʻafwa al-masāwī, Muṣṭafá ibn Aḥmad al-ʻUqbāwī: Lammā arāda Allāh bi-ḥuṣūl al-khayr al-kathīr, jadhaba al-qalb li-ʻaqīdat ahl al-tawḥīd, lil-Quṭb al-shahīr alladhī ʻamma al-nafʻ bi-hi, wa-huwa Shaykhunā Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad al-Dardīr, fa-kānat nafʻan ṣirfan, lil-kabīr wa-al-ṣaghīr, wa-kayfa lā, wa-hiya bārizah ʻamman shughluhu bi-Rabbihi, al-muʻriḍ ʻan al-dunyā bi-yadihi wa-qalbihi, alladhī jaʻalahu Allāh bāb kull khayr lil-ʻibād ..."

title: 880-02 Nuzhat al-majālis wa-muntakhab al-nafāʼis. Al-Juzʼ 2 : manuscript / ʻAbd al-Raḥmān ibn ʻAbd al-Salām al-Ṣaffūrī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi nastaʻīn. Qāla rajul li-Ibn Sīrīn, raḍiya Allāh ʻanhu: Raʼaytu fī al-manām dīkan yaqūlu: Allāh. Allāh Allāh. Fa-qāl: Baqiya min ajalika thalāthat ayyām. Fa-kāna ka-mā qāl. Fa-nasʼalu Allāh taʻālá an yakhtuma aʻmālanā bi-al-tawḥīd fī ʻāfiyah. Wa-raʼaytu fī 'Tahdhīb al-asmāʼ wa-al-lughāt' anna Muḥammadan ibn Sīrīn adraka thalāthīn ṣaḥābīyan. Wa-kāna abūhu ʻabdan li-Anas ibn Mālik, fa-kātabahu ʻalá ʻishrīn alf dirham, fa-addāhā wa-ʻutiq. Wa-ummuhu Ṣafīyah kānat mawlāh ayḍan li-Abī Bakr al-Ṣiddīq, Raḍiya Allāh ʻanhum ajmaʻīn. Bāb 'Dhikr al-mawt wa-al-amal wa-faḍl al-ṣabr wa-al-riḍā' ..."

title: 880-02 Sharḥ Muqaddimat al-Zāhid  : manuscript / Muḥammad ibn Aḥmad al-Ramlī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Qāla al-Shaykh al-ajall, al-Imām al-awḥad, Abū al-ʻAbbās Aḥmad Shihāb al-Dīn ibn Aḥmad Shihāb al-Dīn ibn Ḥamzah al-Ramlī al-Anṣārī, raḥimahu Allāh taʻālá, saqá Allāh tharāhu ṣabīb al-raḥmah wa-al-ruḍwān, wa-askanahu fasīḥ al-jinān, Innahu ʻalá kull shayʼ qadīr wa-bi-al-ijābah jadīr: Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá ashraf al-mursalīn, Sayyidinā Muḥammad, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi ajmaʻīn. Ammā baʻd, fa-hādhā 'Taʻlīq ʻalá al-muqaddimah al-maʻrūfah bi-al-Sittīn masʼalah' al-mansūbah lil-Shaykh al-Imām, al-ʻālim Abī al-ʻAbbās Aḥmad al-Zāhid, taghammadahu Allāh bi-raḥmatih, yaḥullu alfāẓahā, wa-yutammimu mafādahā. Wa-asʼalu Allāh min faḍlihi al-jazīl an yanfaʻa bi-hi, wa-Huwa ḥasbī wa-niʻma al-wakīl ..."

title: 880-02 Ghāyat al-maqṣūd li-man yataʻāṭá al-ʻuqūd : manuscript / Abū al-ʻAbbās Aḥmad ibn ʻUmar al-Dayrabī al-Shāfiʻī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi thiqatī, wa-ʻalyahi tawakkulī. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī ḥarrama al-sifāḥ wa-aḥalla al-nikāḥ lil-khāṣṣ wa-al-ʻāmm, wa-bayyana al-ḥarām wa-al-ḥalāl min al-nisāʼ, ʻalá lisān man arsalahu raḥmatan lil-anām. Aḥmaduhu, subḥānuhu wa-taʻālá, ʻalá mā manaḥanā min al-anʻām, wa-ashhadu an lā ilāha illā Allāh waḥdahu, lā sharīka lah, al-Malik al-ʻallām. Wa-ashhadu anna Sayyidanā Muḥammadan ʻabdahu wa-rasūlah ashraf al-anām, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-aṣḥābih, ṣalātan wa-salāman dāʼimayn bilā infiṣām. Ammā baʻd, fa-yaqūlu al-ʻabd al-faqīr al-muʻtarif bi-al-ʻajz wa-al-taqṣīr, Aḥmad al-Dayrabī al-Shāfiʻī al-Ghunaymī: Qad saʼalanī wālidī wa-baʻḍ al-ikhwān min al-anām, aḥsana Allāh lī wa-lahum ka-al-mabdá al-khitām, an aktuba shayʼan min al-masāʼil al-sharīfah al-mutaʻalliq bi-al-nikāḥ ʻalá madhhab al-Shāfiʻī wa-Abī Ḥanīfah, fa-ajabtuhum li-dhālik ..."

title: 880-02 Sharḥ Muqaddimat al-Zāhid  : manuscript / Muḥammad ibn Aḥmad al-Ramlī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Wa-bi-hi thiqatī. Qāla al-Shaykh al-Imām al-awḥad, Abū al-ʻAbbās Aḥmad Shihāb al-Dīn wa-al-Dunyā ibn Aḥmad Shihāb al-Dīn ibn Ḥamzah al-Ramlī al-Anṣārī al-Shāfiʻī, saqá Allāh tharāhu ṣabīb al-raḥmah wa-al-ruḍwān, wa-askanahu fasīḥ al-jinān, Innahu ʻalá mā yashāʼu qadīr, wa-bi-ʻibādihi khabīr: Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Ashraf al-Mursalīn, Sayyidinā Muḥammad, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallam ajmaʻīn. Ammā baʻd, fa-hādhā Taʻlīq lil-Imām al-ʻallāmah Shihāb al-Dīn Aḥmad al-Ramlī ʻalá Muqaddimat al-Imām al-ʻālim al-ʻāmil Abī al-ʻAbbās Aḥmad al-Zāhid, taghammadahu Allāh taʻālá bi-raḥmatih, yaḥullu alfāẓahā, wa-yutammimu mafādahā. Wa-asʼalu Allāh taʻālá min faḍlihi al-jazīl an yanfaʻa bi-hi, wa-Huwa ḥasbī wa-niʻma al-wakīl ..."

title: 880-02 Tuḥfat al-ṭullāb bi-Sharḥ Taḥrīr Tanqīḥ al-Lubāb : manuscript / Abū Yaḥyá Zakarīyā ibn Muḥammad al-Anṣārī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi nastaʻīn. Qāla Sayyidunā wa-Mawlānā Qāḍī al-Quḍāh, Shaykh Mashāyikh al-Islām, malik al-ʻulamāʼ al-aʻlām, Sībawayh zamānih, farīd ʻaṣrih wa-awānih, zayn al-millah wa-al-dīn, lisān al-mutakallimīn, ḥujjat al-munāẓirīn, muḥyī sunnat Sayyid al-Mursalīn, Abū Yaḥyá, Zakarīyā al-Anṣārī al-Shāfiʻī, taghammadahu Allāh bi-raḥmatih, wa-askanahu aʻlá farādīs jannatih, bi-mannihi wa-karamih. Āmīn: Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī faqqaha fī dīnihi man iṣṭafāh min al-anām, wa-hadá man irtaḍāh li-fahm mā sharraʻahu min al-aḥkām. Aḥmaduhu ʻalá jamīʻ naʻmāʼihi, wa-ashkuruhu ʻalá tazāyudi ālāʼihi, wa-ashhadu an lā ilāha illā Allāh waḥdahu lā sharīka lah, al-Malik al-ʻAllām. Wa-ashhadu anna Sayyidanā wa-Nabīyanā Muḥammadan ʻabduhu wa-rasūluh sayyid al-anām. Wa-baʻd, fa-hādhā sharḥ ʻalá mukhtaṣarī al-musammá bi-Taḥrīr Tanqīḥ al-Lubāb fī al-fiqh ʻalá madhhab al-Imām al-Shāfiʻī, raḍiya Allāh taʻālá ʻanhu, yaḥullu alfāẓahu, wa-yubayyinu murādahu, wa-yuḥaqqiqu masāʼilahu, wa-yuḥarriru dalāʼilahu. Wa-sammaytuhu "bi-Tuḥfat al-ṭullāb bi-Sharḥ Taḥrīr Tanqīḥ al-Lubāb". Wa-Allāh al-Karīm asʼalu an yajʻalahu khāliṣan li-Wajhihi al-Karīm wa-sababan lil-fawz bi-Jannāt al-Naʻīm ..."

title: 880-03 al-Tajrīd li-nafʻ al-ʻabīd. Al-Juzʼ 1 : manuscript / Sulaymān ibn Muḥammad al-Bujayrimī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi nastaʻīn, wa-ʻalayhi tawakkulī, wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Muḥammad wa-ālihi. al-Ḥamdu li-man iṣṭafá li-dīnihi khulāṣat al-ʻālamīn, wa-hadá man aḥabbahu lil-tafaqquh fī al-dīn, ḥamdan nasluku bi-hi minhāj al-ʻārifīn, wa-numnaḥu bi-hi dukhūl riyāḍ al-shākirīn, wa-nashhadu an lā ilāha illā Allāh waḥdahu lā sharīka lahu shahādata al-muqinīn, wa-nashhadu anna Sayyidinā Muḥammadan, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam, bahjat al-muwaḥḥidīn, wa-nuṣallī wa-nusallimu ʻalá al-ḥāwī li-jamīʻ faḍāʼil al-mursalīn, man nabbaha al-ʻuqūl li-taḥrīr tanqīḥ aḥkām al-dīn, al-baḥr al-muḥīṭ, al-qudwah al-ʻuẓmá fī al-ʻālamīn, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi, hudāt al-ummah wa-al-tābiʻīn. Wa-baʻd, fa-yaqūlu al-ʻabd al-faqīr ilá Mawlāh, al-rājī ʻafwa mā iqtarafahu wa-janāh, Sulaymān ibn ʻUmar ibn Muḥammad al-Bujayrimī al-Shāfiʻī, ʻafá Allāh ʻanhu wa-ʻan aḥbābihi: Qad saʼalanī baʻḍ aṣdiqāʼī al-fuḍalāʼ an ajmaʻa mā katabtuhu ʻalá nuskhatay Sharḥ al-Minhāj wa-Ḥāshiyat al-Shabrāmallisī ʻalayhi, bi-mā taḥarrara min ḥawāshīhi fī al-ṭurūs wa-qarrarathu shuyūkhī fī al-durūs, fa-ajabtuhu li-dhālik, wa-in kuntu lastu ahlan li-tilka al-masālik, wa-sammaytuhu 'al-Tajrīd li-nafʻ al-ʻabīd' ..."

title: 880-03 al-Tajrīd li-nafʻ al-ʻabīd. Al-Juzʼ 2 : manuscript / Sulaymān ibn Muḥammad al-Bujayrimī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi nastaʻīn, wa-ʻalayhi tawakkulī. Kitāb al-Ṣawm. Furiḍa al-ṣawm fī Shaʻbān fī al-sanah al-thāniyah min al-Hijrah. Wa-shahruhu afḍal al-shuhūr, wa-huwa min khaṣāʼiṣ hādhihi al-ummah, kamā dhakarahu al-Ḥāfiẓ al-Suyūṭī, wa-naqalahu al-Ḥāfiẓ Ibn Ḥajar ʻan al-jumhūr. Wa-ḥamalū al-tashbīh al-wāqiʻ fī qawlihi taʻālá 'kamā kutiba ʻalá alladhīna min qablikum' ʻalá muṭlaq al-ṣawm, dūna qadrihi wa-zamanih. Wa-qīla innahu laysa min al-khuṣūṣīyāt bi-ḥaml al-tashbīh ʻalá ḥaqīqatih, li-annahu qīla: Mā min ummatin illā wa-qad furiḍa ʻalayhim Ramaḍān, illā annahum ḍallū ʻanhu. Qāla al-ʻAllāmah al-Ujhūrī al-Mālikī: Wa-furiḍa al-ṣiyām thānī al-Hijrah ..."

title: 880-03 al-Tajrīd li-nafʻ al-ʻabīd. Al-Juzʼ 3 : manuscript / Sulaymān ibn Muḥammad al-Bujayrimī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Rabbi yassir wa-lā tuʻassir. Kitāb al-Farāʼiḍ. Ākhiruhu ʻan al-ʻibādāt wa-al-muʻāmalāt, li-iḍṭirār al-insān ilayhimā, min ḥīn wilādatihi, dāʼiman aw ghāliban, ilá mawtihi, wa-li-annahumā mutaʻalliqān bi-idāmat al-ḥayāh al-sābiqah ʻalá al-mawt, wa-li-annahu niṣf al-ʻilm, fa-nāsaba dhikruhu fī niṣf al-kitāb. Qāla ʻalá al-Jalāl: Qawluhu, ay, masāʼil qismat al-mawārīth, ay, al-masāʼil allatī tuqsamu fīhā al-mawārīth, ka-al-masʼalah allatī takūnu min thamāniyah, ka-zawjah wa-bint wa-ʻam, wa-ka-allatī takūnu min sittah, fa-laysa al-murād bi-al-farāʼiḍ al-anṣibāʼ ..."

title: 880-02 al-Dirāyah sharḥ al-Hidāyah : manuscript / Aḥmad ibn ʻAlī ibn Ḥajar al-ʻAsqalānī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī aʻlā maʻālim al-ʻilm wa-aʻlāmah, wa-aẓhara shaʻāʼir al-Sharʻ wa-aḥkāmah, wa-baʻatha rusulan wa-anbiyāʼ, ṣalawāt Allāh ʻalayhim ajmaʻīn, ilá sabīl al-ḥaqq hādīn, wa-akhlafahum ʻulamāʼ ilá sunan sinanihim dāʻīn, yaslukūn fīmā lam yuʼthar ʻanhum maslak al-ijtihād, mustarshidīn minhu fī dhālik, wa-Huwa walī al-irshād, wa-khaṣṣa awāʼil al-mustanbiṭīn bi-al-tawfīq ḥattá waḍaʻū masāʼil min kull jalī wa-daqīq, ghayra anna al-ḥawādith mutaʻāqibah al-wuqūʻ, wa-al-nawāzil yaḍīqu ʻanhā niṭāq al-mawḍūʻ, wa-iqtināṣ al-shawārid bi-al-iqtibās min al-mawārid wa-al-iʻtibār bi-al-amthāl min ṣanʻat al-rijāl ..."

title: 880-02 Ḥall al-mawāḍiʻ al-mughlaqah min Wiqāyat al-riwāyah fī masāʼil al-Hidāyah : manuscript / ʻUbayd Allāh ibn Masʻūd al-Maḥbūbī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Rabbi tammim bi-al-khayr. al-Ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn, wa-al-ṣalāh ʻalá khayr khalqihi Muḥammad wa-ālihi ajmaʻīn. Yaqūlu al-ʻabd al-mutawassil ilá Allāh bi-aqwá al-dharīʻah, ay, al-wasīlah, ʻUbayd Allāh ibn Masʻūd ibn Tāj al-Sharīʻah, suʻida jadduhu wa-unjiḥa jidduhu: Hādhā 'Ḥall al-mawāḍiʻ al-mughlaqah min Wiqāyat al-riwāyah fī masāʼil al-Hidāyah' allatī allafahā jaddī wa-ustādhī, Mawlānā al-aʻẓam, ustādh ʻulamāʼ al-ʻālam, Burhān al-Sharīʻah wa-al-Ḥaqq wa-al-Dīn, Maḥmūd ibn Ṣadr al-Sharīʻah, jazāhu Allāh ʻannī wa-ʻann jamīʻ al-Muslimīn khayr al-jazāʼ, li-ajl ḥifẓī. Wa-al-Mawlá al-muʼallif lammā allafahā sabqan wa-katab, wa-kuntu ajrī mā ajrī fī maydān ḥifẓihi ṭalqan, ḥattá ittafaqa tamām taʼlīfihi maʻa itmām ḥifẓī intashara baʻḍ al-nusakh ilá al-aṭrāf. Thumma baʻda dhālika waqaʻa fīhā shayʼ min al-taghayyurāt wa-nubadh min al-maḥw wa-al-ithbāt, fa-katabtu fī hādhā al-sharḥ al-ʻibārah allatī taqarrara ʻalayhi al-matn, li-taghayyur al-nusakh al-maktūbah ilá hādhā al-namaṭ. Wa-al-ʻabd al-ḍaʻīf lammā shahida fī akthar al-nās kasalan ʻan ḥifẓ al-Wiqāyah akhadhtu ʻanhā mukhtaṣaran mushtamilan ʻalá mā lā budda li-ṭālib al-ʻilm minhu, fa-aftaḥu fī hādhā al-sharḥ mughlaqātihi ayḍan ..."

title: 880-02 Ḥāshiyah ʻalá Sharḥ Jamʻ al-jawāmiʻ : manuscript / Ibrāhīm Ḥijāzī al-Sandiyūnī al-Shāfiʻī al-Aḥmadī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallam. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī khaṣṣa ahl al-ʻilm bi-al-iḥsān wa-man ʻallamahum maʻrifat al-uṣūl wa-al-tibyān, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Sayyid walad ʻAdnān, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-aṣḥābihi dawī al-qadr wa-al-shān. Wa-baʻd. Hādhihi Ḥāshiyah ʻalá al-Sharḥ alladhī allafahu al-ʻĀlim al-ʻallāmah Muḥammad ibn Aḥmad ibn ʻAbd Allāh Jalāl al-Dīn al-Maḥallī ʻalá matn Jamʻ al-jawāmiʻ al-mansūb li-ʻAbd al-Wahhāb Taqī al-Dīn ibn al-Subkī, jamaʻahā al-faqīr Ibrāhīm al-Sandiyūnī al-Shāfiʻī min taqrīr Shaykhihi al-ʻAllāmah Muḥammad ʻUbādah, alladhī katabahu ʻan Shaykh al-Mashāyikh, al-Shaykh ʻAlī al-ʻAdawī, wa-min taqrīr shaykhihi al-ʻAllāmah al-Shaykh Aḥmad al-Bīlī, wa-min Ḥāshiyat al-Najjārī, wa-min al-Kamāl ibn Abī Sharīf, wa-min Ḥāshiyat al-Kinānī, wa-ghayr dhālik. Wa-asʼalu Allāh al-ʻAlī al-ʻAẓīm lahā. Āmīn."

title: 880-02 Sharḥ Muqaddimat al-Zāhid  : manuscript / Muḥammad ibn Aḥmad al-Ramlī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Qāla al-Shaykh al-ajall al-awḥad, al-ʻĀlim al-ʻallāmah Abū al-ʻAbbās Aḥmad Shihāb al-Dīn Aḥmad ibn Ḥamzah al-Ramlī al-Anṣārī al-Shāfiʻī, taghammadahu Allāh bi-raḥmatihi wa-ruḍwānih. Āmīn: al-Ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Ashraf al-Mursalīn, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi ajmaʻīn. Ammā baʻd, fa-hādhā Taʻlīq ʻalá al-Muqaddimat al-maʻrūfah bi-al-Sittīn masʼalah, al-mansūbah lil-Shaykh Abī al-ʻAbbās Aḥmad al-Zāhid, taghammadahu Allāh bi-raḥmatih wa-ruḍwānih. Āmīn, yaḥullu alfāẓahā, wa-yutammimu mafādahā. Wa-asʼalu Allāh taʻālá min faḍlihi al-jazīl an yanfaʻa bi-hi, wa-Huwa ḥasbī wa-niʻma al-wakīl ..."

title: 880-03 Sharḥ mukhtaṣar ʻalá al-Mukhtaṣar. Al-Juzʼ 1 : manuscript / Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad al-Dardīr.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi nastaʻīn. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī faḍḍala ʻulamāʼ al-Sharīʻah ʻalá man siwāhum fī al-dārayn, wa-jaʻalahum maljaʼan li-ʻibādihi wa-ijtabāhum. Wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá al-Nabī al-aʻẓam wa-al-Rasūl al-akram, Sayyidinā Muḥammad, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam, wa-ʻalá sāʼir ikhwānihi min al-nabīyīn wa-al-mursalīn, wa-al-ṣaḥābah wa-al-qarābah wa-al-tābiʻīn, wa-ʻalá sāʼir aʼimmat al-dīn, khuṣūṣan al-arbaʻah al-mujtahidīn, wa-muqallidīhim ilá Yawm al-Dīn. Ammā baʻd, fa-yaqūlu afqar al-ʻibād ilá Mawlāhu al-Qadīr, Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad al-Dardīr: Hādhā 'Sharḥ mukhtaṣar ʻalá al-Mukhtaṣar' lil-Imām al-jalīl, al-ʻAllāmah Abī al-Ḍiyāʼ Sayyidī Khalīl, iqtaṣartu fīhi ʻalá fatḥ mughlaqih wa-taqyīd muṭlaqih, wa-ʻalá al-muʻtamad min aqwāl ahl al-madhhab, bi-ḥaythu matá iqtaṣartu ʻalá qawl, kāna huwa al-rājiḥ alladhī tajibu bi-hi al-fatwá, wa-in iʻtamada baʻḍ al-shurrāḥ khilāfah. Wa-billāh taʻālá astaʻīn, wa-ʻalayhi atawakkal, fa-innahu al-Mawlá al-Karīm alladhī ʻalayhi al-muʻawwal ..."

title: 880-02 al-Jawharah al-munīfah fī sharḥ Waṣīyat Abī Ḥanīfah : manuscript / Munlā Ḥusayn ibn Iskandar al-Rūmī al-Ḥanafī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi thiqatī. al-Ḥamdu lillāh al-mutawaḥḥid bi-wujūb al-wujūd wa-al-baqāʼ, al-mutafarrid bi-al-qudrah al-kāmilah wa-al-ʻizz wa-al-kibriyāʼ, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá khayr khalqih Muḥammad, ashraf al-anbiyāʼ, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-aṣḥābihi al-bararah al-atqiyāʼ. Yaqūlu al-ʻabd al-ḥaqīr al-faqīr ilá Mawlāhu al-ʻazīz al-ghanī al-madʻū bi-Munlā Ḥusayn ibn Iskandar al-Ḥanafī, ʻāmalahu Allāh bi-luṭfihi al-khafī: Wa-baʻd, fa-innī istakhartu Allāh taʻālá fī waḍʻ sharḥ mukhtaṣar ʻalá kitāb al-Waṣīyah, al-mansūb ilá al-Imām al-Aʻẓam Abī Ḥanīfah, raḍiya Allāh ʻanh, baʻda an waqaftu ʻalá sharḥihi lil-ʻAllāmah al-Akmal, wa-huwa sharḥ ʻaẓīm, lākin fī ʻibārātihi diqqah, wa-fīhi ayḍan dhikr madhāhib al-firaq al-ḍāllah, fa-yaʻsuru ʻalá al-mutaʻallimīn al-tamyīz; fa-innī, in shāʼa Allāh taʻālá, adhkuru al-ʻibārāt al-wāḍiḥah, wa-lā adhkuru madhāhib al-firaq al-ḍālah istiqlālan, wa-ayḍan azīdu fīhi, in shāʼa Allāh taʻālá, fawāʼida laṭīfah jalīlah, min al-targhīb wa-al-tarhīb. Wa-sammaytuhu 'al-Jawharah al-munīfah fī sharḥ Waṣīyat Abī Ḥanīfah' ..."

title: 880-03 al-Ashbāh wa-al-naẓāʼir al-fiqhīyah ʻalá madhhab al-Ḥanafīyah : manuscript / Zayn al-Dīn ibn Ibrāhīm ibn Nujaym.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-[bi-hi] nastaʻīn. al-Ḥamdu lillāh wa-kafá, wa-salāmun ʻalá ʻibādihi alladhīna iṣṭafá. Wa-baʻd, fa-lammā yassara Allāh taʻālá itmām 'Kitāb al-Ashbāh wa-al-naẓāʼir al-fiqhīyah ʻalá madhhab al-Ḥanafīyah' al-mushtamil ʻalá sabʻat funūn, aradtu an ufahrisahu fī awwalihi li-yashula al-naẓar fīhi. al-Fann al-awwal fī al-qawāʻid, wa-hiya khams wa-ʻishrūn qāʻidah, [...] qawāʻid kullīyah wa-bawāqīhā qawāʻid juzʼīyah yankhariju ʻalayhi mā lā yanḥaṣiru min al-ṣuwar al-juzʼīyah. al-Ūlá lā thawāb illā bi-al-nīyah, wa-fīhā bayān mā yakūnu al-nīyah fīhi sharṭan wa-mā lā takūnu, wa-bayān dukhūlihā fī al-ʻibādāt wa-al-muʻāmalāt wa-al-khuṣūmāt wa-al-mubāḥāt wa-al-manāhī wa-al-matrūk ..."

title: 880-02 al-Iḥrāz fī anwāʻ al-majāz : manuscript / Aḥmad ibn Aḥmad al-Sujāʻī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi al-iʻānah. al-Ḥamdu lillāh al-hādī man yashāʼu ilá ṣirāṭ [al-ṣrāṭ] al-mustaqīm, al-mubayyin ḥaqīqat al-majāz ilá al-sharīʻah al-samḥāʼ wa-al-dīn al-qawīm, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Sayyidinā wa-Mawlānā Muḥammad, al-murshshaḥ bi-al-āyāt al-Qurʼānīyah, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-aṣḥābihi al-muʻtaṣimīn bi-ḥablihi min al-dasāʼis al-Shayṭānīyah. Āmīn. Ammā baʻd, fa-yaqūlu faqīr Mawlāhu, Aḥmad al-Sujāʻī, ballaghahu Allāh min faḍlihi mā yatamannāhu min ḥusn al-masāʻī: 'Qad naẓamtu fī al-majāz naẓman badīʻ al-mabānī, jazīl al-maʻānī, wa-aradtu an ubayyina mā inṭawá taḥta niqābih, wa-akshifa mā khafiya min lubābih, bi-sharḥ laṭīf wa-uslūb ẓarīf, sālikan sabīl al-ikhtiṣār, wa-muqtaṣiran ʻalá al-muhimm min al-fann, ḥasbamā afādahu mashāyikhunā al-akhyār, wa-sammaytuhu 'al-Iḥrāz fī anwāʻ al-majāz', wa-ʻalá Allāh al-iʻtimād fī jamīʻ al-umūr, wa-Huwa ḥasbī wa-niʻma al-wakīl, niʻma al-mawlá wa-niʻma al-naṣīr' ..."

title: 880-02 Fatḥ rawq al-Raḥmān bi-sharḥ mā jāʼa ʻalá mafʻal min al-maṣdar wa-naḥwihi wa-ism al-zamān wa-al-makān : manuscript / Aḥmad ibn Aḥmad al-Sujāʻī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Ḥamdan li-man sharrafa bi-ṭalʻat Sayyidinā Muḥammad al-zamān wa-al-makān, wa-faḍḍalahu ʻalá sāʼir al-makhlūqāt min malik wa-uns wa-jān, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-aṣḥābihi al-kirām, wa-ʻalá man taṣaddara baʻdahum min al-sādah li-bayān al-aḥkām, ṣalātan wa-salāman dāʼimayn tudfaʻu bi-himā ʻannā jamīʻ al-ʻilal [wa-] al-balīyāt, wa-nakūnu min al-muqarrabīn ilá Allāh taʻālá fī al-ḥayāh wa-al-mamāt. Āmīn. Ammā baʻd, fa-hādhā taqyīd laṭīf li-naẓm al-ʻAllāmah al-Qāḍī shāriḥ al-Alfīyah li-Ibn Mālik, raḥimahumā Allāh, mā jāʼa ʻalá mafʻal wa-naḥwihi min al-maṣādir wa-asmāʼ al-zamān wa-al-makān. Wa-qad washshaḥtuhu bi-nafāʼis al-durar, wa-ḍammantuhu ashyāʼ kathīrah min al-masāʼil al-ghurar, wa-sammaytuhu 'Fatḥ al-rawq [rawq] al-Raḥmān bi-sharḥ mā jāʼa ʻalá mafʻal min al-maṣdar wa-naḥwihi wa-ism al-zamān wa-al-makān. Wa-Allāh asʼalu an yanfaʻa bi-hi, bi-jāh Sayyidinā wa-Mawlānā Muḥammad wa-ālihi wa-ḥizbihi. Āmīn ..."

title: 880-02 Muʻīn al-ḥukkām fīmā yataraddadu bayna al-khaṣmayn min al-aḥkām : manuscript / ʻAlī ibn Khalīl al-Ṭarābulusī al-Ḥanafī.
note_text: Incipit: "[Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm]. Tabāraka alladhī abdaʻa al-mawjūdāt bi-qudratih, wa-ṣanaʻa al-makhlūqāt bi-ʻaẓamatih, wa-mayyaza kull min al-ʻālamīn bi-ṭabīʻatih. Aḥmaduhu ʻalá mā wahaba min nūrihi al-qudsī, wa-ajzala min ishrāq al-ḍiyāʼ al-ḥusnī, wa-awdaʻa miṣbāḥ al-qūwah al-ʻaqlīyah fī mishkāt al-qūwah al-naẓarīyah, wa-kammalahā bi-al-zujājah al-sharīfah al-bālighah allatī yakādu zaytuhā yuḍīʼ, wa-jaʻalahā nūran ʻalá nūr, kaannahā al-kawākib [al-kawkab] al-durrī, mutawaqqidatan min shajarah mubārakah ʻulwīyah, lā sharqīyah wa-lā gharbīyah. Wa-asʼaluhu an yuṣalliya ʻalá khayr barīyatihi wa-atammihim kamālan, wa-aʻẓamihim ishrāqan wa-ijlālan, Muḥammad, al-muʼayyad bi-al-Rūḥ al-Amīn, wa-ʻalá man irtaḍá min ālihi wa-aṣḥābihi ajmaʻīn ..."

title: 880-02 Mukhtaṣar al-Qudūrī : manuscript / Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad al-Qudūrī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Kitāb al-Ṭahārāt. Qāla Allāh: 'Yā ayyuhā alladhīna āmanū idhā qumtum ilá al-ṣalāh fa-ighsilū wujūhakum wa-aydiyakum ilá al-marāfiq wa-imsaḥū bi-ruʼūsikum wa-arjulikum ilá al-kaʻbayn'. Fa-faraḍ al-ṭahārāt ghasl al-aʻḍāʼ al-thalāthah, wa-masḥ al-raʼs, wa-al-mirfaqān wa-al-kaʻbān yadkhulān fī al-ghasl, wa-al-mafrūḍ fī masḥ al-raʼs miqdār al-nāṣiyah, wa-huwa rubʻ al-raʼs ..."

title: 880-03 al-Muntakhab fī uṣūl al-madhhab : manuscript / Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad al-Akhsīkathī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Ammā baʻd ḥamd Allāh ʻalá nawālih, wa-al-ṣalāh ʻalá Rasūlihi Muḥammad wa-ālih, fa-inna uṣūl al-sharʻ thalāthah: al-Kitāb wa-al-Sunnah wa-ijmāʻ al-ummah, wa-al-aṣl al-rābiʻ al-qiyās al-mustanbaṭ min hādhihi al-uṣūl. Ammā al-Kitāb, fa-al-Qurʼān al-munzal ʻalá al-Rasūl, al-maktūb fī al-maṣāḥif, al-manqūl ʻanhu naqlan mutawātiran, bi-lā shubhah, wa-huwa al-naẓm wa-al-maʻná jamīʻan fī qawl ʻāmmat al-ʻulamāʼ, raḥimahum Allāh, wa-huwa al-ṣaḥīḥ min madhhab Abī Ḥanīfah, raḥimahu Allāh, illā annahu lam yajʻal al-naẓm ruknan lāziman fī ḥaqq jawāz al-ṣalāh khāṣṣatan ..."

title: 880-03 Sharḥ Jamʻ al-jawāmiʻ : manuscript / Jalāl al-Dīn Muḥammad ibn Aḥmad al-Maḥallī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh ʻalá afḍālih, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Muḥammad wa-ālih. Hādhā mā ishtaddat ilayhi ḥājat al-mutafahhimīn li-Jamʻ al-jawāmiʻ, min sharḥ yaḥullu alfāẓah, wa-yubayyinu murādah, wa-yuḥaqqiqu masāʼilah, wa-yuḥarriru dalāʼilah, ʻalá wajh sahl lil-mubtadiʼīn, ḥasan lil-nāẓirīn, nafaʻa Allāh bi-hi. Āmīn. Qāla al-muṣannif, raḥimahu Allāh: Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Naḥmaduka Allāhumma, ay, naṣifuka bi-jamīʻ ṣifātika, Yā Allāh ..."

title: 880-02 Lamʻ al-lawāmiʻ fī ikhtiṣār Jamʻ al-jawāmiʻ : manuscript / ʻĪsá ibn ʻAlī al-Ikhnāʼī al-Shāfiʻī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi al-iʻānah. Qāla faqīr raḥmat Rabbihi ʻĪsá ibn ʻAlī al-Ikhnāʼī al-Shāfiʻī, ʻafā Allāh ʻanhu wa-li-wālidayh: al-Ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn, wa-al-ʻāfiyah lil-muttaqīn, wa-lā ʻudwāna illā ʻalá al-ẓālimīn, wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥābatihi ajmaʻīn. Ammā baʻd, fa-hādhā kitāb ikhtaṣartu fīhi 'Jamʻ al-jawāmiʻ', muṣannaf al-Imām al-ʻAllāmah al-Subkī, wa-lam adhkur fīhi illā al-muḥtāj ilayhi, wa-sammaytuhu 'Lamʻ al-lawāmiʻ fī ikhtiṣār Jamʻ al-jawāmiʻ'. Wa-arjū min Allāh taʻālá tawjīzahu, in ʻishtu, bi-ʻibārah wa-jīzah. Wa-bi-hi al-ʻawn wa-al-hidāyah ilá mā fīhi al-kifāyah, wa-Huwa ḥasbī wa-niʻma al-wakīl ..."

title: 880-03 Fatḥ al-Wahhāb bi-sharḥ Manhaj al-ṭullāb. Al-Juzʼ 1 : manuscript / Abū Yaḥyá Zakarīyā ibn Muḥammad al-Anṣārī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Qāla Sayyidunā wa-Mawlānā Qāḍī al-Quḍāh, Shaykh Mashāyikh al-Islām, malik al-ʻulamāʼ al-aʻlām, farīd ʻaṣrih wa- waḥīd dahrihi, Sībawayh zamānihi, ḥujjat al-munāẓirīn wa-lisān al-mutakallimīn, Muḥyī al-Sunnah fī al-ʻālamīn, Zayn al-Millah wa-al-Dīn, Abū Yaḥyá Zakarīyā al-Anṣārī al-Shāfiʻī, taghammadahu Allāh bi-raḥmatih, wa-askanahu fasīḥ jannatih, wa-nafaʻanā wa-al-Muslimīn bi-barakatih: Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh ʻalá afḍālih, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-ālih, wa-baʻd, fa-qad kuntu ikhtaṣartu 'Minhāj al-ṭālibīn' fī al-fiqh, taʼlīf Shaykh al-Islām Abī Zakarīyā Yaḥyá Muḥyī al-Dīn al-Nawawī, raḥimahu Allāh, fī kitāb sammaytuhu bi-'Manhaj al-ṭullāb', wa-qad saʼalanī baʻḍ al-aʻizzah min al-fuḍalāʼ al-mutaraddidīn ilayya an ashraḥahu sharḥan yaḥullu alfāẓahu, wa-yujillu ḥuffāẓahu, wa-yubayyinu murādahu, wa-yutammimu mafādahu, fa-ajabtuhu ilá dhālik bi-ʻawn al-Qādir al-Mālik, wa-sammaytuhu bi-'Fatḥ al-Wahhāb bi-sharḥ Manhaj al-ṭullāb'. Wa-Allāh asʼalu an yanfaʻa bi-hi, wa-Huwa ḥasbī wa-niʻma al-wakīl ..."

title: 880-03 Nihāyat al-muḥtāj ilá sharḥ al-Minhāj. Al-Juzʼ 1 : manuscript / Muḥammad ibn Aḥmad al-Ramlī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Rabbi yassir. Yā Karīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī shayyada bi-Minhāj dīnihi arkān al-sharīʻah, wa-saddada bi-aḥkāmihi furūʻ al-Ḥanīfīyah al-samḥāʼ, man ʻamala bi-hi fa-qad ittabaʻa sabīl al-muʼminīn, wa-man waqafa ʻanhu kharaja ʻan masālik al-muʻtabarīn. Aḥmaduhu, subḥānahu, ʻalá mā ʻallam, wa-ashkuruhu ʻalá mā hadá wa-qawwam, wa-ashhadu an lā ilāha illā Allāh waḥdahu lā sharīka lah, al-Malik al-Ḥaqq al-Mubīn, wa-ashhadu anna Sayyidanā Muḥammadan ʻabduhu wa-rasūluh, al-mabʻūth raḥmatan lil-ʻālamīn, wa-al-nūr al-sāʼir lil-khalāʼiq ilá Yawm al-Dīn, arsalahu ḥīna darast aʻlām al-hudá wa-ẓaharat aʻlām al-radá, wa-inṭamasa manhaj al-ḥaqq wa-ʻafā, wa-ashrafa miṣbāḥ al-ṣidq ʻalá al-inṭifā, fa-aʻlá min al-dīn maʻālimah, wa-min ḥukm al-sharʻ dalāʼilah, fa-insharaḥ bi-hi ṣudūr ahl al-īmān, wa-inzāḥat bi-hi shubuhāt ahl al-ṭughyān ..."

title: 880-02 Ḥāshiyah ʻalá Sharḥ al-Mukhtaṣar. Al-Juzʼ 1 : manuscript / Muḥammad ibn Aḥmad ibn ʻArafah al-Dasūqī al-Mālikī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi thiqatī wa-rajāʼī. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī kammala dhawī al-aḥlām bi-maʻrifat ʻilm al-ḥalāl wa-al-ḥarām, wa-hadāhum li-istikhrāj durar al-aḥkām, fa-istakhrajūhā min baḥrihā wa-awdaʻūhā kanzahā bi-daqāʼiq al-afhām. Wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá man atá bi-al-kalām al-ḥasan, wa-ukhtuṣir la-hu al-kalām, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-aṣḥābihi al-ḥāfiẓīn li-sharīʻatihi min al-taghyīr wa-al-tabdīl ʻalá mamarr al-sinīn wa-al-ayyām. Wa-baʻd, fa-yaqūlu al-ʻabd al-faqīr Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad al-Dasūqī al-Mālikī: Hādhihi taqyīdāt ʻalá Sharḥ Shaykhinā al-ʻAllāmah mufīd al-ṭālibīn wa-murabbī al-murīdīn al-marḥūm al-Shaykh Aḥmad al-Dardīr al-ʻAdawī li-Mukhtaṣar al-ʻAllāmah Abī al-Ḍiyāʼ Khalīl ibn Isḥāq alladhī allafahu fī al-fiqh ʻalá madhhab Imām al-aʼimmah wa-najm al-Sunnah al-Imām Mālik ibn Anas, iqtabastuhā min kutub al-aʼimmah al-aʻlām, mushīran bi-mā ṣūratuhu ..."

title: 880-02 Ḥāshiyah ʻalá Sharḥ al-Mukhtaṣar. Al-Juzʼ 2 : manuscript / Muḥammad ibn Aḥmad ibn ʻArafah al-Dasūqī al-Mālikī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi thiqatī. Bāb al-Dhakāh. Qawluhu 'bi-maʻná al-tadhkiyah', ashāra ilá anna al-dhakāh ism maṣdar, bi-maʻná al-maṣdar, wa-al-murād al-dhakāh al-muḥaqqaqah fī al-dhabḥ, fa-lā yaridu anna al-ʻqd wa-al-naḥr min <min> afrād al-dhakāh, wa-lā yushtaraṭu fīhā qaṭʻ al-ḥulqūm wa-al-wadijayn, wa-kharaja ʻan qawlihi qaṭʻ al-khanq wa-al-nahsh, fa-lā yusammá dhabḥan. Wa-qawluhu 'lā ghayruhu', ay, lā qaṭʻa ghayruhu ..."

title: 880-02 Ḥāshiyah ʻalá Sharḥ al-Mukhtaṣar. Al-Juzʼ 3 : manuscript / Muḥammad ibn Aḥmad ibn ʻArafah al-Dasūqī al-Mālikī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi wathiqtu, wa-ʻalayhi tawakkaltu. Bāb 'Yanʻaqidu al-bayʻ bi-mā yadullu ʻalá al-riḍá'. Qawluhu 'ay yaḥṣal wa-yūjad'. Innamā fassara yanʻaqidu bi-mā dhukir, li-anna inʻiqād al-shayʼ ʻibārah ʻan taqawwumihi bi-ajzāʼih, wa-lā yaṣuḥḥu an yufassara bi-yaṣuḥḥ aw yalzam, li-annah qad yaḥṣalu al-bayʻ bi-al-maʻṭāh aw ghayrihā min al-ṣiyagh, wa-lā yakūnu ṣaḥīḥan aw lāziman. Wa-al-ḥaqāʼiq al-sharʻīyah tashmalu al-ṣaḥīḥ wa-al-fāsid. Qawluhu 'ʻAqd muʻāwaḍah', ay, ʻaqd yaḥtawi [yaḥtawī] ʻalá ʻiwaḍ min al-jānibayn ..."

title: 880-02 Kitāb al-adhkiyāʼ : manuscript / Abū al-Faraj ʻAbd al-Raḥmān ibn ʻAlī ibn al-Jawzī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Rabbi yassir. Qāla al-Shaykh al-Imām, al-ʻālim al-ʻallāmah, al-baḥr al-fahhāmah, Jamāl al-Dīn Abū al-Faraj ʻAbd al-Raḥmān ibn al-Jawzī, raḥimahu Allāh taʻālá: al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī aḥallanā maḥallat al-fahm, wa-ḥallānā ḥilyat al-ʻilm, wa-mallkanā ʻiqāl al-ʻaql, wa-zayyananā bi-niṭāq al-nuṭq, wa-naʻūdhu bi-hi min kadar ṣafāʼ al-fikr wa-ʻakar duhn al-dhihn, wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá al-mabʻūth bi-jawāmiʻ al-kalim ilá aʻqal al-umam, wa-ʻalá jamīʻ atbāʻihi al-sāʼirīn fī manhaj atbāʻih, wa-sallama kathīran. Ammā baʻd, fa-inna ajall al-ashyāʼ mawhibat al-ʻaql, fa-innahu al-ālah fī taḥṣīl maʻrifat al-ālah, wa-bi-hi tuḍbaṭu al-maṣāliḥ, wa-tulḥaẓu al-ʻawāqib, wa-tudraku al-ghawāmiḍ, wa-tujmaʻu al-faḍāʼil ..."

title: 880-02 Kashf al-lithām ʻan sharḥ Shaykh al-Islām : manuscript / Muḥammad ibn Aḥmad ibn ʻAlī al-Buhūtī al-Khalwatī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī adhāqa man ijtabāhum ḥalāwat al-taḥqīq, wa-jaʻala lahum min al-ʻināyah khayra rafīq, wa-sharaḥa ṣudūrahum li-sulūk sabīl al-taṣawwur wa-al-taṣdīq. Wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad al-mursal ilá khayr rafīq, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-aṣḥābihi al-ḥāʼizīn nisbatahum ilayh al-nasb al-ṣiddīq, ṣalātan wa-salāman dāʼimayn mutalāzimayn ilá yawm al-fazaʻ wa-al-maḍīq. Ammā baʻd, fa-yaqūlu al-ʻabd al-ḥaqīr ilá Mawlāhu al-ʻAlī, Muḥammad ibn Aḥmad ibn ʻAlī al-Buhūtī al-Ḥanbalī, baṣṣarahu Allāh bi-ʻuyūb nafsih, wa-jaʻala yawmahu khayran min amsihi: Hādhihi taḥrīrāt rāʼiʻah wa-taḥrīrāt [wa-taqrīrāt] fāʼiqah ʻalá Sharḥ Shaykh al-Islām, malik al-ʻulamāʼ al-aʻlām, dhī al-taṣānīf al-bāriʻah al-kathīrah wa-al-taʼālīf al-nāfiʻah al-shahīrah, Qāḍī al-Quḍāh, Abī Yaḥyá Zakarīyā al-Anṣārī, li-kitāb al-Shaykh Ashraf al-Dīn al-Abharī, al-shahīr bi-Īsāghūjī, jarradtuhā min khaṭṭ Shaykhinā wa-Ustādhinā, ʻallāmat zamānih, wa-farīd ʻaṣrihi wa-awānih, baqīyat al-muḥaqqiqīn, wa-bughyat al-mudaqqiqīn, Shihāb al-Millah wa-al-Dīn, Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad al-Ghunaymī al-Anṣārī al-Khazrajī, aḥallahu Allāh maḥalla ruḍwānih, wa-askanahu farādīs jannātih [jinānih] ..."

title: 880-03 Bustān al-ʻārifīn : manuscript  / Naṣr ibn Muḥammad Abū al-Layth al-Samarqandī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Hādhā Kitāb Bustān al-ʻārifīn. al-Ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn, wa-al-ʻāqibah lil-muttaqīn. Wa-lā ḥawla wa-lā qūwata illā billāh al-ʻAlī al-ʻAẓīm. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad Khātim al-Nabīyīn, wa-ʻalá ālihi al-ṭayyibīn, wa-ʻalá jamīʻ al-anbiyāʼ wa-al-mursalīn, wa-ʻalá ʻibād Allāh al-ṣāliḥīn, min ahl al-samāwāt wa-al-araḍīn. Qāla al-Faqīh Abū al-Layth, raḥmat Allāh ʻalayh: Innī qad jamaʻtu fī kitābī hādhā funūnan min al-ʻilm mimmā lā yasaʻu jahluhu, wa-lā al-takhalluf ʻanhu min al-khāṣṣ wa-al-ʻāmm, wa-istakhrajtu dhālika min kutub kathīrah, fa-awradtu fīhi mā huwa al-awḍaḥ lil-nāẓir fīhi wa-al-rāghib ilayhi, wa-bayyantu lil-ḥujaj fīmā yuḥtāju fīhi ilá al-ḥujjah bi-al-Kitāb wa-al-akhbār wa-al-naẓar, wa-taraktu al-ghawāmiḍ min al-kalām, wa-ḥadhaftu asānīd al-Aḥādīth takhfīfan lil-rāghibīn fīhi wa-iltimāsan li-manfaʻat al-nās, wa-sammaytuhu 'Kitāb Bustān al-ʻārifīn' ..."

title: 880-02 Fatʹḥ al-Raḥmān bi-sharḥ Luqṭat al-ʻajlān wa-bullat al-ẓamʼān : manuscript / Abū Yaḥyá Zakarīyā ibn Muḥammad al-Anṣārī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-Huwa ḥasbī wa-niʻma al-wakīl. al-Ḥamdu lillāh fātiḥ abwāb al-ʻulūm li-man qaṣadahu, wa-māniḥ ʻaṭāyāhu li-man aṭāʻahu wa-ʻabadah. Wa-ashhadu an lā ilāha illā Allāh al-mutafaḍḍil ʻalá man ikhtārahu wa-waḥḥadah. Wa-ashhadu anna Sayyidanā Muḥammadan ʻabuduhu wa-rasūluh, al-mufaḍḍal ʻalá ghayrihi mimman abdaʻahu wa-awjadah. Wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá ashraf Nabī ʻaẓẓamahu wa-majjadah, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-aṣḥābihi wa-atbāʻihi al-bararah al-mumajjadah. Wa-baʻd, fa-lammā kānat al-Muqaddimah al-mawsūmah bi-'Luqṭat al-ʻajlān wa-bullat al-ẓamʼān', taʼlīf al-Shaykh al-ʻallāmah al-Rabbānī Muḥammad ibn ʻAbd Allāh al-Zarkashī al-Shāfiʻī mushtamilah ʻalá nuqūl ʻajībah, wa-masāʼil gharībah, wa-ḥudūd manīʻah, wa-mawḍūʻāt badīʻah, maʻa kathrat ʻilmihā wa-wajāzat lafẓihā, wa-iftiqārihā ilá ḥall mabānīhā, wa-bayān maʻānīhā, ṭalab minnī baʻḍ al-aʻizzah ʻalayya min al-fuḍalāʼ al-mutaraddidīn ilayya an aḍaʻa ʻalayhā sharḥan yaḥullu alfāẓahā, wa-yubrizu daqāʼiqihā, wa-yuḥaqqiqu masāʼilihā, wa-yuḥarriru dalāʼilihā, fa-ajabtuhu ilá dhālik bi-ʻawn al-Qādir al-Mālik, rājiyan bi-hi jazīl al-ajr wa-al-thawāb min fayḍ Mawlānā al-Akram al-Wahhāb. Wa-sammaytuhu: 'Fatʹḥ al-Raḥmān bi-sharḥ Luqṭat al-ʻajlān wa-bullat al-ẓamʼān' ..."

title: 880-02 Risālah fī aḥkām al-Jānn : manuscript / Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad al-Maydānī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi nastaʻīn. Qāla Sayyidunā wa-Mawlānā, al-Imām al-ʻālim al-ʻallāmah, al-baḥr al-fahhāmah, al-muḥaqqiq al-ruḥalah, Nawawī zamānih, wa-farīd ʻaṣrihi wa-awānih, wārith ʻulūm Sayyid al-Mursalīn, Shaykh al-Islām wa-al-Muslimīn, Shams al-Dunyā wa-al-Dīn, Muḥammad al-Maydānī al-Shāfiʻī, raḥimahu Allāh taʻālá. Āmīn: al-Ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad ashraf al-anām, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi al-sādah al-kirām. Wa-baʻd, qāla Imām al-Ḥaramayn fī kitābihi al-shāmil: Ankara kathīr min al-falāsifah, wa-al-Qadarīyah, wa-kāffat al-Zanādiqah, wujūd al-Shayāṭīn wa-al-Jinn, maʻa anna nuṣūṣ al-Qurʼān, wa-tawātur al-akhbār, wa-istifāḍat al-āthār, dāllah ʻalá wujūdihim ..."

title: 880-02 Ākām al-marjān fī aḥkām al-Jānn : manuscript / Muḥammad ibn ʻAbd Allāh al-Shiblī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-Huwa ḥasbī. al-Ḥamdu lillāh Khāliq al-Ins wa-al-Jān. Wa-ashhadu an lā ilāha illā Allāh waḥdahu, lā sharīka lah, shahādatan yakūnu li-man tadarraʻa bi-hā awfá jinnah. Wa-ashhadu anna Muḥammadan ʻabduhu wa-rasūluh, al-dāʻī ilá al-Jannah, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayh, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-aṣḥābih, dhawī al-baʼs wa-al-najdah wa-al-minnah, ṣalātan tuʻaẓumu bi-hā ʻalayhim al-minnah, wa-sallama taslīman kathīran yaqūmu bi-al-gharaḍ wa-al-Sunnah, ka-mā awjaba dhālika ʻalaynā wa-sannah. Wa-baʻd, fa-hādhā kitāb jāmiʻ li-dhikr al-Jānn wa-akhbārihim wa-mā yataʻallaqu bi-aḥkāmihim wa-āthārihim ..."

title: 880-02 Shumūs al-anwār wa-kunūz al-asrār : manuscript / Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad ibn al-Ḥājj al-Tilimsānī al-Maghribī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī awdaʻa ruqūm al-ḥurūf badāʼiʻ asrārih, wa-rakkaba minhā maʻāniya asmāʼih, wa-fajjara minhā yanābīʻ al-aʻdād wa-buḥūr al-awfāq bi-mawāhib anwārih, wa-wakkala rūḥānīyatan taqūmu wa-takhdumu arbābahā fī jamīʻ al-maṭālib, tadullu bi-surʻatihā ʻalá faradānīyatihi, fa-fataḥa bisāṭ al-uns, wa-aṭlaʻa man shāʼa min al-ins ʻalá ʻajāʼib malakūtihā mimman akhlaṣa min ʻibādih ..."

title: 880-03 al-Muṭṭalaʻ : manuscript / Zakarīyā ibn Muḥammad al-Anṣārī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Qāla al-Shaykh al-Imām al-ʻālim al-ʻallāmah, shaykh al-ṭarīqah wa-maʻdin al-ḥaqīqah, waḥīd dahrihi wa-farīd ʻaṣrih, mufīd al-ṭālibīn, ḥujjat al-munāẓirīn, murabbī al-sālikīn, qudwat al-ʻārifīn, baqīyat al-mujtahidīn, qāmiʻ al-mubtadiʻīn, Shaykh al-Islām wa-al-Muslimīn Abū Yaḥyá Zakarīyā al-Anṣārī al-Shāfiʻī, taghammadahu Allāh bi-raḥmatihi. Āmīn ... Wa-baʻd, fa-hādhā sharḥ laṭīf li-kitāb al-ʻAllāmah Athīr al-Dīn al-Abharī, raḥimahu Allāh taʻālá, al-musammá bi-Īsāghūjī fī ʻilm al-manṭiq, yaḥullu alfāẓah wa-yubayyinu murādah, wa-yaftaḥu mughlaqah, wa-yuqayyidu muṭlaqah, ʻalá wajh laṭīf wa-manhaj munīf. Wa-sammaytuhu "al-Muṭṭalaʻ". Wa-Allāh asʼal an yanfaʻa bi-hi, wa-Huwa ḥasbī wa-niʻma al-wakīl ..."

title: 880-03 al-Muṭṭalaʻ : manuscript / Zakarīyā ibn Muḥammad al-Anṣārī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi nastaʻīn. Qāla Shaykhunā al-Imām al-ʻālim al-ʻallāmah, shaykh al-ṭarīqah wa-maʻdin al-ḥaqīqah, waḥīd dahrihi wa-farīd ʻaṣrih, mufīd al-ṭālibīn, ḥujjat al-munāẓirīn, walī al-sālikīn, qudwat al-ʻārifīn, baqīyat al-mujtahidīn, qāmiʻ al-mubtadiʻīn, Shaykh al-Islām wa-al-Muslimīn, dhū al-funūn wa-al-taṣānīf al-ḥamīdah wa-al-fatāwá al-mufīdah, Abū Yaḥyá Zakarīyā al-Anṣārī, taghammadahu Allāh bi-raḥmatihi, bi-Muḥammad wa-ālihi wa-ṣaḥābatih. Āmīn. Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm ... Wa-baʻd, fa-hādhā sharḥ laṭīf li-kitāb al-ʻAllāmah Athīr al-Dīn al-Abharī, raḥimahu Allāh, al-musammá bi-Īsāghūjī fī ʻilm al-manṭiq, yaḥullu alfāẓah wa-yubayyinu murādah, wa-yaftaḥu mughlaqah, wa-yuqayyidu muṭlaqah, ʻalá wajh laṭīf wa-manhaj munīf. Wa-sammaytuhu "al-Muṭṭalaʻ". Wa-Allāh asʼalu an yanfaʻa bi-hi, wa-Huwa ḥasbī wa-niʻma al-wakīl ..."

title: 880-03 Kitāb al-Bustān : manuscript  / Naṣr ibn Muḥammad Abū al-Layth al-Samarqandī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi thiqatī, wa-Huwa ḥasbī. al-Ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn, wa-al-ʻāqibah lil-muttaqīn. Wa-lā ḥawla wa-lā qūwata illā billāh al-ʻAlī al-ʻAẓīm. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Rasūlihi Muḥammad Khātim al-Nabīyīn, wa-ʻalá jamīʻ al-anbiyāʼ wa-al-mursalīn, wa-ʻibādihi al-ṣāliḥīn, min ahl al-samāwāt wa-al-araḍīn. Qāla al-Faqīh Abū al-Layth Naṣr ibn Muḥammad ibn Ibrāhīm, raḍiya Allāh ʻanhu: Innī qad jamaʻtu fī kitābī hādhā funūnan min al-ʻilm mā lā yasaʻu jahluhu wa-al-takhalluf ʻanhu lil-khāṣṣ wa-al-ʻāmm, wa-istakhrajtu dhālika min kutub kathīrah, wa-sammaytuhu 'Kitāb al-Bustān', fa-awradtu fīhi mā huwa al-awḍaḥ lil-nāẓir fīhi wa-al-rāghib ilayhi, wa-bayyantu al-ḥujaj fīmā yuḥtāju fīhi ilá al-ḥujjah bi-al-Kitāb wa-al-akhbār wa-al-naẓar wa-al-āthār, wa-taraktu al-ghawāmiḍ min al-kalām, wa-ḥadhaftu asānīd al-Aḥādīth takhfīfan lil-rāghibīn fīhi wa-iltimāsan li-manfaʻat al-nās, wa-arjū Allāh taʻālá bi-hi al-thawāb, wa-asʼaluhu al-tawfīq lil-ṣawāb ..."

title: 880-02 Ḥayāt al-ḥayawān : manuscript / Muḥammad ibn Mūsá al-Damīrī.
note_text: Incipit: "[Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm]. Bāb al-Hamzah. al-Asad min al-sibāʻ maʻrūf, wa-jamʻuhu usūd, wa-usd, wa-āsud, wa-āsād, wa-al-unthá asadah. Wa-innamā ibtadaʼnā bi-hi li-annahu ashraf al-ḥayawān al-mutawaḥḥish, idh manzilatuhu manzilat al-malik al-muhāb, li-qūwatihi wa-shajāʻatihi wa-qasāwatihi wa-mahābatihi wa-sharāsat khuluqihi, wa-li-dhālika yuḍrabu bi-hi al-mathal fī al-shajāʻah wa-al-basālah wa-fī shiddat al-iqdām wa-al-ṣawlah ..."

title: 880-02 al-Asrār al-Rabbānīyah : manuscript / Aḥmad ibn ʻAlī al-Būnī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī adāra bi-yad al-asrār laṭāʼif aflāk al-malakūtīyāt, wa-abraza min khidhr [khidr] al-ghayb shumūs al-maʻārif li-dhawī al-ḥaqāʼiq al-ilāhīyāt, wa-aṭlaʻa min baḥr al-nūr al-aʻlá nafāʼis jawāhir al-ʻuqūl al-nūrānīyāt, wa-aḥkama iḥkām aḥkām tadawwiru dawāʼir al-akwān bi-al-ḥurūf al-iḥāṭīyāt, al-badīʻ alladhī abdaʻa ibdāʻ ṣuwarihā fī alwāḥ arwāḥ al-ʻawālim al-ʻulwīyāt wa-al-suflīyāt, al-muṣawwir alladhī ṣawwara kunh maʻānīhā fī ʻarsh al-nafs al-wāḥidah, fa-ẓaharat fī dhawāt al-anfus al-mutaʻaddidāt ..."

title: 880-02 al-Manhaj al-maslūk fī siyāsat al-mulūk : manuscript / ʻAbd al-Raḥmān ibn Naṣr al-Shayzarī.
note_text: Incipit: The first leaf of the manuscript is missing; starts with: "... mimman ātāhu Allāh mulkahu al-ʻaqīm [al-ʻaẓīm], wa-ahdāhu ṣirāṭahu al-mustaqīm, wa-awrathahu mashāriq al-arḍ wa-maghāribahā, wa-awṭaʼahu min al-mulūk riqābahā wa-manākibahā, wa-kāna mimman yará al-adab wa-faḍlahu, wa-yūrithu [wa-yuʼthiru] al-ʻilm wa-ahlahu, jamaʻtu li-khizānat ʻulūmihi hādhā al-kitāb, [wa-huwa] yaḥtawī ʻalá ẓarāʼif al-ḥikmah wa-jawāhir min al-ādāb wa-uṣūl fī al-siyāsah wa-tadbīr al-raʻīyah wa-maʻrifat arkān al-mamlakah wa-qawāʻid al-tadbīr wa-mā yalzamu ahl al-jaysh min ḥuqūq al-jihād, wa-nabbahtu fīhi ʻalá al-shiyam al-karīmah wa-al-akhlāq al-dhamīmah, wa-ashartu fīhi ʻalá faḍl al-mashūrah, wa-al-ḥthth ʻalayhā, wa-kayfīyat muḍārabat al-aʻdāʼ wa-al-nadb ilayhā ..."

title: 880-02 Sharḥ Mukhtaṣar al-Qānūn fī al-ṭibb : manuscript / Muḥammad ibn Maḥmūd al-Āmulī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī khaṣṣaṣa nawʻ al-insān bi-aʻdal al-amzijah wa-afḍal al-bunyān, wa-sharrafahum bi-ʻilmay al-abdān wa-al-adyān, wa-al-ṣalāh ʻalá khayr man khalaqahu, Muḥammad, al-dāʻī ilá al-ḥaqq wa-al-burhān, wa-ʻalá ālihi al-maʻṣūmīn min al-zalal wa-al-ṭughyān. Wa-baʻd, fa-yaqūlu al-Mawlá al-aʻẓam wa-al-ḥabr al-mufakhkham, afḍal al-ʻArab wa-al-ʻAjam, Shams al-Ḥaqq wa-al-Millah wa-al-Dīn, al-Āmulī, raḥimahu Allāh: Innī lammā raʼaytu anna ashadd al-ʻulūm ḥājatan wa-aktharahā manfaʻatan, bal asnāhā martabatan, wa-aʻlāhā darajatan, huwa ʻilm al-ṭibb, al-mutakaffil bi-ḥifẓ mazāj al-insān bi-qadr al-imkān, al-muḥtāj ilayhi fī kull ḥīn wa-awān, ṣaraftu ilayhi ʻinān al-himmah, wa-ʻaqadtu bi-hi aʻyān al-azimmah, baʻdamā rajaʻtu ʻammā kuntu aʻtaqiduhu fī ḥadāthat al-sinn, wa-tayaqqantu anna dhālika kāna min baʻḍ al-ẓann, wa-ṭafiqtu ataṣaffaḥu fī akthar al-awqāt mā ṣunnifa fīhi min al-mabsūṭāt wa-al-mukhtaṣarāt, fa-lam ara fīhā aḥsan min al-Mukhtaṣar al-mansūb ilá al-ḥakīm al-muḥaqqiq, wa-al-ḥabr al-mudaqqiq, ustādh al-aṭibbāʼ wa-qudwat al-ḥukamāʼ, mafkhar al-sādah wa-al-nuqabāʼ, Ashraf al-Millah wa-al-Dīn Muḥammad al-Īlāqī ..."

title: 880-03 Rawḍat al-ṭālibīn wa-ʻumdat al-muftīn. Volume 1 : manuscript / Muḥyī al-Dīn Yaḥyá ibn Sharaf al-Nawawī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Rabbi zidnī ʻilman. al-Ḥamdu lillāh dhī al-jalāl wa-al-ikrām, wa-al-faḍl wa-al-ṭawl wa-al-minan al-jisām, alladhī hadānā lil-Islām, wa-asbagha ʻalaynā jazīl niʻamih, wa-karrama al-Ādamīyīn wa-faḍḍalahum ʻalá ghayrihim min al-anām, wa-jaʻala fīhim qādah yadʻūn bi-amrihi ilá Dār al-Salām, wa-ijtabá man laṭufa bi-hi minhum, fa-jaʻalahum min al-amāthil wa-al-aʻlām, fa-ṭahharahum min anwāʻ al-kadar wa-waḍar al-āthām, wa-ṣayyarahum bi-faḍlihi min ulī al-nuhá wa-al-aḥlām, wa-waffaqahum lil-dawām ʻalá murāqabatihi wa-luzūm ṭāʻatihi ʻalá takarrur al-sinīn wa-al-ayyām ..."

title: 880-02 Rawḍat al-ṭālibīn wa-ʻumdat al-muftīn. Volume 2 : manuscript / Muḥyī al-Dīn Yaḥyá ibn Sharaf al-Nawawī.
note_text: Incipit: "Kitāb al-Zakāh. Hiya aḥad arkān al-Islām; fa-man jaḥadahā kafar, illā an yakūna ḥadīth ʻahd bi-al-Islām, lā yaʻrifu wujūbahā, fa-yuʻarraf. Wa-man manaʻahā wa-huwa yaʻtaqidu wujūbahā, ukhidhat minhu qahran, fa-in imtanaʻa bi-qawm, qātalahum al-Imām ʻalayhā. Faṣl. Fiman tajibu ʻalayhi al-zakāh. Huwa kull Muslim ḥurr, aw, baʻḍuhu ḥurr; fa-tajibu fī māl al-ṣabī wa-al-majnūn, wa-yajibu ʻalá al-walī ikhrājuhā min mālihimā ..."

title: 880-02 Rawḍat al-ṭālibīn wa-ʻumdat al-muftīn. Volume 3 : manuscript / Muḥyī al-Dīn Yaḥyá ibn Sharaf al-Nawawī.
note_text: Incipit: "Kitāb al-Bayʻ. Bāb mā yaṣiḥḥu bi-hi al-bayʻ. al-Bayʻ muqābalat māl bi-māl, aw, naḥwihi. Wa-yuʻtabaru fī ṣiḥḥatihi thalāthat umūr: al-Awwal, al-ṣīghah, wa-hiya al-ījāb min jihat al-bāyiʻ, ka-qawlihi 'Biʻtuka, aw, mallaktuka, wa-naḥwihimā'. Wa-fī 'Mallaktuka' wajh ḍaʻīf. Wa-al-qabūl min al-mushtarī, ka-qawlihi 'Qabiltu, aw, ibtaʻtu, aw, ishtaraytu, aw, tamallaktu'. Wa-yajīʼu fī 'tamallaktu' dhāka al-wajh. Wa-sawāʼun, taqddama qawl al-bāʼiʻ 'Biʻtu', aw, qawl al-mushtarī 'Ishtaraytu', fa-yaṣiḥḥu al-bayʻ fī al-ḥālayn, wa-lā yushtaraṭu ittifāq al-lafẓayn ..."

title: 880-02 Rawḍat al-ṭālibīn wa-ʻumdat al-muftīn. Volume 4 : manuscript / Muḥyī al-Dīn Yaḥyá ibn Sharaf al-Nawawī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Rabbi zidnī ʻilman. Kitāb al-Iqrār. Wa-huwa ikhbār ʻan ḥaqq sābiq. Wa-fīhi arbaʻat abwāb. al-Awwal fī arkānihi, wa-hiya arbaʻah. al-Awwal, al-muqirr, wa-huwa muṭlaq al-maḥjūr ʻalayhi, fa-al-maḥjūr ʻalayhi yaṣiḥḥu iqrāruhu. Qāla al-Ghazzālī, raḥimahu Allāh: Yaṣiḥḥu iqrāruhu bi-kull mā yaqdiru ʻalá inshāʼihi. Wa-hādhā bi-al-ḍabṭ yustathná minhu ṣuwar, minhā law qāla al-wakīl taṣarraftu kamā udhintu, fa-qāla al-muwakkil lam tataṣarraf, lā yuqbalu iqrār al-wakīl, ʻalá aḥad al-qawlayn, maʻa qudratihi ʻalá al-inshāʼ. Wa-kadhā law qāla istawfaytu mā amartanī bi-istīfāʼih, wa-nāzaʻahu kamā sabaq. Wa-minhā istinkāḥ al-bint ilá walīyihā, wa-iqrāruhu ghayr maqbūl, wa-yumkinu an yuzāda fī al-ḍabṭ, fa-yuqālu yanfūdhu iqrāruhu fī al-taṣarrufāt al-mutaʻalliqah allatī yastaqillu bi-inshāʼihā ..."

title: 880-02 Rawḍat al-ṭālibīn wa-ʻumdat al-muftīn. Volume 5 : manuscript / Muḥyī al-Dīn Yaḥyá ibn Sharaf al-Nawawī.
note_text: Incipit: No incipit; the title page of this codex is missing; starts with part of "al-Bāb al-khāmis: Fī bayān māniʻ al-mīrāth", as follows: "... wa-fī baṭṭ al-jurḥ wa-saqy al-dawāʼ awjuh, ḥakāhu Ibn al-Labbān wa-ghayruhu, annahu lā yamnaʻu. Wa-ʻan ṣāḥib al-Taqrīb wajh fī muṭlaq al-qatl bi-al-tasabbub, annahu lā yamnaʻu. Wa-al-ṣaḥīḥ alladhī ʻalayhi al-aṣḥāb al-awwal. Wa-sawāʼun ṣadara al-qatl min mukallaf aw ghayrih. Wa-yajīʼu fī al-ṣabī wajh yatakharraju min al-qawl alladhī ḥakāhu al-Ḥannāṭī fī al-mukhṭī, idhā qulnā ʻamd al-ṣabī khaṭaʼ, sawāʼun fīhi al-mukrah wa-al-mukhtār. Wa-fī al-mukrah khilāf, wa-al-madhhab al-manʻ ..."

title: 880-02 Kitāb al-ʻibar. Al-Juzʼ 2 : manuscript / ʻAbd al-Raḥmān ibn Muḥammad ibn Khaldūn.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallam. al-Kitāb al-thānī. Fī akhbār al-ʻArab wa-ajyālihim wa-duwalihim mundhu mabdaʼ al-khalīqah ilá hādhā al-ʻahd. Wa-fīhi dhikr muʻāṣirīhim min al-umam al-mashāhīr, mithl al-Sharānīyīn, wa-al-Nabṭ, wa-al-Kaldānīyīn, wa-al-Furs, wa-al-Qibṭ, wa-Banī Isrāʼīl, wa-Banī Yūnān, wa-al-Rūm, wa-al-ilmām bi-akhbār duwalihim. Wa-yataqaddamu al-kalām fī dhālik muqaddimatān. Aḥaduhumā [Iḥdāhumā] fī umam al-ʻālam wa-ansābihim ʻalá al-jumlah. al-Thāniyah fī kayfīyat awḍāʻ al-ansāb fī hādhā al-kitāb ..."

title: 880-02 Kitāb al-ʻibar. Al-Juzʼ 3 : manuscript / ʻAbd al-Raḥmān ibn Muḥammad ibn Khaldūn.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Wa-bi-hi thiqatī wa-rajāʼī wa-ʻalayhi iʻtimādī. Kāna li-Banī ʻAbd Manāf fī Quraysh jall min al-ʻadad wa-al-sharaf, lā yunāhiḍuhum fīhi aḥad min sāʼir buṭūn Quraysh. Wa-kāna fakhdhāhum Banī Umayyah wa-Banī Hāshim, ḥayyan jamīʻan yantamūn li-ʻAbd Manāf wa-yunsabūn ilayhi, wa-Quraysh taʻrifu dhālik wa-tasʼalu la-hum al-riyāsah ʻalayhim, illā anna Banī Umayyah kānū akthar ʻadadan min Banī Hāshim wa-awfar rijālan. Wa-al-ʻizzah innamā hiya al-kathrah. Qāla al-shāʻir: Wa-innamā al-ʻizzatu lil-kāthirah ..."

title: 880-02 Kitāb al-ʻibar. Al-Juzʼ 4 : manuscript / ʻAbd al-Raḥmān ibn Muḥammad ibn Khaldūn.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā wa-Mawlānā Muḥammad wa-ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallam. Akhbār al-dawlah al-muzāḥimah li-Dawlat Banī al-ʻAbbās, wa-nabdaʼu minhum bi-Dawlat al-Abārisah [al-Adārisah] bi-al-Maghrib al-Aqṣá. Qad taqaddama lanā dhikr Shiʻat Ahl al-Bayt li-ʻAlī ibn Abī Ṭālib wa-banīh, raḍiya Allāh ʻanhum, wa-mā kāna min shaʼnihim bi-al-Kūfah wa-mawjadatihim ʻalá al-Ḥasan fī taslīm al-amr li-ghayrih, wa-iḍṭrāb al-amr ʻalá Ziyād bi-al-Kūfah min ajlihim, ḥattá qatala al-mutawallūn kibar dhālika, minhum Ḥujr ibn ʻAdī wa-aṣḥābuh. Thumma istadʻaw al-Ḥusayn baʻda wafāt Muʻāwiyah, fa-kān min qatlihi bi-Karbalāʼ mā huwa maʻrūf. Thumma nadima al-Shīʻah ʻalá quʻūdihim ʻan munāṣaratih, fa-kharajū baʻda wafāt Yazīd wa-bayʻat Marwān. Wa-kharaja ʻUbayd Allāh ibn Ziyād ʻan al-Kūfah wa-sammaw anfusahum al-Tawwābīn ..."

title: 880-03 ʻAjāʼib al-makhlūqāt wa-gharāʼib al-mawjūdāt : manuscript / Zakarīyā ibn Muḥammad al-Qazwīnī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-ʻAẓamat [al-ʻAẓamah] laka, wa-al-kibriyāʼ li-Jalālika, Allāhumma. Yā qāʼim al-dhāt, wa-mufīḍ al-khayrāt, wa-wājib al-wujūd, wa-wāhib al-ʻuqūl, wa-fāṭir al-arḍ wa-al-samāwāt, mubdī al-ḥarakah wa-al-zamān, wa-mubdiʻ al-ḥayyiz wa-al-makān, wa-jāʻil al-nūr wa-al-ẓulumāt, muḥarrika al-aflāk wa-muzayyinuhā bi-al-thawābit [wa-]al-sayyārāt, wa-muqarrir al-arḍ wa-mumahhiduhā li-anwāʻ al-ḥayawānāt, wa-aṣnāf al-maʻādin wa-al-nabāt. Dāma ḥamduka, wa-jall thanāʼuka, wa-taʻālá dhikruka, wa-taqaddasat asmāʼuka, lā ilāha illā ant ..."

title: 880-02 Bāʻith al-nufūs ilá ziyārat al-Quds al-maḥrūs : manuscript / Ibrāhīm ibn ʻAbd al-Raḥmān ibn al-Firkāḥ.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn. Wa-ashhadu an lā ilāha illā Allāh waḥdahu lā sharīka lah. Wa-ashhadu anna Muḥammadan ʻabduhu wa-rasūluh, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-azwājihi wa-dhurrīyatihi wa-sallam taslīman. Wa-raḍiya Allāh ʻan aṣḥābihi ajmaʻīn. Fa-hādhā 'Muntakhab fī faḍāʼil Bayt al-Maqdis wa-qabr al-Khalīl Ibrāhīm', ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam, ghālibuhu min kitāb al-Mustaqṣá lil-Ḥāfiẓ Bahāʼ al-Dīn ibn ʻAsākir, raḥimahu Allāh, wa-al-qalīl minhu min kitāb al-Shaykh [Abī al-Maʻālī] al-Musharraf ibn al-Murajjā al-Maqdisī, raḥimahu Allāh. Wa-mā naqaltuhu min kitāb Abī al-Maʻālī fa-huwa mubayyan annahu min kalāmih, wa-al-bāqī min al-Mustaqṣá. Wa-qad ḥadhaftu al-asānīd min dhālika kullih li-mā iqtaḍathu al-maṣlaḥah fī dhālik ..."

title: 880-02 Iʻlām al-nās bi-mā waqaʻa lil-Barāmikah min Banī al-ʻAbbās. Volume 1 : manuscript / Muḥammad Diyāb al-Itlīdī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī anzal al-Kitāb al-mubīn ʻalá ashraf al-anbiyāʼ wa-al-mursalīn, wa-qaṣṣa ʻalayhi akhbār al-mutaqaddimīn wa-al-mutaʼakhkhirīn, wa-aʻlamahu bi-mā kāna wa-mā yakūnu ilá Yawm al-Dīn. Aḥmaduhu idh jaʻalanā min ummatihi, wa-ashkuruhu ʻalá ʻaṭāyāhu wa-niʻmatih. Wa-ashhadu an lā ilāha illā Allāh waḥdahu, lā sharīka lah, alladhī manna ʻalaynā bi-maʻrifat aḥwāl man taqaddama min al-umam, wa-lam yakshif ʻannā sitrahu idh zalla binā al-qadam, wa-jaʻalanā ummatan ʻadūlan wasaṭan, wa-shahida lanā bidhālika al-Kitāb al-muʻaẓẓam al-muṭahhar ..."

title: 880-02 Tanwīr al-abṣār wa-jāmiʻ al-biḥār : manuscript / Muḥammad ibn ʻAbd Allāh al-Khaṭīb al-Tamartāshī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallam. Ḥamdan li-man aḥkama al-sharʻ al-sharīf wa-aʻlá manārah, wa-aʻazza man qāma bi-aʻbāʼihi wa-aʻlá miqdārah, wa-ṣalātan wa-salāman ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad alladhī ḍāʻafa Allāh fakhārah, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-aṣḥābih, wa-akhaṣṣa bi-al-ziyādah aʻwānahu wa-anṣārah. Wa-baʻd, fa-yaqūlu al-Shaykh al-Imām al-ʻallāmah, wa-al-Imām al-ʻumdah al-fahhāmah, ʻumdat al-ʻulamāʼ al-rāsikhīn, Shaykh al-Islām wa-al-Muslimīn, wārith ʻulūm al-anbiyāʼ wa-al-mursalīn, kahf al-mushtaghilīn, barakat al-Muslimīn, farīd ʻaṣrih wa-waḥīd dahrih, Mawlānā Shams al-Dīn Muḥammad ibn al-marḥūm Shaykh al-Islām, zubdat al-anām, ʻAbd Allāh ibn al-marḥūm Shaykh al-Islām, al-ʻālim al-ʻāmil al-humām, Shihāb al-Dīn Aḥmad ibn Tamrtāsh al-Ḥanafī, mattaʻa Allāh al-Muslimīn bi-ṭūl ḥayātih, wa-adharra ʻalaynā wa-ʻalayhim min barakātih. Āmīn ..."

title: 880-02 al-Mustaṭraf min kull fann mustaẓraf. Al-Juzʼ 2 : manuscript / Muḥammad ibn Aḥmad al-Ibshīhī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ālihi wa-sallam. al-Bāb al-khamsūn. Fīmā jāʼa fī al-asfār wa-al-iʻtirāf [wa-al-ightirāb], wa-mā qīla fī al-wadāʻ wa-al-firāq, wa-al-ḥathth ʻalá tark al-iqāmah bi-dār al-hawān, wa-ḥubb al-waṭan wa-al-ḥanīn ilayhā. Ammā mā jāʼa fī al-asfār wa-al-ḥathth ʻalá tark al-iqāmah bi-dār al-hawān, fa-qad qāla Allāh taʻālá: 'Huwa alladhī jaʻala lakumu al-arḍa dhalūlan', al-āyah ..."

title: 880-02 Tuḥfat al-ʻarūs wa-nuzʹhat al-nufūs : manuscript / Muḥammad ibn Aḥmad al-Tijānī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Rabbi yassir. Yā Karīm. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ālihi wa-sallam. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī sawwaghanā al-faḍl jazīlan, wa-faḍḍalanā ʻalá kathīr mimman khalaqa tafḍīlan, wa-asbagha ʻalaynā min niʻamihi al-ẓāhirah wa-al-bāṭinah, mā jaʻala kathīr al-shukr bi-al-nisbah ilayhi qalīlan. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad alladhī ibtaʻathahu lil-khalq rasūlan, wa-nazzala ʻalayhi waḥyahu tanzīlan, wa-takhayyarahu min aṭhar al-aʻrāq, wa-jaʻala sharʻahu al-qawīm mutammiman li-makārim al-akhlāq taḥrīman wa-taḥlīlan, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-aṣḥābihi alladhīna kammala lahum bi-ruʼyatihi wa-ittibāʻihi al-faḍl takmīlan, wa-sallama ʻalayhi wa-ʻalayhim taslīman, tubādī rūḥuhu ilá arwāḥihim al-muqaddasah bukratan wa-aṣīlan ..."
