title: 880-02 Badīʻ al-inshāʼ wa-al-ṣifāt fī al-mukātabāt wa-al-murāsalāt : manuscript / Marʻī ibn Yūsuf al-Karmī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Wa-bi-hi thiqatī. Qāla al-Shaykh al-Imām, al-ḥabr al-humām, al-ʻālim al-ʻallāmah, al-ʻumdah al-fahhāmah, al-Shaykh Marʻī ibn al-Shaykh al-Imām Yūsuf ibn Abī Bakr ibn Aḥmad al-Maqdisī al-Ḥanbalī, raḥimahu Allāh. Āmīn: al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī akrama al-insān, wa-ḥallāhu bi-ḥilyat al-nuṭq wa-al-bayān, wa-jaʻala al-lisān tarjumān al-jinān, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá man ḥalla min al-faṣāḥah wa-al-balāghah aʻlá makān, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-aṣḥābihi ulī al-bayān wa-al-tibyān. Wa-baʻd, fa-hādhihi ishārāt yasīrah wa-ʻibārāt qaṣīrah, wa-ḍaʻtuhā fī al-mukātabāt, wa-hadhdhabtuhā fī al-murāsalāt, yaḥtāju ilayhā arbāb al-faḍāʼil ..."

title: 880-02 Tadhkirat ulī al-albāb wa-al-jāmiʻ lil-ʻajab al-ʻujāb. Al-Juzʼ 1 : manuscript / Dāʼūd ibn ʻUmar al-Anṭākī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Subḥānuka. Yā mubdiʻ mawādd al-kāʼināt bi-lā mithāl sabaq, mukhtariʻ ṣuwar al-mawjūdāt fī akmal al-fawāʻil wa-al-qawābil, wa-muzayyin jawāhirahu bi-al-aʻrāḍ, wa-al-majmūʻ bi-al-khawāṣṣ, wa-mulhim istikhrājihā bi-al-tajārib wa-al-qiyās man ikhtarta min al-khawāṣṣ, fa-kāna irtibāṭuhā bi-al-muʼaththirāt [bi-al-muʼashshirāt] ʻalá waḥdānīyatika aʻdal shāhid, wa-taṭābuq kullīyātihā wa-juzʼīyātihā ʻalá ʻilmika bi-al-kullīyāt wa-al-juzʼīyāt wa-luzūmānīyatihi aṣaḥḥ rādd ʻalá al-jāḥid ..."

title: 880-02 Murūj al-dhahab wa-maʻādin al-jawhar : manuscript / ʻAlī ibn al-Ḥusayn al-Masʻūdī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh ahl al-ḥamd wa-mustawjib al-thanāʼ wa-al-majd. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Muḥammad khātim al-nabīyīn, wa-ʻalá ālihi, wa-sallama taslīman, ilá Yawm al-Dīn. Bāb Dhikr jawāmiʻ aghrāḍ hādhā al-kitāb. Ammā baʻd, fa-innā ṣanaʻnā kitāban fī akhbār al-zamān, wa-qaddamnā al-qawl fīhi fī hayʼat al-arḍ, wa-mudunihā, wa-ʻajāʼibihā, wa-biḥārihā, wa-aghwārihā, wa-jibālihā, wa-anhārihā, wa-badāʼiʻ maʻādinihā, wa-aṣnāf manāhilihā, wa-akhbār ghiyāḍihā, wa-jazāʼir al-biḥār wa-al-buḥayrāt al-ṣighār, wa-akhbār al-abniyah al-muʻaẓẓamah wa-al-masākin al-musharrifah, wa-dhikr shaʼn al-mabdaʼ wa-aṣl al-nasl, wa-tabāyun al-awṭān, wa-mā kāna nahran fa-ṣāra baḥran, wa-mā kāna baḥran fa-ṣāra barran, wa-mā kāna barran fa-ṣāra baḥran ʻalá murūr al-ayyām wa-kurūr al-duhūr, wa-ʻillat dhālik wa-sababihi al-falakī wa-al-ṭabīʻī wa-inqisām al-aqālīm bi-khawāṣṣ al-kawākib ..."

title: 880-02 Laqṭ al-marjān fī aḥkām al-Jānn : manuscript / ʻAbd al-Raḥmān ibn Abī Bakr al-Suyūṭī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh al-Ḥannān al-Mannān. Wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad al-mabʻūth ilá al-ins wa-al-jānn. Hādhā talkhīṣ kitāb 'Ākām al-marjān fī aḥkām al-Jānn', lil-Shaykh al-Imām al-Qāḍī Badr al-Dīn al-Shiblī, raḥimahu Allāh, sammaytuhu Laqṭ al-marjān, lakhkhaṣtuhu ʻalá wajh artaḍīh wa-akthartu min al-ziyādāt fīh ..."

title: 880-02 al-Iqnāʻ fī ḥall alfāẓ Abī Shujāʻ : manuscript / Muḥammad ibn Aḥmad al-Shirbīnī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bihi thiqatī. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alldhī nashara lil-ʻulamāʼ aʻlāman, wa-thabbata lahum ʻalá al-ṣirāṭ al-mustaqīm aqdāman, wa-jaʻla maqām al-ʻilm aʻlā maqām, wa-faḍḍala al-ʻulamāʼ bi-iqāmat al-ḥujaj al-dīnīyah wa-maʻrifat al-aḥkām, wa-awdaʻa al-ʻārifīn laṭāʼif sirrih, fa-hum ahl al-muḥāḍarah wa-al-ilhām, wa-waffaqa al-ʻāmilīn li-khidmatihi fa-hajarū ladhīdh al-manām, wa-adhāqa al-muḥibbīn ladhdhata qurbihi wa-unsihi, fa-shaghalahum ʻan jamīʻ al-anām ..."

title: 880-02 Lawʻat al-shākī wa-damʻat al-bākī : manuscript / Ṣafī al-Dīn ʻAbd al-ʻAzīz ibn Sarāyā al-Ḥillī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Wa-mā tawfīqī [illā bi-hi]. Wa-lā budda min shakwá ilá dhī murūʼatin // yuwāsīka aw yuslīka aw yatawajjaʻu. Ammā baʻda ḥamd Allāh alladhī qaḍá bi-al-maḥabbah wa-al-wulūʻ, wa-ḥakama bi-ḥarq qalb kull ʻāshiq wa-walūʻ, wa-qaddara bi-hawān ahl al-hawá fa-lam yafraḥū bi-hujūm al-hujūʻ, wa-amar bi-shaqāhum aw saqāhum kaʼs al-tafarruq wa-al-tashawwuq wa-al-taḥarruq wa-al-dumūʻ. Wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad ṣāḥib al-ʻilm al-mazīd wa-al-ḥilm al-madīd wa-al-baṭsh al-shadīd wa-al-raʼy al-sadīd, al-qāʼil wa-qawluhu yudnī min bāligh al-ḥikmah kulla baʻīd: 'Man ʻashiqa, fa-katama, fa-ṣabara, fa-ʻaffa, fa-māta, fa-huwa shahīd' ..."

title: 880-01 Tārīkh al-aʼimmah al-aʻlām min aʼimmat al-Islām, mulakhkhaṣ min Tārīkh Ibn Khallikān : manuscript.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi nastaʻīn. al-Ḥamdu lillāh ahl al-ḥamd wa-mustawjib al-thanāʼ wa-al-majd, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad al-ʻalam al-fard, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-tābiʻīhi wa-ḥizbih ilá Yawm al-Dīn. Ammā baʻd, faqad qāla al-Shaykh al-ḥāfiẓ Abū Nuʻaym [al-Iṣbahānī] fī Tārīkhih [Ḥilyat al-awliyāʼ wa-ṭabaqāt al-aṣfiyāʼ]: 'Wa-minhum al-Imām al-kāmil, al-ʻālim al-ʻāmil, dhū al-sharaf al-munīf wa-al-khuluq al-ẓarīf, man la-hu al-sakhāʼ wa-al-karam, wa-huwa al-ḍiyāʼ fī al-ẓulam, awḍaḥa al-mushkilāt, wa-afṣaḥ ʻan al-muʻḍilāt, al-muntashir ʻilmuhu sharqan wa-gharban, al-mustafīḍ madhhabuhu barran wa-baḥran, al-muttabiʻ lil-sunan wa-al-āthār, wa-al-muqtadī bi-mā ijtamaʻa ʻalayhi al-Muhājirūn wa-al-Anṣār, iqtabasa ʻan al-aʼimmah al-aḥbār fa-ḥaddatha ʻanhu al-aʼimmah al-akhyār, al-Ḥijāzī al-Muṭṭaibī, Abū ʻAbd al-Raḥmān Muḥammad ibn Idrīs al-Shāfiʻī ..."

title: 880-03 Lawāqiḥ al-anwār fī ṭabaqāt al-akhyār. Al-Juzʼ 1 : manuscript / ʻAbd al-Wahhāb ibn Aḥmad al-Shaʻrānī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi thiqatī. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī khalaʻa ʻalá awliyāʼihi anʻāmahu, fa-hum bi-dhālika la-hu ḥāmidūn, wa-akhaṣṣahum bi-maḥabbatihi, wa-aqāmahum fī khidmatihi, fa-hum ʻalá ṣalātihim yuḥāfiẓūn, wa-daʻāhum ilá ḥaḍratihi, wa-aẓhara fīhā marātibahum, fa-al-sābiqūn al-sābiqūn, ulāʼika al-muqarrabūn, wa-fataḥa lahum abwāb ḥaḍratihi, wa-rafaʻa ʻan qulūbihim ḥijāb buʻdihi, fa-hum bayna yadayhi mutaʼaddibūn ..."

title: 880-02 al-Jawāhir al-sanīyah fī al-nisbah wa-al-karāmāt al-Aḥmadīyah : manuscript / ʻAbd al-Ṣamad ibn ʻAbd Allāh al-Miṣrī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi thiqatī. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī aṭlaʻa anwār al-Aḥmadīyah fī samāʼ al-shuhūd, wa-jalā jamālahā fī mirʼāt al-wujūd, fa-ashraqat anwāruhā ḥattá iqtabasa minhā kull mawjūd, wa-iktasaba min kamāl jamālihā man huwa min ahl al-kalām wa-al-kamāl wa-al-qabūl wa-al-iqbāl maʻdūd. Aḥmaduhu an āwānā ilá rukn shadīd qawī, wa-anhalanā min al-manhal al-ʻadhb al-rawī al-Aḥmadī, wa-awradanā baḥran mustamaddan min al-fayḍ al-Nabawī, minhu jamīʻ al-ʻālamīn tartawī ..."

title: 880-01 Sharḥ al-Nuzʹhah fī ʻilm al-ḥisāb : manuscript.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī lā tuḥṣī niʻamuhu jamīʻ al-ḥussāb. Wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Muḥammad wa-al-āl wa-al-aṣḥāb. Hādhā ḥall laṭīf li-muqaddimat al-Nuzʹhah fī ʻilm al-ḥisāb yakshifu ʻan wajhihā al-ḥijāb, wa-yujlī maʻāniyahā lil-aḥbāb, nafaʻa Allāh bi-hi al-ṭullāb. Qāla al-muṣannif, raḥimahu Allāh: Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, ay, Abtadiʼu. Wa-al-ism min al-sumū, ay, al-ʻulū, wa-qīla min al-wasm, ay, al-ʻalāmah. Wa-Allāh ʻalam lil-dhāt al-wājib al-wujūd. Wa-al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, ismān maʼkhūdhān min al-raḥmah, wa-hiya, lughatan, riqqat al-qalb, taqtaḍī al-tafaḍḍul, fa-huwa ghāyatuhā al-muʻtabar bihā hunā. Ammā baʻd, hiya lil-intiqāl min uslūb ilá ākhar, ay, mahmā yakun min shayʼ baʻda ḥamd Allāh al-sābiq lafẓan ..."

title: 880-02 al-Taʻrīfāt  : manuscript / ʻAlī ibn Muḥammad al-Sayyid al-Sharīf al-Jurjānī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh ḥaqqa ḥamdih, wa-al-ṣalāh ʻalá khayr khalqih Muḥammad wa-ālih. Wa-baʻd, fa-hādhihi taʻrīfāt jamaʻtuhā, wa-iṣṭilāḥāt akhadhtuhā min kutub al-qawm, wa-rattabtuhā ʻalá ḥurūf al-hijāʼ, min al-Alif wa-al-Bāʼ ilá al-Yāʼ, tasʹhīlan tanāwuluhā lil-ṭālibīn wa-taysīran taʻāṭīhā lil-rāghibīn. Wa-Allāh al-hādī wa-ʻalayhi iʻtimādī fī mabdaʼī wa-maʻādī. Bāb al-Alif wa-al-Bāʼ. al-Ibtidāʼ ..."

title: 880-02 al-Fawāʼid al-sanīyah : manuscript / Muḥammad ibn Ḥasan al-Kawākibī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh taʻālá jadduhu // subḥānahu fa-laysa yuḥṣá ḥamduh. Thumma al-ṣalātu wa-al-salāmu sarmadā // ʻalá al-Nabī al-Muṣṭafá nūru al-hudá ..."

title: 880-02 Jāmiʻ al-Fuṣūlayn : manuscript / Maḥmūd ibn Isrāʼīl ibn Qāḍī Simāwnah.
note_text: Incipit: There is no "Basmalah"; the text starts with: "Wa-qad jaʻalahu al-muʼallif arbaʻīn faṣlan, wa-ʻaddahā, fa-qāl: al-Faṣl al-awwal fī masāʼil al-qaḍāʼ wa-al-ḥukūmah, wa-mā yattaṣilu bi-hi min ʻazl al-qāḍī wa-al-waṣī wa-al-wakīl wa-al-maʼmūr wa-al-rasūl, wa-fīhi mā yaṣīru bi-hi dār al-Islām dar al-ḥarb, wa-al-murtadd, wa-fīhi bayān ḥadd al-ijtihād, wa-fīhi bayān mā yakūnu ḥukman min al-qāḍī, wa-fīhi bayān naṣb al-walī wa-al-qayyim wa-al-mutawallī wa-al-waṣī, wa-fī ākhirihi rujūʻ Muḥammad [i.e. al-Ustarūshanī], raḥimahu Allāh, ʻan an yaqūl: ʻIlm al-qāḍī kabayyinah, wa-fīhi baʻḍ mā yataʻallaqu bi-al-qaḍāʼ ..."

title: 880-02 al-Durr al-mukhtār : sharḥ Tanwīr al-abṣār. Al-Juzʼ 2 : manuscript / Muḥammad ibn ʻAlī al-Ḥaṣkafī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Kitāb al-Buyūʻ. Lammā faragha min ḥuqūq Allāh, al-ʻibādāt wa-al-ʻuqūbāt, sharaʻa fī ḥuqūq al-ʻibād, al-muʻāmalāt wa-munāsabatuhu lil-waqf, izālat al-mulk, lākin lā ilá mālik, wa-hunā ilayhi, fa-kānā ka-basīṭ wa-murakkab wa-jamʻ, li-kawnihi bi-iʻtibār kull min al-bayʻ wa-al-mabīʻ wa-al-thaman anwāʻan arbaʻah: Nāfidh, mawqūf, fāsid, bāṭil; wa-muqāyaḍah: Ṣarf, silm, bayʻ muṭlaq; wa-murābaḥah: Tawlīyah, waḍīʻh, musāwamah ..."

title: 880-02 al-Ghurar al-bahīyah fī sharḥ al-Bahjah al-Wardīyah : manuscript / Zakarīyā ibn Muḥammad al-Anṣārī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi thiqatī. Qāla al-Shaykh al-Imām al-ʻālim al-ʻallāmah, al-ruḥalah al-baḥr al-fahhāmah, mufīd al-ṭālibīn, ṣadr al-mudarrisīn, ḥujjat al-nāẓirīn, muḥyī al-Sunnah fī al-ʻālamīn, Abū Yaḥyá Zakarīyā ibn Muḥammad ibn Aḥmad al-Anṣārī al-Shāfiʻī, fasaḥa Allāh fī qabrih, wa-nafaʻanā wa-al-Muslimīn bi-barakatih, bi-Muḥammad wa-ālih: Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-Huwa ḥasbī wa-niʻma al-wakīl. Wa-ṣallá Allāh wa-sallam ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ālihi. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī aẓhara bahjat dīnihi al-qawīm, wa-hadá man waffaqahu ilá ṣirāṭ mustaqīm, aḥmaduhu ʻalá mā anʻama wa-ʻallama wa-saddada ilá al-ṣawāb wa-qawwam. Wa-ashhadu an lā ilāha illā Allāh al-wāḥid al-qahhār, al-karīm al-ḥalīm al-sattār. Wa-ashhadu anna Muḥammadan ʻabduhu wa-rasūluh wa-ṣafīyuhu wa-ḥabībuhu wa-khalīluh, ṣallá Allāh wa-sallama ʻalayhi wa-ʻalá ikhwānihi min al-nabīyīn, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-sāʼir al-ṣāliḥīn, wa-tābiʻīhim ilá Yawm al-Dīn. Wa-baʻd, fa-inna al-Bahjah al-Wardīyah fī al-fiqh lil-Imām al-muḥaqqiq, wa-al-baḥr al-mudaqqiq, Abī Ḥafṣ Zayn al-Dīn ʻUmar ibn Muẓaffar ibn ʻUmar ibn Abī al-Fawāris al-Wardī, ṭayyaba Allāh tharāh, wa-jaʻala al-Jannah maʼwāh, lammā kānat min abdaʻ kitāb fī al-fiqh ṣunnif, wa-ajmaʻ mawḍūʻ fīhi ʻalá miqdār ḥajmihi ullif, ṭalaba minnī baʻḍ al-aʻizzah ʻalayya min al-fuḍalāʼ al-mutaraddidīn ilayya an aḍaʻa ʻalayhā sharḥan yaḥullu alfāẓahā, wa-yubayyinu daqāʼiqahā, wa-yuḥaqqiqu masāʼilahā, wa-yuḥarriru dalāʼilahā, fa-ajabtuhu ilá dhālik bi-ʻawn al-Qādir al-Mālik ..."

title: 880-03 Kanz al-daqāʼiq : manuscript / Abū al-Barakāt ʻAbd Allāh ibn Aḥmad al-Nasafī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi nastaʻīn. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī aʻazza al-ʻilm fī al-aʻṣār, wa-aʻlá ḥizbahu fī al-amṣār, wa-al-ṣalāh ʻalá Rasūlihi al-mukhtaṣṣ bi-hādhā al-faḍl al-ʻaẓīm, wa-ʻalá ālihi alladhīn fāzū minhu bi-ḥaẓẓ jasīm. Qāla Mawlānā al-ḥabr al-niḥrīr, ṣāḥib al-bayān wa-al-banān fī al-taqrīr wa-al-taḥrīr, kāshif al-mushkilāt wa-al-muʻḍilāt, mubayyin al-kināyāt wa-al-ishārāt, manbaʻ al-ʻulá, ʻalam al-hudá, afḍal al-wará, ḥāfiẓ al-ḥaqq wa-al-millah wa-al-dīn, shams al-Islām wa-al-Muslimīn, wārith al-anbiyāʼ wa-al-mursalīn, Abū al-Barakāt ʻAbd Allāh ibn Aḥmad ibn Maḥmūd al-Nasafī, afāḍa Allāh ʻalayhi anwār raḥmatih, wa-taghammadahu bi-maghfaratih: Lammā raʼaytu al-himam māʼilah ilá al-mukhtaṣarāt, wa-al-ṭibāʻ rāghibah fī al-muṭawwalāt aradtu an ulakhkhiṣa al-Wāfī, bi-dhikr mā ʻamma wuqūʻuh wa-kathura wujūduh li-yakthura fāʼiduh wa-yatawaffara ʻāʼiduh ..."

title: 880-03 Kanz al-daqāʼiq : manuscript / Abū al-Barakāt ʻAbd Allāh ibn Aḥmad al-Nasafī.
note_text: Incipit: The beginning is missing; text starts with: "... wuqūʻuhu wa-kathura wujūduhu, li-takthura fāʼidatuhu, wa-tatawaffara ʻāʼidatuhu, fa-sharaʻtu fīhi baʻda iltimās ṭāʼifah min aʻyān al-afāḍil wa-afāḍil al-aʻyān alladhīna hum bi-manzilat al-insān lil-ʻayn wa-al-ʻayn lil-insān, maʻa mā bī min al-ʻawāʼiq. Wa-sammaytuhu bi-Kanz al-daqāʼiq, wa-huwa wa-in khalá min al-ghuwayṣāt wa-al-muʻḍilāt, fa-qad taḥallá bi-masāʼil al-fatāwá wa-al-wāqiʻāt, muʻlaman bi-tilka al-ʻalāmāt. Wa-ziyādat al-Ṭāʼ lil-iṭlāqāt. Wa-Allāh al-muwaffiq lil-itmām wa-al-muyassir lil-ikhtitām ..."

title: 880-02 al-Muntazaʻ al-mukhtār min al-Ghayth al-midrār al-mufattiḥ li-kamāʼim al-Azʹhār : manuscript / ʻAbd Allāh ibn Abī al-Qāsim ibn Miftāḥ.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Muqaddimah lā yasaʻu al-muqallid jahluhā. al-Maʻná innahu lā yajūzu la-hu al-ikhlāl bi-maʻrifatihā. Faṣl dhakara fīhi Mawlānā [... ...] man yajūzu la-hu al-taqlīd wa-man yaḥrumu ʻalayhi, wa-mā yajūzu al-taqlīd fīhi min al-aḥkām wa-mā lā yajūz, fa-qāl: al-Taqlīd, wa-huwa qabūl qawl al-ghayr min ghayr an tuṭālibahu bi-ḥujjah fī al-masāʼil al-farʻīyah, iḥtirāz min al-uṣūlīyah, sawāʼ akānat fī uṣūl al-dīn, aw uṣūl al-fiqh, aw uṣūl al-qasam ...".

title: 880-03 al-Ishārāt fī ʻilm al-ʻibārāt : manuscript / Khalīl ibn Shāhīn al-Ẓāhirī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī khalaqa Ādam min ṭīn, thumma nafakha fīhi rūḥan wa-iṣṭafāhu lil-risālah, kamā iṣṭafá Idrīs min baʻdihi Nūḥan, wa-ittakhadha Ibrāhīm khalīlan, wa-Mūsá kalīman, wa-Ismāʻīl dhabīḥan, wa-naṣara Hūdan ʻalá ʻĀd, wa-alāna al-ḥadīd li-Dāwūd, wa-wassaʻa li-Sulaymān rawḥan wa-sakhkhara la-hu rīḥan ..."

title: 880-02 al-ʻIqd al-manẓūm fī dhikr afāḍil al-Rūm : manuscript / ʻAlī ibn Bālī Manq.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Yā man qaddara al-ājāl wa-jaʻala lahā madadan, wa-dabbara al-umūr wa-aḥṣá kulla shayʼin ʻadadan, Ṣalli ʻalá Muḥammad, khayr man naṭaqa bi-al-ṣawāb, wa-ūtiya al-ḥikmah wa-faṣl al-khiṭāb, wa-khutima bi-hi al-Risālah wa-al-Kitāb, wa-man tabiʻahu bi-iḥsān min al-āl wa-al-aṣḥāb. Wa-baʻd, fa-naḥnu naquṣṣu ʻalayka aḥsan al-qaṣaṣ wa-al-akhbār min tawārīkh al-ʻulamāʼ al-kibār wa-al-mashāyikh al-akhyār alladhīna darajū fī zamānī, wa-shālat naʻāmatuhum fī ʻaṣrī wa-awānī, min alladhīna tabarraktu bi-ṣuḥbatihim, aw tasharraftu bi-mujarrad ruʼyatihim ..."

title: 880-02 Ḥāshiyah ʻalá al-Fawāʼid al-Shinshawrīyah : manuscript / Muḥammad ibn Sālim al-Ḥifnī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi thiqatī. Qāla al-Shaykh al-Imām wa-al-ḥabr al-humām, murabbī al-sālikīn wa-mufīd al-ṭālibīn, al-ʻālim al-ʻāmil wa-al-wāṣil al-kāmil, alladhī huwa li-ʻawārif al-maʻārif ḥāwī, Sayyidunā wa-Mawlānā al-Shaykh Muḥammad al-Ḥifnāwī, aṭlaʻa Allāh fī samāʼ al-maʻālī Shams isʻādih, wa-ghamaranī wa-al-Muslimīn bi-wābil amdādih. Āmīn: Ḥamdan li-man naṣaba li-taḥrīr fiqh al-mawārīth aʻlāman, wa-jaʻala lahum min thamarāt imtithāl 'Taʻallamū al-farāʼiḍ wa-ʻallimūhu' aʻlāman ... Ammā baʻd, fa-yaqūlu faqīr Mawlāhu al-ghanī, asīr al-masāwī, Muḥammad al-Ḥifnī: Qad ṭalaba minnī baʻḍ aʻizzāʼ aḥbāb, faḍlan bulaghāʼ adhkiyāʼ anjāb an uʻalliqa ʻalá al-Fawāʼid al-Shinshawrīyah mā yataʻallaqu bi-īḍāḥ tarākībih bi-ṭuruq ījāzīyah, māʼilan ʻan al-ikthār mimmā mallat minhu al-asmāʻ bādhil al-juhd fī ittibāʻ al-muḥtāj ilayhi atamma ittibāʻ, fa-ajabtuhu li-mā ṭalaba, rājiyan bi-barakatihi bulūgh al-arab. Qawluhu 'al-ʻĀlamīn' ..."

title: 880-02 al-Fatāwá al-kubrá. Al-Juzʼ 1 : manuscript / Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad ibn Ḥajar al-Haythamī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi thiqatī, wa-ʻalayhi tawakkulī. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī jaʻala Aḥmad aʻlam hādhihi al-ummah, wa-shihābahā alladhī yuzīlu ʻanhā min dujá al-ishkāl kull ẓulmah, wa-nayyirahā al-waqqād alladhī yujlī bi-futyāhu al-masāʼil al-mudlahimmah, wa-bayyana al-ṣawāb minhā, fa-lam yakun amruhā ʻalaynā ghummah. Naḥmaduhu ḥamda man nāla min al-ʻulūm awfar naṣīb, wa-nashkuruhu shukra man ijtahada fīhā fa-kāna fī ijtihādihi dhā sahmin muṣīb. Wa-ashhadu an lā ilāha illā Allāh waḥdahu, lā sharīka la-hu shahādatan naʻtadduhā lil-jawāb fī yawm al-suʼāl, wa-nattakhidhuhā dhakhīratan fī al-māḍī wa-al-mustaqbal wa-al-ḥāl. Wa-ashhadu anna Sayyidanā Muḥammadan ʻabduhu wa-rasūluh alladhī laysa li-millatihi ʻalá ṭūl al-madā [al-madá] durūs, wa-lā li-ʻulamāʼ ummatihi mazīyah illā bi-maḥāsin al-wujūh al-bādiyah fī muṣannafātihim wa-al-durūs ..."
